
1a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi bcud len nad thams cad 'joms shing lus kyi stobs rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba bzhugs//
1b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sarbe shwa ra ra se ya na ro ka ha ri pa rir puSh+Ta ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ thams cad kyi
1b2(mdo 'grel): dbang phyug bcud len nad thams cad 'joms shing lus kyi stobs rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa
1b3(mdo 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po dngul chu sbyang ba'i don du so phag gi phye ma dang sbyar la lan bdun gyi bar du btags shing sbyang
1b4(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o/ /de'i skabs su yang nyi ma la bdug par bya'o/ /shing a kon gyi 'o mas lan bdun gyi bar du btags shing
2a1(mdo 'grel): sbyang bar bya'o/ /de'i skabs su yang nyi ma la bdug par bya'o/ /yang shing be'un gyi 'o mas sngar bzhin no/ /kaN+Da'i
2a2(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba'i shing tsher ma can gyi khu bas sngar bzhin no/ /ku ma ri'i khu bas sngar bzhin no/ /tsi tra'i khu bas sngar bzhin no/ /mdze
2a3(mdo 'grel): tsha'i khu bas sngar bzhin no/ /sman da rnams bkrus shing dngul chu bzung ngo/ /ling gi zhes bya ba'i sman 'dab ma gsum pa/ ro tsha ba/
2a4(mdo 'grel): me tog med pa dang/ sdong bu mtho gang tsam yod pa'i khu ba blugs nas btags pas skam zhing skud pa ltar drang du 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /
2b1(mdo 'grel): zangs spyod bar 'dod pas srab mor byas la skyur po'i nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du sbang ngo/ /dar ba'i chur khu la yang de bzhin no/ /legs par bkru bar
2b2(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas zangs dang mu zi mnyam par byas la rdza gong nang du du ba mi 'tshor bar bya'o/ /dngul lta bur dkar por 'gyur ro/ /bsha' tshe sbyong ba
2b3(mdo 'grel): la pong gi khu bas sngar bzhin no/ /lcags bsad par 'dod pas ba'i chu la 'bru gsum btab la srab mor byas la bzhug go /bcug pa ni bsreg
2b4(mdo 'grel): pas so/ /phyi nas kyang 'bru gsum bcug la zangs bzhin no/ /lhang tshor bsad par 'dod pas zhib tu btags la skyur pos bcug la zangs bzhin
2b5(mdo 'grel): no// //a ra d+ha'i lo ma ni gnyen po yin te zangs bzhin no/ /po'i lci bag kha mnan par bya'o/ /rngo pha wang bsad par 'dod pas k+Shi ri kand+ha'i lo
3a1(mdo 'grel): mas nyi ma la lan bdun bdug par bya'o/ /mar khu chand+he bcug pa sngar gyi zangs bzhin no/ /dkar por song ba ni 'byongs pa'o// //
3a2(mdo 'grel): dngul sbyang bar 'dod pas nir bi si'i khu bas lan bdun gyi bar du lcags bzhin du bsad par bya'o/ /ji ltar dngul chu bsad pa bzhin b+hi ma la yang
3a3(mdo 'grel): bsad par bya'o/ /gser sbyang bar 'dod pas ka tsa na'i khu ba ji ltar zangs gsod pa bzhin bya'o/ /ji ltar gser gsod pa bzhin su ba ki ta yang de
3a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin no/ /de ltar sbyang ba thams cad cha mnyam por byas la a ba ni cha gsum mo/ /de ltar zhib tu btags la gong bur bya'o/ /nad pa la ra ti bzhi
3a5(mdo 'grel): bzhi byin na nad thams cad 'phrog go /skyur po dang sngo spang ngo/ /phye dang khur ba'ang spangs la ra ti bzhi bzhi zla ba drug tu zos na skra dkar dang gnyer ma spong
3b1(mdo 'grel): zhing tsho nyi zla dang mnyam mo/ /mtshon gyis mi chod cing bud med la khu ba 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zla ba drug gi bar du gru la phyin na 'bying ba bsrung ngo/ /dbang phyug gis bstan pa'i rin po che'i bcud len
3b2(mdo 'grel): grub pa rdzogs so// //ha rid+ho bar gyi rnal 'byor pa shi ba dA sha dang/ oryan pas b+hu twar bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ra sA ya Na shAstra
3b3(mdo 'grel): udtri ti/ bod skad du/ gser 'gyur gyi bstan bcos bsdus pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun mkhyen zhi ba kun ster ba/ /dpal mgon mchog tu zhi bar mdzad/ /longs spyod
3b4(mdo 'grel): grol ba rab ster ba'i/ /dbang phyug dam pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /phra dang sbom las rnam par grol/ /gsal dang mi gsal mchog tu zhi/ /dpal dang longs spyod gol ster ma/ /mchog gi dbang
3b5(mdo 'grel): phyug mar phyag 'tshal/ /mchog tu sra ba'i dngul chu yi/ /las kyi sbyor ba nges par sbyar/ /de nyid rab sbyor mdza' la ni/ /yon tan skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ /rgyal ba yis ni nad 'joms shing/ /smin
3b6(mdo 'grel): ba yis ni dbul po spong/ /bcings pa yis ni mkha' la 'gro /dngul chu'i yon tan rnam gsum mo/ /gal te lhang cher smin na yon tan brgyad/ /mu zi zhu gyur 'di la yon tan drug /dngul chu mnyam
4a1(mdo 'grel): du gser gyis nges bcings na/ /khyod kyi mkha' la 'gro ba gang gis 'gog /gsha' tse dngul chu'i ro yis mnyam du bsnun/ /de phyed zla ba gnyis pa'i rim pa yis/ /gsha' tshe zla
4a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyogs gsungs gser sbyor las/ /zangs ma drug cu rtsa bzhi 'bigs par byed/ /de nyid thig le mi gtor shing/ /dmar skya'i mdog ni nor ster ro/ /me la gnas shing mi g.yo gi /nam mkha' 
4a3(mdo 'grel): smin pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /gang la dngul chu mnyam du bzhu/ /dngul dang yang na gser dag gam/ /gcig tu gyur cing mi zad pa/ /de ni bcings pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lhang tsher zhu ba gang zhig gis/ /
4a4(mdo 'grel): dngul chu dbang du byas gyur na/ /de yis chos dang nor dag ni /sgo dag nye bar nye ba yin/ /kha yang nam mkha' za ba dang/ /ser po za bas mu zi dang/ /gser gyi mngal gyi khu ba nyid/ /nor 'dzin steng
4a5(mdo 'grel): na shin tu dkon/ /rnyings min ma yin khyab pa yi/ /dmar min ma yin gzhan mi 'tsho/ /smin dang rnyings pa nyid kyis ni/ bye ba rnams ni 'bigs par 'gyur/ /de nas dngos po'i grangs brjod de/ /'od ldan
4a6(mdo 'grel): lcags ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /de dngos med na lcags rnon po/ /ra gan zho phyed gsha' tshe zangs/ /sgra gcan gser dang dkar po rnams/ /lcags rnams brgyad du gsungs pa ste/ /dngul chu'i smin pa so/
4b1(mdo 'grel): so la/ /sbyang ba nyid du bya ba ste/ /gser 'gyur las la dngul chu rnams/ /mu zi de bzhin dri med dang/ /mAk+Shi ka dang de bzhin mtshal/ /ku NaTI kA shi ki drug /gser gyi btsag dang ba bla rnams/ /shes rab ldan pas 'bad pas sbyangs/ /mkhas ?
4b2(mdo 'grel): las rnams shes par bya/ /gser gyi las rnams ba bla yis/ /kha rdog ser dang dkar po'i khams/ /lhang cher de bzhin sau bI ra/ /kAM gu Sha tha rnams so sor smin/ /de rnams rtags ni bshad par bya/ /sbyangs pas khu ba rnams ni ltung/ /'od ldan
4b3(mdo 'grel): yang zhing khu pa dkar/ /rnon po mchog tu rnon por 'gyur/ /zangs ma dmar dang sra ba ste/ /rigs ni gsum du dbye ba las/ /bal yul las byung mchog yin te/ /'dab mar gyur pa 'bring du rig /tha ma 'od kyi dri mar shes/ /las ni legs
4b4(mdo 'grel): bar sbyar bar bya/ /sbyangs pas khyab byed nyid dang ni/ /dngul chu'i smin pa nyid la phan/ /zha nye nag po dkar bar shes/ /rang bzhin yang zhing khu ba can/ /gsha' tshe dri dang ldan pa mchog /tshogs pa nag cir myur du 'ju/ /myur du 'ju pa'i rang bzhin
4b5(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /dkar por shin tu yongs su grags/ /rag na kha gser 'dra zhing/ /dri ma len cing dri dang ldan/ /drag cing brtan pa'i khu ba nyid/ /zangs kyi khams ni ma thug pa'o/ /sgra ldan ni ma yang dag ldan/ /sra zhing mchog tu brtan gyur ba/ /zangs dang gsha' tsho
4b6(mdo 'grel): dge bsres ba/ /mthug cing myur du 'ju ba'o/ /bcad na dkar zhing bdar na ser/ /bsregs na gur gum lta bu dang/ /snum dang nyung dus lci ba ste/ /gser gyi mtshan nyid rnam pa drug /skar ma kunda'i mdog dang mtshungs/ /snum dang skar ma rab tu ster/ /
4b7(mdo 'grel): yon tan drug cu rtsa bzhi ni/ /rigs kyi mtshan nyid dag tu bshad/ /sngon rjes ji lta de bzhin du/ /bsdus nas bdag gis rab gshad bya/ /'od ldan la sogs lcags rnams kyis/ /sbyangs nas snying stobs dgug pa ste/ /'od ldan lcags
5a1(mdo 'grel): sam yang na rno/ /gser ni dgug cing phye mar bya/ /tshwe yi sde tshan ji snyed dang/ /dri chu'i sde tshan sbyar bar bya/ /tshwa dang dri chu de nyid kyis/ /blo dang ldan pas phye mar bya/ /gong bu gsum du slangs yang ni/ /sgyur rtsi rnam ba mang
5a2(mdo 'grel): pos gdul/ /de ni rtsa ba nyid du bya/ /slar yang skyur rtsis sbyar bar bya/ /'di yis zangs dang 'od ldan na ma/ /yang na rmon po 'di yis sbyad/ /gleng chen rus phye yang dag sbyor/ /'ching bu'i phye mas nges sbyar bya/ /lan ni bdun gyi bar du ni/ /rA yi dri chus gtor
5a3(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ /de 'dir zangs ni sbyar bar bya/ /blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis bshad/ /'di yis zangs ni rab mchog tu/ /sbyad bya las rnams thams cad la/ /de nas ra gan de bzhin du/ /sbyang pa bdag gis rab bshad bya/ /'bad pa yis ni bdar bar bya/ /phye
5a4(mdo 'grel): ma zhib mo nyid du bya/ /tshwa bcug dri yi chu yis ni/ /mkhas pas nyi ma bdun du mnye/ /slar yang skyur ma dang bcas pas/ /kod bu gsum du sbyin par bya/ /'di yi spyad ba bshad pa ni/ /ra gan cho ga ji bzhin no/ /'khar ba 'bad pas bdar bya ste/ /phye ma
5a5(mdo 'grel): zhib mo nyid du bya/ /tshwa bcug dri yi chu yis ni/ /phye ma nyid ni slar yang sbyad/ /lan bdun gyi ni bar du sbyang/ /slar yang skyur mos sbyad bar bya/ /zha nye byin nas mel bsreg /ji srid zangs su ma gyur bar/ /zangs kyi gzugs gyur gang la ni//
5a6(mdo 'grel): slar yang zangs sbyin spyad bar bya/ /sgra ldan sbyang bar bshad pa yi/ /gtso bo dag ni bdag gi bshad/ /zha nye sbyad bar bshad pa yang/ /ji ltar rigs par bdag gis bshad/ /ba bla'i phye mas 'bar bzhin du/ /shi ri khaN+Da'i 'o mas sbyad//
5a7(mdo 'grel): mang por sbyang zhing phye ma dag /nyi ma la ni sbyang bar bya/ /me nas zhu dang phye ma la/ /zha nye yis ni nges par sbyar/ /lan bdun g yis ni dag par 'gyur/ /'bras bu gsum gyi khu bas bkru/ /'di yi sbyad bar bshad pa ni/ /zha nye gsha cho
5b1(mdo 'grel): dge bzhin bshad/ /kun Ti yi dngos po dang/ /chad gi me tog khu ba yi/ /de yi phye ma sbyar bar bya/ /gsha' tse res kyis yang yang du/ /'od kyi blo gros mar khu dang/ /yang na ka rany+dza mar khus/ /bkru zhing gtor ba nyid du bya/ /sbyar ba mang du gsungs pa yis/ /
5b2(mdo 'grel): nyes ba mang po rnams bar spong/ /zha nye cung zad byin nas ni/ /skad ma mkhas pas me la bsreg /de bzhin gyur pa dri chu yis/ /blo dang ldan pas lan gsum bku/ /de nas mdza' dang bar dag tu/ /lan bdun du ni bkru bar bya/ /de yis dag par 'gyur pa
5b3(mdo 'grel): ste/ /'di la rnam bar spyad mi bya/ /gser mi sbyong bar bshad pa yi/ /yon tan rnams ni drug de yi/ /dang po tsha dang dri chu yis/ /ji snyed skyur rtsis bkru bar bya/ /mar dang sprad dag bsres pa yis/ /byug pas slar yang mdzad mi 'gyur/ /'di yis 'dod?
5b4(mdo 'grel): grub 'grub par byed/ /gser gyi rim ba ji bzhin no/ /lcags rnams gdul bar gsungs pa yi/ /ji ltar mi 'gyur sbyor ba las/ /gser dngul ji lta ba de bzhin/ /'od ldan lcags dag ji snyed dang/ /de yi dangs po rnon po la/ /dang po sbyang bar
5b5(mdo 'grel): byas nas ni/ /phyi nas las kyis mnyam du brtsam/ /mdog bzang mAk+She ka nyid dang/ /tshwa dang skyur mo dag gi sbyar/ /gser 'gyur rtsi'i bstan bcos ji snyed pa'o// //*/ /sku gsung thugS gyi cha tshad// //
5b6(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shasta la n+ya grod+ha pa ri maN+Da la bud+d+ha pra ti ma la ga ? na ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan nyid/ /mtho bcu pa shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang bral
5b7(mdo 'grel): ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yum la chos ston du dga' ldan du gshegs pa'i tshe/ /bcom ldan 'das la shA ri'i 
6a1(mdo 'grel): bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mi zhugs tsan sku ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bung mi bzhugs sam/ da yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus su/
6a2(mdo 'grel): mchod pa dang sti stang du bya ba'i ched du/ sku'i gzugs brnyan shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar sku ji tsam par 'dom yang de tsam la/ 'dom ci tsam par sku yang de tsam byed du gzhug ste/ yan lag dang/ nyid lag dang/ cha shas dang/ mchu zheng? dang/ srid dang
6a3(mdo 'grel): tshigs bcas pa dang/ 'byung ba thams cad kyi gtsug tor la sogs pa'i tshad ji lta ba bzhin bshad kyis nyon cig /nyid kyi sor gyi tshad rnams kyi/ /brgya las nyi shu tham pas lhag /gtsug tor la ni sor bzhi ste/ /dbu skra'i gnas kyang de bzhin te//
6a4(mdo 'grel): sor ni phye dang bcu gsum gyis/ /cha gsum dbye ste zhal de dang/ /dpral ba dang ni shangs nyid de/ /de ltar gsum gyi de dag ni/ /sor bzhi lhag dang bcas pa ste/ /o sko la ni sor gnyis so/ /o sko'i zheng dang byung ba ni/ /sor bzhi dag tu bzhed
6a5(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /ma mchu'i dkyus su sor gnyis te/ /'og tu rngams su sor gcig yin/ /dbus su bum pa'i ris dgong de/ /grwa ni sor ba cig yin par bshad/ /mkhas pa dag gis zhal gyi dkyus/ /sor bzhi dag tu bya ba yin/ /ji ltar skyos bzhin
6a6(mdo 'grel): tshoms rnams kyang/ /bzhi bcu bkod pa yin par bshad/ /yas mchu sor ni phyed dang gnyis/ /rngams dang gyur ba'ang de bzhin no/ /de yi gong na bzhin yod pa/ /sor ngag gis ni sum char bya/ /shangs kyi zhed du sor gnyis te/ /'phang du
6a7(mdo 'grel): sor ni phyed dang gnyis/ /shangs dag gis ni bug yang/ /sor phyed zlum po dag tu bshad/ /shangs kyi spubs ni snyoms pa dang/ /dbus kyi zheng ni sor phyed do/ /skyan dbang sor gnyis shes bya ste/ /spyan gnyis dkyus ni sor bzhi'o//
6b1(mdo 'grel): zheng du sor gsum de gnyis kyi/ /dbus su 'bras bu gsum cha'o/ /spyan la cha lnga sor bzhi ste/ /de dag la ni 'tshams gsum mo/ /spyan gyi 'phang ni sor dag gi /bzhi cha dag tu grags pa yin/ /spyan gyi spubs ni sor gsum ste/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bya/ /smin ma'i bar ni
6b2(mdo 'grel): sor dag gi phyed dang gnyis su grags pa yin/ /smin ma'i sbubs su mtho ba dang/ /smin dkyus sor bzhir shes par bya/ /de dang snyan gyi mchog mar mnyam/ /snyan gnyis zheng ni sor gnyis yin/ /de gnyis phug sgo sor phyed do/ /'phang du sor gcig shes par bya/ /rne'u
6b3(mdo 'grel): dag la ni sor phyed de/ /snyan gyi cho ga rnams kyi zheng/ /sor dag gi ni bzhi cha yin/ /snyan gyi nang zheng cha dag la/ /sor na phyed dang gsum yin no/ /snyan shal dang ni dbu skra'i mdza' / /ci mdzes bya yi klad pa la/ /gsum ste snyan nas snyan dag tu/ /sor ni bco brgyad
6b4(mdo 'grel): shes bya dang/ /de gnyis bar gyi rgyab logs su/ /so ni bcu bzhir 'dong bya dang/ /dbu mdza' 'khor bar sor dag ni/ /sum cu gnyis po rnams yin no/ /snyan gyi srid du sor bzhi ste/ /mgur gyi zheng ni sor brgyad yin/ /sbom dag tu ni sor rnams kyi/ /nyi shu rtsa
6b5(mdo 'grel): bzhi dag tu bya/ /mgur gyi mdza' nas sor bcu gnyis/ /khrag pa'o de ni thal gong zhes/ /zhal gyi tshab ni bzhi dag gis/ /lag pa dag gi srid bstan te/ /spung pa lin sor nyi shu/ /de bzhin lag dar bcu drug go /phyag mgul 'khor ba'ang de bzhin no/ /mkhrig ma
6b6(mdo 'grel): nas ni khyag gi rtser/ /sor ni bcu gnyis rab tu grags/ /phyag 'thil srid du sor bdun te/ /de yi zheng ni lnga yin no/ /'thil du dung dang 'khor lo dang/ /pad+ma lcags kyu nyid kyang yin no/ /phyag mtshan rnams kyi gzugs dag gi /rnam pa tha dad bri bar bya/ /gung
6b7(mdo 'grel): mo'i srid dang sor lnga ste/ /tshigs phyed kyis thung 'dzub mo yin/ /srin lags dag ni sor rnams kyis/ /phyed kyis thung ba nyid du bya/ /mthe'u chung dag ni srin lag gi /tshigs kyi phyed kyis thung bar bya/ /sor mo thams cad tshigs gsum ste/ /de dag tshigs
7a1(mdo 'grel): phyed sen mo'o/ /mkhrigs ma yin gong dag gi /sor bzhi dang bcas mtho bong ngo/ /sboms su yang ni de srid do/ /de ni tshigs gnyis phyed sen me/ /mthe bo nas na 'dzub mo'i bar/ /sor gsum dag tu bshad pa yin/ /mkhris
7a2(mdo 'grel): ma nas ni mthe'u chung ngu/ /srid ni sor lnga dag tu bya/ /mgur nas thugs ka'i bar dag ni/ /thugs ka nas ni lte ba dang/ nu ma gnyis kyi bar dag tu/ /song ni phyed dang bcu gsum yin/ /num gnyis kyi gang dag nas/ /mtshan ? du ni sor drug bya/ /mthong
7a3(mdo 'grel): ga dag gi 'phel ga ni/ /song ni nyi shu rtsa lnga yin/ /mthong gnas ni rgyab 'khor bar/ /ser ni lnga bcu rtsa drug yin/ /nu ma nas ni lte ba'i bar/ /sor ni bcu drug kho nar 'dod/ /zas? dang zab tshigs bcas pa yi/ /lte ba khud ni sor cig po/ /lte ba'i
7a4(mdo 'grel): dbus nas 'khor bar ni/ /sor ni bzhi bcu tham pa yin/ /sta zur dag nas zheng du ni/ /sor ni bcos brgyad khe na yin/ /lte ba pho mtshan drung bar der/ /sor ni phyed dang bcu gsum yin/ /smad ke de yi phyed dag nas/ /dge pa la ni sor bzhi yin/ /brla
7a5(mdo 'grel): yi sboms su sum cu gnyis srid du nyi shu rtsa lnga sto/ /de dag gi ni dbus kyi sboms/ /nyi shu rtsa ni brgyad yin no/ /tshigs bcas lha nga sor bzhi ste/ /long bu sor gsum dag tu bya/ /byin pa zlum zhing drang po la/ /sor ni nyi shu rtsa lnga yin/ /de
7a6(mdo 'grel): yi dbus kyi sboms su ni/ /sor ni bcu drug dag tu bshad/ /lor bu'i phyed nas sor bcu gnyis/ /lor bu'i mdza' ma sor gnyis te/ /cing ba 'byung ba sor bzhi yin/ /sor gsum dag tu bya ba yin/ /zhabs gnyis sor ni cig
7a7(mdo 'grel): gnyis las/ ngos kyi rngams ni sor cig ste/ /sor mo lnga po de dag ni/ /tshigs gnyis tshigs phyed sen mo ste/ /mthe ba'i spoms su sor lnga yin/ /de yi srid du song gsum ste/ /mdor na mthe bo kho na yin/ /'dzub mo yin srid kyang yin
7b1(mdo 'grel): chen bcu drug brgyad phyed kyis/ /lhag ma cig pas cig lhung ngo/ /sor mo rnams la 'phang sor cig /mthe bong de sor phyed dang gnyis/ /brgyan pa'i zhabs kyi steng dag ni/ /rus sbal rgyab ltar gang bar bya/ /zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa'i mtshan/ /mnyam
7b2(mdo 'grel): 'zar? des dang ma snyongs? la/ /'khor lo dung dang dpal be'u bcas /shin tu sba ba'i ri mo bri/ /de lta bu yi kun mkhyen gyi/ /zhabs ni shin tu sngags par bshad/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan nyid mtho bcu pa/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar mchu zhe dgab pa zhes
7b3(mdo 'grel): bya ba 'di yongs su rdzogs so/ //rgya gar skad du/ saM bud+d+ha b+ha Shi ta pra ti ma lak+Sha Na bi ba NaM? ma/ bod skad du /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i sku gzugs kyi tshad kyi rnam 'grel zhes bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal
7b4(mdo 'grel): lo/ /sku gnyis rjes skyes rgyal ba yin/ /sku la phyag 'tshal de nas ni/ /bdag gi nges pas mtshan nyid de/ ji ltar nus bzhin rnam 'grol bri/ /ji ltar bsnyen bkur bar bgyi zhes bya ba ni nye bar spyad ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i cha shas kyi mtshan nyis ci gad+ha?
7b5(mdo 'grel): ltar mchu zheng yongs su gdab? zhes pa ni n+ya grod+ha ni shing ljon pa ste/ de'i yal gam chu zheng gab blta bu'o/ /'di 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la gsungs so zhes pa mi kha cig go /gzhan ni 'di sku khyad par la gsungs ba'i phyir na phyag gnyis logs su brkyang ba ni ?
7b6(mdo 'grel): gang ste/ ji srid sku'i tshad de srid 'dom gyi srid du yang gsungs so/ /ji srid ces pa la sogs pa'i 'jam pa ni snum pa'i chos nyid do/ /mdzes pa ni yid 'phrog pa'o/ /'gyang bag dang ldan pa ni gsum dgu la sogs pa'i yon tan no/ /bdun
7b7(mdo 'grel): mtho ba zhes pa ni cha shas bdun steng du mtho ba ste/ gang las na zhabs gnyis dang/ phyag gnyis dang/ thal gong gnyis dang mgrin pa zhes so/ /de la zhes pa la sogs pas ni srid la sogs pa lnga po rnams kyi tshad gsungs pa bshad par bya'o/ /byang chub
8a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs ba ni ji ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba ma lus pa nyon cig ces pa'o/ /dbu skra'i gnas dang de gnyis la zhes pa ni dbral ba'i steng dang gtsug ter 'og la sor mo bzhi'o/ /gtsug tor la yang sor mo bzhi'o/ /de gnyis ni song
8a2(mdo 'grel): mo bzhir gsungs so/ /ser mo phyed dang bcu gsum zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la'o/ /de'i sum cha dbral ba la sogs ba'i dbye ba las so/ /kos ko'i mdza' gang gi de'i kos ka'? mdza' dang shangs kyi 'og gi mthar thug ba'i gnas la'o/ /kos ko'i mdza' ni lhag bcas pa ni
8a3(mdo 'grel): sor phyed kyis lhag pa nyid do/ /kos ko la ni sor gnyis ni logs kyi rgyur ste/ steng yi srid ma yin ba zhes so/ /sor mo gsum po 'di srid ste/ steng cung zad mtho ba zhes khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o/ lhag dang bcas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnamS
8a4(mdo 'grel): la mthong ngo/ /'byung sa steng du cha yis so zhes pa'i che'i skra yis sor mo gsum gyi char bshad do/ /'byung sa mtho ba 'di'i cha la bim a'i ri mo zhes te/ bim pa'i 'bras bu'i rnam pa'i rim zhes pa'i don to/ /zhal gyi grwa ni cha gcig ste/ sor mo gcig go /ji
8a5(mdo 'grel): ltar byung ba ste/ ji ltar 'khrungs pa bzhin choms kyi rgyal po la sogs pa rim pas gang rnams kyi rnam par bkod pa gsungs pa de bzhin du'o/ /sor mo'i sum cha zhes pa ni sor mo'i sum chas pad sgros te de bzhin du sna'i rtse mo'i 'og du'o/ /mchu'i steng du
8a6(mdo 'grel): chu 'bab pa'i rnam pa lta bu'i pad? sgros so/ /sma ra'i gnas kyi dbus su mtshams 'dra ba'o/ /sor mo phyed mnyam pa zhes khyad par gyi bsdu ba ste/ shangs kyi bug zhes pa ni shangs kyi spubs zlum por 'khyil ba'o/ /shangs kyi rgyud dang shangs kyi rtse mo
8a7(mdo 'grel): zhal dang mnyam ba'o/ /cha phyed ni sor mo phyed do/ /spyan gyi bar la zhes pa ni spyan dag gi dbus la sor mo ste sor mo gcig gi chad do/ /dbral ba'i 'og spyan gnyis kyi nye bshangs kyi logs la re re ji srid ba zhes so/ /spyan gyi 'bras bu'i
8b1(mdo 'grel): dbus kyi snying po de la sor gnyis kyi lnga chas shes par bya'o zhes ni kha cig go /de bzhin du sor gcig gi lnga cha la byed do zhes te/ 'di ni rags pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs so/ /sor gnyis sor gsum dag ces pa ni sor gnyis ni spyan gyi nor bu'i cha'/ /sor gsum
8b2(mdo 'grel): ni spyan gyi zur dang nye ba ste/ sha'i zlum nang lhan cig go /spyan la sor mo bzhi ni rang gi mtshams so/ /rnam par 'byung ba nas spyan gyi dbyibs su gsal ba'o/ /rdog po ni legs par mtho ba'o/ /spyan gyi sbubs la sor mo gsum zhes pa ni smin ma'i 'og spyan
8b3(mdo 'grel): 'bras nas brtsams te steng dang logs sor mo gsum mo/ /spyan gyi zur dang shangs kyi logs dang spyan dag gi bar mnyam du bya'o/ /kos ko zhes pa ni kos ko'i mdza' dang steng du spyan 'bras kyi logs nges par sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ma yin pa zhal gyi zur gnyis
8b4(mdo 'grel): kyang de bzhin du bya'o/ /smin dbus ni smin ma'i bar du sor mi phyed dang gnyis so/ /rgyu ru ni zhing du bya'o/ /dbus su zhes pa ni smin ma'i dbus su mdzod spur shes par bya'o/ /zla ba gang zhes mdzes pa ltar/ /shangs kyi rgyud dang mdzod spu'i thig /de
8b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin gtsug tor dbyibs legs pa/ /gtsug gi nor bu de shes bya zhes pa'i gtsug gi nor bu ni dkyil gyi rnam pa'o/ /gtsug tor yang de bzhin du'o/ /snyan gyi rtse yang zhes so/ /bu ga'i steng du snyan ni sor mo bzhi'o/ /zheng du ni rgya ru ste/ 'dab
8b6(mdo 'grel): ma'i zheng cha gcig go zhes so/ /snyan gyi rtsom dog sor me phyed kyi chad ni 'dab mar brjod do/ /steng mtho zhes pa ni sor mo gcig go /snyan gyi spubs ni phyed cha ste/ sor phyed snyan gyi khung du 'jug pa la'o/ /'gram pa nas snyan dag gi dbus
8b7(mdo 'grel): ma tog pa ma bye ba'i rnam par steng du 'khyil ba'o/ /sor phyed dang gsung gyis snyan du 'gyur te/ 'dab ma dang lhan cig phyed dang bcas pa'i ser mo gnyis te/ nad gi cha zhes pa ni zheng du shar dang nub kyi mdza' o/ /snyan gyi logs kyi 'deb ma la'o
9a1(mdo 'grel): spyan mdza' las mdza' sor mo phyed dang lnga snyan gyi 'dab ma ste/ snyan gyi ngos 'dab ma dang bcas pa'o/ /snyan nas brtsams te snyan gyi bar ma d+han gyi cha'i dbu la sor bco brgyad do/ /rgyab tu sor mo bcu bzhi ste/
9a2(mdo 'grel): nub kyi cha'i dbu la'o/ /de dag par du ni? nub kyi cha'i khyad par dang ngo/ /sor mo sum cu rtsa gnyis ni zhes pa la sogs ba ni gcig tu bya bar gsungs so/ /zlum bo ni bskor ba'o/ /'gul pa ni cha bzhi ste so bzhi'o/ /mgul nas brtsams ta
9a3(mdo 'grel): snyan la snyeng du sor mo dgu'o/ /shar dang nub kyi cha la bskor ba'i phyir sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi mgur la'o/ /mgul ba las mgul pa'i lhag ma la sar mo brgyad de/ logs su snyan gyi nye bar sor bzhi 'dzin bas so/ /thal gong sor
9a4(mdo 'grel): mo bcu gnyis so/ /snyab ga'i khar zhes ba ni snying ga'i nye ba'i bar gyi cha shas nyid dang bral ba zhes ba'i don to/ /gdong ba bzhi'i tsha' kyis ni/ /phyag gi srid du zhes te ring du'o/ /phyag gi srid ces ba ni 'dir phrag pa nas brtsams
9a5(mdo 'grel): te phyag gi rtsa mo dri sring ba phyag tu gsungs so/ /'dir phrag ba nas gru mo'i steng yan tshong sor mo nyi shu dpung ba la blta bar bya'o/ /gru mo 'ang 'og nas sku mkhrig mar na chang phyag dar ta sor mo bcu drug go /mkhrig ma'i thog
9a6(mdo 'grel): nas phyag gi rtse mo yan chad gru mo'i zur gyi bar phyag dar du blta par bya la zhes so/ /mchan 'og nas brtsams te par lha'i cha dang po'i tshigs gyi mthar yo nas su blta ba na sor mo nyi shu ro/ /phrag pa'i mdun gyi mdza' nas brtsamS
9a7(mdo 'grel): te rgya btu gsungs pa ni 'di gnyis mnyam du sor bcu gnyis kyi tshigs so zhes so/ /tshigs kyi phyogs zlum bo la sor mo bcu gnyis so/ /phyag dag gi phyag gi srid du sor mo bdun gyi tshad do/ /phyag gi mthal la dbus su rgyar?
9b1(mdo 'grel): sor lnga'i tshang ngo/ /grangs zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la mtshan rnams gsungs pa ni mchan thams cad pa ste/ 'khor lo rtsibs stong la sogs pas lhan cig pa'i gzugs zhes pa ni mtshan thams cad kyi gzugs so/ /gang yang
9b2(mdo 'grel): ji lta ba'ar? re? mo'i rnam pa dang/ gang yang bkra shis kyi rnam ba dang/ gang yang rig pa'i rnam pa dang /gang yang sa'i rnam pa dang/ gang yang g.yung drung 'khyil pa'i rnam pa zhes pa la sogs ba'o/ /shis pa'i yon tan med ba dang mi ldan ba'o/ /kun
9b3(mdo 'grel): gyi mtshan gyi gzugs su gyur pa'o/ /rnam ba phan tshun so sor ma 'byar ba'o/ /phyag sor gung mo sor lnga'i srid du ring ba'o/ /gung mo las tshigs phyed kyis dman pa mdzub mo ste sdigs mdzub bo/ /sor mo phyed kyis dman ba ni ming med do/ /mthe'u chung ni nye ba
9b4(mdo 'grel): ste ming med las zhes te/ ming med las tshigs gcig gis dman pa ni mthe'u chung ngo/ /de rnams tshigs phyed sen mos mdzes pa ni yid 'phrog ba'o/ /mkhrig ma'i steng du ji srid sen mo'i rtse mo'i bar du mtheb chen gyi srid du song
9b5(mdo 'grel): mo bzhi'o/ /lta ba yang de bzhin du de srid sor mo bzhi ba nyid do/ /mtheb chen ni tshigs gnyis so/ /tshogs phyed du sen mo'o/ /mtheb chen gyi rtsa ba dang mdzub mo'i rtsa ba'i bar la sor mo gsum mo/ /mthe'u chung dang mkhrig ma dag gi dbus
9b6(mdo 'grel): gyi cha phyag gi chal srid du ste ring du sor mo lnga'o/ /'dir don gyis go bar bya ba'i phyir mthe'u chung spangs nas phyag gnyis kyi dbus ma'i nye bar ring du tshigs gsum gyi cha yis mtho ba'o/ /de steng zhes pa ni mchan 'og gi steng du phrag pa'i mtshams
9b7(mdo 'grel): su cha dgur bya'o/ /sor mo dgu po rnams kyi tshad do/ /brang nang sku rgyab ces pa ni sku brang dang sku rgyab dag re re nyid la bskor ba ste/ yongs su zlum du sor mo lnga bcu rtsa drug go/ nu ma lta ba'i bar de bzhin zhes ba ni nu ma dang lte ba'i bar dag la sor
10a1(mdo 'grel): bcu drug go /kun 'bigs zhes pa lte khung dang/ tshigs kyi tshigs dag ces pa ste/ tshigs kyi mdud pa dag dang/ lte ba gnyis kyi cha shas pags pa 'dus ba de dag lhan cig lte ba'i khung na sor mo gcig go /lte
10a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i dbus su yongs su brtag pa ni lte ba nas brtsams te rgyab dang lhan cig ji srid lte ba tshun chad zlum bo la sor mo bzhi bcu rtsa drug go /srid kyi rgyu ru zlum po dag la pags pa'i 'og tu sor mo bzhi 'phyang ba'o/ /slo dag gnyis kyi steng du sor gcig
10a3(mdo 'grel): go /brla zhes ba ni brla'i steng du mnyam gzhag yang dag pa'i gzugs bya'o/ /de dag steng gi dbus kyi bar la sor bcu gnyis so/ /brla'i rtsa ba'i zlum la sor mo bum cu rtsa drug go /brla'i 'og gi dbus kyi zlum la sor mo sum cu so gnyis so/
10a4(mdo 'grel): bus mo zhes ba ni bus mo'i rtsar yongs su bskor ba'i zlum la sor mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad do/ /tshigs bcings pa sngon ma gnyis sor mo bzhi'o/ /pus mo'i 'og tu pus mo las sor mo ste/ long bu sor mo gnyis so/ /long bu mi
10a5(mdo 'grel): mngon zhes pa la sogs pa ni sor mo'i tshogs gnyis mi mngon pa dang/ /sha yis 'khyil pa'o/ /de'i phyir rtsa ni gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rdza dang dag ni dbus kyi 'khyil la sor mo nyi shu rtsa gcig shis yongs su zlum po nyid do/ /
10a6(mdo 'grel): dbus kyi 'og tu sor mo bcu bzhis yongs su zlum pa'o/ /long bu'i 'og tu zhes pa ni zhabs kyi long bu man chod la sor bzhi'o/ /long bu'i phyi rol nas ji srid sen mo'i rtse mo'i bar du khrabs kyi srid du sor bcu gnyis so/ /zhabs
10a7(mdo 'grel): kyi phyed kyis zheng du'o zhes pa ni sor mo drug go /steng dang 'og gi rgyar sor mo gnyis so /zhabs gnyis kyi logs zhabs kyi long bu'i 'og rting pa la steng dang 'og tu sor bzhi'o/ /sor ma drug gi rgya las ni zhes pa la sogs bas?
10b1(mdo 'grel): ni rgya ste 'phreng la sum 'gyur gyis ni zlum bo ste zhes pa ni ting pa'i zur gcig nas gcig gi rting ba'i bar du zhabs dang lhan cig tu zlum po la sum 'gyur ni sor mo bco brgyad ces ba'i don to/ /zhabs kyi sor mo lnga po rnams ni tshigs gnyis ?
10b2(mdo 'grel): me'i? phyed du sen mos mdzes ba na mtheb chen no/ /sor sa lnga po rnams ni yongs su zlum pa'o/ /srid du sor mo gsum zhes pa ni ring du sor mo gsum mo/ /zhabs kyi mdzub mo ni srid du mtheb chen dang mnyam pa nyid do/ /de'i phyir mtheb chen gyi srid du
10b3(mdo 'grel): mdzub ma'o/ /cha bcu drug gis dbus ma dman zhing thung ba'o/ /gung mo las brgyad chas dman pa ni ming med do/ /ming med las brgyad chas dman pa ni mthe'u chung ngo/ /sor mo rnams ni song gcig gi dbangs su'o/ /mtheb chen ci phyed dang bcas pa'i
10b4(mdo 'grel): sor mo'i dbangs su'o/ /zhabs kyi phyed rgyab rus spal gyi rgyab lta bu'o/ /zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /mnyam du 'brel ba ni dang ba'i rkang pa ltar ma chad par 'brel ba'o/ /bya'i sgo nga zhes bya ba la sogs
10b5(mdo 'grel): pas ni zhal rnam ba la zhir ru gsungs so/ /skyes bu chen po'i zhal ni bya'i sgo ba'i rnam ba'i/ /lha ma rnams ni til gyi 'bras bu rnam pa'o/ / maN+Dal gyi rnam pa ni khro bo rnams kyi yin no/ /gru bzhi pa yang ngo/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
10b6(mdo 'grel): rab tu zhi bar bya'o/ /spyan ni dangs par gyur pa ste/ thams cad la gzigs par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan no/ /steng du lta bar byed ba dang/ dman pa la brten pa dang/ 'og tu lta ba yang ma yin bar ro/ /bdag gis
10b7(mdo 'grel): rnam 'phreng? shing byas bsod nams des/ sangs rgyas la sogs tshad ni rdzogs byas te /rnam par mi rtog byang chub tshogs thob cing/ skye dgu rnams kyis rgyal ba nyid thob shog/ yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs ba'i 
11a1(mdo 'grel): sku gzugs kyi tshad kyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam 'grel rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma d+hA ra dang/ lots+tsha ba yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mang yul gung thang gi rgyal sar bsgyur ba'o//
11a2(mdo 'grel): grub pa kun mkhyen chos rgyal gyi/ /gsung gi 'od zer snang bar brten/ /mkhan chen b+hoT paN+Di ta/ /dam chos 'dzin dag gsung brten nas/ /yar lungs grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis/ /gung thang rgyal sar legs bar bsgyur ro//
11a3(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du /tsit+ta lak+Sha NaM/ bod skad du/ ri mo'i mtshan nyid/ /lha chen tshangs pa srid med bu/ /dbyangs can mchog sbyin mdzad ba la/ /bdag gis rab tu phyag 'tshal te/ /rgyal ba dang ni bkra shis bgyi/ /lha con? bung ba'i ri
11a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal //sras mo zhal gyi pad+ma can/ /de nas de gsung de 'og tu/ /mkhas pa thams cad rgyal bar shog /bkra shis par gyur cig /de'i 'og tu ri mo'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o/ /lha chen po rig par thams cad ston par mdzad
11a5(mdo 'grel): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog mar zla ba la btud nas/ /zla ba chos pa gtsug rgyan nas/ /lha chen de nas/ khyab 'jug dang/ /dbang nyi chu lha me rlung lha/ /de nas skye dgu mnga' mdzad pa/ /las kun pa la phyag 'tshal te/ /de nas
11a6(mdo 'grel): gcer thul rkang pa dang/ /slob dpon dag ni thams cad la/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ /ri mo'i las kyi tshon dag la/ /mnyam par gzhag nas ci dran dang/ /nus pa cung zad brjod par bya/ /las kun pa dang rab sim dang/
11a7(mdo 'grel): gcer bu thul byas mtshan nyid dang/ /kun tus snying po shes byas nas/ /brtson pa'i blo can rnams kyi blo/ /skye phyir ri mo'i mtshan nyid dag /bdag gis bsdus nas byas pa ste/ /ri mo'i mtshan nyid mkhas pa yi/ /shes rab bzang rnams
11b1(mdo 'grel): nga la nyon/ /ri mo'i mtshan nyid 'di nyid sngon/ /mi yi rgyal pos 'dzin pa/ /blo dang ldan zhing grags pa tshe/ /chos shes bden pa'i rtsal ldan pa/ /rnam grags 'jigs thul zhes bya byung/ /rgyal po dam pa de ring la/ /chos dang mthun bas sa skyangs pas
11b2(mdo 'grel): mi rnams kyi ni tshe yi'o/ /grangs ni stong phrag brgya thub grag /de tshe nad rnams med gyur cing/ /dus min 'chi ba gang yang med/ /yid nad med cing gsod byed na/ /khro dang chags sogs gal yod/ /rlung ni legs par ldang gyur cing/ /dbang pos
11b3(mdo 'grel): char ba legs par 'bebs/ /sa bon rtsa ba 'bras bu rnams/ /mdangs dang ro dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rigs bzhi rnams kyang ma 'chol cing/ /de bzhin rang gi chos la brtson/ /'gro ba rgyas shing dpal dang ldan/ /rdzu 'grul yon tan
11b4(mdo 'grel): kun ldan 'gyur/ /yul 'khor de ltar gyur pa'i tshe/ /rgyal po bdag nyid chen po yi/ /yid ni dka' thub cher zhugs pas/ /de yis dka' thub mchog kyang byas/ /dka' thub de yis rgyal po de/ /nyid kyi 'jig rten mes po las/ /yon tan brgyad
11b5(mdo 'grel): phyug sred dka' ba/ /mchog rnams kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /lha yi mtshon dang dgra rnams kyis /mi yul 'phebs par mi nus dang/ /bstan bcos ma lus rnams la yang/ /thogs pa med pa'i blo mchog thob/ /yon tan kun
11b6(mdo 'grel): gyis rab brgyan pa/ /mi yi bdag po de lta bu/ /nor bu'i sras po mnga' thang tshe/ /lha mthus pha rol gnon mdzad pa/ /rig pa rnams kyi rten bzang po/ /chos kyi lus 'gral gyur ba na/ /bram ze zhig ni du bzhin du/ /rgyal po'i gan du 'ongS
11b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /mi dgar gyur pa de la ni/ /ci nyes zhes ni rgyal pos bris/ /de yang khros pas rgyal po la/ /gtum pa'i tshig ni smras pa ni/ /gang phyir khyod kyi yul du ni/ /dus ma yin par 'chi byung yang/ /nges par mi rje khyod kyis ni/ /chos
12a1(mdo 'grel): min skye dgu bskyangs pa 'dra/ /sngon chad ma byung ngo mtshar gang/ /de yang de ring 'byung 'gyur te/ /dus min 'gum pa bdag gis bu/ /mtshon dang sha gzugs mdod par/ /byis pa rigs kyi rgyud 'tshob pa /snying du sdug pa bkum mo la/ /rje byod
12a2(mdo 'grel): gal te bram ze gces/ /khyed ni thams cad mkhyen lags na/ /srog pas ches 'phangs bdag bu de/ /bdag gi thad du khring de gshegs/ /rgyal bo mthu chen gal te yang/ /bdag la thugs brtser ma mdzad na/ /der khyod spyan sngar bab par yang/ /srog ni rtsa bzhin
12a3(mdo 'grel): bdag gis dor/ /bram ze de yis de skad smras/ /de tshod yi bu dgug phyir/ /rgyal po dam pa blo chen des/ /thugs la dgongs pa mdzad par gyur/ /da yi zham 'bring 'dod gsungs bas/ /bram ze de yis dbugs phyung ste/ gshin rje'i rgyal po nyi ma dang/ /'dra bar
12a4(mdo 'grel): shad bde ma'ong? nas/ /'gro bas phyag bying bas de la/ /rgyal po 'jigs thul phyag 'tshal te/ /bram ze la ni phan btson pas/ /rab tu gus pas tshigs 'di smras/ /legs ldan bram ze 'di yi bu/ /srog bas chos 'phangs snying sdug pa/ /'chi ba la ni ma thug
12a5(mdo 'grel): bar/ /khyod kyi mdag gzhug bgyid pas phrogs/ /snying rje bram ze la dga' nas/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mnga' mdzad cing/ /'jig rten las kyi dbang po yis/ /bram ze 'di la bu stsal gsol/ /de skad smras nas rgyal po la/ /chos kyi rgyal bos 'dzum
12a6(mdo 'grel): dmul nas/ mchod gnas de la tshig 'jam dang/ /brjid bag tu ni slar smras pa/ dbang ga gis rang dgar 'ga' yang ni/ /'gugs la 'am gtang bar mi nus te/ /rang gi las kyi 'bras bu'i mthus/ /skye bo dag gi dbang du 'gyur/ /dus
12a7(mdo 'grel): dang las kyi dbang 'gro ba/ /bde dang sdug bsngal phrad par 'gyur/ /da ltas rgyal po bdes nyes ni/ /ma lan par ni go phyir rigs/ /bdag gi thad du phyin nas ni/ /slar ni 'ga' yang thar mi 'gyur/ /dus ni stobs dang ltan gyur bas/ /bram ze'i khye'u
12b1(mdo 'grel): nan gyis dkug /'byung lo kun gyis mi thub pa'i/ /dge dang mi dge 'dir myong ngo/ /ming ni las kyi sa gzhi ste/ /'di ni 'bras bu'i sa gzhir bshad/ /gshin rjes de skad smras pa dang/ /mi yi bdag pos phyir smras pa/ /yang dang yang du gshin rje la/ /byin cig
12b2(mdo 'grel): ces ba'i tshig smras so/ /de la gshin rjes yang dang yang/ /mi rung mi rung zhes smras so/ /rgyal pos byin cig byin cig smras/ /gshin rjes yang yang mi rung smras/ /de dag de ltar zhen pa yis/ /shin tu 'khrugs pa dag tu 'gyur/ /de ltar de dag 'khruD
12b3(mdo 'grel): pas na/ /'thob mtshon? pa byung gyur te/ gshin rje la ni rgyal po des/ /sdod sdod ces ni lan mang smras/ /g.yul dngos dag tu gshin rjes kyang/ /de las nga sdod 'di yin zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal po de yis ni/ /mda' yang drag cing rno bdag /grangs med pa
12b4(mdo 'grel): yi char dag ni/ /gshin rje yi ni steng dag tu/ /shin tu dbab pa dag byas so/ /sprin las char drag rgyun 'dra ba'i/ /thogs med go bar byed la yi/ /sngags dan ldan pa'i lha yi mtshon/ /kun nas gshin rjes myur phab pas/ /de yis rgyal po de khros ta/
12b5(mdo 'grel): lha yi mtshon cha mthu chen gyis/ /gshin rje mngag gzhug brtags pa dang/ /yi dags kyis kyang da 'phangs na/ /gcod pa tsom par byed pa yi/ /ral gri sogs la skam pa dang/ /tho ba 'jigs pa 'byin byed pa/ /ma lus pa dag rtag tu bcom/ /de
12b6(mdo 'grel): nas yi dags mi bzang ba'i/ /gzugs can phan tshun kun tu rgyug /gshin rje'i dmag dpon bcom pa dang/ /phyogs phyogs su ni rings par 'gro/ /rgyal pe yis ni g.yul gyi dod?/ /pham par byas pa mthong nas ni/ /gshin rje'i rgyal ba de khros nas
12b7(mdo 'grel): ji bzhin byed pa'i dbyug pa gzas/ /rgyal po bskal pa'i ma 'dra ba'i/ /dbyug ba gzas pa de mthong nas/ /khros te tshangs pa'i mgo mtshan can/ /mtshon cha lag tu blangs pa dang/ /de nas 'byung pa thams cad dang/ /gnas rnams kyang ni
13a1(mdo 'grel): bred par gyur/ /kun nas 'byung ba chen po yang/ /ltas ngan chen po gzir bar 'gyur/ /de nas 'gro ba kun gdungs par/ /changs pa yis ni mthong nas su/ /tshangs bas lha rnams lhan cig tu/ /sa phyogs ? phyin
13a2(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa mthong nas ni/ /mtshon pa tul tha? mon sbyar nas su/ /des snas? 'di ni thog tu smra sa/ /de dag gis ni 'khrug pa'i rgyu/ /de kun ma lus thos nas su/ /de dag la ni tshangs pa yi/ /g.yul las zlo gnas tshig ? pa/ /
13a3(mdo 'grel): gshin rje'i bdag nyid chen po 'di/ /nyes pa med bden mi'i rgyal po yid/ /'chi bdag mnyes dus mnyes/ /'on kyang rang gi las kyis nyes/ /sngon chad dge dang mi dge ba'i/ /las de byis pa de yis byas/ /mi yi skye ba yang dgo thob/ /
13a4(mdo 'grel): 'chi ba'ang myur du byung bar gyur/ /'on kyang bram ze mchod pa'i phyir/ /khyod kyi ngal ba 'bra ba bcas bshig da yi drin la de la yang/ /thabs kyi rig pa 'di snang ste/ /gzugs dang kha dog sgo nas ni/ /bram ze'i bu ni tsi 'dra ba/ /
13a5(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis lags bar bris shig dang/ /de nas khyod phan de nges bya/ /tshangs pas snang ste smas pa dang/ rgyal po blo ldan de yis kyang/ /bram ze'i khye'u de mthong bar/ /gyur du zan kyang nges skyas? so/ /de nas bris nas tshangs pas kyang/ /de lta
13a6(mdo 'grel): bu ni bslang nas so su/ /bram ze la ni gson por byin /bram ze mgu bas mig rgyas te/ /udra la? gsal ba'i ming ldan no/ /bzhon la shin tu gzhon mdog ce na/ /changs pa lan phyag byas nas/ /rang gi bu ni blang pa byas/ /de nas
13a7(mdo 'grel): tshangs bas rgyal po la/ /khyod kyis g.yul du bram ze'i phyir/ /mdag gzhug de dag mthu yis ni/ /brtul ba nga ni legs so legs/ /tshangs pas de skad smras pa dang/ /rgyal po da ci mgu bar gyur/ /thams cad sdom par
13b1(mdo 'grel): byed ba'i lha/ /gshin rje'i yid ni mi dgar gyur/ /gshin rje'i rgyal po mi dga' ba/ /de yang chengs bas mthong nas cis/ /bshes tshigs mang pos dbugs phyung nas/ /mi yi rgyal bo la smras pa/ /rgyal pos chos lugs rnams shes nas/ /khyod kyis
13b2(mdo 'grel): snyas par mi bya'o/ /mi la dga' ba byung ba bzhin/ /mngon ba'i nga rgyal byed pa brlag /dam ba rnams kyis bsten mi 'gyur/ /shin tu smad pa dag tu 'gyur/ /rtag tu gshung bar 'gyur ba dang/ /bde ba chung du 'ang thob mi 'gyur/ /mkhas pa rnams kyang
13b3(mdo 'grel): spang bar 'gyur/ /mtho ris las kyang myur du nyams/ /rgyal po nga rgyal byed pa na/ /kun gyis spang par myur du brtsi /de bas rtag ? ci/ /rgyal pos mdzangs par bya ba dang/ /rig pa nor dang rig stobs dang/ ldan zhing nga rgyal med par bya/ /bye
13b4(mdo 'grel): brag t? ni rgyal po yis /lha rnams dang ni bam ze la'ang/ /le par yang ni gus par bya/ /brnyas pa'i thabs ni yang mi bya/ /bkur ba dang ni 'gal mi bya/ /mi bzed mi bya khyad mi bsad/ /kun shes nga rgyal mi bya zhing/ /yon tan can la sngar
13b5(mdo 'grel): mi bya/ /mi gsha' mi smra 'khu mi bya/ /mig sngar bab la don yod bya/ /lha rnams dang ni mi mthun dang/ /bram ze dang yang mi mthun la/ /bar na'ang bde med de yi phyir/ /rgyal po gshin rje'i mi dga' spangs/ /tshangs pas da ltar gdams
13b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /bram ze la dga' rgyal po de/ /gshin rje la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /gshin rje la ni dga' par byas/ gshin rje yang ni dga' gyur zhing/ /tshangs pa yang ni dga' 'gyur te/ /de tshe 'gro ba thams cad kyang/ /mya ? med cing
13b7(mdo 'grel): dga' bar gyur/ /de nas tshang sangs rgyal la smas/ /khyod kyis yi dags gcer thub shog /gshin rje'i mngag gzhug de dag gis/ /rtag tu 'gro bar mi phabs shog /stobs dang gzi brjid dka' thub kyis/ /'di 'dra rgyal po
14a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag la'ang/ /thugs ba med par thal pa ni/ /gyur na mi rung de yi phyir/ /dag med bya min mi byed bzhin/ /bdag gis rgyal po khyod bzlog ste/ /'jig rten du ni grags pa che/ /byung ba dang ni ldan par gyur/ /gcer
14a2(mdo 'grel): bu zhes bya'i rnam grangs 'di/ /yi dags rnams la byas pas na/ /skyes bu skyes mchog gang phyir khyod/ /gcer bu thams cad phebs pas na/ /de phyir gcer thul zhes bya ba/ /mchod sbyin gyis ni grags mchog 'gyur/ /grags mchog bram
14a3(mdo 'grel): zer 'dzin phyir dang/ /da yang dgyes par deng phyin chad/ /skye dgu'i bdag po gzhan bzhin du/ /sa yi steng du grags ldan 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs dka' thub rig byed ring/ /sdig med skye dgu bde bar skyongs/ /nga yis gnang bas khyod
14a4(mdo 'grel): kyis kyang/ /bram ze'i bu 'di bris pas na/ /des khyod 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir/ /ri mo dang po 'byin byed yin/ /'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs phyir/ /brjed pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin/ /de ring phyin chad ri mo de/ /mngon par
14a5(mdo 'grel): yang ni mchod par shog /mi rnams kyi yang yid 'phrog cing/ /gtan du dga' dang bde sbyin shog /bkra shis dpal yod sdig slong shog /srin po gsod cing dgra 'joms shog /'di ltar nga yi tshig gis khyod/ /dang por bris pa
14a6(mdo 'grel): de yi phyir/ /dang por bri ba yin pas na/ /ming yang ri mo zhes byar 'gyur/ /de ltar changs pa de yis su/ /gshin rje gcer thul de gnyis kyis/ /sdums mdzad nas ni de gnyis dang/ /bram zas rkang la phyag 'tshal te/ /de dag
14a7(mdo 'grel): kun la shes byas nas/ /de nas rang gi gnas nyid du/ /bstan pa 'jig rten gsum gyi sla/ /lha yi tshogs dang lhan cig dang/ /rgyal pos kyang ni chos rgyal la/ /mchod gnas dga' ste gnas su dong/ /bram ze rang gi grong
14b1(mdo 'grel): khyed du/ /gang du 'ongs par song bar gyur/ /bram ze bu dang bcas song nas/ /rgyal po de yang yid dangs? te/ /snying du sdug dang gnyen dang bcas/ /ri mo la ni rtag tu brtson/ /de nas mi yi dbang phyug de/ /tshangs pa yi ni gnas su dong/ /gzugS
14b2(mdo 'grel): kun mthun pa'i tshad de yang/ /changs pa la ni tshul bzhin dris/ /tshangs pa chad ni gang gis su/ /ri mo bdag gis bri ba yi/ /mtshan nyid bdag gis sna tshogs pas/ /deng slad deng 'dir bdag gsung 'os/ /ri mo yang na ji ltar byung/ /
14b3(mdo 'grel): de yi chad kyi sa cho ga gang/ /de ltar thal mo sbyar nas zhus/ /tshangs pas mi dbang la smras pa/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba 'di/ /khyod la nga yis bshad par bya'o/ /rgyal po dang por 'jig rten gyi/ /rigs byed rnams dang mchog
14b4(mdo 'grel): sbyin byung/ /mchod rten byed par ri mo 'dri/ /de phyir ri mo rig byed pa rtsi/ /nga yi dang po skye dgu bre/ /'di ltar skye dgu rnams la bstan/ /de bas dang por bris pa'i phyir/ /ri mo zhes bya bar brjod de/ /'gro ba dang ni gal ba'i bar/ /
14b5(mdo 'grel): rgyu dang ni rgyur bcas pa dag /de yi tshul bzhin bris byas pas/ /de phyir 'di ni ri mor bshad/ /ri bo'i mchog ni ri rab yin/ /sgo nga las skyes rnams kyi ni/ /gtso bo nam mkha' ldong bzhin no/ /mi yi gtso bo sna bdag bzhin/ /de
14b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin ri mo sgyu rtsal gtso/ /ji ltar chu bo thams cad kyang/ /rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa bzhin/ /rgya mtsho la ni rin chen brten/ /nyi ma la yang gza' rnams brten/ /drang srong dam pa tshangs pa la/ /ji ltar lta rnams bsten
14b7(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin/ /rgyal po de bzhin sgyu rtsal kun/ /ri mo'i las la yang dag brten/ /ri rgyal ri rnams klu rnams ni/ /gaM gam ste gza' gtso gnyis/ /bya yi rgyal po nam mkha' lding/ /lha rnams gtso bo dbang chen yin/ /de
15a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin ri mo sgyu rtsal gtso/ /de bas las kun lhag na song/ /gcer thul nges ni ri mo yi/ /mtshan nyid chog tshang rnams kyang/ /thams cad khyod la ston par 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pas bsgo ba bzhin/ /mi
15a2(mdo 'grel): yi rgyal po dga' bzhin du/ /las kun pa yi thang du song/ /snang nga chen po des mthong ngo/ /mthong nas rgyal pos phyag 'tshal to/ /nges kyang de dang lhan cig tu/ /bstan mchog bkod nas bkur sti byas/ /zhes sa'i tshig kyang
15a3(mdo 'grel): smra bar 'gyur/ /khyab bdag 'phrin las thams cad pas/ /khyod kyi thad du tshangs pa'i bkas/ /bdag phyin ri mo'i 'phrin las kyi/ /mtshan nyid bdag la bshad du gsol/ /ci rigs par yang tshang dang ni/ /rnam pa cho gar
15a4(mdo 'grel): bcas pa gsungs/ /rgyal pos de skad smras pa dang/ /las kun pas ni bzlo bshad pa/ /mi bdag dam pa rtse cig tu/ /nga yis bshad pa thams cad nyon/ /ji ltar ri mo byung ba dang/ /tshad dang gnas thabs mdog ldan pa/ /blo dang
15a5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa kun gyi gtso/ /ri mo'i mtshan nyid lhas bkur ba/ /pad+ma las byung legs ldan gyis/ /ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du nyon/ /dngos po kun gyi byang gzugs kun/ /'jig rten rnams ni dang gyur pa/ /dge ba'i mtshan nyid tshangs pa yis//
15a6(mdo 'grel): bris nas bdag la dang por byin/ /tshang ni gang dang gang gis ni/ /gnas dang thabs ni mdzas gang yin/ /tshangs pa de las de dag ni/ /thob nas ri mo mchog rnams kun/ /mnga' bdag dam pa'i bka' drin las/ /bzo rnams
15a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o/ /rgyal po skye dbu 'di dag ni/ /rnam pa de ltar bdag gis sprul/ /mtshan nyid dag dang ldan pa yi/ /ri mo sna tshogs snying nas ni/ /de nas phyin chad lha rnams kyis/ /ri mo dag 'phel byung ba
15b1(mdo 'grel): yin// /tshad dang mtshan nyid byang bzhin dang/ /'dra dang spa dang mdzes pa dag /ci 'dra de 'dra don dang/ /bdag la shes nas ma lus par/ /rgyu rtsal kun ldan ri mo 'di/ /ma lus par ni blo ldan mchog /khyod kyis mi rnams dag dang ni/ /legs par gzung la
15b2(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa dang/ /gzung bar spro ba'i sems ldan dang/ /de dag bya bar dka' ba dang/ /rtag tu yid gzhungs mdun dag tu/ /rab tu bstan par gyis shig dang/ /thub pa rtsam pa sna tshogs dang/ /klu dang gnod sbyin srin po dang/ /yi dags lha min sha zar?
15b3(mdo 'grel): bcas/ /mtshan nyid la sogs cho ga bzhin/ /bris nas khyod la ngas bstan to/ /gcer bu thul gyis ri mo'i mtshan nyid bstan pa las/ /gcer bu brtul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bzod ldan dgus pas/ /
15b4(mdo 'grel): rgyal po bdag nyid che de la/ /tshangs pas ri mo ci 'dra bar/ /bri ba mngon bstan smras pa ni/ /snga ma 'jig pa'i mthar gyur cing/ /gtan dang 'gro ba zhig pa na/ /gser gyi sgo ngas mun bcom ste/ /chu yi nang nas kun tu byung/ /sgo nga de las
15b5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi/ /mas pho rang nyid kun tu byung/ /de nas tshangs de oM la sogs/ /rig byed dang ni rig pa dang/ /rtogs par bya dang skye dgu ni/ /rnam pa bzhi dang de dag gis/ /gzugs dang ming la sogs pa ni/ /tshe dang bcas dang tshangs pa
15b6(mdo 'grel): yis/ /rigs dang gnas kyi spyod pa dang/ /chos dang lugs rnams sha stag byung/ /tshangs pas de ltar byas nas ni/ /des pa tshangs pas 'gro kun la/ /phan par bya phyir rang nyid kyi/ /yid la kun tu sems par gyur/ /de nas sems par gyur
15b7(mdo 'grel): pa nas/ /de yi blo ni 'di ? byung/ /ji lta bur na skye bo rnams/ /rgyal po dang ni lha rnams kyis/ /ming dag shes shing g.yel med par/ /rtag tu gus pa byed par 'gyur/ /tshangs pas de ltar bsams nas des/ /lha chen khyab bdag brgya? byed 
16a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /lha rnams dag ni thams cad dang/ /skal pa chen por rang gi yang/ /tshad dang yon tan mdzes pa dang/ /mchan ldan shin tu 'dra ba dang/ /gzugs bzang shin tu legs phebs dang/ /yan lag nyid lag rdzogS
16a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /kun nas shin tu 'byes pa dang/ /dbyibs ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /rgyan dang gos ni shin tu mdzes/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs 'chang ba yi/ /byang gzugs ri mo'i mtshon 'phel bas/ /rang nyid kyis ni rnam par bris/ /de dag lha rnams
16a3(mdo 'grel): kyis mthong nas/ /mig rtsa rangs shing snying dga' ste/ /tshangs pa legs so legs smras nas/ /gus pa yis ni bstang byas shing/ /de rnams kyis ni rang rang gi /byang gzugs byin brlabs mthu chen byas/ /de nas tshangs pa dga' ?
16a4(mdo 'grel): gyur nas/ /lha bdun la ni 'di skad smras/ /'jig rten gsum du deng phyin chang/ /khyed cag gis ni byang gzugs la/ /bsod nams rten pa the tshom med/ /rtag tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /gang zhig yang dag yid bzang byas//
16a5(mdo 'grel): rigs ba yis ni bsgrubs pa'i nor/ /gtsang dang de la gzhol g.yes/ /mi yi yul du mchod byed na/ /de rnams da dag la rtag tu/ /bsgrub don nad med 'dod pa ster/ /'jig rten rnams ni sdig sel zhing/ /rmi lam ngan
16a6(mdo 'grel): dang sdang rnams kyis/ /zin ba dag ni sel byed cing/ /bsrung ba nyid ni byed par 'gyur/ /chos bzhin byed pa mdza' dag gis/ /srin po 'joms shing grags pa 'phel/ /'jig rten rnams kyi mchod bya'i phyir/ /lha yi byas gzuD
16a7(mdo 'grel): rnams la ni/ /ming ni brjod byed? stong bya dang/ /mchod bya phyag byar rags par 'gyur/ /skyes bu bsod nams brtson gang gang/ /khyod kyi byad gzugs gang gang la/ /nyin cig bzhin du mchod byed na/ /de la de das? zhi ba ster/ /de skad
16b1(mdo 'grel): smras nas der gyur ces/ /lha rnams yid ni rab dga' nas/ /rang gi gzi brjid ches byin rlabs/ /rang rang gi ni gnas su dod/ /de ltar mchod pa bya byung zhing/ /'gro bas mchod ba bya gyur ba/ /de dag gis ni tshang la sogs/ /bdag las mtshan nyid thos nas
16b2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /mi dbang khyod kyi ri ring du/ /mi yi 'jig rten ma lus sgrogs/ /mchan gyi rig pa dam pa gang/ /bdag gis tshangs las snyed de dang/ /tshad ci 'dra ba de lta bur/ /ma lus par ni shes par bgyi/ /dbur 'os 'jig rten gsum dag na/ /lus can
16b3(mdo 'grel): gyis ni lus kun gyis/ /yan lag tshad ni gang yin pa/ /bdag gis bshad kyis mnyen par gyis/ /rgyal po chen po ri mo'i tshad ni lha kun gyi/ /mchod cing grags 'phel sdig dang 'jigs pa sel byed dang/ /ni/? gsar? sdug cing thog mar byung la sna
16b4(mdo 'grel): tshogs bzhi/ /brjod pa skyon dang bral ba 'di ni go bar gyis/ /ri mo'i mtshan nyid las mchod par bya ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rgyal po 'gro ba'i lus chad chad de ni/ /tshangs ba rang gi bdag la bshad ba
16b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ /bdag kyang khyod la'o khyod kyang skye dgu la/ /tshad kyi tshul ni rab tu bshad par gyis/ /lha dang lha min glu dbang dang/ /srin po dri za mi 'am ci/ /grub dang rol mkhan mtshan sgregs dang/ /sha za yi dags phrul bum dang/ /rig sngagS
16b6(mdo 'grel): 'chang gi tshags dang ni/ /mi dang mi ma yin rnams dang/ /rgyal po dag ni thams cad kyi/ /tshad du bya ba 'di yin no/ /rdul phra rab dang sgra'i rtse mo/ /sro ma shig dang nas dang sor/ /thams cad rim bzhin brgyad 'gyur du/ /skyed pa yin par
16b7(mdo 'grel): yongs su bstan/ /rdul phra rab ni brgyad po la/ /sgra yi rtse mo zhes bstan to/ /tshad shes pas ni skra rtse yang/ /brgyad la sro ma zhes bstan to/ /sro ma brgyad la shig yin te/ /shig brgyad la ni nas su bshad/ /nas brgyad la ni sor
17a1(mdo 'grel): yin te/ /sor zhes bya ba sor mo bshad/ /sor gnyis la ni sor tshad gnyis/ /sor bzhi la ni sor tshad bzhi/ /tshad shes pas ni nas bzhi la/ /sor gyi phyed du bstan pa yin/ /srid ces bya ba mchu yin te/ /zheng ni thad ka zhes bya ba/ /
17a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal po mi ni 'di dag gi /tshang ni yongs su bstan par bya/ /'khor lo bsgyur pa'i chu zheng ni/ /ji ltar yin pa bshad kyis nyon/ /mchu dang zheng ni gab pa ste/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang 'dra ba yin/ /'khor lo bsgyur ba'i srid du ni/ /rang gi sor gyi gcal ba yis/ /brgya dang
17a3(mdo 'grel): rtsa ni brgyad yin te/ /gang duAng gzhan gyis sor gyis min/ /rgyal po gong du smos pa yi/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yi/ /srid kyi tshang du bya ba dag /'dir ni dngos su bshad par bya/ /gdong la sogs pa'i tshad gang yin/ /de ni bdag gis
17a4(mdo 'grel): bshad kyis nyon/ /gdong la dpral bsna dang ni/ /kos ko sor bzhi tshang gsum dbye/ /gdong gi zheng du sor mo dag /bcu bzhi yin par rab tu bstan/ /de nyid kyi ni stod dmang zheng/ /sor mo dag ni bcu gnyis yin/ /tshang shes pa yis mchur
17a5(mdo 'grel): yang ni/ /sor ni bcu gnyis yin par 'dod/ /gtsug tong mchur ni sor bzhi ste/ /zheng du sor ni drug yin no/ /mgo ni gdugs kyi tshang du bya/ /mgo bo'i zheng du sor bcu gnyis/ /de bzhin mgo bo'i khor yug tu/ /sor mo sum cu rtsa gnyis yin/ /rna
17a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i zheng la sor gnyis te/ /srid du sor ni bzhi yin no/ /rna ba'i bu ga sor phyed de/ /rna ba'i bu ga sor cig bshad/ /rna mchog dang ni smin mjug mnyam/ /mig sbubs rna ba'i bu gar mnyam/ /rna gshal la ni des pa med/ /smin ma'i srid la sor
17a7(mdo 'grel): bzhi ste/ /zheng la nas ni gnyis yin no/ /zhi ba kun gyi smin ma ni/ /zla ba tshes pa 'dra ba yin/ /tshang shes pas ni gar byed dang/ /khros dang du la gzhu 'drar dgug /skrag dang mya ngan byed pa la/ /mjug smang mgo ni bstod bya zhe'o/ /sna yi sgrubs
17b1(mdo 'grel): las smin ma ngag /bskyed de sbral ba'i phyed du bzhag /'khor lo sgyur ba'i mdzod sbu yis/ /smin ma'i bar ni sor cig bya/ /smin ma'i sked nas skra 'tshams kyi/ /zheng du sor ni phyed dang gsum/ /smin ma'i mgo nas dbral dbyings la/ /sor bzhi pa yi tshad du ba/ /mig?
17b2(mdo 'grel): gi dbubs la sor gnyis te/ /mig gi bar yang de bzhin no/ /mig gi dkyus su sor gnyis te/ /zheng du sor ni cig tu bshad/ /mig gi 'bras bu mig gsum ste/ /mig la 'bras bu gsum 'gyur bshad/ /gdong pa yin dkyus la ni/ /mig tu bya bar yongs su
17b3(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /mig ni 'od? ma'i gzhu 'dra'i zheng/ /nas gsum gyi ni tshang du bya/ /utpal 'dab 'dra'i mig la ni/ /nas drug gis ni tshad du bshad/ /nya lto 'dra ba'i mig gang yin/ /nas brgyad kyi ni tshad du bshad/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mig /nas dgu yi mi tshad
17b4(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /mgron bu 'dra ba'i mig gang yin/ /de ni nas dag bcu yin no/ /rgyal po de ni mig dag gi /dkyus dang zheng du bstan pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pa la rtog med pa'i/ /mig ni 'od ma'i gzhu 'dra bya/ /bud med rnams dang g.yem po yi/ /nya yi lto 'drar
17b5(mdo 'grel): shes par bya/ /tha mal 'dug ba'i mig ngag ni/ /ud+pal 'dra bar 'dod pa yin/ /skrag dang du ba nyid kyi ni/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bshad/ /khros dang sdug bsngal gzir ba'i mig /mgron bu 'dra bar bri bar bya/ /utpal 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mig /mdza' dmar
17b6(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu gnag pa dang/ /gsal zhing rdzi ma rtse ring dang/ /yid 'ong mdog dbyung 'jam 'jam lha/ /lha rnams la ni bris byas nas/ /rgyal po skye dgu phan byed 'gyur/ /ba yi 'o ma'i mdog gsal 'dra/ /snum zhing rdzi ma rang rod med/ /gsal bas pad+ma'i
17b7(mdo 'grel): 'dab 'dra la/ /mthing shun gyis ni bskyur byas shing/ /'bras bu gnag la rgya che ba'i/ /mig bris dpal dang bde ba ster/ /'di ni mig gi zheng gi tshang/ /yin par yongs su bstan pa yin/ /lta stangs sum bcu rtsa drug gang/ /de dag mtshan nyid phyis
18a1(mdo 'grel): bshad do/ /sna la sor ni bzhi yin te/ /rtse mo'i 'phang du sor gnyis so/ /sna sbubs yo kar bcas pa yi/ /zheng du sor ni gnyis yin no/ /sna yi bu ga'i zheng nas drug /'phang du nas ni gnyis su bshad/ /sna yi bu ga'i
18a2(mdo 'grel): bar zheng ni/ /nas gnyis dkyus su nas drug go /ya mchu'i rngams su sor cig ste/ /ma mchu la ni ser phyed bshad/ /ya mchu dang ni ma mchu'i dkyus/ /sor bzhi dag tu shes par bya/ /ya mchu yi ni steng ma yi/ /srid du sor ni phyed yin no//
18a3(mdo 'grel): mchu mdza' bim pa ltar dmar zhig/ /de bzhin gzhu yi ru shing 'dra/ /kha yi grwa ni cung zad bstong/ /de bzhin mdzum bag can du bya/ /kos ko 'phang na sor gnyis te/ /zheng du sor ni gsum du bshad/ /mgul pa dag gi srid tshad
18a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /sor bzhi dag tu bstan pa yin/ /gnam ldang po ni srid sor du/ /sbom po'i zheng la sor bcu ste/ /phra mo shis la sor brgyad do/ /sboms dag tu ni sum 'gyur ro/ /gnyer ma gsum gyis mdzes byas pa/ /dung dang 'dra ba
18a5(mdo 'grel): dag tu bya/ /rgyab logs su ni mi dma' zhing/ /'khor bar zlum po nyid du bya/ /mkhur tshos la ni sor lngar bya/ /'gram pa la ni sor bzhir bya/ /mu 'gram phyogs kyi tshad dag ni/ /sor bzhi dag tu shes par bya/ /'di ni bdag
18a6(mdo 'grel): gis ngo mchu dang/ /zheng dag bstan par byas pa yin/ /grwa bzhi lham dang legs rdzogs dang/ /gsal dang mdzes pa'i mtshan can bya/ /gru gsum mi bya yo mi bya/ /khros bag mi bya zlum mi bya/ /gdod 'di 'dra ba bris byas nas/
18a7(mdo 'grel): rtag tu 'byor ba byed par 'gyur/ /skye dgu rnams la zhi 'dod pa/ /ring po zlum po yon po dang/ /zur gsum la sogs gang yin nas/ /de dag rnams ni lha la yang/ /rgyal po 'di ni gdang dag gi /tshad du bya ba bstan ba
18b1(mdo 'grel): yin/ /lus kyi rab tu brjod par bya/ /'di ni ma yengs bzur bar gyis/ /ske lto bar zheng sor gnyis te/ /spung ya'i zheng du sor drug go /phrag pa la ni sor brgyad do/ /mthong ga gdong ni gnyis 'gyur bshad/ /pho mtshan srid ni sor drug bya/ /sta zur dkyus su sor bco
18b2(mdo 'grel): brgyad/ /sgrog rus bar nas snying gar gdong/ /snying nas lte ba khur duAng min/ /lte nas phom chan bar la'ang gdong/ /sked pa la ni sor bcu bzhi/ /lte ba dag ni sor phyed de/ /zab cing g.yas su 'khyil bar bshad/ /nu mdzer la ni ns gang ste/ /kho ra khor yug sor
18b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis so/ /gang du sham thabs sgos la nas/ /ska rags dag ni bcings nas su/ /lte ba'i 'og gi lto yi bar/ /sor bzhi dag tu bya ba yin/ /pho mtshan zheng du sor gnyis te/ /chu so'i srid du sor drug go /rlig pa ha cang mi 'phyad dang/ /ngo? mnyam zlum zhing
18b4(mdo 'grel): gshis phebs dang/ /sboms su sor bdun yin te/ /srid du sor ni bzhi yin no/ /pho mtshan dag gi sboms su ni/ /sor drug dag tu shes par bya/ /pho mtshan nas ni lto mtshams kyi/ /bar la song ni drug yin no/ /de nas gzung ste brla dag gi /srid kyi chad du bya
18b5(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ /sor mo nyi shu rtsa lngar bya/ /bus mo la ni sor bzhi'o/ /lor bu'i phyogs la sor bzhi'o/ /rje ngar la ni gdong gnyis bshad/ /bong bu'i phyogs kyi rje dar gyi/ /zheng du sor ni bzhi yin no/ /rje ngar dag gi dbus dag gi /zheng du sor ni drug tu bshad/ /pus
18b6(mdo 'grel): gdong zhing ni sor gsum bya/ /srid nyid du ni ma yin no/ /pus mo gong gi brla gnyis kyi/ /zheng du sor ni brgyad yin no/ /brla dur? sbom po'i zheng du ni/ /sor ni bcu gnyis dag tu bya/ /brla yi mdun ni mthon po ste/ /gnyis ka'ang kun nas shas rgyas bya/ /'jam shing
18b7(mdo 'grel): bshad shor? med ba dang/ /glan po che yi sna ltar bya/ /long bu bus mo mi mngon dang/ /rtsa rnams kyang ni mi mngon dang/ /byin gyis zlu po dag tu bya/ /skang na cung zad mthon por bya/ /rting? pa'i 'phang la sor lngar bya/ /zheng du sar ni gsum du bshad/ /rkang pa
19a1(mdo 'grel): gnyis la sor bcu bzhi/ /mthe bong la ni sor bzhi'o/ /pad+ma dmar po'i rtse 'dra dang/ /rgya skyegs khu ltar sad bag can/ /rkang rgyu ma rnyongs sa la mdzad/ /'khor lo mtshan gyis sbras pa 'dar/ /rting ba dang ni mthe bong gnyis/ sa'am
19a2(mdo 'grel): reg na 'jar bar bya/ /rgyal po 'khor lo sgyur ba yi/ /rkang pa'i dra ba dang ba'i 'dra/ /rkang bol srid song brgyad shes bya/ /rus sbal rgyab ltar mtho ba dang/ /mdzes pa'i mtshan ldan zhed du yang/ /sor ni lnga dang sdug bar bya/ /mthe'u chung sor gyi drug ba nas/
19a3(mdo 'grel): zheng ni sor mo drug yin no/ /mthe bong zheng du sor gnyis ta/ /spoms su seng ni drug yin no/ /srid du sor ni bzhi yen ta/ /drung ma rtsam mthon por bya/ /'dzub mo dgan cung zang cig /mthe bong la ni lhag bar bya/ /de nyid kyi ni srid dang sboms/ /sor
19a4(mdo 'grel): mo dag ni gsum du ba/ /sor mo lhag ma rnams dang ni/ /tshad ni sor mo re res dbri/ /mthe'u chung gi ni srid dang sboms/ /sor mo dag ni gnyis gnyis so/ /sor mo bar thags bzang ba dang/ /tshigs sdug 'bar 'bur med pa dang/ /
19a5(mdo 'grel): shin tu zlum dang rtsa mi mngon/ /rgyus pa rus pa mi mngon dang/ /sen mo zla gam 'dra ba dang/ /mdog dmar yang zhing sad bag can/ /me yi 'bras bu ltar mdog snum/ /gsal zhing sang bag can dang ni/ /le brgan rtsi yis sku bar bya/ /
19a6(mdo 'grel): ke ke ru ltar sar bar bya/ /zla gam dbyibs 'dra mdog dmar zhing/ /mdog snum sma med 'jam par bya/ /nas kyi 'phreng bas gang ba dang/ /tshigs rnams 'byor zhing shin tu grims/ /sor mo dag ni tshigs gsum ste/ /mthe bong de ltar
19a7(mdo 'grel): sgrims nas bya/ /the bong dang ni mdzus mo'i bar/ /zheng ni sor gyi phyed du bya/ /long bu'i 'og ni rkang pas bshad/ /'phang du sor ni bzhi yin no/ /'di ni rkang pa'i mchu zheng gi /mtshan nyid bdag gis bshad pa yin/ /mi yi bdag po lag
19b1(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /mtshan nyid dag ni nyan bar gyis/ /lag pa'i mthil la sor bdun te/ /zheng du sor ni ldar bya'o/ /gung mo yi ni sor mo la/ /sor lnga dag gi tshad du bya/ /mdzub mo sen mo'i phyed du phyin/ /srin lag kyang ni de'i tshad do/ /mthe'u chung yang ni thung dur bya/
19b2(mdo 'grel): the beng la ni sor bzhir bstan/ /mthe bong la ni tshigs gnyis te/ /nas 'phreng dgang zhing 'bar 'bur med/ /mthe bong drung gi sbe sha la/ /sor mo dag ni gsum du bshad/ /mthe bo'i lto yi tshad dag ni/ /nas dgu dag tu bya ba yin/ /lto yi zheng du nas brgyad do/ /srid
19b3(mdo 'grel): du nas ni dgu yin no/ /mthe bo yin ni bzhi cha nas/ /dra ba'i rim pas 'brel bar bya/ /sen mo mdog dmar sang zhing sdug /nya phyis 'dra bar ngo mtsher bya/ /mthe bo'i drung gi rbe sha yi/ /zher du sor ni gsum shes bya/ /mkhrig ma'i drung nas srid du ni/ /ser
19b4(mdo 'grel): mo bdun du bya ba yin/ /'di ni mthe bo'i srid dang zhing/ /tshad du bya ba bstan pa yin/ /sor mo rnams kyi sen mo ni/ /tshigs kyi phyed kyi tshang nas bya/ /rtse 'phra rkeng pa nas 'dra? dang/ /skyon med chigs ni 'byor ba dang/ /tshigs sdug zlum zhing ri/
19b5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /rgyal bo sor mo rnams su bshad/ /lag pa yi ni 'thil dag kyang/ /pad+ma dmar po 'dra bar bya/ /ri mo zab cing ya yo med/ /mdza' gnyis zab chung phra ba dang/ /ri bong khrag gis mdog 'dra bar/ /rim gsum gyis rnam
19b6(mdo 'grel): mdzes bya/ /dpal be'u g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang/ /'khor lo'i mtshan nyid brgyan pa dang/ /shing bal 'da' ba reg pa dang/ /dad skud chun po ltar 'jam bya/ /kun nas sha ni rgyas ba dang/ /rtsa snang ba dang mi mngon dang/ /bol mtho
19b7(mdo 'grel): mthil ni gshong ba dang/ /sor mo'i dra ba srab cing mdzes/ /sen mo'i lho ba utpal dmar/ /klu yi rgyal po gdengs ka 'dra/ /sen mo nges ni 'jam pa dang/ /srab cing mdog snum dag pa dang/ /mdog dmar yang zhing// tshes?
20a1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /mtho zhing gsal bas lag mdzes bya/ /lag ba'i mchu dang zheng dag gi /mtshan nyid rab tu bstan pa yin/ /dbung ba yi ni srid dang zheng/ /rgyal po bdag la mnyan par gyis/ /lag pa'i
20a2(mdo 'grel): srid du sor mo dag /sum cu rtsa drug ngag tu bshad/ /dbung ba la ni sor bco brgyad/ /lag dar la yang de bzhin no/ /dpung mgo la ni sor drug ste/ /dbung pa'i zheng la sor ldar bya/ /mkhrig ma la ni sor gsum mo/ /lag dar
20a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis la mor bzhi'o/ /phrag ba'i phyogs ni yangs pa dang/ /byin gyis zlum po dag tu bya/ /zheng dag tu ni sor bco brgyad/ /rtsa dang tshigs ni mi mngon bya/ /lag pa gtogs bar srid du ni/ /bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dag bya ste/
20a4(mdo 'grel): lag pa dag gis bus mo la /slebs pa dag tu ring ba dang/ /kun nas sha ni rgyas ba dang/ /byin gyis phra zhing sdug legs bya/ /mi yi dbang phyug dbung ba ni/ /ba langs mjug ltar byin gyis phra/ /gang tshe drang por
20a5(mdo 'grel): 'dreng ba na/ /lag ba ngag gis bus mo reg /de phyir rgyal po lag pa yis/ /bus mo slebs ba zhes bshad do/ /'di ni dbyung ba lag ba yi/ /srid zheng mtshan nyid bstan ba yan/ /da dung du ni ma bstan pa/ /gang yin khyod la
20a6(mdo 'grel): bshad par bya/ /skra yi mtshams nas lhag rus par/ /tshad na sor mo drug yin no/ /rgyab kyi sogs pa gnyis la ni/ /sor mo bcu drug dag tu 'dod/ /sogs pa'i bar gyi srid du ni/ /tshad shes rnams kyis sor bcu ste/
20a7(mdo 'grel): zheng du sor ni dgu yin par/ /rnam bar phya nas yongs su bstan/ /sogs ba'i bar ni rgya zhib dbyibs/ /'dra zhing shin tu sdug bar bya/ /rgyab kyi gshul la sor drug go /ro stod gzhung la sor nyi shu/ /gzhung gi zhed?
20b1(mdo 'grel): du sor gnyis te/ /lung bu can dang sdug gur bya/ /skyes ba'i de ltar shes par bya/ /bud med la ni long bu chung/ /dbyi yi bar na 'dug pa yi/ /sgu dgru? ba zhi lham ba ste/ /dma' zhing tshad du bya ba yang/ /sor mo dag ni drug tu bshad/ /sgu ngo? nas na ste
20b2(mdo 'grel): zur 'chams/ /zheng du sor mo bzhi yin no/ /rkub kyi lung bu sor gnyis so/ /rkub rtsos ser brgyad mdzes pa dag/ /ha cang mi zhum mi 'bur dang/ legs par zlum zhing shin tu mdzes/ /rkub tshos zheng du sor bdun gyi/ /tshad du bya ba bstan pa yin/ /'di ni
20b3(mdo 'grel): mchu dang zhang rag gi /mtshan nyid dag tu bstan pa yin/ /da dung du yang de bshar /kyis/ /de ni ma yengs gzung bar gyis/ /so dang skra dang spu rnams kyi/ /skye ba'i thabs dang kha dog ni /mtshan nyid lha yi gdong dag gi /med pa'ang bshad par bya yis
20b4(mdo 'grel): nyon/ /mnyam zhing thags ni dam pa dang/ /mdog snum tsing zhing rno dkar ba/ /mu tig bzho pad+ma'i rtsa/ /kha ba'i phung bo ltar dkar ba/ /bzhi bcu yod cing so bzang la/ /mche ba rnams kyes legs par mjes/ /srid du nas gsum shes par bya/ /de
20b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin zheng du nas gnyis so/ /so yi snyil dang rkan dang ni/ /lce yi mtshams ni dmar por bya/ /mche ba nas kye phyed kyi bskyed/ /sma ma'i me tog ba 'bus 'dra/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ltar 'jam pa dang/ /rtse mo rno la shin tu zlum/ /mche ba shas kyi bzang der bya//
20b6(mdo 'grel): lce ni pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra zhing/ /glog 'gyu ba ltar gsal ba dang/ /mdog snum khrag ni 'dra bar bya/ /a d+ha'i 'dab ma gzhon nu 'dra/ /gdong la kun tu khebs ba yin/ /skad kyi gdangs ni snyan pa dang/ /glang chen rgyags ba'i 'dra ba dang/ /rta yi rgyal
20b7(mdo 'grel): po'i skad 'byin 'dra/ /'drug sgra sgogs ltar skad brjod do/ /mchu ris 'dra bar phrag ba dang/ /rang bzhin gyis ni snam bag rgyan/ /sdug cing anda rnyil ngad? 'dra/ /rung mdog mig sman 'dra ba dang/ /rma bya'i ma? grin? pa 'dra ba dang/ /khu byug yi na zor?
21a1(mdo 'grel): ka 'dra/ /ci le gnas pa'i mdog ltar 'cher/ /sogs ba'i steng du slebs pa dang/ /'khril ba gcan la g.yas su 'khyil/ /chu ris seng ge'i ral ba 'dra/ /thor chugs ral ga g.yan du 'khyil/ /'di dag sgra
21a2(mdo 'grel): yi rnam pa yin/ /bdag nyid chen po'i byin pa dang/ /brla dang 'doms dang mchan khung dang/ /rna ba sna yi bu ga dang/ /'gul pa kha dang 'gram pa la/ /spu med gyen phyos 'jam ba dang/ /phra snum mig sman sngon po 'dra/ /chu ris
21a3(mdo 'grel): 'dra bar sdug pa dang/ /zlum po dag tu 'khyil ba yi/ /ba spu rnams kyis rgyal po yi/ /thong ka mdzes byas yid 'ong bya/ /mi rnams yin gyi lha 'brel dang/ /kha la kha sbu ba sbu med/ /lus la sbu ni med pa dang/ /bcu drug
21a4(mdo 'grel): lo lon 'drar shes bya/ /mi yi bdag po lha rnams ni/ /skra tshogs phra zhing 'khyil bag can/ /mthon mthing gis ni rnam par mdzes/ /sems can kun gyi yid 'ong bri/ /'dzam bu chu ba'i gser zhun 'dra/ /pad+ma
21a5(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa'i spubs 'bras can/ /tsam pa ka mdog sbel 'od can/ /skyes mchog 'khor lo sgyur ba bya/ /glang chen rgyal po khyu mchog dbang/ /dad pa seng ge rnams kyi dang/ /'khor lo bsgyar ba'i 'gros 'dra bar/ /mi yi
21a6(mdo 'grel): rgyal po shes par gyis/ /glang chen rgyal bo'i go stobs che/ /khyu mchog dbang bo'i rnon bag can/ /seng ge rgyal po brtan bag can/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po ngom brjid can/ /mi yi dbang phyug chas 'dra zhing/ /'gros rnams thams
21a7(mdo 'grel): cad zil gnan nas/ /zlo gar dag ni ston pa 'dra/ /sems can rnams la slob pa 'dra/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i sha mdog ni/ /rdul dang dre mas mi gos shing/ /srab la mdog snum dri zhim dang/ /me long ltar reg 'jam pa yin/
21b1(mdo 'grel): nor bu 'bar ba'i 'ong can dag /gos srab dkar por bzhan pa ltar/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ /kun nas 'od kyi 'khor bar bri/ /zla ba sprin bral lhag bar mdzes gyur cing/ /gzugs ni 'od kyi skor ba ci 'dra bar/ /sa bdag 'khor lo sgyur? pa 'ang mdzes
21b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'dro/? /dkyil 'khor lus la gnas pa 'ang nges par bya/ /gdong yang zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od ltar dkar/ /mi yi 'jig rten zla dgong zla gnyis 'dra/ /smin legs mgul legs dbral ba gdong bar legs/ /skra mdog legs snum 'jam zhing rtse mo 'khyil?/
21b3(mdo 'grel): sna mtho drang zhing mchu ni khrag ltar spa/ /so ni da gcing mu tig sar pa 'dra/ /rdzi ma'i mdog snum mchog gi 'dra zhing ring/ /mthon ting gsal bar mig kyang dkyus ring mdzes/ /mdzod sba 'bar ba smin ma'i bar gnas ba/ /dkar bo lus ni rnam par mdzes
21b4(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /rna ba pad+ma rgyas pa'i spubs mdog 'dra/ /de yi rna gshal byin gyis 'phra bar bya/ /mgrin pa dud 'dra thal gol rgyal ba yin/ /phrag pa 'gas 'brel yan lag des par zlum/ /mthong ka sha rgyas mchu dang zheng du gab/ /seng ge'i rgyal po lto
21b5(mdo 'grel): ltar byin gyis rnyed?/ /rkeng pa legs zlum lus ni sha rgyas shing/ /lte ba g.yas su 'khyil ba zab pa yin/ /glang chen rgyal 'drar 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub/ /kun nas legs zlum tshigs kyang mi mngon yin/ /brla ni glang chen sna 'dra byin gyis zlum/ /
21b6(mdo 'grel): ? gdong mtho zhing long bu mi mngon la/ /ser mo legs 'brel mdzes shing rkang pa dang/ /bol ni rus spal 'dra bar sha rgyas te/ /rtse mo zla gam 'dra ba'i sen mos spa/ /rkang 'jam 'khor lo'i mtshan ldan sbal ljar/ /lag dang zlum zhing brkyad na
21b7(mdo 'grel): ring pha dang/ /khu mchog 'jug ma 'dra par byin gyis bra/ /ser mo ring zhing legs zlum lag mthil gshod/ /sen mo'i 'od kyis gsal byas 'khor los rgyan/ /dbyigs legs tsam ba'i phung po 'dra bar dkar/ /dad ltar 'khor lo sgyur ba brjid? 'gror
22a1(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /de ltar 'di ni 'khor lo sgyur ba yi /mchu zheng mdza' dag gi ni tshad du bshad/ /rje dar brla rgyas lus ni shin tu rgyas/ /phyag dang zhabs legs tshigs rnams mi mngon no/ /rgyab dang rtsib logs legs shing? la? ?
22a2(mdo 'grel): yi/ /phrag legs gdong legs lus kyang gru bzhi legs/ /shin tu sha rgyas yan lag thams cad mdzes/ /lus kun mdog sdug 'khril ba gcan yang yin/ /yon tan sdug brgya chen dag ldan zhing/ /dang pha ltar 'gro 'khor lo sgyur bar bshad/ /mkhas
22a3(mdo 'grel): bar brags bdag gis ni/ /mdor na mi la yan lag tu/ /mgo bo mgul pa lag ba gnyis/ /brla dang rje dang yin par bshad/ /'di skad bstan pa gang yin nas/ /kun la rang gi sor mos yin/ /nyid lag tshang ni gang yin nas/ /tshang du bya ba dang bshad
22a4(mdo 'grel): ba/ /sa gzhi mnyam dang chu dang ni/ /zheng dang sboms la sogs ba yi/ /chad dang tshul gyis nying lag dang/ /legs ba phun sum tshogs bar bri/ /de phyir thog mar mkhas rnams kyis/ /tshang ni 'bad de shes bar bya/ /tshad dang gnas thabs mi
22a5(mdo 'grel): ldan gzugs/ /lha rnams kyis ni rnam spang shing/ /sha za 'byung ba srin bo rnams/ /de dag la ni gnas byed cing/ /myur du mi shis 'jigs pa 'byung/ /legs pa rnams kyi bgegs kyang byed/ /gtso bo mchu dang zheng dag gi /mtshan nyid rab
22a6(mdo 'grel): tu bstan pa yin/ /rgyal po bzhi po dag gis ni/ /rang gi blo yis rnam phye sheg /stobs can dang ni snang byed dang/ /ram shing rta bcu ba'i bu/ /me rno'i bu ni tshad bzhin no/ /tshang shes dag gis bya ba ste/ /bzang po la ni sor gnyis dbri/ /
22a7(mdo 'grel): ma la bar skyes sor bzhi'o/ /gsal byed sor ni brgyad kyis dbri? /ri bo 'chong ni sor bcus so/ /ji ltar mi sdug mi 'gyur bar/ /rang gi blo yis tshad bri bya/ /lus la mjas pa ma tshad na/ /chad ngag gis ni ci zhig bya/ /rgyal po
22b1(mdo 'grel): dag ni bzhi rnams kyi/ /tshad kyi mtshan nyid so so ste/ /tshangs pas bdag la bstan pa bzhin/ /gal te khyod la bshad pa na/ /des ni gzhung ni mdzas? pa dang/ /mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs thob na/ /skye bo blo mi chung ba dag /mi thos bas kyang skrag? par
22b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /bud med skyes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi/ /bstan bcos stong phrag bcu gnyis te/ /rnam pa lnga yang tshangs pa yis/ /rang nyid kyis ni bstan ba yin/ /mi yi mtshan nyid ldan ba yi/ /rnam pa lnga po bstan de dag /de khyod gal te bstan byas na/ /des
22b3(mdo 'grel): ni gzhung ni mangs gyur bstan/ /mi yi rgyal bo khyod la ni/ /bstan ba des na ci zhig bya/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i tshang bstan pa/ /mi yi skyes mchog lha dang ni/ /thams cad ngag gi chad ngag gi /mtshan nyid rab tu bstan yin pas/ /rang gi ble yib?  nus pa
22b4(mdo 'grel): yis/ 'das? byas bzang la sogs bzhi bri/ /'di la bzang po'i srid du ni/ /brgya dang rtsa ni drug tu bya/ /gsal byed la ni brgyar shes bya/ /ma la bar skyes bzhi yi skyed/ /ri bong mchog gi srid du ni/ /sor mo dgu bcu rtsa brgyad bya/ /de las gzhan pa'i tshad
22b5(mdo 'grel): kyi tshul/ /ma byung byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mi yi dbang phyug gtso bo dang/ /'bri dang tha ma dag gi gzugs/ /srid dang zhed du bya ba dang/ /thams cad bltas te bltas ba yin/ bud med bzhin? du skyes ba la'ang/ /de ltar dang gi blos spyad nas/ /rgyal po'i
22b6(mdo 'grel): srid du 'ang sor re dang/ /sor de dag gis dbri bar bya/ /mgri na bo mgo bo lte ba dang/ /brang dang rked pa'i bar dang ni/ /brla dang rje dang bus mo dang/ /rkang ba gnyis kyi srid ngag dang/ /mi sdug pa ni mi 'gyur bas/ /tshad kyi tshul gyis dbri par bya/ /gtso
22b7(mdo 'grel): bo bar ma tha ma yi/ /tshang? bu bya ba go rim bzhin/ /mchu dang zheng ni rab tu bstan/ /bud med tshad tshul mnyan par gyis/ /rgyal pos ji skad bstan 'di rang gi blos sbyong nas/ /tshang dang 'tsham par bya zhing smod par mi 'gyur dang/ /gnas thabs
23a1(mdo 'grel): mang po dang ni sa gzhi mnyam gnyis dang/ /shin tu gzhon sha ya yo med par ri mo bris/ /ri mo'i mtshan nyid las/ /tshad kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i tshad yig ji snyed pa rdzogs so// //
23a2(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bri ti mA maM lak+Sha NaM nA ma /bod skad du/ sku gzugs kyi tshad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /eTe'i ril sangs rgyas pa'i/ /sngon gyi rgyud dang bstan bcos su/ /sku gzugs tshad kyi mtshan
23a3(mdo 'grel): nyid rnams/ /thub pa rnams kyis sngon gsungs gang/ /go rim ji bzhin lhan cig tu/ /de 'dir yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshal nas/ /lha sku'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya/ /sor mo bcu gnyis lag 'thil dang/ /
23a4(mdo 'grel): gdong dang mtho yang de bzhin du/ /don gcig ming duAng 'di shes bya/ /ka laM sor gnyis go la kaM /lag pa'i pad+ma'i bzhi cha la/ /sor mo'i tshad du shes bar bya/ /de nas sor mo brgyad cha yis/ /nas su mkhas pas rig par bya/ /sku yi yan
23a5(mdo 'grel): lag nyid lag gi /chag tshad don zhes gsungs pas na/ /rnam pa 'di yis de bzhin du/ /mkhas pas chag tshad gzhal bar bya/ /gang zhig cung zad lus srid kyi/ /cha dgu yi ni cha gcig dang/ /mtho gang gdong du byas nas ni/ /de bzhin
23a6(mdo 'grel): du ni rgyar yangs te/ /ba yig rnam pa a 'bras dang/ /mkha' 'gro'i sgo da til 'bras bzhin/ /de nas dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /rnam pa bzhi zhes gsungs pa la/ /sor mo gcig gis dman pa ni/ /ba yig rnam pa'i tshad yin te/ /
23a7(mdo 'grel): gang zhig sor mo gnyis dman pa/ /a 'bras lta bu zhes bya'i gdong/ /gang zhig phyed bcas sor gcig dman/ /mkha' 'gro'i sgo nga 'dra bar brjod/ /gang zhig sor mo gsum spangs pa/ /til gyi 'bras bu 'dra bar brjod/ /gdong ni
23b1(mdo 'grel): bzhi po rnams la yang/ /rnam par spang bya mgram pa la/ /til 'bras dbyibs kyis nges pa ni/ /lha mo rnams kyi bzhin la 'dod/ /bstan bcos mi mthun bzhin byas na/ /sbyin bdag rnam par nyams par 'gyur/ /bstan bcos mthun par bzhin mdzad
23b2(mdo 'grel): na/ /phun tshogs dang ldan gnyen dang bcas/ /gtsug tor la la sor bzhi ste/ /bdugs kyi rnam pa 'dra bar bya/ /sor mo phyed dang sor mo bzhi/ /dbral ba ru ni yongs su grags/ /dpral ba'i phyed kyi nges pa ni/ /sro mo bcu dang lan par bya/ /sor gnyis mig par de bzhin du/ /sna gong
23b3(mdo 'grel): phyed bcas sor mo dang/ /sor gnyis logs dang steng du ste/ /sna'i rgyud la nas gsum mo/ /sna rdog zlum po sor mo ste/ /rgyud kyi rtsa ba nas gnyis so/ /rna bsnyan gyi bu ga ni/ /nas gsum yin te shin tu mdzes/ /dung bzhin du ni 'khyil ba ste/ /
23b4(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa yis ni tshad ldan bya/ /'di tshad yang dag rig pa yis/ /lce'i khyim du rab gsungs pa/ /til gyi me tog sna ma dang/ /ne tso khra yi gdong pa bzhin/ /sor gcig dang ni nas gnyis te/ /de yi 'og gi cha ru gsungs/ /ma mchu
23b5(mdo 'grel): la ni nas drug ste/ /ya mchu la ni nas bzhir bya/ /pang sgros steng du gnas pa ni/ /sor mo yin sum char bya/ /zhal gyi ma mchu mchungs pa la/ /rgya ru sor mo gnyis su bya/ /gyes mtshams nas drug dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs re ka bri
23b6(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ /zhal gyi grwa yang sor mo phyed/ /cung zad tsam zhig dma' bar bya/ /kos ko'i zheng du sor gnyis te/ /srid kyi tshad du nas bcu'o/ /sor phyed smin ma'i dbus su ste/ /sor mo lnga ni ring du bya/ /nas phyed smin ma'i re khA'i tshad/ /ma nyes
23b7(mdo 'grel): gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra'o/ /sor gnyis nas gnyis spyan la ste/ /rgya yi sum cha spyan gyi ni/ /sum cha nag por yang dag gsungs/ /de yi sum cha spyan 'bras yin/ /nas phyed rdzi ma'i tshad du gnas/ /ku mung utpal 'dab 'dra dang/ /pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra
24a1(mdo 'grel): nya lto 'dra/ /mig mthar sor bzhir shes par bya/ /myos 'dab la ni sor mo gcig /snyan gyi zheng du sor mo gnyis/ /srid du sor mo bzhi yin no/ /snyan gyi rgyab kyi 'byung sa nas/ /sor mo gnyis su yongs su grags/ /
24a2(mdo 'grel): 'dud 'khyud yang dag sor mo phyed/ /de phyed steng gi rgur por bya/ /sor mo yi ni bzhi cha yis/ /snyan shal gyi ni zhing yin no/ /snyan gyi gsang gnas nas gnyis te/ /ji ltar mdzes pa mu khyud nang/ /snyan gyi mu khyud rtsa ba nas/ /gri gug dbyibs
24a3(mdo 'grel): su rab tu grags/ /snyan gnyis dag gi dbus kyi ni/ /dbu la sor mo btso brgyad do/ /yang na mtho do nyid du gsungs/ /dpral ba'i rgyab kyi phyogs la ni/ /sor gnyis bcu gcig the tshom med/ /smi mtshams spyan dbus dag la ni/ /sor
24a4(mdo 'grel): mo gnyis su yongs su grags/ /snyan gyi rtsa dang kos ko'i bar/ /sor mo rnams ni brgyad du 'gyur/ /de bzhin kos ko dpral ba dang/ /spyan dag kyang ni mtshungs par bya/ /zhal gyi grwa sogs mig 'bras dag /thig ni mnyam
24a5(mdo 'grel): pos gzhal bar bya/ /smin ma'i re khA snyan rtsa'i thig /thig gis mnyam du tshad par bya/ /snyan gyi mdun khyud spyan dbus kyang/ /de bzhin du ni mnyan par gzhal/ /lkog ma'i steng ni sor mo bzhi/ /mgul pa'i srid kyang de
24a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin no/ /phrag rtsa dang ni snyan rtsa'i bar/ /ji srid sor mo drug yin no/ /kos ko'i sha ni zlum po ste/ /ji ltar mdzes par byas nas ni/ /de yi tshad du 'phyang ba'o/ /kos ko'i khung dang snyan khung gi /dbus kyi khung ni thung zhing
24a7(mdo 'grel): dma'/ /cod pan dang ni ral pa bcings/ /'khyil pa skra yi lhas ma dang/ /gtsug phud dang ni rtse mo gsum/ /dbu rgyan dang ni thor tshugs bcings/ /de rnams sor mo brgyad du ring/ /de bas lhag par mi bya'o/ /dge ? mi dge
24b1(mdo 'grel): 'chad 'gyur ba'i/ /zhal gyi rnam pa cung zad ni/ /mdzum zhing mnyen pa byas nas ni/ /mtshan nyid dang ni ldan par bya/ /bska dang tsha ba dang ni khro?/ /de bzhin du ni skyur dang le/ /gdong gi dbyibs ni rigs byas nas/ /ring du yongs su spang bar bya/ //
24b2(mdo 'grel): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /lus kyi tshad kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /mgrin pa'i mtshams nas lte ba'i bar/ /gnyis skyes gdod pa gnyis su bya/ /lte ba 'doms kyi spa ba dang/ /rtsa nas 'phred la logs dag dang/ /'phongs rtsos ngag dang de
24b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ /mgrin mtshams nu ma'i dbus dag dang/ /nu ma'i mthar yang de bzhin du/ /mgrin logs dpung pa'i rtse mo rnams/ /mtho re'i tshad du rab tu gsungs/ /lte ba'i nu ma'i bar cha ni/ /sor mo rnams ni bcu bzhi ste/ /thig ni mnyam du
24b4(mdo 'grel): gdab par bya/ /de bzhin mgrin mtshams brang gi zho/ /lus kyi rked pa'i rgya la ni/ /mtho ni gsum gyi tshad du gsungs/ /rgyab la sor mo drug dag bya/ /de bzhin brad gi nu ma'i mthar/ /nu ma'i dkyil 'khor logs su ni/ /sor mo gnyis kyi
24b5(mdo 'grel): tshad kyis so/ /nu ma'i rtse mo nas gnyis zlum/ /nas gsum lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /lte ba'i zabs? ni mdzes byas la/ /g.yas su 'khyil pas mtshan pa'o/ /sor gnyis gsang ba'i gnas la ste/ /sor gnyis bcu ni lag dar la//
24b6(mdo 'grel): sor gnyis gsum ni lag pa'i srid/ /de yi srid du gung mo'i/ /mthe bong la ni sor bzhi bya/ /de dang mtshungs pa mthe'u chud/ /gung mo'i srid las sen phyed kyis/ /dman pa'i sor mo ming med do/ /gung mo'i srid las sen gang
24b7(mdo 'grel): dman/ /mdzub mo ru ni shes par bya/ /mthe bo che yi rgya ru ni/ /zheng la nas rdog dgu yin te/ /phyed dang bcas pa'i nas brgyad kyis/ /gung mo'i tsh+d ni mdzes par bya/ /gnyis po nas rdog brgyad du rig /mthe'u chung ni nas bdun
25a1(mdo 'grel): shes/ /mtheb chung rtsa nas mkhrig ma la/ /sor mo rnams ni lnga ru 'dod/ /lag mthil dbus kyi zheng la yang/ /de yi tshad kyis shes par bya/ /mthe bo'i tshigs nas mkhrig ma'i bar/ /ji srid sor mo bzhi? yan?
25a2(mdo 'grel): no/ /mthe bo'i rtsa nas mdzub? mo'i bar/ /ji srid sor mo gnyis su 'gyur/ /sor mo rnams ni tshigs pa gsum/ /mthe bo la ni tshigs gnyis 'gyur/ /sor mo so so rnams kyi ni/ /tshigs pa rnams ni mnyam du brjod/ /rtse mo zlum zhing phra bar
25a3(mdo 'grel): rig /tshigs pa rnams ni bde bar sbyar/ /so la sor byed rtse mo ste/ /'phyed la tshigs phyed de bzhin du/ /sen mo'i rtsa ba zla phyed kyi/ /rnam pa can du mkhas bas bya/ /phyag ni sor mo lnga bar bya/ /logs dag sor mo gnyis yin no/ /phyag
25a4(mdo 'grel): gi mthil ni gang bar bya/ /dge ba'i re khAs nye bar mdzes/ /phyag gi re khA 'chad 'gyur ba/ /lha rnams kyi ni dge ba'i mtshan/ /dung dang pad+ma rgyal mtshan dang/ /'khor lo rdo rje? shak+ti dang/ /'khyil ba bum pa zla ba gdugs/ /de bzhin dpal
25a5(mdo 'grel): be'u lcags kyu gdugs/ /rtse gsum nas kyi phreng ba dang/ /nor 'dzin gyi ni de nyid bya/ /lte ba'i gsang ba'i dbus dag ni/ /brla yi rtsa ba mtshungs par bya/ /brla ni mtho dor ring ba nyid/ /rje dar rings su gdod gnyis bya/ /pus mo la ni
25a6(mdo 'grel): sor gnyis gnyis/ /phong bu sor gnyis gcig tu shes/ /rting pa sor gnyis gnyis su shes/ /rim? pa'i 'bras bu smin pa bzhin/ /zhabs kyi phyed du sor mo bdun/ /srid kyi tshad du sor mo bcu/ /zhabs kyi bzhi char gyur pa yis/ /
