48a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i dbyangs rnams ni/ /a yig dang ni A yig dang/ /de bzhin gsum pa u yig dang/ /e yig lha mo yid 'phrog ma/ /o yig dang ni lnga ru 'dod/ /de ltar lnga yi dbyangs su 'dod/ /'di yi luD kyi dkar phyoD kyi
48a4(mdo 'grel): dbyangs kyi rang bzhin rim/ chos gcig a? ste swa ba la/ bzhin du/ /sa dang chu me A rlung dang ni/ Ao? nam mkha' sbyor bar shes par bya// tshes` yon tan `tshes dri dang ro dang gzugs dang ni /me /reg bya sgra rnams
48a5(mdo 'grel): rim bzhin dran/ /dbyangs lnga zhes bya lha chen ma/ /bya ba A` a'i A` kun la shes par bya/ /ring bo lnga rnams dkar phyogs la/ /sa` chu` sa la dri'i yon tan yod pa bzhin gzhan la gang yod` rlung /namkha' `
48a6(mdo 'grel): lan gsum du yang 'gyur gtso che ba ba yin/ /ka nas ha yi mthar thug par/ /nga nya Na gsum spangs pa yis/ /bcu drug nas stong gi bar gsal byed phyogs gnyis dag la 'char/ /dkar phyogs nag phyogs dag la yang//
48a7(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' mdzes ma yi ge sum cung 'gyur/ /gsal byed ka nas da yi bar/ /dkar po'i phyogs la k+Sha ma rto ? sum cu yod` rim bzhin 'char/ /bcu bdun ? stong gi bar` mdor` rgyal` dkar phyogs ring bar lan
48b1(mdo 'grel): gsum ste/ /ka sogs rnams dang lhan cig 'gyur/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes rnams dang/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes la yang/ /dga' ba nas ni brtsams nas su/ /lan gsum du can 'tshar ba yin/ /ri rI li lI spangs pa yi/ /dbyangs
48b2(mdo 'grel): yig thung du a dang ` lnga po rnams/ /nag po'i phyogs la 'tshar ba ni/ /d+ha sogs rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /so so'i tshes kyi byed pa rnams/ /bdag po lan gsum du yang 'gyur/ /shum dza na ma o ha ni ? an+ta ka /'dzigadzamma?
48b3(mdo 'grel): gcig nas nye'i bar la e skye ba i 'jigs pa u 'jigs pa i skya ba o gnas pa` hA ni rim pa a dang` bzhin/ /byis pa gzhon nu lang tsho rgan/ /shin tu bud pa` smin te shi ba rim pa bzhin/ /kyis` mum ba` a` snying stobs` gnas ba` sdul skye rim
48b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du 'jigs a sogs dbyangs kyi bye brag dang/ /ches ni lnga la mun pa` bzang po rgyal stong pa rdzogs ` cung zad dang` tshes dang` shin tu dar` `ming yig a yin na byis pa i gzhon nu u 'ang ? e rgan o shi ba` rim par sbyar/ /byis pa rgas pa la sogs
48b5(mdo 'grel): la/ /dar gud las kyi bye brag byed/ /tshes la 'char ba'i dbyangs rnams dang/ /ming gi dbyangs rnams sbyar bar dbya/ /dpyid 'brir dkar phyogs sogs brtsams nas/ /dbyangs rnams 'char re lha mo kye/ /nyin zhag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la/ /
48b6(mdo 'grel): dbyangs ni re re 'char bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin zhag ni bcu gnyis la/ /dbyangs ni 'dri byed rang gi re re 'char ba dang/ /16 nas stong gi bar nyi ma zhag la ? gnyis kyi bar du dang po a gnyis pa i des 'dre'o/ ` skyes nas bdun cu rtsa gnyis phrag lngas dbyangs rdzoD pas zhag ? ste lo gcig go /rags?
48b7(mdo 'grel): dang po la e gcig pa i /de bas bra ba de bzhin skyes nas ` phra ba` zhag lnga dag la yang/ /dbyangs rnams 'char bar 'gyur ba dang/ /nyin re bzhin du dbyangs re 'char/ /thur dang ring ba'i dbyangs lnga'o/ /nyin 1 lnga mtshan ni lnga 'char ba?
49a1(mdo 'grel): dran/ /lta dang sum {kha} cu bdun {ga} cu gnyis/ /rags pa phra ba'i dbye ba yi/ /'char bar 'gyur ro dkar mo kyai/ /dkar nag phyogs kyi so so la/ /gsal byed re re 'char ro kye/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi zla phyed la/ /ri bong
49a2(mdo 'grel): can dang dus drug dang/ /shin tu phra ba` 12 zer ram` drag po yis ni tshes rnams la/ /dga' pa dang ni a yig dag 13 /nag po'i phyogs la thung rnams 'char/ /mig dang thub2 pa nyi ma 12 la/ /bzang mdor` rgyas/ po'i ming can chos gcig nas nyi?
49a3(mdo 'grel): tshes dang ni/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni/ /so sor skye zhing char bar byed/ /me dang bkra shis thung ba ` 'dong tshes la/ /rgyal 24 ba zhes byar grags pa dang/ /u zhes 'byung ba'i dbyangs yig 'char/ /bzhi dang nyin zhag bu ga
49a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /de bzhin bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag la/ /stong bar brjod pa'i chos dang ni/ /e yi yi ge'i dbang byed 'gyur/ /mda' dang phyogs zhes bya ba dang/ /de bzhin bco lnga'i tshes grangs la/ /rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i tshes dang ni/ /dbyangs yig
49a5(mdo 'grel): o ni nges par 'char/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes grangs la/ /a sogs lnga ni 'char bar dran/ /sngar bzhin brjod pa'i chos rnams la/ /lha mo ring por shes par gyis/ /dga' 1 ba bzang2 po rgyal3 ba dang/ /stong4 pa rdzogs pa'i bye
49a6(mdo 'grel): brag la/ /mig1 dmar gza'2 lhag phur3 bu dang/ /pa4 sangs spen5 pa rim bzhin sbyar/ /dkar nag phyogs kyi bye brag la/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed 'char ba la/ /rang bzhin dbang gi dge mi dge /bar ma'i 'bras bu mthong par 'gyur/ /
49a7(mdo 'grel): dga' ba'i tshes las mig dmar dang/ /rgyu skar smin drug a yig rnams/ /'dzom na dang po'i ming yig a yod pa nges 'khrug pa dang g.yul bshis? pa dang/bag ma slang ba dang 'bro 'dug byed ba loD pa gang yang mi bya ? 'dogs des 'dre'o/ /gyur rgya dang tsakra stun/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang dang po'i ming yig
49b1(mdo 'grel): a/ /na 'chi rma 'byung 'bras bu med/ /bzang bo'i chos dang gza' lhag ces/ /rgyu skar mchu dang i yi dbyangs/ /'char tshe i yi ming can rnams/ /nyon mongs 'gyur te snga ma bzhin/ /rgyal ba'i chos la bla ma'i gza'/ /rgyu skar skag 'char
49b2(mdo 'grel): e skyabs lta bu/ nad med na/ las rtsams na/ u yid byangs/ /u yi ming can srog mthar byed/ /bag ma la sogs 'bras bu med/ /stong pa'i tshes dang pa ba sangs/ /rgyu skar mon gru de bzhin te/ /dbyangs ni e yig 'char ba la/ /
49b3(mdo 'grel): e yig rang bzhin 'bras bu med/ /rdzogs pa'i tshes la spen pa dang/ /rgyu skar bra nye nyid byung nas/ /'i ming khyo'i ming gnyis po la rtsi gsung/ dbyangs yig o 'char dus su ni/ /ming ni o can myur du brlag /dga' ba'i chos la nyi ma'i res/ /
49b4(mdo 'grel): a yig ming can nang yun ring/ /bzang por zla ba'i ras la ni/ /i dang de ming de bzhin no/ /rang sa nas ni lnga pa la/ /nub par 'gyur dka' bzlog ma/ /a ni o la nub pa ste/ /ngan` a ni a la de bzhon ? sder gyi rgyu skar rnaMs
49b5(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar ` u yang i la rab tu nub/ /e ni u'i dbyangs la nub/ /ming pi dang po nas e yod ches dang po'i` o ni nub pa e zhes bshad/ /mdor na sa ni namkha' mdor` rgyas pa` shar nas ngan pa` dbyangs yig 'char dus` la/ /chu ni sa la
49b6(mdo 'grel): nub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin du ni shes par bya/ /rtsod dang nad dang g.yul 'gyed dang/ /bya ba kun a li logs kun` 'byung ba lnga dang sbyar nas/ la shes par bya/ /'char ba'i dus su dge ba ste/ /nub dus mi shis par ka la'i? leD kun` yang
49b7(mdo 'grel): dran ? byis ka soD kun nub par shes par bya/ gzhon lar tsho rgan dang 'chi/ /gnas skabs lnga ru brjod par bya/ /rang sar byis par grags pa ste/ /gnyis pa gzhon dbyangs` nu gsum lang tsho/ /nga la rgan te lnga pa shi /?
50a1(mdo 'grel): brag so sor shes bar bya/ /gsal byed nub na nang 'byung ste/ /dbyangs ni 'chi ba ster ba byed/ /lus dang srog gi dbye ba yi/ /gsal byed dbyangs la shes par bya/ /gzhan yang phyogs kyi bye brag si?/ /
50a2(mdo 'grel): 32? kyang ming yig ? byes pa gnyis gzhon gsum lang tshon na lnga shi ba bzhi` lus yin bas` srog yin pas nub na` shar du las yig lho phyogs su/ /i yi yi ge 'tshar bar 'gyur/ /u yig nub de nyid kyi` tu 'char blta/ /byed du ye?
50a3(mdo 'grel): ni 'byung zhing 'char/ /dbus su o yig ces byar grags/ /dbyangs dang gsal ? ming can chos gcig la shar du gror mi rung des kun la 'dre'o/ ` gnyis pa i'i can lho ngan` gsungs ba ur? `/ bzhi ba ya'i ching can byed dang/
50a4(mdo 'grel): byed 'char phyogs su/ /lnga ba o'i ming can dbus su ngan ` A ring po tshe shar phyogs 'pho ba'i tsham thig re bgod/ de rnams kyi thad ka'i gsal byed bkod 'gro dang bya ba kun la spangs/ /de ltar dbyangs rnams gang shar ba/ /bltas nas yid
50a5(mdo 'grel): la rab tu bzung/ /rags par ni pha ba yi/ /gnas skabs bye brag la 'char ba/ /bdag gis ji ltar bshad pa bzhin/ /shes bar gyis shig gangs ri'i bdag /g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dbyangs 'tshar ?
50a6(mdo 'grel): nub pa'i 'bras bu bzang ngan shar ba de dar ba yin/ 'char ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las /lam lnga dang dbyangs 'chags pa nges pa bstan pa chen po ste le'u dang ba'o// gyis/ ? bcu gcig?  dang po song nas /
50a7(mdo 'grel): lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das/ /lha chen khyod kyi dbyangs 'char ba/ /shin tu rgyas par bdag la gsungs/ /yang ni bdag la zhu ba mchis/ /ra shi ri 'khor lo 'char ba las/ /'di byed rnyed dang mi rnyed dang/ /rgyal ?
50b1(mdo 'grel): dang 'pham pa thams cad ni/ /mdzes bdag khyod la ji bzhin zhu/ /shin tu gsang ba bshad du gsol/ /lo gcig gi ni dkyil 'khor la/ /cha shas dum bu'i mtshan nyid dang/ /gtso'o stobs kyi bye brag dang/ /dus sbyor byed pa'i
50b2(mdo 'grel): mtshon nyid dang/ /dus sbyor ji ltar yin pa ming po dang/ gzhan dum grags ba` de la 'dri byed dge mi dge /gza' yi rigs la ? sogs pa las/ /la sogs bye brag? zhes bar dang/ /'angs dan ma 'ongs da
50b3(mdo 'grel): ltar gyi/ /bcu drug gis dgos pa la dang zhag dang sum cu cha gos pas` dus gsum bye brag shes ba rnams/ /dbang phyug gtso bos bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyon gcig mdzes ma ma lus pa/ /
50b4(mdo 'grel): ra sha'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang/ /gza' rnams khyim la 'das ma yongs da ltar` 'khod pa dang/ /zhag gcig gi ni cha shas la/ /bgos pas dus sbyor bcu gnyis la/ /dus sbyor dkyil 'khor mnyam par grags/ /dus sbyor
50b5(mdo 'grel): gza' bdun gnas pa yi/ /'bras bu dkar mo yum khyod nyon/ /lug gling 'khrig pa karka Ta/ /de bzhin seng ge bu mdog rims so/ sreng sdig gzhu dang chu srin dang/ /bum pa nyi yi khyim rnams su zhag sum cu / mig dmar ba
50b6(mdo 'grel): sangs ? lhag che ltar dang/ /zla nyi gza' lhag pa ba g.yon skor` sangs/ /mig dmar phur bu spen pa gnyis/ /phur bu zhes bya khyim bdag gza'/ /lug glang 'khrig pa karka Ta/ /shar lho nub byang rim pa bzhin//
50b7(mdo 'grel): seng ge la sogs brgyad rim bzhin/ /khyim gyi phyogs kyi stobs su brjod/ /nyi ma shar/ pa me` sangs mig lho phyogs kyi stobs g.yas skor la 'khor/ dmar dang/ /g.yas bskor ` phyin ? tu spen bu` zla rlung gza' nor lhag bar phug 
51a1(mdo 'grel): shar nas dbang ldan mthar thug pa/ /g.yas skor lam gyi 'khor lo ste/ /nyi ma shar dge chu bdag ngan/ /de bzhin kun la shes par bya/ /g.yon bskor lugs la nyin mtshan dbyug gu ni/ /
51a2(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' me zhes yongs su grags/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis nyi shu brgyad/ /glang gi nyin mtshan las shes bya/ /rgyu rims kyi gza''khrig par nyin mo sum cu bzhi/ /nyi shu rtsa drug mtshan lug khyim na yod pa'i zla ba gcig la du dran/ /
51a3(mdo 'grel): karka nyin mo sum cu drug /mtshan mo la ni nye bzhi zer/ /seng+ge nyen mo suM cu bzhi/ /nyi shu rtsa drug mtshan mo'i tshad/ /bu mor grags pa'i nyin mtshan la/ /sum cu so gnyis nyi shu brgyad/ /srang ni lug dang 'dra ba yin/
51a4(mdo 'grel): sdig pa nyin la nyi shu brgyad/ / ` 'di rnams dus la bor dang rdo mkha' 'gro na yod` mtshan mo sum cu so gnyis zer/ /gzhu yi khyim la nyi shu drug /nyin yin mtshan mo la so bzhi/ /chu srin nyin mo la nye bzhi/ /
51a5(mdo 'grel): mtshan la sum cu rtsa drug grags/ /bum pa'i nyin mo nye drug dang/ /sum cu rtsa bzhi mtshan la'o/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad nya yi nyin/ /mtshan mo sum cu rtsa gnyis zer/ /de ltar chu tshod shes par bya/
51a6(mdo 'grel): mo? 'pho ba gang la gnas pa yi/ /'das pa'i zhag grangs ji snyed pa/ /gnas gnyis stong ma chu yis bsgyur/ /chu srang nyi shu rtsa lnga yis /'og ma bsgyur la drug cus bgod/ /rnyed ba steng du sbyin par
51a7(mdo 'grel): khyims dus sbyor gyi rtsis byed na bya/ /phyed pas lhag na gcig sbyin bya/ /`nyi mas nyin re la chu tshod bzhi dang chu srang nyre? lnga za ba'i phyir/ /'di ma byas na dag gsungs/ /chu tshod dang? chu spang lhag ma steng ma drug cus thob pa rnams/ /lhag pa don med
51b1(mdo 'grel): chu srin la sogs byang bgrod la/ /thob pa lhag ma chu srung de khyim gang yin gyi nyi mo'i chu tshod la nyin mtshan 'brid` sbyin pa nyid du bya ba yin/ /karka Ta sogs lho bgrod la/ /dor? bas nyin mo'i chu tshod yin/ /steng mas drug cu la phri bas/ /tshud kyi gnas ?
51b2(mdo 'grel): gzhu chu srin du 'pho ba nyi ma ldog` de la gcig phab lhag mas 'brid/ /des ni mtshan mo'i chu tshod shes/ /khyim gyi nyin mo'i rgu? tshor la ? bya pa 'khrig pa nas karka Ta ru 'pho ba la nyi ma zlog/ ` drug cu thob ba des 'phri bas ` logs su bris la ` nyi mo'i chu tshod kyis mtshon ma'i chu tshod ba/
51b3(mdo 'grel): 'pho ba'i nyin mtshan chu tshod nyi mo'i chu srang gi lhag ma` mtshan mo'i` de/ /dang srang` steng ma brgyad kyis thob pa ni/ /thun byed chu tshod bya bar grags/ /lha ma drug cus bsgyur ba la/ /'og gi chu srang
51b4(mdo 'grel): steng du gzhug /gang yin pa` brgyad kyi cha rnyed thun phyed kyi/ /chu srang zhes bya bka' bzlog ma/ /de'i 'dab ma/ nyi mo'i chu tshod yin` skar mig dbyug tshes lug gi tshad/ /` khyim so so'i tshad bstan ba nyin mo'i` rig byed ma/ bla?
51b5(mdo 'grel): me glang du brjod/ /ro dang zhe lnga bgod?` 'khrig ba yin/ /dgu dang nam mkha' karka Ta/ /drag dang bco lnga seng ge'o/ /gnas su` sum cu sum cu bu mor dran/ /chos dang zhe lnga srang du skar ma
51b6(mdo 'grel): dges/ /nor zla stong pa sdig bar go /nyi shu bco lnga gzhu yin mnyam/ /'pho ba/ zung mig sum cu chu srin no/ /rgyal ba mda' chu bum par grags/ /'khor lo nya ru shes par bya/ /khyim gyi 'khor
51b7(mdo 'grel): lo rdzogs pa yin/ /mtshan nyid rnam pa bstan pa yin/ /gzhan yang skar ma gza' bdun po gang la byed kyang ? drug cus bsgyur/ /'og gi de rang gi long sbyong dag bar bya chu tshod steng du gzhug /dus dang ril byed?
52a1(mdo 'grel): sre bar bya/ /mda' dang yon tan zlas thob pa/ /'das pa'i khyim yin lhag ma la/ /sum cus bsgyur la chu srang ni/ /gnyis kyis bgos thob gzhug par bya/ /mda'?
52a2(mdo 'grel): yon tan zlas thob pa/ /'di ni sham b+ha la ba'i man ngag yin gsung de nyi skar du ? chu srang du rtsi snan na zhag bcu'i man ngag dang khyad med do/ ` gza' gzhan la rang rang gi khyim du stod ba'i zhal grangs khyer bsgyur/ gang gnas khyim gyi 'das zhag yin/ /de la
52a3(mdo 'grel): dbyug gu chu srang dang/ /dbugs kyi don du rim bzhin bsgyur/ /bgos pas thob pa dbyug gu dang/ /chu srang dbugs su rim bzhin 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho chu dang zla ba la/ /lo gcig gi dus sbyor te i cha bdun thur ma grib
52a4(mdo 'grel): mar bcas/ /bgos ba thob pa chu tshod yin/ /chu srang dbugs kyang rims bzhin sbyar/ /lhag dus sgyur thob dung gi sgyur la a lug dang srang la drug sbyin bya/ a /glang dang bu mo rang sor bzhag /'khrig pa seng
52a5(mdo 'grel): ger brgyad dor ro/ /karka Ta ru bco brgyad 'bri/ /sdig ba nyal bcu yang sbyin/ /gzhu dang god gi bgod byed kyi ` 'di rnams rgya mtsho la smon 'bid de nas cha bdun grib thur gyi ba'o// chu srin bum pa la/ /bcu gnyis dag ni byin ba
52a6(mdo 'grel): khas/ /snga dro 'dras pa phyi dro lus/ /de yis nyin mo'i dbyug gur 'bring/ /lhag ma lus dang 'das pa shes/ /nam mkha' mkha' zung lug gi khyim/ 2 /nam mkha' rig byed mchi ma glang/ /bum pa
52a7(mdo 'grel): stong pa nor lha zung khrig pa/ /chu srin mkha' so karka 'pho ba gang la gnas pa yi 'das pa'i zhag grangs ji snyed ba` zhes ba dang snad cig go `lug? gi brad? 'bab de yang khyiM? res bzhi bcu 'phel dub srang nas ? phyir/ ` khyim gyi chu srang 'dis dus sbyor la dgos dus chu srad zer/
52b1(mdo 'grel): Ta ru dran/ gzhu/ mkha' i dus me rnams seng ge'o/ /nam mkha' mkha' mtsho bu mor dran/ /rim pa'i rim ba min ba las/ /srang srog bzlog go gangs ri'i bdag /thams cad nyi ma'i rjes 'brangs te/ /nyin zhag la ni las
52b2(mdo 'grel): kun byed/ /lug khyim rnams ni re 'jog sdig tu/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam srang par shes/ /mi mnyam ba ni pho yin te/ /srang sogs 300 zla /'di thams cad nyi ma'i longs spyod kyang 'chol dgos gsung ngo// //
52b3(mdo 'grel): mnyam ba mo zhes bya bar dran/ /pho khyim rnams ni drag bo ste/ lug /mo khyim rnams ni zhi bar glad brjod/ /lug logs pa g.yo dang brtan dang gnyis rang bzhin/ lug soD ri baM bzhin du gnas/ dus sbyor rjes su 'bras bu rnams//
52b4(mdo 'grel): glang sogs thob par 'gyur ro lha mdzes ma/ /khyim gyi dus sbyor dum bu drug /bshad kyi lha mo chen mo nyon/ /dus sbyor gcig lug glang 'khrig 'des 'bre dang phyed ba dang/ /sum cha dgu cha
52b5(mdo 'grel): thur shing gi rtsal ba'i nyin mo'i chu tshod kyi tshol bgos bas/ phyir zla ba ro'i chu srang dum bus nang zhag re'i dbugs la dum du? lo re'i dbu? gur dum du ` bcu gnyis cha/ /sum cu'i cha shas bye brag rnams/ /shes bar gyis
52b6(mdo 'grel): shig lha mdzes ma/ /dus sbyor gyi ni chu tshod dang/ /phyir dang sum cha dgu tshe dang/ /bcu gnyis cha'i chu tshod dang/ /sum cu'i cha shas rab bsgrub ba'i/ /dbyug gu'i grangs rnams bshad pa ni/ /zhag
52b7(mdo 'grel): gcig la ni bcu gnyis te// dus sbyor ` de yis gcig nyin zhag gi longs spyod brjod/ /dbugs stong rab rlung dam drang du sbyor byed kyi sum cha nam mkha' mkha' dang brgyad de gzugs/ /phyi lo dbyu gu dang bar zla ba'i chu srad dang bzhag gi dbugs grangs 'di
53a1(mdo 'grel): dus sbyor gcig gi tshad du brjod/ /phyed pa la sogs breg rnams/ /lha mo dus sbyor nyid las phye/ /mkha' mkha' bu kha mkha' mkha' ro/ /mkha' mkha' mig dang mkha' mkha' ?/ /
53a2(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' ro rnams rim pa phyed ba'am` bzhin/ /shes dus sbyor` par bya'o bzang mo kye/ /dus sbyor phyed sogs bgod byed` mtshan nyid bshad/ /bskal ba chen mo'i bdag mo nyon/ /lug la sogs
53a3(mdo 'grel): pa 'pho ba yin/ sum cu cha'i 'das pa'i zhag grangs ji snyed pa/ /rang gi chu srang dag gis bsgyur/ /lug mkha' mkha' zung des 'dre` sum cus bgos pas rnyed pa ni/ ste dbang phyug chen por `mkha' mkha' zung dang don 'dra dag
53a4(mdo 'grel): gam lta `nyi ma khyim de 'das pa'i chu srang yin/ /de yi khyim gyi chu nyi ma khyim gang la gnas pa'i` srang la/ /bri ba'i lhag ma ma 'ongs pa/ /des ni 'pho ba'i 'das pa dang/ /ma 'ongs ba ni shes par byed/ /dus
53a5(mdo 'grel): sbyor gang yin ngos bzung phyir/ /de yi lhag don med` dus gang yin` kyi chu tshod ni/ /'das rnams drug bcus ma 'ong chu srang gi phri bas` bsgyur bar bya/ /nyin 'das gi 'das ba'i chu tshod/ khyim myur rtsis yin/ de la ma 'ongs chu srang
53a6(mdo 'grel): gis/ /phri bas ma ldang de nyid yin/ /ldang na so sor rim bzhin dbri/ /rtsis nam byed ba'i thub shing yin ` steng du nyin gcig gi 'das ba'i chu tshod` lug sogs drug la rim pa ste/ /srang sogs drug la khyim de'i 'og na 'ug 200 ldog
53a7(mdo 'grel): par dbri/ /tad kal la bri bas gang tshe khyim 'og gi chu srang gi/ bas gang zang yin` ma ldang thig le shar/ /ces te khyim 'das grangs steng du 'gro/ yas babs 6` tad kal nas ` mas 'dzeg du dum bu ? pa'i 'don tad kal cha nas lo?
53b1(mdo 'grel): de che dus sbyor tangka la/ so sor? /phri ba'i lhag ma sum cus bsgyur/ /ba las` de la tangka la chu srang gis khyim gang la thig le shar ba de nyid` bgos pas thob pa cha shas yin/ /lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba la/ /chu srang gis thob dbyug gu ste/
53b2(mdo 'grel): dus sbyor gnas lnga gzhag ba'i ri/ ` lhag med na thig le shar ba'i tad kal gang yin gyi khyim bdag gang yin gyi gza' de du sbyor la dbri/ de'i 'og mas dus sbyor byed ba la de'i 'og ma cha? loD te rim ngar dbri ba? man ?/ ` tad kal bya ba ni khyim gang yin la gcig dbri/ de'i 'og tu chu tshod dbuD cha shes kyi rimS?
53b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin 'brid// yang lhag drug cus bsgyur ba la/ /chu srang gis thob chu srang yin/ /yang lhag drug bsgyur bgos thob dbugs/ /` nam mkha' mkha' cud? log pa'o// tangkal cha shas dbyug srang dbugs/ /dus sbyor gyis ni gnas lnga tad ka ?
53b4(mdo 'grel): bzhed/ /dus sbyor thog mar bzhag pa'i phyir/ /tangka la la ni sum cus bsgyur/ /'og gi cha shas steng du gzhug /de yang drug cus bsgyur bya ste/ /'og gi chu tshod steng du gzhug /tangka la zhes pa khyim gang yin la dbri de'i 'og tu chu
53b5(mdo 'grel): tshod loD ris sa bzhin bri/ tangka la dag ma dag lta ba yin` lug sta bu mo la 200 la` mkha' mkha' brgyad dang gzugs kyis bgo /thob pa'i dus sbyor tatkal la/ /dus sbyor byed pa lta ba'i phyir/ /cha shas drug cus bsgyur ba la/ /
53b6(mdo 'grel): 'og gi chu tshod steng du gzhug /mkha' mkha' bu gas bgos pa la/ /thig le shar ba de tad kal chu srang dang thob pa mnyam na dag pa yin `du sbyor 1 ba` 'dra na dag pa yin` phyed pas lhag na gcig sbyin bya/ /gnyis de logs su bzhag la rang rang gi bgo las mang
53b7(mdo 'grel): ba mi srid ste/ /byang kyi bgo` gcig gi bdag po nyi ma ste/ /dus de gnyis kyi bdag bo zla ba yin /dus di'i/ de nas dus sbyor sum cha brtag /sngar bzhin cha shas ji srid lhag na cig byin bya ba men dgo/ ` ma thob na ? nyim yin gsung ngo// drug cus bsgyur
54a1(mdo 'grel): chu tshod steng gzhug drug brgyas bgo /ji srid lhag na gcig sbyin bya/ /rnyed pa gsum las mang mi srid/ /gcig ni tatkal la yin te/ /gnyis ni tatkal la grangs lnga/ /gsum byang dgu pa'i
54a2(mdo 'grel): dus sbyor te/ /gang yin bdag po'i 'bras bu byung/ /de na 300 sa dgu cha brtag par bya/ /cha shas drug cus bsgyur ba la/ /chu de rang tshod steng gzhug mkha' stong mig /bgos ba yin pas lha ? gcig sbyin
54a3(mdo 'grel): tad kal nas grangs ba'i` bdag po da lta med kyang khyim bdag gza'o// bya/ /de ni dus sbyor dgu cha ste/ /thog mar tatkal gang yin nas/ /bzung la dgu cha gang phyoD bzhi'i khyim 'og nas bzung ba yin gsung ji srid yin lta/ /gang yin bdag
54a4(mdo 'grel): po'i 'bras bu 'byung/ /lug seng 3 po gsal yod kyang gzhu rnams lug nas grangs/ /'og zung nas grangs pa'i dgu pa 'am le'u bdun par lam gyi skabs su skar ma'i rkang pa yin zer chu srin bu mo glang rnams ni/ /chu srin nas ni thog
54a5(mdo 'grel): mkha' stong mig gi rnyed ba du byung ga de thig le shar ba'i tad kal la nas grangs ba'i 'bras bu 'byung ste 'go 'dzin lugs gzhung nas byung ba bzhin lug dang seng ge gzhu rnams la tang kal yod na lug nas 'go 'dzin des 'dre/ mar bya/ /'khrig pa bum pa srang rnams ni//
54a6(mdo 'grel): drang po srang nas grangs bzung ngo/ /karka Ta dang sdig pa nya/ /karka Ta nyid thog mar bzhag /bcu gnyis cha ni lta ba na/ /cha shas drug cus bsgyur ba la/ /chu tshod steng gzhug mkha' chas kyi/ /thob pa lhag na
54a7(mdo 'grel): gcig sbyin bya/ /tatkal la nas grangs pa phyogs bzhi'i khyim nas mgo zung yi/ /1 byung na tad kal la 'byung 'og ma des 'dre gang yin bdag po'i 'bras bu 'byung/ /gzhan yang sum cu'i
54b1(mdo 'grel): tshal yang/ /dus de'i gza'i 'bras bu` cha shas sngar bzhin bsgyur ba la/ /chu tshod bcug la mkha' ros bgo /lhag na thob la gcig sbyin bya/ /sum cu 'di yan chad rtsis sdos yin/ mig dmar spen pa phur bu dang/ /gza'
54b2(mdo 'grel): lhag pa sangs rim par bzhag /gcig nas lnga'i bar du byung na dbus kyi bdag bod ming? nas 10 spen ba 11 nas 18? kyi bar phur bu/ 19? nas 25 byung na lhag ba des 'dre/ 21 nas 30 pa sangs tad kal dang du sbyor 27 glang lta bu'i mnyam pa la tad kal yod pa'i ?/ bgos pa
54b3(mdo 'grel): la lnga man chad byung na dbus kyi bdag po dmir 'byung sa lnga yan chad/ 12 spen sa'i des 'dre/ lnga dang lnga dang brgyad bdun lnga/ /gnas gnyis dag la bgod par bya/ /lug sogs mi mnyam pa'i khyim/ /rim pa bzhin du grangs pa
54b4(mdo 'grel): yis/ /dbus kyi bdag po'i 'bras bu 'byung/ /glang sogs mnyam la rim min te/ /de ltar shes g.yas g.yon bya mdzes ma kye/ /do dus du ma drug yin gang snga dang bo nas bdag po'i gza'
54b5(mdo 'grel): rnams ni/ /thig le shar ba nas 'go 'dzin bas ` nyi ma mnyam pa nas zlog ba'i 'bras bu 'byung te lnga pa la ba sangs so/ rim pa bzhin du bzhag pa la/ /dge dang mi dge'i mtshan ma brtag /lug glang karka gzhu dang ni/ /
54b6(mdo 'grel): chu srin dus sbyor 'og lta skye/ /nya ni 'phred ltas skye ba ste/ gyis /lhag ma skye ba steng du blta/ /bu mo 'khrig pa bum ba srang/ /mdog bzang gzhan nyi ma zla ba zhi ba la ces bzhi drag 'bras bu rang/ 'di sbyar dum bu drug pa'i dus sbyor gyi rtsis yin gzhan
54b7(mdo 'grel): la mi rtsi/ ni ngan pa ste/ /byis pa bzhi lta bu skye bas dus sbyor gnas stobs nye bar ` 'di ni dus sbyor gang yod kyi phyoD kyi rtsis stobs yin bu chung skyes pa shes/ /ba yin mi rnams la ni yongs su shes/ /zhag kho na yi 'khrigS?
55a1(mdo 'grel): bu mo srang bum pa/ /shar du stobs dang ldan pa ste/ /lug glang seng ge gzhu rnams ni/ /lho ru de bzhin stobs su 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i dus sbyor gcig bu ni/ /nub tu stobs ?
55a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bar grags/ /gzhan yang 'gro ba bya ba gang la karka chu srin nya ni byang/ /phyogs kyi stobs su bshad pa yin/ /lug glang 'khrig ba karka Ta/ /gzhu dang chu srin mtshan mo la/ /seng+ge bu mo srang sdig
55a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ /bum nya nyin mo stobs dang ldan/ /tad kal la yi dus sbyor ni/ /mthong ba'i sa nas bdag pa'i gza'/ /bdun pa yod na shin tu bzang ba ste/ /de yi grogs po yid kyang las byed dge bzang/ /
55a4(mdo 'grel): las byed gang/ khyim gang la yod pa de lug gi nas su mthong bar zhing ? gza' yod med lta zhing bdag yod ma ? khyim lug lta bur gza' nyi ma 'ongs pa'i dus su nyi ma logs dpa' ba' i gnas la rang rang gi cha shas yun la ngan/ ` lug dang sdig pa dmir zhing /glang srang ba ni pa pa sangs 'khrig pa bu mo lhag pa zhing/ karka zla
55a5(mdo 'grel): ba zhes bya ste/ seng+ge nyi ma'i zhing du grags gzhu dang nya ni phur bu'i zhing chu srin bum pa spen ba'i zhing/ btang snyoms la ni btang snyoms 'gyur/ /nya yi khyim la phur bus te/ /de yi mthong ba'i sa rnams ni/ bdun/
55a6(mdo 'grel): de dang grogs po yod na bzang/ /dgra rnams yod na mi dge ste/ /bdun par dgra yod 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dge sdig gang yod stobs che ste/ /dran pa'i stobs su yongs su grags/ /de nas gzhan yang dus sbyor
55a7(mdo 'grel): ` khyim gang yod pa lug gi gnas su gzhag la mthong sar zhing dag gi gza' yod pa bzang gyi/ /` sdig pa la sdig grub` dge ba la don grub dum bu sum cu'i cha shas bshad// gzhan yang skar ma 60? bsgyur/ 'og gi chu tshod steng du gzhug/ mda'
55b1(mdo 'grel): dang yon tan zlas thob pa logs cha shas rtsal lo/ /gza' gzhan la yang rang rang gi long spyod gong bzhin bya'o/ /rang rang gi longs spyod dag pa la sum cu bsgyur ba la mda' yon gyis thob pa de cha shas don du bzhag la zer/ lug gi 'pho lta/ nyi ma lta bu dang/ cha shas bcu bsgyur ba dag go des 'dre/ ?
55b2(mdo 'grel): ba yang god dang 'dra ste cha shas gang yin pa de chu tshod re nas/ lug du nyi ma cha shas bcu/ /glang la zla ba cha shas gsum/ /karka Ta phur bu lnga yang dge /bu mo gza' lhag bco lnga'o/ /srang du spen pa mkha' yig dang/ /chu srin
55b3(mdo 'grel): ` khyim gza'i kyang rtsis kyi chu tshod mkha' dus kyi sgyur la ? thob khyim 'das pa de'i gza' sdod ba 1 khyim` gza'` yun ji tsa sdod pas 30 thob chu tshod la te de tsam bzang` gza'i long spyod gal? nyi dag yang 130? thob rims pa bzhin bya/ mig dmar nyi shu brgyad/ /nya la?
55b4(mdo 'grel): pa sangs nyi shu bdun/ /cha shas 'di dag yun la dge/ /rang sa? par du bzang nas ni grangs pa yi/ /bdun pa la ni mi dge ste/ /lug du spen pa nyi shu ste/ /karka mig dmar cha nas nyi shu brgyad/ /
55b5(mdo 'grel): ` khyim de dag tu gza' de dag byung na mthong ba'i gnas` las gang byed nyi ma lta bu ` 'di man dma' sa'i gnas spen pa lta bu yod yang ngan/ ` nyi ma nas grangs ba'i spen ba kyang ba des 'dre` nya ru gza' lhag bco cha shas lnga ste/ /bu mo pa sangs nyi shu bdun
55b6(mdo 'grel): sdig par zla pa gsum yin no/ /chu srin phur pa cha shas lnga/ /srang du nyi ma cha shas bcu/ /'di dag cha shas yun la ngan/ /tatkal la yi dus sbyor la/ /zhing bdag gza' ni 'char ba dang/ /
55b7(mdo 'grel): de las gzhan chags pa'i khyim rnams su/ /`gzhan yang zhi gza' yod na bzad med na tad kal gtso cha khyim bdag gza' rnams dgra khyim yin pas` 'khor gcig` gtso che` de'i cha bzhi che chung` gzhan gtso che chung 
56a1(mdo 'grel): 'chags pa'i tshe/ /de yis bgos pa'i don rnams ni/ /'grub 'gyur mdzes dga' bde skyid ma/ /rang gi skye ba'i khyim dang ni/ /tatkal la ni dus sbyor 'das/ /tad kal? gang yong pa de nyid lug gi gos
56a2(mdo 'grel): sar gzhan la mthong ba'i sa gang yin lta ba ni` mthong ba'i sa ni bdun yin te/ /yon skor gsum dang bcu la rkang pa gcig /bzhi dang brgyad la rkang pa ming skar` lug du byas pa'i` gsum/ /lnga dang dgu la phyed mthong bshad/ /
56a3(mdo 'grel): bdun la thams cad rdzogs par mthong/ /dum bu drug ni tang kal khyim gang la yod pa de nyid rang gi go sar bzhag la mthong ba lta ba ni` bzhi ni mi mthong mdzes dga' ma/ /mthong dga' stobs kyi bye brag bshad/ /rang rang sde tshan gnas
56a4(mdo 'grel): pa las/ /nyi ma phur bu ba ba sangs/ /nyin mo stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mig dmar ra hu spen pa zla/ /mtshan la lhag ma stobs cher ldan zhes so gnas` 'gyur te/ /nyin dang mtshan la stobs byed
56a5(mdo 'grel): ` lnga sdus kyi khyim gza' stobs lta` lnga bsdus kyi res gza'i stobs sta` las gang la yang` pa/ /'di rnams res kyi gza' dang dus sbyor gnyis ka la sbyor/ gza' lhag ces byar yongs su grags/ /phur bu dang ni pa ba sangs/ /
56a6(mdo 'grel): dkar po'i phyogs la stobs che ste/ ? /nyi ma dang ni spen pa dag /nag po'i phyogs la stobs su 'gyur/ /gnyis ka la ni stobs byed pa/ /zla ba mig dmar ma ning yin pas` gza' lhag go/ /zla ba dang ni pa ba sangS/
56a7(mdo 'grel): 'di dang 'dra ste gcig nas bco lnga'i bar la` glang sogs mo khyim la` rnams stobs ldan bcu drug nas stong gi bar la te/ /lhag ma'i gza' rnams pa? khyim la/ /stobs dang ldan 'gyur mthong dga' ma/ /byang du bgrod tshe stobs che ba/ /nyi ma/ nam mkha' i
56b1(mdo 'grel): nor bu ri bong can/ /de las gzhan pa gza' rnams ni/ /lto bgrod stobs byed yid 'dren ma/ /nyi ma zla ba zhi ba la/ /lto bgrod byang bgrod du dang po bzhi gza' dang? yang sbyad dus` stobs 'gyur mdzes dga' snying 'dren ma/ /rgyas par
56b2(mdo 'grel): gza' lhag de bzhin te/ /`dgra gros kyi dbang du byas pa zla ba rkang ba sgal nas 'bring lho bgrod la ma rgal na byang bgrod du shes par bya/ ` dus sbyor gyi tad ka la zhi drag gi? gza''di tsho 'bras bu 'byung nyin re'i gza' la sbyor ba'o` rang rang gi lho bgrod byang bgrod 'khyog drang dang 4? po nyin re gza' dang dus sbyor
56b3(mdo 'grel): 2 la sbyor/ pa ba sangs kyi dbang la stobs/ /mig dmar dgug pa phur bu skrod/ /bsad pa stobs che spen pa'o/ /de rnams dbang byed khyim rnams la/ zhing bdag gi gza' gang yin khyim dang sbyar/ /stobs dang ldan par rab tu grags/ /
56b4(mdo 'grel): rang rang khyim du 'ong ba'i tshe/ /stobs dang ldan par bdag gis dran/ /gzhan dag `ngal myur 'khyog logs nyin re'ang rtsi` zhing bdag gi gza' dang de'i khyim dang sbyar` zhing der 'ongs pa'i tshe/ /de yis 'bras bu ga la gter/ /
56b5(mdo 'grel): gza' de'i ? 'gyur de'i yang 2? 'gyur yod pas` gza' rnams stobs kyi bye brag ni/ /khyim bdag ma 'ongs pa yin pa` spen pa mig dmar gza' lhag dang/ /phur bu pa sangs zla ba nyi/ /de bzhin nyi ma rim pa bzhin/ /gcig
56b6(mdo 'grel): nas bdun gyi bar du yang/ /re re yis ni stobs 'phel 'gyur nyi 'gyur gyi/ /nyi ma'i grogs po phur bu snga phyi nyi 'gyur/ spen pa'i nyi 'gyur dmir? la yod` ste/ /zla ba'i phur bu gza' lhag go /gza' lhag dang ni pa ba sangs/
56b7(mdo 'grel): mig dmar grogs bor yongs su grags/ /gong ma bas 'og ma` zla ba mig dmar phur pa dang/ /stobs 7 'gyur` pa sangs dang ni sben pa dag /gza' lhag gi ni grogs po dran/ /phur bu'i grogs po nyi zla dang/ /de
57a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin pa sangs spen par brjod/ /de bzhin pa ba sangs kyi grogs /mig dmar gza' lhag phur bu spen/ /yang ni spen par grags ba la/ /gza' lhag phur bu pa ba sangs/ /grogs
57a2(mdo 'grel): la gzhan pa dgra zhes grags/ /gzhan dag grogs dang dgra min bya/ /btang snyoms 'dod zer lhas mchod ma/ /mchod sbyin nges brjod srid bsrung dang/ /snyon ngag ngag gi rigs byed la/ /phur bu pa sangs
57a3(mdo 'grel): so yin te` dgra mang bas mi 'thad` mig dmar dang/ /gza' lhag 'di 'thed gsung` rim bzhin bdag por brjod/ /nag cha dag la dbang byed ba/ /zla ba nyi ma mig dmar dang/ /spen pa dkar cha dbang? byed la//
57a4(mdo 'grel): zla ba de bzhin phur bu dang/ /ba sangs dge ba rje btsun ma/ /gza' lhag gnyis ka'i mtshams grogs yin` tshes 1 nas brgyad kyi bar la nag cha` 4 nas ? gyi bar ? dkar cha 22 nas stong gi bar nag cha` la dbang/ nyi ma/
57a5(mdo 'grel): mig dmar phur bu rnams/ /skyes pa'i gza' ru bstan pa yin/ /khu ba dang ni ri bong can dkar nag 2 ka la dbang byed/ /bud med dag gi gza' zhes grags/ /gza' lhag dang ni spen pa dag /lnga sdus kyi bza' `
57a6(mdo 'grel): ma ning zhes bya lha chen ma/ /phur bu dang ni ba wa? sangs/ /las gang byas 'grub` pa ba sangs` bram ze'i rigs su bstan pa yin/ /nyi ma dang ni mig dmar ngag /rgyal rigs zhes byar yongs su grags/ /zla ba rje rigs zhes
57a7(mdo 'grel): skyes ba dang bkra shis las 'grub/ bya ste/ /'di yang lnga bsdus` gza' lhag rdo'i las 'grub pa bar ? dmangs rigs dag tu brjod/ /pha ni bram ze ma ni dmangs/ /de yi bu ni spen zhes bya/ /sgra gcan zhes byar grags pa ni/ /? la
57b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i rigs su shes par bya/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dag /rgyal po'i rigs su yongs su grags/ /phur bu ba sangs blen bo'i ?/ /mig dmar dmag dpon bdag por grags/ /gza' lhag rgyal po'i bu zhes bya/ /bren gyi gza' de spen par grags
57b2(mdo 'grel): mig dmar sben pa sgra gcan nyid/ /drag por gza' ru yongs su grags/ /lhag ma rnams ni zhi bar brjod/ /pa sangs phur bu lhag pa zla/ /bsod nams dag gi gza' yin te/ /gzhan ni sdig can zhes byar grags/ /mdzes dga' gza'i
57b3(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin yin/ /phur bu rtsa ma? pa bzhin du ser/ /pas sti? grud nyi ma dmar skya'i mdog tu gsal/ bas ste 'grub/ /mig dmar dmar nag ri bong khrag/ zla ba dkar la ser ba'i mdangs/ /gza' lhag sde la ljang par ston/ /pa
57b4(mdo 'grel): sangs kha dog sna tshogs la/ kun me'i kha dog / `'di tshe'i? kha dog gi 'og gi khu tshur gyi mngon shes la kha dog ji ltar 'dug btan la 'bebs so// spen pa nag po sgra gcan sngo/ /de ltar gza'i kha dog bzhed/ /nyi ma dang ni mig dmar dag /bzhu
57b5(mdo 'grel): bar mi bzhu'i khams zhes bya/ /gza' lhag dang ni spen pa la/ /rtsa ba zhes bya gos la sogs/ /zla ba bur pa pa spa sangs/ /srog chags rigs yin dkar mo kye/ /de ltar dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyang/ /lug glang gser bags?
57b6(mdo 'grel): 'khreg bge? leg sa logs? yang zer` ba/ /khams? dang rtsa ba srog shing logs pa rtsa ba'i rigs` sam ram` rim bzhin/ /tha skar bra nye smin drug sogs/ /khams rtsa srog sogs go rim bzhin/ /kun la sbyar te shes par bya/ /
57b7(mdo 'grel): g.yon skor lus nor 'di dus sbyor thog mar bzhag la lta spu ni zla grogs po dang/ /rim pas gong ma'i khyim gyi rims dang 'dra` khams` pa`? bu dag tshung ma 'chi dang choms/ /kar ka khams sau rtsa ba bu mo srog ` srang? khams sdig? pa rtsa gzhu srog
58a1(mdo 'grel): chu srin khams nya srog rim pa bzhin sbyar las dang rnyed stor go rim bzhin/ /ta til dus sbyor sogs zhes bya/ /tatkal la'i dus sbyor la/ /tatkal la dang bzhi ba dang/ /bdun pa dang ni bcu ba rnamS/
58a2(mdo 'grel): u ba rtsa yi bdag nyid tu/ /gnas pa'i dbang gi gru bzhir grags/ /tatkal dus sbyor gnas dang po pa la/ /nye drug bcu rang nas bgrangs pa ni` dang gcig du grangs de nas` dang bcu gcig de nas bgrad ba'i rnams/ /
58a3(mdo 'grel): 'di ba dum u pa rtsa'i bdag nyid du/ /thig gdab pas` ste 'bras bu 'og du ston` shes par bya'o lha chen ma/ /tad ka la nas dang po gsum sogs mi mnyam pa/ /u pa dzad dge ba yin/ /bzhi logs pa
58a4(mdo 'grel): u zer ram gnyis pa bzhi ming yin 'bras bu 'og nas ston sogs mnyam pa ste/ /a pa rtsa de mi dge ba/ /tatkal lnga pa dgu pa rnams/ /zur gsum zhes byar mi mnyam pa` drag khyin mi dge zhi ba dge yongs su
58a5(mdo 'grel): grags/ /bar du gnyis ni gnas pa la/ /gru bzhi'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /bar du gsum drag logs` g.yon skor` ming` g.yas nas bgrang zeng` thig btab na` duAng` ni gnas gyur ba/ gzur gsum du ni brjod
58a6(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /lnga ba dang ni bdun pa dag /de bzhin grib mar yongs su grags/ /brgyad pa nyin des zhes bya ste/ /de bzhin bcu gnyis mtshams zhes bya/ /bzhi dang brgyad pa la gnas pa/ /bzhi pa zhes byar
58a7(mdo 'grel): g.yas bskor yang zer/ thams cad g.yon yin` yongs su grags/ /gnyis pa dang ni g.yon skor` lnga pa dang/ /brgyad dang 1 dang ? zer` bcu gcig mthar thug par// til? kal nas dus sbyor tatkal la gnas pa'i/ /
58b1(mdo 'grel): thur smad zhes byar yongs su grags/ /nye drug dgu dang bcu gnyis pa/ /de bzhin gyen stod ces byar smra/ /gsum pa dang ni bcu pa la/ /rkang ba gcig ni mthong sar dran/ /de bzhin lnga pa dgu pa la/ /rkang pa gnyis ni mthob? zhes
58b2(mdo 'grel): de thams cad kyi ming grags/ /bzhi pa dang ni brgyad pa la/ /tad kal nas bgrang pa'i` ming` rkang gsum mthong ngo bde ster ma/ /g.yon skor ` bzhi cha` bdun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa la/ /bzhi po yongs su rdzogs par mthong/ /ma lus
58b3(mdo 'grel): pa ni gnas pa las/ /gza' yi 'bras bu bskyed pa yin/ /gsum dang bcu la spen pa gnas/ /yongs su rdzogs pa ster ba yin/ /7pa'i gnas su rkang pa rnam rdzoD na 'bras bu mthong sa yin la rdzogs na mi mthog bar rto/ ` rkang pa rim pa de
58b4(mdo 'grel): lnga dang dgu la phur pa gnas/ /bzhi dang chen po` g.yon bskor tad kal nas sgrangs pa'i` `rang re'i stobs` 'bras bu` yod tshad` brgyad la mig dmar dang/ /bdun pa la ni lhag pa zhes/ /gza' mchog rdzogs pa
58b5(mdo 'grel): gter ba yin/ /rang gi skye ba'i dus sbyor las/ /bdun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa las/ /dus me 'char tshe 'chi bar grags /bdud ba/ dus sbyor gang la skyes shes bgos` gnas` nyi ma phur bu spen pa nyam? yin pa rang re'i stobs yod tshad ` 'bras bu rdzoD pa
58b6(mdo 'grel): mgon ston `dus sbyor gang la skyes shas dgos ma shes na ming skar la bya ` tad ka la nas sgrangs pas` gang pa'i sgra gcan mjug ma` nyi mas nad 'byung dmig dmar dgra /spen pas nor ni nyams dmir? yang zer` par 'gyur/ /ke rus don nyams lha
58b7(mdo 'grel): mchod ma/ /sgra gcan shar na dgra yis pham/ /gang yang` zla bar rang rgyal gza' lhag rtsod/ /pa lba sangs kyis don rnams 'grub/ /phur bus sngaD rnaMs 'grub par ston/ /tad kal la nas sbrangs ba'i` mdor na skye gnas bdun pa la/ /
59a1(mdo 'grel): bzang nga zhi dag gnas par shes/ /de ltar ra shi'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /cho ga'i bye brag bdag gis bshad/ /g.yo ba zung gi 'phyang ba khyod/ /legs bar rtogs saM 'dod dga' ma /bram?
59a2(mdo 'grel): ze rnam par dag ba'i tshogs/ /phung po gsum mkhyen thub dbang po khyes?/ /sgra yi bstan chos don yangs pa/ /bklag pas chog pa don/ sna rgyan` 'grub pa/ /nyan par 'dus pa'i sems dga' ma/ /zhes mos? na/
59a3(mdo 'grel): bla ma dam pa'i 'khor gzhan` ste ston ba'i phung po 'du byed kyi phung po las kyi phung po` rim pa yis/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i rgyud kyi che ba` bstan chos 'di/ /gzi brjid dga' ma ma lus mthong/ /'di ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal
59a4(mdo 'grel): man ngag med pas mi shes pas` ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las dus sbyor gyi gza' dum bu drug gi don rab tu phye ba snod dman pa` chen po ste/ le'u dbang phyug/ gnyis pa'o// /
59a5(mdo 'grel): lha mos gsol pa/ skal ldan lha yi lha mchog gtso/ /ri bong can gyis dbu la brgyan/ /mchog tu dge ba thams cad mkhyen/ /ji ltar dus sbyor dge mi dge /zhing dang cho ga sdang gsung nas/ /lha chen rdzu 'phrul thams
59a6(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyon/ /dus sbyor 'phrin las thams cad ni/ /mi gsung bzhugs pa ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dka' bzlog lha mo mchog du ni/ /gsang ba bshad kyis groD mo nyon/ /
59a7(mdo 'grel): bsam pa 'dri ba po'i ma chid? sngon du legs bzhag te/ /bye brag so sor legs bsam la/ /snga dro'i dus su sems dge ma/ /mden ? sum dran pa sor bzhag nas/ /mdun sdang gdod ni sngon phyogs te/ /yid ches the chom? med
59b1(mdo 'grel): dga' bas/ gus pas phyag ni btsal bya ste/ /yon phul nas ni mnyes par bya/ /de ltar sngon du byas nas ni/ /langs nas rgyab kyis phyogs pa min/ /g.yas dang g.yon pas ma yin par/ /mdun du sma bar sdang naS
59b2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /dgos pa'i bsam pa sngon btang ste/ /de'i` dan gsal tshig gi dri bar bya/ /slob dpon mkhas shing bye brag shes/ /dga' zhing blo gsal yid gzhungs pas/ /tatkal dus sbyor rab shes pas/ /dum bu
59b3(mdo 'grel): drug pa'i bye brag mthong/ /nyin ra ri gza' skar` gang 'dri ba skog dris ma yin pa/ gyi mtshan nyid ni` gza'i rnams khyim dang rgyu skar la/ /gnas pa'i longs spy+d shes pa dang/ /gza' nyin re'i skar tshes dang byed
59b4(mdo 'grel): sbyor sogs/ /rnam par dag pas nges byas te/ /` gza' thams cad kyi khyim gad na 'dug lta ba ni/ skar gnas 60? sgyur/ chu tshod sres la mda' yon gyi thob pa khyim dang zhag logs pa sbyar nyi ma kha 'das bzhag /gzhan tsho 'das pa'i 30? yi? cha? yin zur 3? dang po tad kal la/ zur 3
59b5(mdo 'grel): 'phal phyed dag gza' zur ? 35 phyed/ gza' gru 42 dang nya 5 la 9 cha man cha rims bzhin bgod// 'dri bar byed pa'i tshig tshogs kun/ /khong du chud nas sma bar bya/ /zur gsum gru bzhir bsod nams shar/ de'i tshe/ u pa gong gi nya du 10 dang 11
59b6(mdo 'grel): zhes bas sbyar` tsa la sdig can gnas/ /'dri byed rnyed pa 'byung `?3610 dang rnams su u pa rtsi la bdag nyid shes par bya ` chur nyra? dang po bad kar 18? la byed bya nyra pa nyra bya'i 7 khru 421 2 pa la 95 ra man chad rims bzhin bgod/ 63 gru bzhir sdig nas dbul rtsa ba gsod nams yod na
59b7(mdo 'grel): shes/ ` sa pa dag nyid sheS bar bya'o/ /dang po nyra logs mi nyams pa u pa rtsa de dge ba yin/ zhes bstan/ /de las bzlog na rnyed pa med/ /tatkal dus sbyor phur bu gnas/ /` g.yon skor tad kal la grangs kyi` bzhi dang bdun la
60a1(mdo 'grel): zla ba gnas /bcu la nyi ma snang gyur na/ /smras ma thag tu don rnams 'grub/ /dang po dang ni gnyis pa dang/ /bcu dang bcu gcig bsod nams yod/ /de ma thag tu don rnams ni/ /de lta'ang grub?
60a2(mdo 'grel): par bstan pa yin /tad kal nas grangs pa'i` tatkal dus sbyor g.yo ba la/ /sdig can gza' lug khrig pa /tad kal nas g.yon skor du` dang lhan gcig gnas/ /don rnams med cing rnam pa 'joms/ /sngar nas med
60a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i du kha 'byung/ /tatkal dus sbyor bdag po lug kad? srang chu srin khyim` g.yon skor brtan dang g.yo dang 2 rang bzhin sbyar la g.yo ba'i khyim byung na/ yod/ /de'i grogs po snang yang bde/ /bzhi pa la ni yod na yang/
60a4(mdo 'grel): g.yon bskor /khyim gang byung ba'i bdag po'i gza' ste ? 'byung nas gza' de'i grogs po yang bzang` the tshom med par bde bar ston/ /ba 'am lhag phur du sbyar` la ` bdag bo'i bza' g.yon skor bdag po'i groD dang
60a5(mdo 'grel): 'grogs/ bcu gcig pa dang brgyad pa la/ /sdig can nye bar gnas pa dang/ /bzhi pa'ang sdig can gnas/ ? /'di byed sdug bsngal 'byung bar dran/ /dang po gnyis pa bzhi pa dang/ /bdun brgyad bcu la bsod namS
60a6(mdo 'grel): yod/ /'dri g.yon bskor` byed tshe ring lo mang thub/ /gru bzhi la yang de bzhin no/ /tatkal la'i dus sbyor dang/ /bzhi dang brgyad la sdig can tad kal grangs pa'i` gnas/ /dgra rnams kyis 'tshe don nyams
60a7(mdo 'grel): shing/ /'di byed 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /khyiM? gang? la yid/ tatkal bsod nams yod` dus sbyor sdig gza' yod/ dang bo/ lus la lus kyis yin bas ? g.yon bskor/ /nad rnams 'byung bar bstan/ /bzhi par sdig can yod pa na
60b1(mdo 'grel): gnyen bshes rnams ni 'thab rtsod 'khrug/ de bzhin bdun par sdig can yod/ /chung ma 'ongs tshad 'chi bar ston/ /bcu par sdig can bstan par gnas/ /byas pa'i las rnams 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de las ldog ste
60b2(mdo 'grel): bsod nams yod/ /rim ba bzhin du dge ba yin/ /gru bzhi tshang bar dge ba can/ 'dis yin pas /'dri byed grags dang snyan pa 'byung/ /dang po lnga pa bdun dang brgyad/ /kyis yin pas 4 pa 7 pa 10
60b3(mdo 'grel): kyi gza'` na de dag la` de la bsod nams snang gyur cing/ /gsum drug bcu dang bcu gcig la/ /zla gnas yod na nad can myur du grol/ /dang por lnga dang bdun brgyad la/ /sdig can gza' dang zla ba 'dzom/ /'dri
60b4(mdo 'grel): byed nad ni 'byung ba ste/ nad can gang rung` yin na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gsum pa la sogs ri mig rnams/ /khyim du gnas shing 'jug pa ste/ /dgu pa la sogs de bzhin du/ /yul lam khyim nas thon par graD
60b5(mdo 'grel): 'jug la zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis/ /'bri bar byed pa /de yan chad lugs 1 yin/ tad kal nas ` nya nas dgu'i bar du re mig du yod bas dgu nas khyim 2 pa'i bar la yang du yod pas khyim gsum pa nas bdun pa'i bar la` rgyal bar bshad
60b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i khyim` thon la zhi ba'i gza' gros byed po/ rnams tshang/ /pham pa rgyal bar byed pa yin/ /'jug ma sdig can gza' rnams shar/ /gang zhig 'dri ba 'pham pa ste/ /thon la drag po'i gza' rnams ba'am bza' 
60b7(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /rgyal ba gros byed phyi ma` 'pham par 'gyur ba yin/ /khros byed phyi ma`? sngo ma thon 'jug khyim` zhi drag gnyis ga byed mar gnas/ /phan tshun 'khrug dang po de` pa 'dums par 'gyur/ /gang gis dris kyang groD byed phyi ma rgyal rgyal la ni?
61a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i gza' yod na/ /shin tu dge ste rgyal bar nges/ /'pham la zhi ba'i gza' yod na/ /thog mar 'pham nas de nas rgyal/ /rgyal ba sdig can yod pa na/ /dang por rgyal nas de nas 'phan?//
61a2(mdo 'grel): 'khrug pa'i gros byed dang po ni/ /'pham pa zhes ni bya ba ste/ /phyi nas gros byas rgyal ba zhes/ /bde ster lha mo shes par gyis/ /dang po bdun bar bsod nams 'jug ma? yod/ /gsum rtsom pa phyi ma
61a3(mdo 'grel): dang drug dang bcu pa dang/ /bcu gcig pa la sdig pa nas/ /de'i tshe 'di byed skyes bu rgyal/ /gza' lhag phur bu pa sangs gsum/ /tad kal nas g.yon skor grangs` bcu pa la ni shar ba na/ /dpung gi tshogs ni
61a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par rgyal/ /thamS cad 'dzoms mam re re'ang bzang/ /lug glang seng ge gzhu rnam ni/ g.yon skor/ tatkal dus sbyor la 'char zhing/ /de la sdig can yod pa na/ /dgra yis bdag nyid 'ching bar 'gyur/ /bzhi par
61a5(mdo 'grel): yang ni de 'char tshe/ /3 pa /de dang 'dra ste dgra bos 'ching/ /bzhi po gang rung` tatkal dus sbyor la bzhi gang rung` sogs pa/ /dus sbyor gnas ni ra re 'a?/ /bdun pa` gza' ni gnyis gsum bzhi la sogs/ /khug? blang logs`
61a6(mdo 'grel): tad kal nas 'dzom par gyur pas legs par brtag /lnga dang dgu par sdig can yod/ /de che dag ni 'ongs gyur te/ /choms rkun la sogs 'ong ba la/ /bdag gis dus sbyor 1 ba'i steng nas dum bu ba rtsis na 'dzom` 'pham par byas
61a7(mdo 'grel): nyi ma de dus kyi dus sbyor rtsil lta` zhi thag` dge sdig` 'dri ba po` ste 'bras bu che'o` te song/ /nyi ma mig dmar sben pa gsum/ /skabS? bzhi pa'i gnas su 'dzem ba ni/ /gang rung 'dzom pa na` ma thag gi dus sbyor rtsi'o?/ /lam zhugs pa yi
61b1(mdo 'grel): gtam thos kyang/ /dgra bo 'byung bar ga la 'gyur/ /gza' lhag phur bu ba sangs gsum/ /sngar bzhin bzhi par 'jam phyur na/ /dgos pa med kyang dgra bo rnams/ /'ongs te rang nyid 'joms par 'gyur/ /gang tshe g.yo ba'i tatkal
61b2(mdo 'grel): la/ /nyi ma dang ni phur pa shar/ /dgra bo lam du zhugs te 'ongs/ /de tshe ldog par the tshom med/ /lan bzhin` brtan pa'i dus sbyor tatkal la/ /nyi ma phur pa 'dzom ste gnas/ /pha rol dmag gi lug sogs khyim pa shar
61b3(mdo 'grel): grang pa'i ?` deng` dpung tshogs kyang/ /lam du mi 'jug dge kyang` ba yin/ /nyi ma gza' lhag phur glang soD khyim la` grangs pa'i bdun pa` pa dkar/ /g.yo ba'i dus spyor la 'dzom pa/ /re re 'am thams cad gang
61b4(mdo 'grel): yin pa/ /'dri pa don rnyed dgra las rgya la/ /tatkal dus sbyor brtan pa la/ /phur pa sben ba mnyam par gnas/ /dgra rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba pa sangs` 'am?/ /gal te mi 'ong ba 'ang lug lta bu` 1 gaM? 2 la sogs` srid/ /
61b5(mdo 'grel): tatkal dus sbyor nas grangs pa'i/ /gnyis pa phur ba gsum pa la/ glang /pa sangs shar na pha rol dgra/ /'ongs nas rang nyid pham ngar 'gyur/ /thog tu 'ong bar 'dug ` 'di thob du 'ong gyur 'du gsung song lug seng sdig pa'i dus sbyor la/ /
61b6(mdo 'grel): dang nyi ma mig dmar mthong sar yod/ ? /brkus sam spas sam sem pa ni/ /bzhu dang mi bzhu khams la grub/ /bu mo chu srin 'khrig bum pa/ gza' lhag spen pa 'dzom pa 'am/ /re re mthong na rtsa ba'i khyiM de lug du shas pa de nas rtsi
61b7(mdo 'grel): tad kal nas grangs pa'i 7 pa na ` 'thong bde ? yod na ni lta par bshad 1 dang 2 'thod na zhad de'o// ` 'di yod na la thang du` gse pa'ong ` bzang pa logs pa` sa rdo loD ` rigs/ /khu tshur ram tadkal gza' mang dung thung` sngag kyi` bza' byung rung ma byung rung shid logs ni stor ba sogs/ /
62a1(mdo 'grel): sems sogs tshigs su ma brjod rnams/ /de las grub bo mthong dga' ma/ /srang gzhu nya glang karka Ta/ /zla ba phur pa ba lpa? sangs/ /ba dzom re re mig gis mthong/ /ma smras srog ?
62a2(mdo 'grel): rigs yin gyis/ /ma brjod lkog gyur kha dog ni bza' yi mdog dang bstun ba yin/ /tad kal la` brtan lnga pa'i tad kal` pa'i khyim dgu lnga po la 3? bo mthong bar cha'i khyim/ par yin` sha rus su sogs`
62a3(mdo 'grel): gcig par gyur ba de yi tshe/ /gtor ba'i rdzas gong du bstan pa'i/ /kun la stag lug sogs 'dug nas ces so/ 60? drug gi` 21 gi`? dang longs spyod rnams/ /rang mis
62a4(mdo 'grel): phyi nang bka' i mi` cig par ma gyur 1 brtan g.yo la song na phyi nang 2 kar khyer` khyer bar the tshom med/ /glang sogs brtan ba'i khyim gyi bdag bo'i gza' dang 4 cha'i gza'2 1 na de gI? 'bras bu 'byung/ khyim na yod`

62a6(mdo 'grel): lug logs` 'khrig ba logs 2 ka'i rang bzhin la tad la yod cing dgu cha'ang de la yod na/ 'di yang dum bu drug gi khyim gyi skabs dang sbyar yin pa'i tshe/ /phyi nang gnyis kar rtogs pa yi/ /changs/ 4 cha` ni bar bte? 1 gso ba'i khyim la song na
62a7(mdo 'grel): nor de phyi nang mtshams su sbas/ /gru bzhi dang ni gnyis pa dang/ /a'u ba tsa la bsod nams 'khrig pa la sogs `g.yo dang brtan ba 2? rang bzhin` yod/ /'dri byed gter ba rnyed 'gyur te /de las zlog na mi rnyed
62b1(mdo 'grel): do/ /zla ba dkar char gyur pa dang/ gyi /tatkal dus sbyor gza' lhag dang/ /khyim bdag` phur ba ba sangs snang gyur na/ /gtor ba'i nor ni rnyed pa yin/ /de ltar rku ba byed ba yi/ /skye bu'i rigs dang kha dog dang/ /las
62b2(mdo 'grel): sdig gza' yod na `1 nas 7 gyi bar nag cha brgyad nas 23? bar dkar cha de nas stong gi bar nag` dang nus ba la sogs pa/ /dus sbyor bdag po'i bza' yis shes/ /dgu cha'i longs spyod rtsis ba yi/ /thod pa sngan chad song ba'i grangs/ /lhag ma yis
62b3(mdo 'grel): ni ma 'ongs ba'i/ /grangs nges rnyed ba'i dus tshod shes/ /dgu cha bdag po'i gza' la dris/ /zla ba rigs dang kha dog dang stobs dang` khyim bdag` cha shas la sgyur thob byas pa de` chu tshod la rtsi ste/ /thong ba 'das ba` dus de rtsaM na/
62b4(mdo 'grel): de yi grangs kyis brnyed pa yin/ /mig mdor` rgyas` khyim bdag/? khyim bdag gza' ba la 'das zhag lhag ma ma 'ongs bar bya dmar zhag grangs 15 byung na/ kyis 'dzin te/ /dgu cha yi bco lnga zla phyed la/ /sum cus zla ba
62b5(mdo 'grel): mkha' stong mig gi thob pI 'bras bu la grangs 'jug rtsis ste stod? chu? tshod kyi dus? su lo soD lhag mas chu tshod 'di nas rnyed do shes des 'dre/ /thob pa dang lhag ma zhag nyid su rtsis bas ? byung na zla ba 1 thob ba du byung zhag 12 thob du rgyu nyui? rtsa lnga 'gyur du rtse'o` gcig nas rnyed/ /gza' lhag zla
62b6(mdo 'grel): ba gnyis na brtsi/ /sum cu byung na zla ba gnyis/ /bco lngas zla ba gcig nas rnyed/ /nyi mas zla ba drug yin pas/ /sum cu tshang na zla ba drug /bco lngas zla ba gsum na rnyed/ /phur bu zla ba dgur gyur bas/ /sum cu tsha du
62b7(mdo 'grel): na zla dgu ste// thob pa'i lhag ma ` byung na 9 2 18? des 'bre/ bco lngas zla ba phyed dang lnga/ /'gyur thob pa dang lhag 2 bar 71? byung na zhag du 'byung na zhag bcu gnyis des 'dre'o/ pa sangs zla ba phyed na chu tshod re la zhag dgu dgur 'dod do/
63a1(mdo 'grel): rnyed/ /bco lnga byung na phyed dang brgyad/ /spen ba lo'i bdag nyid bas/ /sum cu tshang na lo gcig bas/ /bco lngas zla ba drug na rnyed/ /de yi bar gyi gangs kyi dus/ /mkhas pas zhib du
63a2(mdo 'grel): 1 byung na zhag 1 la? byung na zhag bdun` dpyad bar bya/ /tatkal la yi dus sbyor 'char/ /dgu pa yi ni lhag byung na zhag 10 pa des 'dre` dum bu yi/ /bdag po'i gza' ni brtaD zhag phyed du rtsi` de rnams` nas kyang/ /gzhan
63a3(mdo 'grel): /nyin zla la gnyis dgu cha lta gzhan` la bshad bya mdzes dga' ma/ /gal te nyi ma yod pa ni// ?cha'i bdag po` rgyal po dang ni me dang khrag / khyim bdag` nyi ma shar dang me tog gos/ /gang na gnas/
63a4(mdo 'grel): 'di la mi lta 9 cha rtsi gzhan tang kal la byed zer/ su she sh+ri na nyi zla ? po la cha la lta/ gzhan ta dkal la byed zer gzhung lan bshad bas gco be kho bor 'dod do// dmar po'i rigs rnams rmi ba yin/ /zla ba bud med me tog gos/ /rin po che dang sna tshor
63a5(mdo 'grel): rmi/ /sa le sbram la sogs pa yi/ /dkar bo'i rigs rnams rmi ba yin/ /mig dmar byi ru khrag dang ni/ /nam mkha' la ni 'phur la sogs/ /tatkal la yi dus sbyo la/ /mig dmar snang na rmi ba yin/ /gza'
63a6(mdo 'grel): lhag dag la rmi lam ni/ /chos bshad pa dang nyan pa rmi/ /phur bas ri mo bris pa dang/ /glog dang rig pa sna tshogs dang/ /rta dang byis ba rtse ba dang/ /pi ti lta dang gnyen mthong rmi/ /pa sangs chu la brgal
63a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /gang dang rtse dang 'khrig pa rmi/ /khyim dang gza' ni so so ste/ /khyim bdag min ba'i gza' shar na/ /rmi lam 'drigs ma 'byung ba 'am/ /yang na rmi lam mi shes so/ /khyim bdag gza' yi dgrar gyur pa'i/ /
63b1(mdo 'grel): gza' rnams shar na ngan pa rmi/ /nyi ma gnas pa nas grangs ba'i/ /bdun la zla ba yod pa 'am/ /zla gnas bdun la nyi ma yod/ /de'i tshe 'dri na rmi lam yod/ /di las gzhan la 'dri ba ni/ /rmi lam med pa shes par
63b2(mdo 'grel): bya/ /rmi lam rmi ba'i dus brtan ba/ /tatkal cha tad ka la yin/ shas sum cu yis/ /g.yon bskor de bzhin g.yon skor` sa nas grangs pa'i ` tad kal la yin` rang bzhin yin pas de la lta/ dar? /cha chas bcu shar sum
63b3(mdo 'grel): cha na/ /bco lnga shar na nam phyed na/ dum bu drug gi /sum cu yod na tho rangs te/ /de la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams/ /mkhas par zhib du brtag par bya/ /'pho ba'i rgyu skar tshes bsres la/ /bod du ? sngar man 'ang? ba'i sha shas kyi sbra ma ?
63b4(mdo 'grel): dum drug skabs/ ma dang` 'phos nyin ches grangs gang yin ` spyod pa'i gza' yis legs par bsgyur/ /ming yig dang bo gsal nyi ma'i bdag po le la klu me sro` ma dang` du yin pa grangs sta rang yan chad/ byed ni/ /rim pas bsres la
63b5(mdo 'grel): de nyin gyis res gza' nyi ma la nus pa med kyang zla ba la 2 kyis sgyur dmir ? des 'dre / /zhes ba'i gza' lo gcig gi byed na 'pho 'tshams 12 po dus 1 du rtsal te byas chog go/ gsum gyis bgo /de yi lhag mas dkon mod dang/ /rin gyi bye brag
63b6(mdo 'grel): ston par byed/ /zed dkon rin mang ri bong can/ /dbus mar brjod pa gnyis lhag pa/ ma lus pa la rin med mod/ /zla re bzhin du brtags te smra/ /skyes bu seng+ge gdan dang stu nas khyim 'phor res tshes rtag par bya'o ji snyed snang
63b7(mdo 'grel): gyur ba/ /rgyas/ lhag ma/ 'bring po/ la byung na'o/ lhag/ pa bzang/ ba'i rtsis so// kun 'dzin` ming dang dbyangs rnams sdus nas ni/ gsal byed rnams la 2 3 ston gcug la ?
64a1(mdo 'grel): char blang bar bya/ ces 'gyu rtsa 1 yod ba'i mid lig dbyangs 1 so sor grangs/ skyes bu kun gyi rgan rims nas dbyangs dad gsal byed so sor bri/ gsal byed sdoms teng kyi sgyur dbyangs kyi bri la skyes bus 'og /lhag ma snyan po nas rims bzhin chos kun the tshom med bar shes/
64a2(mdo 'grel): mi rnams rgan pa'i rim pa yis/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed ji snyed ba/ /re re bris la gsal byed sdoms/ /gnyis kyis bsgyur la dbyangs kyi dphi/ /skyes bus bgos lhag rgan po nas/ /rim pa bzhin no gangs
64a3(mdo 'grel): ? yod ba` /sa nas ming yig bris ba` da du luD ltas la` 'dug gi drangs` rnams phyogs 1 du` thams cad la` kyi drngs` mi du yod kyi grangs` 1 byung na rgan po 2 byung na gzhon pa thig le shar na ga'o
64a4(mdo 'grel): shos/ ri'i bdag /blo gsal yid gzhungs las shes bya/ /slar yan dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams/ /'di la dbyangs dang gsal byed gang min pa yan chod bri mi rung/ rim pas bgrangs la re re dgi/ /de la sngar
64a5(mdo 'grel): `ming gi ming la gang 'dug dbyang sdang gsal byed kyi gong ma ci 'dug /gsal byed bcas pa'i rang dan 'das pa rnams so sor bris la lhag ma gsal byed 2 kyis 'bri/ de la skyes bus bgos ba'i lhag ma sngar bzhin byed// `mi du yod pa'i ming yig du yod ba'i dbyangs so sor grangs pa dang` gsal byed sdom 2
64a6(mdo 'grel): kyi sgyur? dbyangs kyi sgyur skyes bus bgob 1 byung na rgan bos khyer `gyi cho ga yis/ /tshoms rkun the tshom med par shes/ /skyes ba bud med lhan cig las/ /lus dang yan lag so sor phye/ /lus ni rgya mtshos bsgyur byas
64a7(mdo 'grel): byas te/ /a li yan lag me yis bsgyur bar bya/ / snyoms pa'i` de 2 gcig tu bsdoms la gsum gyis pho mo 2 ka'i ming yig` ka li` a li` bgo /lhag ma thog mar bur skyes la zung ni bu mo?
64b1(mdo 'grel): gcig mkha' bu/ /gang tshe bud med 'ongs pa yi/ /dris ba'i dang po gsal byed gsum/ /sde tshan grangs sdom mig gis phye/ /po mo zla ba sdongs pas shes/ /gsal byed rim bas pangs ba gsum/ /bsdoms la bcus bsgyur
64b2(mdo 'grel): dgus thob ba/ /1 po/ re 'dre ba la tshig te 'bras bu dang po` sbrul ma rang? rang gi sde tshan gyi gdon yod `rang rang gi sde tshan gyi bong du yod ba'o` lhag ma 1 2` bu mo` yan chad sdom` dwa tshig yan chad grangs la` ma 'ongs zl ba shes par bya/ /
64b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i lhag ma na du 'dug pa'i zla ba na skye` sbrum ma'i zla'o dga' byed ma/ /de ltar nges bar ma mthong nas/ /yang nas yang du dri ba la/ /sngar gyi tho pa de dang ni/ /lhag ma bsres dans dgu yis dbyangs/ /lhag maS donskye bo` zla ba rtogs pa ste
64b4(mdo 'grel): thig le shar na zla ba bcu/ /yang ni 'dri bar byed ba la/ /rnyed dang lha rtsis kyi` ga ma bsdoms ma nges` la brtag / dgu cha'i ming yig gzhan yang sbrum ma'i gsal byed ni/ /dang po mi mnyam bu skye zhing/ /gnyis dang bzhi
64b5(mdo 'grel): sogs bu mor 'gyur/ /ming yig` ma res nas` tha ma lnga la ma ning de nyid` 'gyur/ /bud med ming gi skar ma'i sa la dgu yi dgos pa'i lhag` sde tshan so so la rtsi` 'das pa'i ming gi gsal byed ni` ka lta bu` grangs/ /kha lta bu`
64b6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin tshes dang gza' dang ni/ /'dri tshig dang po nga? nya Na na ma` /'byang chu rtsa 1 ba la rtsal` smin drug la 1 snar ma la 2 nges 'dre` yi ge'i grangs/ /bsres la bdun gyis bgos pa yi/ /lhag ma mnyam na bu mo ste/ /mi mnyam pa ni bu
64b7(mdo 'grel): de nyid kyi tshes dris ba'i nyi mo` ru mthong/ /bud med sbrum mar gyur ba yi/ /ming gi dbyangs rnams ji snyed ba/ /gsang rim par sgrangs ba'i` ba'i mtshan ma gang rtsan ming du yod sre bal zer` yod a` bsre/ /thug dngos?
65a1(mdo 'grel): pas bgos pas rnyed pa rnams/ /lnga yis bsgyur la lhag ma bsre/ /de la gsum gyis bgos thob pa/ /ri bong can nyid mig dang me/ /lha mi sa 'og rim bzhin 'ongs/ de la /yang na de drug gis dgos pa'i
65a2(mdo 'grel): lhag /gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga dang stong/ /lha dang lha min mi dud thub bas bgos pa'i lhag che /'gro /yi dags dmyal ba rim bzhin yin/ du 'ong /gsal tshe lnga la` lhag 3? pas mang na skyar zhes pa de yig? tu 'dra ba yin byed
65a3(mdo 'grel): rim can dang po gsum /tshig? /bsres la gsum gyis bgos thob pa/ /lhag ma gcig na don brnyed cing/ /gnyis lus dbus mar brten du 'ongs ` zhes pa na de yan chad du yi ge du yod sre ba yin pa rim pa can zhes dang 'das pa dang bcas pa thams
65a4(mdo 'grel): cad la 'dre bar shos so/ /ba ste/ /sha yan chad nyi shu ste sdoms pas lar de de 3 gyi bgod de 'dre` 7b
65a5(mdo 'grel): yung thad? du rtsis zer ba lta bu bzhi yan chod dang lnga man chod 3 `lhag ma med na 'dri byed kyi/ /don ni the tshom med par nyams/ /de ltar bzang ngan brtags nas
65a6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /yid la sogs pa shes par bya/ /skyes pa bud med gnyis kyi ni/ /ming gi yi ge ji snyed pa/ /a sogs dbyangs su zhes pa? 'di yul dang gnas 'di lta bur 'gron don 'grub bo zer ba lta bu lang yan chad la lnga tha pa da chad la 20 pa ste/ nye? lnga yod pa de
65a7(mdo 'grel): rnams 3? gyi bgo gzhan des 'dre` shes bya ste/ /khyo shug logs` ka sogs gsal byed lha dga' ma/ /'di nad na` ming gi dbyangs kyi grangs rnams dang/ /ming gi gsal byed ji snyed pa/ /so sor bye la gcig tu bsre/ /

65b1(mdo 'grel): khyo shug cho ga ste/ gzhan du ma bshad ri sras mo/ /gyen du reg dgu po la/ /'phreng la re ga gsum bris la/ /a ga tsa Ta ta pa ya/ /sha rnams ste bgod 'og ma la/ /klu dang mda' ro mtsho dang ri/ /zla me mig rnams rim par bgod/ /ming gi yi ge
65b2(mdo 'grel): ji snyed pa/ /'og mas steng ma bsgyur bar bya/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed so sor sdom/ /mtsho dang mig gis rim bzhin bsgyur/ /gcig tu bsdoms la me yis phye/ /lhag mar stong pa ri bong can/ /skyes pa gshin rjes sngon la 'khrid/ /khyo shugs 2 ka'i
65b3(mdo 'grel): gang tshe zung du dbyangs du byung yang a yis sgyur ` ka sde byung na 'og gi gang yod kyi bsgyur des 'dre'o/ `sde tshan gang la 'dug pa'i 'og grangs ji snyer sdom pa sre'o ` lhag pa na/ /de tshe bud med sngon la 'gro/ mdzes dga' khyo shug sbyor ba ste/ /gzhan du ngas ni ma bshad do/ /
65b4(mdo 'grel): gshin rje'i gnas 'gro ming yi ge /dang po dkar phyogs yi ge snang/ /nag po'i phyogs la 'chi ba ste/ /dang po nag phyogs yi ge snang/ /dkar po'i phyogs la dus las 'das/ /khyo shug yin te gzhan la min/ /mig gi gsal byed
65b5(mdo 'grel): gong du tshes la dbyangs 'char ba'i A 'di yod sogS dang ka sogs tshes la 'char ba'i dbyangs dang sbyar la/ ` gong du tshes la dbyangs 'char pa dang gsal byed 'char ba'i a dang ka laD?  pa dang pa'i yin dang po mthun na` a thung dang ta sogs` dang po las/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam yi ge` yi ge snang//
65b6(mdo 'grel): g.yon dang g.yas dag rim pa bzhin/ /ming gi dang po A ring dang po ka soD `mig gi dang po 'grib par grags/ /rang gi skyes pa'i skar ma yis/ /tshes gcig la skar ma gang byung ba de nas drangs pa'i grangS nyi? shu 9? la lhag ma gang yod pa des bri bas mnyaM te des 'dra` ba soD 2ka` ma sogs`
65b7(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i don kun 'grub byed cing/ /dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu kun/ /'di nyid gcig bus nges par mthong/ /skyes pa'i zla ba'i skye skar ma zin mi rtsi gsung` tshes grangs la/ /skar ma yi ni des par mthong/ /zla ba shes pas skyes khyim gang
66a1(mdo 'grel): shes pas de la 'bras bu ston/ /skyes pa'i tshes grangs lhag ma yis/ /nyi shu dgu la phri ba yis/ /lhag mas skyes skar rtogs par dran/ /dkar phyogs gcig nas grangs rnams bzung/ /nag po'i tshes la
66a2(mdo 'grel): gsum bsnan dang/ /zla ba'i skar ma shes pa dang/ /de bzhin rang gi skyes zla la/ /bcu gcig bsres pas shes par byed/ /ji ltar skyes pa'i nyi ma'a/ ches bal skar ma gang byung ba de nas grangs pa'i nyi shu rtsa dgu la lha gang yod kyang mi mnyam nges 'dre/ grangs//

66a4(mdo 'grel): de ltar skar ma rab phye bas/ /skyes pa'i zla ba nyin zhag dran/ /'di la rang gi zla ba ni/ /sngon song skar ma btsal ba yin/ /rang gi skar ma shes pa las/ /don kun shes par 'gyur bar dran/ /gang gis skar ma mi shes par/ /de
66a5(mdo 'grel): ni dal sa don med dran/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i skar ma ni/ /lha mo nan tan las shes bya/ /'dri byed srog gi las byed par/ /zlog las gnas na dgos don med/ /gal te las ni byed par gnas/ /bsam pa'i yid la 'dod pa 'grub//
66a6(mdo 'grel): skyes pa sgo nang g.yas 'jog cing ? de bzhin bud med g.yon/ 'di yan chad mi rtsi gsung/ gal te nyi ma'i yi dgu dangs shes pa dang sbyar/ g.yas rlung/ g.yo nas rgyu ba la g.yas nas 'dri ba don med la ? 'jog pa/ /dge zhing shis par ston pa ste/ /zlog na 'dri ba don nyams
66a7(mdo 'grel): 'dri ba po phyi nas 'ong ba'i tso? rkang ? 'gyur/ /g.yas kyis yan lag g.yo ba dang/ /snying nyid ngan pa rnam par spang/ /nye 'khor shis pa'i bya ba byed/ /bsam mi dgos pas rkang pa ` las gang yang` de las ` lam lnga skyes pa g.yon bud med g.yas su 'jog na ?
66b1(mdo 'grel): don kun 'grub/ /'di byed mgrin pa 'gram pa dang/ /rna ba sna mig brang dang ni/ /lte ba gsang ba snying kha so/ /skra dang dpral ba gsus pa dang/ /nu ma dang ni rkub rnams su/ /lag pa g.yas pas reg cing g.yo/ /gdong ni sngon du bltas
66b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe/ /dge pa'i ltas yin bzhin bzang ma/ /g.yon pas reg cing g.yo lca dang zer ram ` ba ni/ /de las bzlog par shes par bya/ /'di byed pho nya'i nye 'khor na/ /ba lang ra lug gsod pa dang/ /'thab rtsod rdog cing du ba dang
66b3(mdo 'grel): btson 'dzin 'brog 'joms nor stor dang/ /snod stong skye bo lus dam gnas de rnams su ? pa/ /gos h+rul ngan ste ` mdze can mdog mi sdung/ /skrag cing bred cing chad pas bcad/ /sems stor mya ngan byed pa mthong/ /kha dog yid
66b4(mdo 'grel): du mi 'ong ba/ /kha ni 'og bltas rlung 'tshug mthong/ /'gro phyogs las bzlog skye bo sogs/ /mthong na mdzes ma don rnams med/ /dud 'gro gsod las thar pa dang/ /rtse? zhing dga' zhing dgod pa dang/ /nang pa sos dang btson rnams thar ?
66b5(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i glu dang de bzhin gar/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas rnams mthong/ /rol mo'i sgra skad snyan pa dang/ /dge slong bram ze bla ma lha/ /lha mchod pa ni dga' ston byed/ /nor rnyed tshong pa rnyed pa che/ /gang dag skyes bu ya mtshan can/ /gos

67a1(mdo 'grel): kyi nor len/ zla ba shes rab g.yon phyogs dran/ /lkog tu gyur pa'i phyi rol don/ /de'i bye brag shes pa yin/ /dgos pa med kyang byis pa rnams/ /dga' ba'i phyir bshad dga' sbyin ma/ /'jigs byed

68b3(mdo 'grel): gab ba'i ye shes 4 dang brgyad dang 12 yod pa'o /rkang pa'i yi ge steng na gza' gdug pa can zhing la sogs bzhag 4 cha 4 skar ma re re'i steng na gnas/ 'khyud pa dang/ /du ba gdong tshugs mthong ba rnams/ /gtso mo nyon la yid la zung /mdor/ dang por smin drug gnas pa
