68b7(mdo 'grel): pa 41 ? g.yon skor yin/ gsal ba las/ /? pa 'og pa sta sa yin du na snar ma la sogs gsal ba yi/ g.yas skor yin 'di mdun sma'i drug la sogs/ gal te nyi ma mnyam par gnas/ /rgyu skar gsum du nyi ma'i thobs? mi 18? yod/ ?
69a1(mdo 'grel): rab tu brjod/ /a nas bcu gnyis pa ma ki /mgo yi rkang pa'i tha mar dran/ /zla ba gnas na nub phyogs su/ /mthong ba rkang pa nyi shu gnyis/ ngu ba yod na/ mon grub rkang pa tha ma yi/ /su yi ga
69a2(mdo 'grel): gsal por mthong ba yin/ /la yi ge 12 yod/ rkang ` de ltar gza' kun dag nyi ma'i 'thod sal/ skar ? de bzhin du smin ca la g.yon bskor / nad du ya'i yang ? 'di smin snar mal Sha la 'dug zer de mthong ngo/ skar la wa/ zla ba'i ?
69a3(mdo 'grel): gis ni/ /mthong ba'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis yin par grags/ /mig dmar gyi ni gsum par grags/ u /de ltar lha yi blon po drug /nyi ma'i bu i brgyad rnams ni/ /nyi ma la sogs
69a4(mdo 'grel): g.yon bskong /gong gi nyi ma mnyam par gnas ces pa'i rgyas bshad do des 'dre 'di 'og na gal te nyi ma mnyam gnas ces pa'i rgyas bshad/ ? smin drug la yod nad pa? nas rkang pa ? phur bu ? rkang pa ? sman pa ? rkang pa ? g.yas skor ? spen pa ? de'i lugs g.yon skor ?
69a5(mdo 'grel): rgya pa tu grags/ /zla ba la sogs mdun du dran/ /g.yas skor rang tu lhag pa sangs g.yon skor nyi ma smin pa la chung chad do/ rA hu gza' lhag pa sangs te/ /bzhi po 'grogs lugs gcig tu brten/ /zla ba mthong ba nyi shu ga'i sa
69a6(mdo 'grel): mig phur sben 3 ste zer ` 26 ta pa ? sangs ? g.yon sa glang po ` de bzhin rA hu dgu ru dran/ lhag pa/ zla ba'i bu yi ? yin te/ /de bzhin dkar pos lnga zhes bya/ /'og ches la 'dre'o` rba? dab` nyi ma'i nyi ma smin
69a7(mdo 'grel): 6 la yod cing skyes skar mgo la yod pa ni nyi ma'i mthongs po'i/ ? rkang pa zla ba dang 'gros nya smin pa la yong na tha skar drang ? nyi ma dang 'dres 1 ? smin kyi la na thod? rtsi` pa sangs` bra nye ming mod` 'bras bu ston pa 'bras bu 'di dag skyag ske ral rtsi las byed pa'i chen po tha ma las ni ma yin no ?
69b1(mdo 'grel): mthongs nor rnams zad/ /mig dmar rU hu sben pa yis/ /lus can rnams ni 'chi bar byed/ /phur bu gnyen rnams brlag cing 'chi/ /pa sangs las nyams don mi 'grub/ /gza' lag dgra 'byung zong mi lom/ /zla bas
69b2(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa chen po 'byung/ /gtso mo mthong ba'i ? po ? ma shi yang ba smras yod ? 'bras bu dran/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /sha la ka yi 'khor lo ste/ /thur ma'i 'jam ma ? bag ma la sogs cho ga mchog/
69b3(mdo 'grel): yung thung bas snod pa chung ? grogs mo lha chen mdzes dga' nyon/ /skar ma dge dang mi dag pa/ / 'di rnams nyin re'i rtsis yin 'bras bu ` nyin re'i chos yin gsung ? thur ma'i bzhi 'khor lo/ g.yas skor ? bzang nang thams cad rtsi ?
69b4(mdo 'grel): ma lus pa ni ston par byed/ /thur ma bdun pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /nges pa'i 'bras bu ston pa yin /shar nas nub tu ri mo bdun/ /lho nas byang duAng de bzhin ste/ /thang kar gdong tshugs 'byung ba nas/ /sha la ka zhes
69b5(mdo 'grel): grags pa yin/ /sum cu drug gi re mig bcas/ /smin drug nas ni bra nye'i bar/ /shar nas brtsams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad rim bzhin bri/ /che zhes de la sdig pa'i gza'/ /lhan gcig gnas te 'khyud pa ni//
69b6(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo'i spyi ming ? de'i thad ka'i skar ma la/ /ma rungs gla dong ni zug par des/ /'khyud pa'i mdun ma sol ba ste/ /rgyab la du ba btsun mo skye/ /de'i nus pa skyes skar bos pa ? de rtsam ste/ /sngon du shes bya lha sras mo//
69b7(mdo 'grel): sol bas 'khyud pa du ba gdong/ 4 po la/ stobs bzhi'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ /nyi ma shar skar 7 pa ? rgyab nas g.yon skar/ /bdun ? dang ni lhan cig pa'i/ /'gro lug men pa kun/ phyogs ni mi shes pa zhes bya/ /nyi ma'i rkang pa brkyangs
70a1(mdo 'grel): dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i phyogs/ /a ta ma ta zhes byar grags/ /phyogs gang bsod nams gza' rnams yod/ /'char pa zhes bya dge ba yin/ /nyi ma dang ni lhan cig pas/ /a ? mi tar
70a2(mdo 'grel): grags pa yin/ /'di yan chad 'khor lugs yin na/ gza' rnams zla ba'i thad gung ba yin/ nub ? kar song/ /de ring skar ma dang sdong phug ? bag ma'i 'bras bu nges par brlag /nyi mi ste gza'/ ? thang kar khyo rnams rgyud? pa yin shi
70a3(mdo 'grel): nyi ma kha na la mkhas pa'i rten pa /'di man chod 1 sngon chu gis ? de nyin gyi zla ba dang smin du lhan cig gnas na de thad ka na byi zhun yod pas gza' gang yong pa'i 'bras bu 'byung gzhan nges 'tre/? mdor ? zla ba dang ? rgyas ? sdig can gza' yin ? zla skar la rtsi rgyu yin gsung
70a4(mdo 'grel): mig dmar gyis ni bu dang bral/ /zla ba'i thad kar gza' lhag yod/ /bza' btung med do lha yi sras/ /lha'i bla mas nor nyams shing/ /sngon chang med pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung/ /ba sangs khyo ni spangs nas su/ /btsun ma
70a5(mdo 'grel): tha skar/ la sogs mgo reg byed/ /spen pa'i thad kar zla ba yod /smad 'tshong du ni 'gro zhes zla ba'i thad skar ? zla ba'i gdong ? grags/ /zla ba yod pa'i thur ma la/ /bsod nams sdig pa gnas gyur pa/ /mdung
70a6(mdo 'grel): dang mdung ni tsho ni po yi/ /sbyor ba yongs su grags pa yin/ /mdung dang mdung ni chen po sbyor ba la/ /shar lho dang byang shar gyi rung ba la song na bu skyes 'chi da nyin gyi skar ma bar 'gyur ba ste/ /bag ma la sogs te lur rgyus so/ /de nyin gyi skar ma la zla ba dang lhan cig
70a7(mdo 'grel): na yod/ de nyon gyi spar ma smin lta bu la yong na de'i thang kan byi thun mong las/ de la dka' gang yod pa'i 'phal bu 'byung smin ni mig ? snar pa'i lhag pa ? ko'i phur bu lag la ba sangs/ nam so'i sben pa/ rgyal gyi nyi ma/ skad cig zla ba zhar phyogs kyi las med do/ /yang na chu ni mig dmar dpe 'dre/ ?
70b1(mdo 'grel): gal te byas su phyin pa na/ /zla gnyis la ni nges par 'chi/ /bag ma blangs na khyo ni 'chi/ /bshes dang dbye zhing don rnams med/ /bya ba gang yang 'grub mi 'gyur/ /mdzes dga' khong du chud par gyis/ /smin ? la sogs skrangs?
70b2(mdo 'grel): de'i dus su ? rnams/ /phyogs su bdun bdun pa las skor ? gnas pa las/ /mig dmar la sogs de'i nyin byas don rnams nyams` gza' rnams ni/ /rgyu ska re ra'i bdag por de dag lugs ? dran/ /gyi mig dam ?
70b3(mdo 'grel): sha ? gyi bdun no/ /de nyin gyi skar ma dang zhes 2 ? na phod na de'i nyin skar ma smin lta bu la yang/ de'i thad ka na byi zhun yod pas/ de gza' gang yang 'bras bu 'byung/ smin 6 bdag mig dmar bi rdzi lhag phur bu sbas ? sben nyi ma bdag zla bas zla ba ste sha ? no lto yang chu'i bdag/ /mig dmar rims bzhin gzhan du de 'os ?/
70b4(mdo 'grel): skar mar rang gi bdag po gnas/ /skyon med pa de gter rang gi bu/ /byes skrod sogs dang bya ba la/ /rang gi bdag pos bde bar byed/ /bdag po rang gi bu la gnas/ /thams cad shis byed lha chen ma/ /byang la sogs pa'i phyogs
70b5(mdo 'grel): lug gi khyim na tha skar bra nye smin ? gnas de'i bdag po mig dmar des 'dre'o/ /bzhi ru/ /zla ba gnas pa'i skar ma rnams/ /sbo dang chu smad khrums smad mig dmar lta bu/ smin ? lta bu la? dang/ /rkyal dang mchu rnams ? mo? sa yi bu/ /mig dmar zhes
70b6(mdo 'grel): bya ba kar song/ /chom rkun gyis 'tshe bzang btung med/ /sngar nas med pa'i nang 'byung de nyin gyi ? zhing/ /longs spyod brang gyur cho de skye/ /chu smad gro zhun me bzhi dang/ /nag ba mon gra zla ba gnas/ /de'i thad kar gza' lhag shar//
70b7(mdo 'grel): 'chi sogs mi dge sna tshogs la/ /nor bu bu dang bu mo dang/ /longs spyod rnams na ma lus nyams/ /khrums stong snubs dang tha skar mchu/ /rgyas bshad ? ga rnams la zla ba dang ? po gang yin yang rung ste de rnams la` gnas/ /thad kar phung? 
71a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i gdong zug na/ /rgyal po'i yul du mi bzhag cing/ /bya ba kun la mi dge ste/ /gnyen rnams gsal bar 'chi bar 'gyur/ /snron dang chu stod gre dang skag /nam gru rnams su zla ba yong/ /de'i
71a2(mdo 'grel): thad kar pa sangs ltas/ /kyi dus ` bag ma blangs na khyo 'chi ste/ /pus mo la sogs na ba dang/ /phyugs kun 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /smin drug lag dang tshu stod dang/ /byi zhun bra nye zla ba gnas/ /thad kar gal te sbon pa
71a3(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /nad 'byung grogs rnams 'chi bar dran/ /rgyu skar bdag po'i nus pa ste/ /rang gi bdag po'i 'khor lo yin/ /smin drug la sogs rim pa bzhin/ /bzhi bzhir yongs su phye ba las/ /sde tshan bdun du 'gyur ba ste//
71a4(mdo 'grel): bzhi la re khas bskor ba bdun/ /nyin zla pa sangs phur bu dang/ mig dmar gza' lhag rA hu sben/ /rim bzhi bo/? g.yal skor` smin 6? nas skag gi bar? rel 1 gis skar ba lta bu` pa bzhir stan tha ma'i char/ /rA hu spen pa gnyis
71a5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin/ /sde tshan` de gza' rnams sbyar ba ni` re re la 'dab byed pa ltar` phan tshun snol nas las/ /mo de thad ka'i nus pa 'byung/ /nyi ma mig dmar thad ka ste/ /mig dmar nyi mar gdong pa btsugs/ /de bzhin zla bar gza' lhag ste//
71a6(mdo 'grel): gong du 'ong 'di 'ang byung na yul phyogs ngan` spen pa phur pa phan tshun bltas/ /ba sangs rA hu de bzhin du/ /thad kar snol bas stobs su 'gyur/ /grong dang grong khyer phyogs rnams su/ g/nyi ma mig dmar thad kas te` phyugs dang de phyogs su ngan`
71a7(mdo 'grel): bzhin lo tog sogs/ /'di 'dra yul phyogs la dan` thad ka'i skyon gyis brlag par ni/ /'gyur ro lha'i dbang phyug ma/ /gza' rnams thad kar gdong btsugs las/ /phan tshun chen po'i 'khor lo grags/ /lnga'o/ lugs 1 yin` smin
71b1(mdo 'grel): drug la sogs rim pa bzhin/ /phyogs re rer bdun bdun gnas pa las/ /rang gi phyogs su 'gro bar chas/ /dge'o dpa' mo dbang phyug ma/ /shar phyogs shar bzhin byang du yang/ /byang shar byang bzhin shar duAng bzang?/ /de bzhin lho/
71b2(mdo 'grel): 'di lugs 1 yin` dang nub phyogs kyang/ /phan tshun mnyam par zla ba shar skar la gnas na ring gzhan` shar skar la zla ba gnas na shar lta bu yang phyogs su` du dge ba ` byi te gzhan byang du 'ong dge phyogs 'phong na` yang dbe` phyogs 2 dan` lho skar khrun cig des 'dre
71b3(mdo 'grel): dge ba yin/ /me dang rlung du pa ri g+ha/ shar skar byang skar 2 phyogs 1 bo bon las shes so/ /mtshams las brgal nas mi shis bas/ don nyams sdug bsngal ngal dub dang/ rmongs shing 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /me dang rlung du mchams
71b4(mdo 'grel): mchis me rlung 2 yin/ /chu tshod sa pa` mer skar` bcad pas/ /pa ri g+ha yi 'khor lo yin/ /dbang 3 ngan skag dang chus yang de bzhin sbyar cher bden bral te/ ldan pa nye smin drug dbus/ /mer ni skag dang mchu zhes brjod/ /bden bral 'gro ba bzang ngan
71b5(mdo 'grel): sa ga lha mtshams dbus/ /gro zhun mon dbyug pa snga dan` gre rlung de bzhin/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba ste/ /lha mo de ltar phan lugs 1` 'tsham su 'gro ba'i bzang ngan` lha 'tshams kyang de ltar skor` tshun gnas/ /phyogs bzhir phan tshun
71b6(mdo 'grel): mi mthun phyir/ /phyogs gsum rnam par spangs pa yin/ /de bzhin spyad/ rdzogs pa dang ni gzugs pa'i dbus/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba dran/ /dmigs pa la skar ma'i 'gro 'jug 'tshams na yod pa la zer` rdzogs dang zug pa'i dbus su ni//
71b7(mdo 'grel): zlog ste 'gro zla skar la rtsi de'i dus su phyogs nya 3` la bzang ba med/ /phyogs 1` skar ma mgo mjug 'tshams su yod la zer` phyogs 1` chu tshod lnga yun` pa'i byed` rdzogs dang zug pa'i chu tshod smin 6? la shar du dge gzhan 3? ngan 'dre` chu tshod lnga/ /?
72a1(mdo 'grel): mi dge'i lhag ma skyon dang bral/ /sngar bshad thad ke'i gdong tshugs kyis/ /'khor lo de ltar 'di shes bya/ /de ltar ma 'khrul shes bya ste/ /skyon gyi 'bras bu rnam bar spangs/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor lo to//
72a2(mdo 'grel): be ra mu pa'i tsakra sum bshal lo` yin/ /de ltar thur ma'i rkang pa brgya pa` 'khor lo mchog / gdong tshugs bshad pa yang` dge dang mi dge'i bye brag rnams/ /phye ste rgyas par bstan pa yin/ /legs par rtogs sam skal bzang ma
72a3(mdo 'grel): rang gi phyag rgya'i` 'di ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rkang pa brgya pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga bstan pa dang/ shal ka'i 'khor lo bstan pa chen po ste/ le'u bzhi pa'o// //
72a4(mdo 'grel): lha mos gsol pa/ lha chen 'khor lo mchog tu dge /rkang pa brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'i/ /cho ga shin du rgyas pa yang/ /dbang phyug lha la nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rkang pa brgyad cu rtsa gcig
72a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /mnyam par 'khor lo rgyas par 'dir/ /g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /bstan chos don kun ma tshang med/ /sha la ka yi 'khor lo yang/ /'di dang lhan gcig mnyam par gnas/ /thig ni drang po cha bcu ru/ /mdzes ma
72a6(mdo 'grel): mnyam par gdab par bya/ /de la re mig brgyad cu gcig /'byung bar nges so sdug gu ma/ /gra nas gra zur shoka logs ya` re mig la/ /a sogs dbyangs kyi yi ge dgod/ /smin drug ngang ni bra nye'i bar/ /phyi'i re mig bdun la bgod
72a7(mdo 'grel): lnga la gsal byed nyi shu rnams/ /de'i nad ma'i` a ba ka na ta sa ran ya/? b+ha dza`? ha Ta sogs dgod/ /de bzhin thog mar mig` srin po rlung lha dbang ldan te thams cad g.yas skor ro/ /shar nas rtsam se te g.yas skor` glang la sogs/ /me nas pa'i khyim ?
72b1(mdo 'grel): phyogs 4 3 3 mo/ /re mig gsum la dgong bar bya/ /dga' ba la sogs tshes rnams ni/ /dbus kyi re mig lnga la dgrod/ /de ltar skar ma la sogs pa/ /g.yas skor sbyor bas dkar mo kye/ /de ltar brgyad cu rtsa gcig la/ /dus kyi
72b2(mdo 'grel): lha rnams thams cad tshang/ /rang gi rgyu skar gsal shar bzang po rdzogs ba` byed dbyangs/ /gsal byed 20 khyim bcu 12? khyim dang tshes la 'chi ba brtag /shar ` lho` nub` byang` bzang? po rgyal bstod pa rdzogs pa du` sdig gza' thad kar
72b3(mdo 'grel): gsum ni ngan/ /gnyis dang gsum skyes pa'i skar ma dga' sogs` gyis brlag 'gyur te/ /gcig gi thang skar song ba yi/ /don nyams nor rnams zad par byed/ /ming la drag po'i gza' rnams 'dzom/ /nges bar sgra gcan` 'od tu 'chad zer`
72b4(mdo 'grel): g.yon skor stong/ 'che ba` sna` 'chi bar mthong zhes dran/ /bso 4` nga nams sdig can mche ba` ming la zin/ /rims 'byung mi rnams zad par byed/ /be ni skar ma` nya 'am 4 'dzom` mche ba dang` sa dkar drag po'i gza'//
72b5(mdo 'grel): gsum 'dzom tshe ni 'jig par ston/ /skyes pa las dang ba ni shar/ /a 2 ka` d+ha na la skar ma` 2 'dzom nas` rims nang 'byung/ /bsod nams gza' drag po'i ming` rnams shar nub tu/ /nyi ma la ming skar la` sa ga zer`
72b6(mdo 'grel): gsum zer` nub ngan par yod /nyi ma dang po` shar du 'ongs tshe nub/ /mchu nas sa ga'i bar du yang/ /ming gi gsal byed lnga pa ` gang gnas pa'i phyogs su` ni/ /ming yig la sogs ldan lhar 1 du` bsod nams kyi gza' che nub`
72b7(mdo 'grel): par gnas/ /ming gi 'khyud pa'i dbang du byas pa'o` skar ma ri nyam song ming skar 2` rung? sol yang ngo/ /'chi ba la 'khyud pa 'di'i dbang du byas pa'o/ /sogs du ba sol ba la sogs kyang 'byung ba'i phyir/ /phyogs gang nyi ma gnas pa'i
73a1(mdo 'grel): phyogs/ rgyu skar yi ge dus sbyor tshes/ /la dbyangs` phyugs nyams mya ngan 'thab rtsod 'byung/ /bran g.yog longs spyod rnam par nyams/ /nyi ma dang bral phyogs gsum kar/ /dgra las rgyal zhing phrogs
73a2(mdo 'grel): bzang 'phrad/ /'dod pa'i kun nus` don kun phun sum dbugs stong brgyad brgya`? nang` tshogs/ /rnyed dang grags pa de bzhin 'byung/ /dbang po la sogs sde tshan gyis/ /lag sogs dbus na gnas pa la/ sha ri/ nyi ma gnas
73a3(mdo 'grel): tshe nub 'gyur te/ /phyogs de'i ming gi rgyu skar dang/ /tshes khyim gsal byed dbyangs rnams ni/ /bsregs nyams tshad pas gdungs pa yis/ shar skar ba gyi rnar nyams par 'gyur ba yin/ /dbus su phyogs der shar gyi thams cad`
73a4(mdo 'grel): skar smin drug nas skag gi bar 7? yod pa la skar ma lag de tshe'i dbus ngan yod pa la zla ba 3 lag gi skyes skar dang ming skar yod pa de la dan gzhan la de'i cha shin tu gud shas rtsi phyogs gzhan` phyogs gzhan des 'dre` phyugs chung gsung` zla ba gsum gsum ngan//
73a5(mdo 'grel): lhag ma'i phyogs gsum dge ba ste/ zla ba'i sde tshan de bzhin smra/ /gsal byed rgyu skar tshes khyim dbyangs/ /phyogs kyi bdag po mkha' 'gro'i phyir/ /gang gi phyogs kyi nyi ma gnas/ /'gro 'dug byed pa dge
73a6(mdo 'grel): tshes la 4 4 ste nyi ma snga pa 'dre` nyi ma med pa'i` 33` nyi ma yong ba'i phyogs tshe ngan` skyes skar ming skar yod pa'i` kun` nyi ma` nyi ma` la` bar grags/ /da bzod dge dang gan ngan` mi dge brtag/
73a7(mdo 'grel): sngon du bsam pa gong du rtsin` mkhas pa yin/ /shar du smin drug ska gi bar/ /nges par gnas yig lnga pa yang/ /sde tshan dang bcas pa nub ste phyogs 4 ka 'dre/ a ba ka ha Ta la sogs gnas/ /khyim ni glang 'khrig ka rka rku
73b1(mdo 'grel): dga' zhes bya ba gra nas dbyangs/ /dbyangs yig dang po lnga pa dang/ /dgu pa dang ni bcu gsum pa/ /nyi ma shar du 'ongs tshe nub/ /mchu nas sa ga'i bar du yang/ /ming gi gsal byed lnga po ni/ u/ ma yig la sogs ldan bar?
73b2(mdo 'grel): chos` dang po shar khyim` gnas` A` u` li` o` zer` gnas/ /de bzhin seng+ge bu mo srang/ /lho na gnas` a` a` Ta sa re ha` ga ni dbyangs yig
73b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa dang/ /drug pa bcu pa bcu bzhir dran/ /bzang po'i tshes te lho phyogs su/ /nyi ma gnas tshe nub par grags/ /lha mtshams khyim` la sogs gro zhun mthar/ /na nas kha'i mthar thug lho'o` par/ /gsal
73b4(mdo 'grel): a` u` lI` aau` byed yi ge lnga yang grags/ /sdig pa gzhu dang chu srin dran/ /nub kyi phyogs` rgyal ba'i tshes sogs bye zhun` a b+ha dza` dbyangs yig rnams/ i /me thug drag a`
73b5(mdo 'grel): dang dbang phyug gnas/ /gal te chu ru nyi ma song/ /de rnams nub par bstan pa yin/ /mon gre la sogs bra nye gnas/ /gnas la yi byad gi` mthar thug par/ /yi ge lnga ni gnas par bstan/ ri /khyim ni bum pa
73b6(mdo 'grel): o` nya dang lug /tshes ni stong pa nub tu` dbyangs ni tshu/ /nor rgyu skar la sogs` sar 7 par` dang nyi ma rgyal sarba tsa` sa dang tsha'i` por dran/ /nyi ma byang nas nub pa yin/ /bsod nams gza' rnams
73b7(mdo 'grel): dge zhes zer/ /rtsa i` ba mig dmar 'dir gza' ra gzig? nyin re phyogs mang su rgyu ba ri` nyi ma re rgyu` yan lag tshes kyi e` gza'/ /glog shu la 'khrug dus 'jug rtsi thabs` nye ba'i gza' la gnas che/ sogs pa rnams/ /nyi snar? mging? yang nyi
74a1(mdo 'grel): ma gnas pa'i rjes 'brang zhing/ /de bzhin spro zhing sdud par byed/ /ji ltar glog ni lnga pa la/ /nyi ma gnas g.yas su grangs pa'i` rang gis 'das pa'i longs spyod yongs su rdzogs par shes/ /'di
74a2(mdo 'grel): 'jug zlog pa nyi ma nas grangs pa'i grangs `glog logs pa nyi ma nas glangs pa'i mig dmar logs/ shar nyin re lan mang du rgyug nyi ma gnas? pa'i skar ma nas skar ma ri zhing/ rkang ba 44 ste/ rkang pa grangs byas pa/ la pa la zlog/ brgyad pa la shul/ gnas pa la sogs pa ni brgyad nye ba'i gza'
74a3(mdo 'grel): brgyad zer/ don nyi ma nas grangs pa'i grangs 'di rnams la zlog pa sogs pa'i ming brgyad kyi ming yig yin gsung ngo/ /'di nyid ma rtsi gzhan la mi ? bsung do/ ltar brgyad la shu la gnas/ /bcu bzhi pa la 'brug tu dran/ /bco brgyad de bzhin du 'jug brjod//
74a4(mdo 'grel): mkha' ? mig gtso zhes des bar mthong/ /thog ces mig dang lag pa dran/ /sa g.yo gsum lhag nyi shu'o/ /'og ma thams cad nyi ma gnas ? kyi phung po 1`? nyin skar nas grangs pa'i ca yod kyi` de bzhin rgyal ba zhes bya ba
74a5(mdo 'grel): gtun shing dag tu grags pa yin/ lags pa /sgre gcan mig dmar sben pa rnams /mthong la sngon du dgu rkang ba` gsum brgyad/ /nye ba'i gza yi sbyor ba rnams ni/ /rgyu skar la sogs shes par bya/ /rgyu skar nyi shu
74a6(mdo 'grel): sang ser than pa la sogs ba` rtsa bdun ni/ thams cad tshang bar bskor ba/ g.yon skor` yin/ /pa'i sa` g.yas skor` dus sbyor phyed gza''char ba ni/ /sum cu'i tshes la'ang bskor zhing mdo`? 'char/ rgyas`/
74a7(mdo 'grel): dang po'i thun la chos kyi bzhag la yang `? nyi ma'i bza' sgra can mig dmar span pa rnams la/ mthongs sngon du ?3 brgyad rnams la dan ba'i cha re yod do? gza' gzhan rnams mi ci? gsung ngo/ /dbugs la brgya nyin mo'i gza' rnams dus? 'khor` dbugs ? nyin mo gza' ca la skor` zhag re spyad pas lan 4 'og na mar du chongs? bskor?
74b1(mdo 'grel): bdag /lan bzhi ji bzhin dus sbyor phyed/ /nyin mo gza' rnams drug la bskor/ /phyed pa'i gza' rnams nyin mo` mtshan mo lnga la bskor ba yin/ /rigs ldan na gsal` 'di ltar lo dang lug sogs khyim /tshes dang thun 'phrang`/
74b2(mdo 'grel): de nyi ma'i gza'` zhag gsum cu la lan pa res gza'7 'char` rtsi ba'i gza' gang 'od yang mgo bzung` `mtshan mo de ka'i 'phro nas mgo bzung lnga la skor mdor na nyin mtshan su byas? pa la nyin mo 7 cha 1 mtshan mo 7 cha 1 `? re re rigs pa 'bra? ba` 'pho? ba'i gza/`?
74b3(mdo 'grel): mtshams rim pa bzhin/ /bdag po'i gza' rnams 'char pas na/ /skar ma las ni rdzogs par bya/ /dzanma ha ni an ta ka /dzanma ha ni te na sha /snying stobs dzanma ha ni rim pa bzhin/ /tshes la lan gsum 'char par grags
74b4(mdo 'grel): shin tu` res gza' byed pa'i gza' nyi mo ca bskor` rang rang gi` rtsa ba'i tshes gzar gang yin sa mgo bzung` de nas` sa sdul` bdun ba` a na nan ta lags pa gong du bshad do` lnga dang po la sdul ra la/ bun pa
74b5(mdo 'grel): dkar po la sogs phyogs gcig la/ /dus sbyor phyed la de ltar 'tshar/ /phyed gong phyed 'og dkar nag dran/ /mtshan yang de ltar dkar nag brjod/ /drag po'i tshes dang drag po'i gza'/ /skar ma drag po gsum lag`
74b6(mdo 'grel): dag po dus sbyor phyed pa de` tshes` 'dzom pas/ /ming skar la sdig pa bzang` nyi ma` nyi ma zla ba'i cha byad dkar cha phyed cha de bzhin du nyin mtshan la yang yod do nas 'phre ba bzhin du 'bras bu ste/ dra nye logs nas tshe`
74b7(mdo 'grel): shin tu mi shis ngan pa ste/ /chu? stod ? khrums? smad` bi na sha ber pa la` ka zhes byar grags/ /ban ba nya 'dzom pa'i mi` rkang pa brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'i/ /'khor lo gsum 'dzom gdong tshugs dran/ /g.yas g.yon mche ba thams cad ka gdong`
75a1(mdo 'grel): glang chen myos pa'i mche ba yis/ /blangs ste za bar byed dang mtshungs/ /g.yas g.yon mche bas 'dzin pa ste/ /sna yi mdun na gdong pa gsod/ /ji ltar gra bzhir gnas pa yi/ /a sogs bshi po
75a2(mdo 'grel): spangs pa las/ /grwa bzhi po la mi 'dzugs par gzhan 4 po la 'dzugs ? 4 po'i pha ta tshu ta la 'dzugs` gdong` gal te dbyags yig bcu gnyis kyang/ /'chi bar nges pas cis mi spang/ /thams cad 'dra ba` lha mos gzhol ba` a` A` i`
75a3(mdo 'grel): a'i` bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi phyir/ /brjod du ma gtub gsang ste bzhag /re mig dang po dgu pa de ltar na lhag ma` i` o` dang/ A/ bcu bdun nyi shu lnga pa ste/ /rkang pa ces zhus pa` brgyad cu rtsa gcig las/ /'di ni 'chi ba
75a4(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal ba lan` rnam par spangs/ /gzhan yang rkang ba bcu gnyis gra dang po la` a` kyi/ /u sogs dbyangs yig bcu gnyis so/ /gal te 'di la gdong tshugs sha zur gyi zar/ / dbus dang lnga po gra
75a5(mdo 'grel): lha mos dra'i bzhi gdong chugs ci ste med /grwa 4 ba/ rkang dbyangs lhag ma` dbyangs yig 16 la 4 mche ba spangs 12 la gdong tshugs 'char ba ci zhes dris bas pa drug la gang gnas pa/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig nyi shu drug /brgya phyed gcig gis ma
75a6(mdo 'grel): ldang pI che snol ba brgya yi phyed dang gcig dris lan` lhag pa/ /re mig bdun cu rtsa gcig pa/ /rim min 12 ba 4 sben pa bcu 18 21 4 grwa dang po nas phar gyur tshur khog` phra dang po nas par grangs chur long` sa` gzhi no`
75a7(mdo 'grel): khengs pa rnams kyis de la spangs/ /grar gnas yi ge bzhi yin te/ /chos 17 na ri rab kyi bar thal tshur thal na nyin du 22 'grib 'grib par mi byed de bzhin du grwa yi yi ge 4 po gang mchi bas mi dag go/ zla ba 'phel par mi byed do/ /rgyu mtshan` nyi
75b1(mdo 'grel): zla'i bar mnyam bco lnga ste/ /cung zad snol bas 'grib par dran/ /des na gang ba'i chos pa ni/ /glang chen mche ba rgyab kyi phyogs/ /lo dang zla ba nyin zhag la/ /log na yod rnam par 'char pa shes par bya/ /dkar nag
75b2(mdo 'grel): nyin mtshan mnyas dus na` phyogs kyi nyin zhag la/ de las zla ba`/ dbyangs dang gsal byed dang grwa 4 po` stobs byed dran/ /dkar phyogs chos zhag la di rab gyi par thad nyi zla gnyis gnas te mi sgrig de ni grwa'i yi ge` pa mche ba'i char mi 'bog` 1 nas` 10? nas`
75b3(mdo 'grel): las bskyed dka' po ste/ /nag phyogs las skyes nag po la/ /'ka' ni la sbyar phyir log rtsa na dra la sbyar` g+haM tsha lta bu` stobs ni che bar 'gyur ba ste/ /zla ba phyed par yongs su grags/ /g+ha da tsha dang sha na tha/ /ta ba d+ha dang tha ja nya//
75b4(mdo 'grel): ka ba bzhi par gnas pa las/ /gsal byed yi ge gsum gsum bstan/ /smin drug la sogs sdig can gnas/ /rang rang gi bya ba gar byed kyang` gang skyes pa'i zla ba` shar` lho sa tha nub` b+ha` byang` ? da`
75b5(mdo 'grel): bra nye g.yas so a dang la gza'` g+ha da tsha lta bu` glang/ /dga' ba bzang po srang lhag pa dang te/ /sa ga g.yon te byi zhun mdun/ /de bzhin rgyu skar kun la sbyar/ /snar ma a'u dang tha skar g.yas/ /waM 'khrig o dang bu mo ra//
75b6(mdo 'grel): mche ba smin 6? ` dbyangs` khyim` chos` khyim` yi ga`? skar ma` skar ma mche bas kha jug go des 'dre'o/ /srog` sa ri g.yon te go zhun mdun/ /mgo yi g.yon nas ka yig dang//
75b7(mdo 'grel): karka seng ge pa nag dang/ /mdun du chu smad zhes bya ste/ /a dang le dang nam gru g.yas/ /bsod nams shar na zas med cing/ /sdig can bdag nyid rnam par nyams/ /lag gi g.yon na ha dang lI/ /Ta yig me bzhi g.yas su ?/ 
76a1(mdo 'grel): li tsa khrum smad mdun phyogs su/ /chu stong sdig can zas med cing/ /sngon bzhin srog mthar byed ba yin/ /nabs so'i g.yon du Ta ma sbo/ /g.yas su ka yig glang lug ta/ /khrum stod mdun du ? zhes bya
76a2(mdo 'grel): sdig pa 'dzom par ston pa yin/ /rgyal gyi g.yon du a'u dang gra/ g.yas su ha yig 'khrig pa o/ /nya dang sa yig mon gru dang/ /mdun du snron te mche bas btab/ /skag nas g.yon du mchu zhes dran/ /Ta dang ka rka dga' ba stong/ /
76a3(mdo 'grel): bum pa ga yig mon gre g.yas/ /lha mtshams mdun nas sdig pas gdung/ /mchu yis g.yas su skag bzung ste/ /g.yon nas ma yig seng ge dang/ /bzang po rgyal ba chu srin kha/ /byi zhun mdun du bra nye'o/ /sdig gnas btsam pa bdag
76a4(mdo 'grel): nyid gnas/ /gre yi g.yon nas Ta yig dang/ /bu mo aM yig gzhu dang dza/ /gro zhun g.yas su u dang rgyal/ /bdun du tha skar sdig can 'dzom/ /sbo yi g.yon du ba dang srang/ /sdig pa b+ha yig chu smad rnams/ /g.yas phyogs ma ? nas
76a5(mdo 'grel): so bzung/ /mdun du nam gru sdig pa'i gza'/ /ra e ya dang chu stong rnams/ /me bzhi'i g.yon du mche bas btab/ /Ta pAM ha dang lag rnams g.yas/ /khrum smad bdun du sdig pas gnod/ /nag par sdig pas gnod pa las//
76a6(mdo 'grel): ta na snrubs ni g.yon du ste/ /pa sangs seng ge karka Ta/ /ka dang mgo g.yas khrum stod mdun/ /g.yas g.yon mdun du gnas pa las/ /sdig can bdag nyid gnod par dran/ /sa rir sdig gnas g.yon du ri/ /snron na g.yas su de bzhin ra//
76a7(mdo 'grel): bu mo aau dang 'khrig pa ba/ /snar ma mdun du mon grum grags/ /sa gar sdig can lha mtshams g.yon/ /g.yas su ta yig srang bzang po/ /dga' ba glang dang a yig dang/ /smin drug mdun du mon gre dang/ /lha mtshams g.yas su gnas pa ni
76b1(mdo 'grel): sa ga g.yon nas na sdig pa/ /rgyal ba stong pa lug dang la/ /bra nye de bzhin mdun du skag /snron la ya yig gzhu a nya/ /tsa yig thad kar mche ba g.yon/ /g.yas su ri yig sa ri bzung/ /rgyal ni mdun du sdig pa'i bdag /snrubs nas b+ha yig
76b2(mdo 'grel): chu srin dang/ /bum pa da yig nam gru g.yon/ /nad nag ba g.yas su ste/ mdun du nabs so sdig can gnod/ /gang zhig chu stong sdig can gnas/ /ja i sha dang khrums smad g.yon/ /ya e ra dang me bzhi g.yas/ /mdun la lag ni
76b3(mdo 'grel): sdig can bdag/ gal te chu smad sdig can gnas/ /khag khrums stod g.yon pas 'dzin/ /b+ha yig sdig pa srang ba sbo/ /g.yas ste mdun du mgo la gnod/ /gro zhun la gnaS g.yas su dza/ /gzhu dang aM yig bu mo Ta/ /bre'o g.yon pas ri mig dang//

76b5(mdo 'grel): la stong dga' karka Ta/ /Ta skag g.yas so sa ga mdun/ /mon grur bdag nyid chen po gnas/ /sa dang nya khyim o 'khrig pa/ /ha rgyal g.yon zung g.yas su ri/ /gro zhun bdun du sa rir dran/ /gnod pa khrum stod la gnas ste/ ga kha chu smad
76b6(mdo 'grel): g.yas su 'dzom/ /g.yon du da yig lug glang ka/ nabs so'i mdun du nag pa bcom/ /khrums smad sdig can gal te 'ongs/ /tsa li wa lag g.yon bas 'jin/ /sha e dza dang chu stod g.yas/ /mdun du ma bzhi rnam par 'joms/ /nam grul
76b7(mdo 'grel): g.yas su da yig dang/ bum ba chu srin b+ha yig snrubs/ /g.yon du la a rgyu skar mgo /mdun du spo zhes bcom par dran/ /tha skar g.yon du u yig dang/ /snar ma g.yas su tsa yin gsum/ /a(mdo 'grel): dang gzhu dang ya dang snron/ /
77a1(mdo 'grel): mdun du bre ni rnam par nyams/ /bra nye'i g.yon du smin drug ste/ /g.yas su la yig lug stong pa/ /rgyal ba sdig pa na yig dang/ /lha mtshams mdun du mchu zhes grigs/ /rang gnas skar ?
77a2(mdo 'grel): rkang pa 4 4 yod pa de'i brangs yin` dang po skyes pa ste/ /rang gi skyes skar ma shes na mang skar la bya nyan las la'ang rtsi gsung yul gyi ming yig dang po mche ba zug ma zug lta/ de bzhin bcu bar skyes skar nas grangs ba'i las zhes brjod/ /zhes ba'i skar ma
77a3(mdo 'grel): skyes skar 'am ming skar nas grangs pa'i bcu las 16 ba rnams dgyes/ des kun la 'dre'o/ /de rnams sdig gza' gang yod kyang ngan no/ /de nas rkang pa bcu drug par/ /rnam par 'gengs pa zhes byar dran/ /rkang ba'i de nas drangs ba'i grangs ni bco brgyad par

77b1(mdo 'grel): nad 'byung zhing/ /nor zad ku cho dgra dang brtsod/ /las mche nas grogs dang 'thab/ /bzo byas sla med las mi 'grub/ /rnam 'gengs gnyen bshes pho mo dbye/ /gal te rgya can mche bas btag /bsam ba'i don rnams 'grub

78b7(mdo 'grel): pa 'chi ba'i dus/ 4 cha 1 dang/ byed dang 2 3 dang bzhi rnams zhag la sbyor 14 12 10 dang 6 dang ? rnams lo nyid de/ thad ka'i stongs 'gyur phyi ma la gnas gong ma rlung rgyu 'og ma 'chi 4 na bzang ma` nyi khyim 'pho ba zhes bya ba// kun nyi
79a1(mdo 'grel): khyim 'gro ba nas mgo bzung ` g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lam nas ni/ /rgyu pa'i mtshan nyid rig par bya/ /'di la dge dang mi dge brtag /nag po'i tshes gcig nas bzung ste/ /nyin zhag gsum du 'pho gcig la

79a3(mdo 'grel): g.yo na ` gcig nas rtsam ste/ g.yas` /nyin zhag gsum du snga dro ni/ /nyi ma'i bgrod pas rgyu ba ste/ /de bzhin chos ni bco lnga'i bar/ /dus sbyor gcig la rgyu bar 'gyur/ /dus sbyor re re rgyu ba las/ /rtsam ste 16 `
79a4(mdo 'grel): phyin phyi log tu nges par 'gyur/ /rtsod pa la sogs nges 'gyur bas/ /nyin g.yas` zhag lngar ni log par rgyu/ no ltod? rtsod pa la dbugs stong brgyad brgya` sogs 'byung bar 'gyur stong brgyad brgya/ /zla ba go log nas`
79a5(mdo 'grel): ` go lag te g.yas rgyu ba'i rgyu las g.yo nas/ /ri mi gnang ma'i 2 po la lnga dang o la 14 la 25 la 26 6 la 27 7 la 28 brgyad la 2 9 9 la 30 10 31 11 31 dbus kyi lta ba la byed du bgos pa'i zhag 3 3 bgod 'go mal zhag 'din 'chi rgod/ phyed kyi nad 'byung zhing/ zla ba
79a6(mdo 'grel): gcig gis gnyen rnams brlag /go log zla phyed gsum gyi 'chi bar 'gyur/ go ? de ltlr shes bya mdzes ma gye/ /zhag gcig nas ni bzhi bar/ /bcu nas bzhi yi bar gyi lo/ /` g.yon g.yas gang rung du yang mi 'pho ba nyi ma 4 cha 1 rgyu
79a7(mdo 'grel): na lo 14 nas nyi phyed kyi lo 12 na zhag 1 ga la 10 na zhag gnyis kyi lo brgyad na/ zhag 3 gyi lo na zhag 4 rgyus na lo bzhi na 'chi ste/ de ni byi'i rims re mig 12 du byas la phyogs 1 gi re mig drug la nyin 4 cha nas mgo bzung ba'i rlung ji ltar rgyu ba'i 4 cha nyin byed zhag 1 zhag 2 zhag 3 zhag 4 zhag 5
