84a5(mdo 'grel): rig byed rnams dang 'phrad/ /phur pas chos dang sbyor bar byed/ /pa sangs bdag pos mchod par 'gyur/ /ke dus cung zad mi dge byed/ /mda''phen rkang pa 'gro 'am rnams/ /gong gi byas bshad ston` gza' yi bsgyur la
84a6(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo yis/ /thob pa'i grangs kyi lam rnams su/ /dge dang mi dge byed par 'gyur/ /lam rang khyim du gnas na sdig gza' yang snod pa mi phyed gsung gyi 'khor lo 'di byed gang/ /`gza' yi sgyur la 'khor lo bgos ma thob mda' phen 60 sgyur la
84a7(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo thob pa mda' phen?/ rtsa rgyud la gnas gza' yi mig dmar yod na 3 spen pa yod na bdun gzhan yang snar ma ? sgyur mda' yon zlas thob 'das khyim yin 30 sgyur chu srang 2 kyis bgos thob zhuD dbugs kyi bar du thob sbyor// lam zhugs rnams la phan byed yin/ /nyi zla mig
84b1(mdo 'grel): dmar gza' lhag phur/ /pa sangs spen pa rA tu dang/ /ke tu'i grangs kyis rim pa bzhin/ /'gro lam la sogs bsgyur bar bya// //gnyis pa dmar po'i tsa kra ri dags brtags pa ni/ /zla ba'i tshe skar ma/ dang ni ri dags
84b2(mdo 'grel): rngon pa'i gong du byung` mi'i ming gi skar ma gnyis kyi bar du sdig pa ste drag gza' rnams kyi 'khyud pa'i grangs su yod pa de dang mnyam ba'i srog chags rigs rnams zin par bshad de ri dags kyi kha dog sdig can gyi gza' nyi ma dmar skya
84b3(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa'i kha dog rigs ji bzhin no zhes rang la 'dri byed la bshad par bya'o/ /ri dags rngon pa de dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi grangs yin zhing sa tshad de las che ba min zhing rkang pa gcig la tsakra 'di chung ba yin pas de lta'i sa cha
84b4(mdo 'grel): gang la gnas pa yang/ /lto 'gro sbrul gyi gzugs gcig byas la de nyid kyis 'khor bar dgod cing/ dmar po gnas pa'i skar ma ni lto 'gro'i khal bri bar bya'o/ /kha nas mjug ma'i bar du rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dgod par bya ste/ lung
84b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i g.yas sprul de'i mgo bo yin zhing/ /g.yon mjug ma yin no lhas mchod ma/ rA hu mjug ma la gnas shing/ /rked par nyi ma gnas gyur na/ /de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /rngon pa la de ba gcig las med kyang des thams cad
84b6(mdo 'grel): gsod/ rked pa na spen pa yod na de'i nang na sems can ri dags gcig kyang med pas dpa' bo zlog par bya ba yin no/ /phur bu mjug ma la gnas shing/ /lhag ba rked pa la gnas na ri dags la rmas rma stong byung yang gcig mi thub pas
84b7(mdo 'grel): de la skor yang re? thag chad pas mi skor/ /phur bu dal 'gros byed pa mgo bo la yod na gzhan gyis gsod mi 'jug pa'i stobs kyis ri dags gsod pa'i dbang dang bral lo/ /dkar po mgo bor gnas cing dal 'gros byed na bud med kyi sgyu byas
85a1(mdo 'grel): te myur du sha khrag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lhag ba dal 'gros mjug mar gnas/ /pa sangs rked par gnas gyur na/ /ri dags zung du gsod 'gyur te/ /rngon pa la ni rmas rma 'byung/ /spen pa mjug na gnas shing zla ba
85a2(mdo 'grel): rked na gnas na nyin bar med kyang mtshan mo gsod do/ /mi la sogs te grogs po'i mthar thug pa'i sems can so so'i ming skar la/ nyi ma yod na rmas te 'gro /zla ba yod na srog dang 'bral/ /mig dmar khrag 'bab de nas 'chi/ /
85a3(mdo 'grel): lhag pa yod na gsod mi 'gyur/ /phur bus dred sdangs byung ba dag kyang gzhan gyis skyob/ pa sangs skyes pas ji ltar gsod te mi gsod cing/ sben pa yod na ri dags rnyed mi 'gyur/ /rA hu yod na myur du gsod/ /dus me
85a4(mdo 'grel): yod na ma bsad kyang/ nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /mgo bo rked ba mjug ma gsum la gnas pa ni nus pa 'byung ba gsum zhes bya'o/ /dpa' bo rngon ba la chas pa'i tshe nyi ma rgyab tu bzhag la mig dmar g.yas dang
85a5(mdo 'grel): zla ba mdun du byas la 'gro zhing thun phyed sgra gcan ngag dang sdongs pa na mtshon rnon po la dar gyis brgyan pa dang 'dra'o/ /rngon ba'i ming skar sbyang ki ri dags lug yin na de ma thag gsod ngo/ /bzlog ba min zhing sems can gyi ming la
85a6(mdo 'grel): zhi gza' gnas na de gsod cing sems can gyi ming la dus me gnas na de 'chor la/ skar ma mon grur zla ba gnas na de che de na ri dags sha ba kho na gnas te/ de bzhin du kun la shes par bya'o/ /tsakra 'di med na rngon pas re
85a7(mdo 'grel): dags ji ltar shor la/ g.yul du 'jug pa la yang tsakra 'dis rgyal bar byed pa yin/ de ltar rngon pa'i 'khor lo zhes pa 'di gzhan du ma bshad do kye ri sras mo zhes pa'o/ /rngon ba'i 'khor lo bstan nas kyang/ /rgyan gyi 'khor lo
85b1(mdo 'grel): btsun mo nyon/ rgyan gyi 'khor lo 'di yi las/ 'gro nyin gyi nyin skar 60 sgyur la/ chu tshod steng bzhug mda' yon gyis thob pa 'das khyim lhag ma la 30 sgyur la chu srang ni 2 kyi bgos thob bzhugs par bya/ de la mda' yon zlas thob pa zhag ga cha shas shes byas te/ de la 1 nas 1 rang?
85b2(mdo 'grel): du byung ? yang/ khyim nas 'gro phyogs na mar sgrang/ 16 nas 30 bar du byung na 'gro sa na yar khyim gyi phyogs su sgrang ba ni/ /gza' yi sgyur la 'khor lo thob pa yis grangs yin/ lam zhugs 'khor lo yi man dag/ /? g.yul shom shags 'gyed 'thab rtsod la/ /zheng du re kha bcu gnyis pa/ /
85b3(mdo 'grel): ri mig lnga pa yi steng du grangs yig dang rgyu skar la sogs pa bkod la logs su dbyangs dang gsal byed rim pas bkod la/ de la ming mig gang na 'dug pa'i grang yig 'bras bu'i steng na yod pa thams cad slangs la/ logs 1 du sre de las brgyad kyis bgos pa'i lhag ma rgyal mtshan logs pa 'og
85b4(mdo 'grel): na mar byung ba bzhin du shes par bya'o// de bzhin mchu ru drug pa dri/ /de 'og a li ka li yang/ /yid 14 dang rgyu 27 skar mig nyi ma 12/ /tshes 12 dang drug dang rgya mtsho 4 me 3/ /de bzhin bcu 12 bdun brgyad dang bug 9 /re mig rnams la rim
85b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin bri/ /de 'og a'o li kA li yang/ /a li 1 1 po grang yi ge mgor re mig 11 'god de nas lhag ma re mig 33 yod pa la/ ka 'thob drangs nas rtsi bar bgod bar bya ste/ 34 spangs par shes par bya'o// rim par mnyam par bri bar bya/ /ri r/i li lI a rnams sdang/ /
85b6(mdo 'grel): k+Sha ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /'di yi re mig yang dag pa/ /lnga bcu rtsa ldar yongs su grags/ /de nas ming gi yi ge'i grangs/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed ji snyed pa/ /legs par brtag la rang rang gi/ steng gi gang 'dug las la` grang
85b7(mdo 'grel): sa sor la sre` kyis bsgyur bar bya/ /nor gyis bgos te khyer ba yis/ /1 byung rgyal mtshan 2 byung du ba 3 byung seng+ge 'dre/ lhag mas 1 nas grangs ba'i` rgyal mtshan la 1 ni` sogs 'char/ /lhag ma med na` de bzhin dbyangs dang gsal yi ge yi
86a1(mdo 'grel): byed ni/ /'di ltar rjes su grags pa rnams/ /rgyal mtshan du ba seng? ge khyi/ /khyu mtshod bung bu glang po che/ /bya rog dang ni brgyad du grags/ /'di rnams stobs kyi bye brag ni/ /bya rog gnyis 'gyur khyi
86a2(mdo 'grel): la brjod/ /khyi yi nyes 'gyur bung bus ste/ /rgyal mchan nas du ba ngos su skor ba yin sto bskol lugs su man ta go` bung bu'i nyis 'gyur lhag ma tu na` khyu mchog dran/ /khyu mchog nyis 'gyur glang po che/ /glang po'i nyis 'gyur
86a3(mdo 'grel): seng ge la/ /de bzhin du khyim` seng ge'i nyis 'gyur rgyal mtshan la/ /rgyal mtshan nyis 'gyur du ba la'o/ /de ltar stobs kyi bye brag shes/ /brgyad kyi cha yis thob pa yi/ /lhag ma yongs su gsal ba ste//
86a4(mdo 'grel): gcig sogs lhag mar gyur pa'i grangs/ /rgyal mtshan la sogs bdun rim bzhin/ /rgyan gyi 'khor lo stobs bstan pa'o/ /de ltar brjod bya dbang mo che/ 2 /de nas ming gi yi ge sogs/ /brtag pa gzhan yang bshad
86a5(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /rgyal dang 'pham pa yongs su shes pas/ /dbyangs 'char rgyud las bshad shags dang gros logs pa 'dran pa'o` pa nyon/ /rang dang rang gi dgra bo yi/ /ming gi gsal byed rtogs pa dang/ /ming gi dbyangs
86a6(mdo 'grel): ni nges byas la/ /gsal byed bzhi yis bsgyur bya ste/ /dbyangs ni gnyis kyis bsgyur byas la/ /gcig tu bsdoms par byas nas kyang/ /rang gi ming gi` dgra'i ming/ mdun gyi cha yis bgo bar bya/ /de yi lhag mar
86a7(mdo 'grel): gang 'gyur ba/ /gnyis ka mnyam na rang dang pra'i 'dum pa ste/ /mi mnyam ma nor ba` de dag` rang gi dbyangs dang gsal byed 1 du sdom dgra'i yang 'de` stongs la bltas bas shes rtag ma gang la stobs che yang rgyal zer` ming gi? yi ge
86b1(mdo 'grel): ji snyed pa/ /gcig gis gcig la dbri bar bya/ /lhag ma gang yod rgyal ba ste/ /ma ldangs pa ni 'pham par 'gyur/ /lhag med mnyam pa 'dum par byed/ /de ltar shes bya dkal bzlog ma//
86b2(mdo 'grel): 2 kyis go` /dgra bshed logs kyi` /ming gi dbyangs tshig phri bas` dang gsal dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi grangs du yod pa ltos la gnas 2 su bzhag pa 1` byed rnams/ /so sor 'bras bu'i grangs` phye la legs
86b3(mdo 'grel): par brtag /zung gis 'pham par shes par bya/ /kha yang pas ni rgyal ba ston/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed ji snyed pa/ /so sor mnyam na 'dum par ston/ /lha mo de ltar ? yang` khor lo mchog /so sor shes par bya zhes
86b4(mdo 'grel): grags/ /de nas 1 logs kha yar la rgyal la zud 'pham mo` shin tu gsang pa yi/ /rma rtags 'khor lo bshad rang gzhan gyi` bar bya/ /skyes bu'i gzugs kyi 'khor lo la/ /rgyu skar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid
86b5(mdo 'grel): can/ /lus kyi cha shas gang du rma/ /'byung zhing ji tsam 'byung ba zhes/ /nyi ma gnas pa'i rgyu skar nas/ /bye brag bye la rim bzhin dbri/ /mgo bo gsum la kha la gsum/ snying gar lnga ste lag par brgyad/ /rkang pa dang
86b6(mdo 'grel): la brgyad yin te/ /dang po g.yas de nas rems bgod` byung dang 'byung na` 'thab dus kyi` skyes skar ` 2 lta gsung` mi gzung la` de ltar gzugs la bgod par bya/ /'dis bla skang des de nas tal dkal la lug khyim du gzhan 'thong brto
86b7(mdo 'grel): rtso dus kyi tad kal lus la bkod pa'i skar ma gang la yod lta/ de la rma byung na ma nges pas/ /da nyin skar ma 60? bsgyur de la chu tshod sre? mda' yon gyis ba'o lhag sum cu bsgyur la chu srang 2 kyis thob pa zhugs/ mda' yon gyi thob ? 'dug ltas la g.yas g.yon gang la zla ba gnas pa'i 'dum phyed 30 byas ?
87a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ mda' yon gyis tha'o pa sgyur ro de'i char/ sa la rma byung nges/ rang gi skar ma'i dus sbyor la/ /mthon ser sdig can gang yod pa/ /rma byung che chung mthong dang stobs/ /bdun par the tshom med par 'gyur//
87a2(mdo 'grel): zla ba lnga bsdus kyi` gnas pa'i don de nyid kyi skar ma la zer ba yin te ne ni` cha shas la/ /skyes pa'i su spyi cha shas gang du rma` gnas grangs pa'i rgyas na` ngos 'dzin` rang khyim min pa na lus bo'i`? par ston` bzhi cha dang rgyas ba` mthong` rma rnams 'byung bar shes par bya
87a3(mdo 'grel): ` dum bu ca mkha' stong mig gis bgos pa de yin yang/ /gsung gang yin lta bar bya'o/ /gzhan yan skar ma 60? bsgyur 'og gi chu tshod steng du bzhugs mda' yon gyi thob/ 'das khyim yin/ lhag ma 30 sgyur la chu srang 2 kyi bshos thob zhugs/ 'da' yon gyi thob zhag gam cha shas zhes bya te rnyed pa ? man chad
87a4(mdo 'grel): g.yas phyogs la char 15 byas te lus kyi cha gang na zla ba gnas pa'i gnas la nim nga bzhin sbyar 16 nas 30 bar la g.yon la de ltar sbyar ro/ /den 1 byung na spyi nas cha 1 gzhal ba'i sar ro/ /rma rnams che chung blta ba ni/ /dgu cha'i dum bur blta bar bya/ /de yi
87a5(mdo 'grel): grangs kyis sor gyis bcal/ /sdi can gnas par rma 'byung bshad/ /nyi mas mthong na rma log 'gyur/ /rA hu sa mthong na rma gzer thebs/ /spen/ zhing du` tad kal` rnyed pa 3 byung na sor gsum logs pa'i
87a6(mdo 'grel): mkha' stong mig gis thob pas` mthong sar` bas mthong de'i 'ang` na skyes bu yis/ /rma la khrag ni med par 'gyur/ zug /mig dmar mthod na khrag mang 'byung/ /gal te 'chi bar gyur pa'ang
87a7(mdo 'grel): srid/ /gzar yi ' khor lo gnas pa las/ /sdig can gnas par shes par byed/ /phyi rol du zhi drag gnyis mthong sa'i khyim du 'tshogs nas mdung chen ste ngan gsung` de ltar pa den pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /so sor bye brag phyed par bya//
87b1(mdo 'grel): 'di yi nyi me mgor bstan pas/ /rma 'byung drang srong gis shes 'gyur/ /de nas mdor bsdus mnyam par ni/ /tri shu la yi 'khor lo bshad/ /gang zhig shes par g.yul 'phyed tshe/ /rtsod pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /tri shul ni
87b2(mdo 'grel): gsum yin te/ /rim pa bzhin du skar ma bgod/ /nyi mas` par` rtse nas bzung ste 'bri bar bya/ /nyi mas nyi mas 'khyud pa'i skar ma de` 'khyud pa'i skar ma de/ /rtse mo nas bzung bra bar bya/ /` g.yas phyogs la nya bris la de nas tre shul
87b3(mdo 'grel): g.yon phyogs kyi yul rbyab? ma la 3 bri de nas de'i nang na mar la 3 bri de nas dbus ma'i g.yon phyogs /bsu bris nyid kyi g.yas phyogs mar gsum bri de nas tri shul g.yas pa'i nad na mar la 3 bri de nas dbus ma dang g.yon pa'i tri shu 2 po rtse drug la rim bzhin du ? bri'o/ /rtse mo nas mar la nang du 'jug pa zhes
87b4(mdo 'grel): bya ste/ de la sdig can gnas na rang dang nad mi la ngan/ rtsa ba nas sar bri ba ni /phyi rol thob pa zhes pa ste de la sdig pa gnas na phyi mi lang no/ nyi mas 'khyud pa'i skar ma de/ /mgo bzung rtse mor skar ma gsum/ /tri shu la yi yu ba la/ /rgyu skar drug ni rim
87b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin bri/ /de nyid phyi rol thon pa yi/ /mdung rtse gsum la rgyu skar gsum/ /tri shul yi yu ba la/ /rim pa gsum gsum rtseg mar g.yas pa'i rtse ma g.yon pa nas cams te /de'i rtse mo la 3 bri de'i yu ba'i` dbus mo yang` bri/ /de nas
87b6(mdo 'grel): stad du brtsegs pa yis/ /dbus ma'i rtse mo yu bar yang/ /g.yas pa'i rtse mor gsum yin te/ /mdor na rtse mo rnams la dgu /yu bar gsum gsum rtseg mar bri/ /dbus ma 'khrug pa'i ti shu la/ /g.yas pa nang du
87b7(mdo 'grel): 'jug par byed/ /g.yon pa phyi rol thon pa ste/ /dbyangs 'char rgyud las de ltar mthong/ /zla ba gang la gnas pa g.yon 'khrug pa chung` brtag /pas g.yas rtses 'khrug pa med rtse mo mar bri ba ni nang du 'jug pa yin te/ de sdig can gnas na nang mi la dang/ /rtsa nga?
88a1(mdo 'grel): nas yar bri ba ni phyi rol than pa zhes bya ste /de sdig can gnas na phyi mi la ngan pa zhes bya ste` rang gi skar ma gang na gnas/ /rang gis brtags la shes par bya/ /gdug pa'i gza' rnams gang yod ngan/ /phyir thon pa la phyir
88a2(mdo 'grel): bzlog 'gyur/ /nad 'jugs skar ma ngan du chad/ /dbu ma 'khrug par gyur pa ste/ /skyes skar ming skar` 'og ma gnyis la rtsod pa chung/ /bar ma gnyis la 'bring por gyur/ /steng mas mnyam la 'thab rtsod che/ /rtse mo gsum
88a3(mdo 'grel): la shin tu che/ /mdung ni dbus mar gang yod 'pham/ /rang dang dgra yi skar ma dang/ /'di la srung ba shin tu gces/ /dbus kyi skar ma'i` g.yas dang g.yon gyi tri shu la/ /nang 'jug phyi rol thon pa las/ /rtsod pa che 'bring gong
88a4(mdo 'grel): ma bzhin/ /dbyangs 'char rgyud la bshad pa yin/ /skyes sgar`? 'di ltar rang gi rgyu skar las/ /sdig can mi dge zhi ba dge /tri shu la gsum zhabs bsdus dgod/ /nyi ma gnas pa'i skar ma ni/ /tri shu bar pa'i rtse mo nas//
88a5(mdo 'grel): rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya/ /tri shu la yi rtse mo la/ /rgyu skar skyes skar ram ming` gsum gsum bri bar bya/ /yu ba'i thad gzhan yang` ka'i bar rnams su/ /rgyu skar drug drug bri bar bya/ /mdor na bar g.yon de nas g.yas su`
88a6(mdo 'grel): dang rtse mo la/ /rgyu skar dgu dang bco brgyad dran/ /tri shu la ni gsum po la/ rgyu skar rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /ming gi skar mar nyi ma song/ /de la nad rnams 'byung bar grags/ /dbu ma gsum la nor nyams byed//
88a7(mdo 'grel): nyi ma med pa'i rtse mo la/ /'thab rtsod 'byung bar bstan pa yin/ /mdor na rtsa mo'i rgyu skar gyis/ /sa dang rtse mo la song na gnyan no` nyi ? ma 'jam na` de na nyams phyugs rnams brlag ba dang/ rtse mo` ming ltar la so? dun?/
88b1(mdo 'grel): gnyen shes rnams ni myur du nyams/ /yul gzhan 'pho zhing rgyal pos 'jigs/ /dbus kyi drug gis bde bar byed/ /bcu gnyis kyis ni phun sum tshogs/ /bu rnams thob cing dga' bskyed dang/ /skal bzang bde ba skyed par
88b2(mdo 'grel): mthong/ /g.yul gyi dus su legs par gnas/ /rtse mor gal te zla ba song/ /nad dang sdug bsngal la sogs 'byung/ /tri shu ba yon` la'i 'khor lo ni/ g.yas g.yon gyi /de ltar lha mo khyod la bshad/ /nyi mas 'khyud pa'i skar ma
88b3(mdo 'grel): de/ /mgo bo nas brtsams rim g.yul lam gal te 'gro 'dug gi dus su` na ba thams cad ngan` bzhin bri/ g.yas su bskor ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /mgo yi mthar thug bri bar bya/ /mgo bor dgu la sna bar gnyis yang` sa/ /lag pa
88b4(mdo 'grel): dag la drug yin te/ /rgyab tu brgyad du bstan pa yin/ /rkang pa dag la gnyis yin te/ /de la rang gi skar ma ni/ /mgo dang rkang bar 'chi bas te/ /lag pa dag la rnam par rgyal/ thug ba/ /rgya ba ni rgyal 'pham med par 'thab/ /rna ba
88b5(mdo 'grel): dag la rnam par nyams/ /zla pa'i skar ma de bzhin no/ /g.yul la song na du rgyal dang 'pham ming skar` pa yi/ /nyi ma'i 'khor lo gangs ri'i bdag /ming gi rgyu skar 'khor lo ni/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis kyang//
88b6(mdo 'grel): 'khrug pa gnyen dang las rnams kun/ /byed dang 'dir rtogs dka' bzlog ma/ /rim pa gnyis dang ldan pa la/ /re mig bcu bzhi mnyam par bgod/ /sbyang khu ni le byi la brtsal la` stag/ /khri brnyan ma ha seng ge
88b7(mdo 'grel): rdzong? ma yin pa ru sbel? ba la rtsi` /re mig steng gi rim pas bri/ /lug sgrul byi ba khyu mchog dang/ /spre'u rta dang glang po che/ /'og tu thad grangs rnams la 'god/ /lug ni smin drug rgyal yin te/ /de bzhin sbrul ni snar
89a1(mdo 'grel): ma mgo /byi ba spo dang mon gre brjod/ /khyu mchog mchu dang chu stod yin/ /spre'u gro zhun chu smad dran/ /rta ni tha kar mon bru'o/ /glang po bra nye nam gyur brjod/ /de nas sbyang gu lag dang snubs//
89a2(mdo 'grel): byi zhun khrums stong ne'u le/ byi la de bzhin nabs so skag /stag ni nag pa sa gar brjod/ /khri brnyan snron dang lha mtshams bshad/ /ma he me bzhi sa rir grags/ /seng ge khrums smad gre yin te/ /'og
89a3(mdo 'grel): dang gong gi ri mig la/ /lug sogs sbyang sogs rim pa bzhin bgod/ /de ltar rta dang ma he dgra /glang dang stag kyang mi mthun te/ /sbrul dang ne'u le 'dza' ba med/ /lha mo glang chen seng ge dgra /lug dang sbyan ki mthun
89a4(mdo 'grel): pa med/ /mjos ma byi ba byi la yang/ /de bzhin sbre'u khri brnyan dran/ /g.yu du shes bya lha mchod ma/ /ji ltar ming gi skar ma ni/ /mchu dang chu stod khyu mchog ming/ /seng ge'i ming la khrum smad gra /de ltar thams
89a5(mdo 'grel): cad shes par bya/ /rang gi rigs ni shes pa las/ /stobs kyi che chung shes par 'gyur/ /ming gi skar ma mi shes par/ /mdzes dga' g.yul sogs ji ltar byed/ /rgyal dang tha skar nabs so mgo /nam gru
89a6(mdo 'grel): lha rnams sa ra dang/ /gro zhun me bzhir bcas pa rnams/ /lha yi rigs su shes par bya/ /steng ma rnams stobs che` rkang pa brgya ba'i tsakra mi` chu stong khrums stong khrums smad gre/ /spo dang skyes skar mi shes na ming skad`
89a7(mdo 'grel): chu smad bra nye lag /snar ma'i ming gi bye brag rnams/ /mi yi rigs yin bzhin bzang ma/ mchu dang nag pa smin drug dang/ /mon gre mon grum sa ga dang/ /snubs skabs snron dang bcas pa rnams/ /srin bo las ni
89b1(mdo 'grel): grub pa yin/ /rang gi rigs rnams mnyam par mthun/ /lha dang mi ni 'bring pos te/ /lha dang srin po de bzhin no/ mi thun pas mi dang srin po lhan cig 'chi/ /gal te chung ma srin mor 'gyur/ /khyo ni mi yi rigs las skyes/ /de tshe?
89b2(mdo 'grel): khyo ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /shin tu rgyang ring 'dug par bya/ /mi 'dza' lhan cig 'chi ba ste/ /rang gi rigs mthun pa de bar byed/ /gal te lha'i rigs yin na/ /mi dang srin po kun las rgyal/ /mi dang srim po lhan cig ba//
89b3(mdo 'grel): me dang chu bzhin 'gal bar 'gyur/ /de ltar khyo shug la sogs nga/ /rigs kyis 'kho lo bstan pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /ming gi mtshan nyid shes par
89b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /the tshom med par bshad kyis nyon/ /tha slo dpon dang grogs po rje khol la yang sbyar` skar mge dang rgyal dang ni/ /me bzhi lha mtshams go zhun dang/ /nabs so ming skar mar skyes na bzang` sa ga lhan cig pa//
89b5(mdo 'grel): de yi mig ni dge bas te/ /bsam pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang/ /dro lam rgya yi yul yang mthod/ /lag pa 'dri byed kyi skyes skar ming skar lta` snubs dang mon gre dang/ /sa ri gre dang chu stod dang/ /khrums stong mig ni long ba dang//
89b6(mdo 'grel): don dang las kun 'grub pa med/ /mchu dang nag pa snro na zhes bya/ /snar ma sbo dang chu smad dang/ /khrums smad rnams la 'dri byed kyi/ /mig ni shal lam yo bar 'gyur/ /bra nye smen drug de bzhin skag /mon gru sa ga
89b7(mdo 'grel): bye zhun dang/ /nam gru gang yod mig dmar zhing/ /tshag por 'gyur zhing dge ba med/ /don la rnyed pa rab 'byor byed/ /yid la 'dod pa rnam par spangs/ /de nas sde brgyad 'khor lo mchog /gang gis shes pa'i ming
90a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis/ /stobs dang gnyen po bye brag rnams/ /bshad kyi lha yi bdag po nyon/ /a yi sde tshan lha yin te/ /ka ste lham yin du brjod/ /tsa sde gang gnas klu zhes brjod/ /Ta yi sde chan dri dang? grags//
90a2(mdo 'grel): ta sder gnas pa snod sbyin dran/ /de bzhin pa sde srin por smra/ /ya yi sde tshan sha za ste/ /sha yi sde tshan mi g.yas nas skor` ming la thog ma a yod pa lta bu des 'dre` zhes grags/ /'di ltar lha min stobs zhig ste/ klu la de yis
90a3(mdo 'grel): nyis 'gyur bshad/ /de yi nyis 'gyur dri za ste/ /de yi nyis 'gyur snod sbyin no/ /de yi nyis 'gyur srin pos te/ /srin po'i nyis 'gyur sha za dang/ /sha za'i 'gyur gyis lha la brtag /lha las med` yi nyis 'gyur
90a4(mdo 'grel): mi shes grags/ /de ltar phan chun nye ring du/ /grangs ni gang mang stobs cher 'gyur/ /phyogs mtshams thad kar mi mdza' ste/ /stobs chen rnams kyi chung ba gsod/ /g.yul gyi dus su bstan pa yin/ /'khor lo'i
90a5(mdo 'grel): stobs ni nges par mthong/ /ming gi dang po gsal byed la/ /rnam par spyod par yongs su grags/ /de ltar stobs kyi bye brag ni/ /tshangs pas rgyud nas bshad pa yin/ /g.yul gyi dus su 'khor lo 'di/ /stobs kyi
90a6(mdo 'grel): cha yi rgyal 'pham ston/ /sde tshan ji ltar gnas pa dang/ /stobs bskyed pa yi rim pa ni/ /dbang med gshin rje'i bden bral dang/ /chu lhag nod sbyin dbang ldan dang/ /go rim bzhin du gnas pa ste/ /'di rnams stobs
90a7(mdo 'grel): la khyad par gnas/ /dbyangs la sbyar ba'i` stobs chen rnam phyogs 'tshams thams cad thad ka bgrod du shar du 'gro` par rgyal 'gyur te/ chung ba 'pham par 'gyur ba yin/ /rang rang pha rol phyogs kyi stobs/ /srog chags rnams
90b1(mdo 'grel): kyi lus kyis gsal/ /a sde 'di ltar bya khyud ste/ /ka si sde tshan byi lar grags/ /tsa yi sde tshan seng ger grags/ /Ta sde sbyang kyi shes par bya/ /ha yi sde chan sbal? du gsal/ /pa sde byi lar yongs su grags/ /sa yi sde tshan glang po
90b2(mdo 'grel): che/ /sha sde lug du yongs su brjod/ /de nas 'dab chags 'khor lo mchog/ gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /dus kyi stobs kyi 'dod don kun/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar phyogs mtshams brgyad po la/ /shar nas
90b3(mdo 'grel): brtsams de legs par sa ya srog/ dgong/ /shar phyogs bdag po nyi ma ste/ /mig dmar me yi phyogs na gnas/ /gshin rje phur bu la has mchod ma/ /gza' lhag bden bral phyogs na gnas/ /pa sangs chu bdag phyogs zhes
90b4(mdo 'grel): dran/ /rlung phyogs bdag po spen par grags/ /zla ba nor gyi bdag po'i phyogs/ /sgra gcan dbang ldan spyod yul lo/ /bya rgod ra dang gong ma sreg /de bzhin ne tso khrung khrung dang/ /rma bya 'ug pa srin bya ste/ /'dab chags
90b5(mdo 'grel): brgyad du yongs su grags/ /'di ltar rim bzhin a sde dang/ /ka sde tsa sde de bzhin de/ /res gza' gang byung yang sgra gcan stong la yong` Ta sde ta yi sde zhes bya/ /ya yi sde tshan rnams dang ni/ /pa yi sde tshan bcas pa dang/ /sha yi sde
90b6(mdo 'grel): tshan chang bar ni/ /ri mig brgyad la legs par bgod/ /sde tshan brgyad po rang rang gi /dus kyi stobs ni 'dis shes 'gyur/ /bya rgod dang ni khra hor pa/ /nyin mo lhag ma stobs cher 'gyur/ /rma bya dang ni khrung khrung dag /tho
90b7(mdo 'grel): rangs dus tshe stobs su 'gyur/ /srin bya dang ni gong ma sreg /nye ma'i gung la stobs cher 'gyur/ /ne tso? dang ni 'ug pa dag/ mtshan mo'i dus la stobs cher 'gyur/ /'ug pa dang ni ne tso dag/ dgun zla gsum la stobs cher 
91a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rma bya khrung khrung zhes bya ba/ /dpyid zla gsum la stobs cher grags/ /gong ma sreg ces bya ba yang/ /dbyad zla gsum la bde legs byed/ /bya rgod dang ni srin bya dag/ zla ba kun pa stobs
91a2(mdo 'grel): cher brjod/ /gcig dang dgu la bya rgod stobs/ /gnyis dang bcu la de bzhin khra/ /gsum pa dang ni bcu gcig la/ /gong ma sregs kyang stobs cher byed/ /de bzhin bzhi dang bcu gnyis la /ne tso stobs ni 'byung bar gsal
91a3(mdo 'grel): khrung khrung zhes byar grags pa ni/ /lnga dang bcu gsum tshes la dran/ /drug dang bcu bzhi'i tshes grangs la/ /rma bya'i stobs ni che ba yin/ /bdun pa dang ni bco lnga la/ /'dab chags 'ug pa stobs skyed 'gyur/ /brgyad pa srin
91a4(mdo 'grel): bya stebs 'phel grags/ /bla ma brgyud pa'i rim gyis so/ /de ltar dus kyi stobs bshad pa/ /lha mo 'dri ba rnams la brjed/ /dbang por bya rgod nyi ma'i res/ /a yi ming can stobs cher 'gyur/ /de ltar gza' dang sde tshan
91a5(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /phyogs rnams kun la shes par bya/ /nyin mtshan cha dang chos grangs rnams/ /zla ba bye brag shes par bya/ /ras kyi gza' la nyi ma byung na a'i sde tshan gyi ming can shar phyogs su 'greb bzang de ltar phyogs kun la sbyar ? sde brgyad tsakra dang sbyar ro//
91a6(mdo 'grel): de ltar ming gi sde tshan las/ /stobs kyi bye brag shes par bya/ /gang gi rigs yin bye brag phyed/ /de la stobs dang stobs ming shes/ /ne tso la ni stobs gcig ste/ /hor pa'i khral stobs gnyis byed/ /rma bya la ni
91a7(mdo 'grel): stobs gsum ste/ /gong ma sreg la bzhir 'gyur ro/ /khrung khrung la ni lnga zhes dran/ /de bzhin 'ug pa drug 'gyur gsal/ /'ug pa bdun 'gyur srin byar brjod/ /bya rgod brgya 'gyur bstan pa yin/ /'dab chags
91b1(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo 'di lta bu/ /lags par gzung zhi kha dbang mo che/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo chen po ste/ /lha yi yul na sngar med pa/ /'phral du phan 'dogs byed pa yin/ /smin drug nas ni brtsams nas ni/ /?
91b2(mdo 'grel): skar le tshan gsum la bri/ /rim pa gsum du bgod pa la/ /gdong tshugs zhes bya ri sras mo/ /rim pa gsum gyi rgyu skar la/ /bsod nams sdig can gang gnas lta/ /skyes pa phun tshogs ma tshogs dang/ /so so'i de bzhin sgrub
91b3(mdo 'grel): bya dang/ /des sbyin byas pa de bzhin du/ /pha rol byam bkod mdzangs ma kye/ /skar ma gsum las gdong tshugs ni/ /the tshom med par rtogs par byed/ /g.yas dang po skyes skar nas grangs pa'i ? phun sum tshogs de man chad pha rol byas dkod sa
91b4(mdo 'grel): 'dra? g.yon gyis ni sdug bsngal zhing/ /rim dang nor nyams la sogs byed/ /gsum dang gnyis gcig 'jom pa las/ /che 'bring bye brag shes par bya/ /bsod nams gza' yi dge zhing bzang/ /sdig can rnams kyis mi shes byed/
91b5(mdo 'grel): bsod nams sdig can 'dres mar gnas/ /ba smras /'bras bu'i stobs ni 'dres mar sdong dang g.yas g.yon ste bshad ? gang yang rung ? gsal/ /gza' rnams skar mar gnas lta ste/ /bum 'jom la sogs shon na ? sdong tshugs la sogs pa ?
91b6(mdo 'grel): de'i stobs kyis 'bras bu skyed/ /nyi ma sgra gcan mig dmar dang/ /sben pa song ba'i skar ma rnams/ /gal te skar mar gsum kha 'dzom/ /gza' skar so so'i rtsis kyis` de yi srog ni 'joms par dran/ /bsod nams can rnams
91b7(mdo 'grel): bde bar mthong/ /'dres bas 'bras bu 'dres mar gsal/ /'di la bsod nams sdig can ni/ /gang 1 la gdod la sogs ? gnas 'bras bur stobs cher 'gyur/ /de nas klu yi 'khor lo sdul la zer/ mchog/ nyon gcig
92a1(mdo 'grel): lha yi gzugs can ma/ /nyin zhag skar ma nas brtsams te/ /kha nas mjug ma'i bar du ni/ /kham dang mdun dang gsus pa dang/ /spyi dang mjug ma mgul pa dang/ /dpung pa lte ba gsang?
92a2(mdo 'grel): gnas te/ /klu yi 'khor lo rim pa bzhin/ /gsum gsum rtsis byas dus kyi zla ba'i` mnyam par mdor` bkod pa las/ /de yi 'bras bu rnam par ston/ /mgul ba bsus pa spyi dang ni/ /mjug ma bdun la mi
92a3(mdo 'grel): dge ba/ /'chi ba la sogs shes bya ste/ /nad pa rnams la bstan pa yin/ /kha dang lte bar skyes skar yod/ /nor rnyed nas ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /phrag par rnam par rgyal 'gyur te/ /gsang bar nor nyams nges par skyes skar ?
92a4(mdo 'grel): mthong/ /gdengs kha'i dbang phyug 'khor lo zhes/ /rgyu skar yan lag btsun mo nyon/ /sprul gyi gzugs ni bri bar bya/ /de yi rtsa gsum gnas pa la/ /tha skar la sogs rim bzhin bri/ /nam gru'i mthar thug bri par
92a5(mdo 'grel): bya/ /rtsa gsum brgyan pa'i 'khor lo la/ /gang gnas gza' yi 'bras bu lta/ /nyi ma mig pa darma song ba'i rtsa/ /sben par hu gang gnas pa/ /nad med nang 'byung nad can 'chi/ /bzhis 'chi gsum gyi nor nyams byed//
92a6(mdo 'grel): gnyis ni gnyen brlag gcig gis ni/ /nor nyams gnyen nyams rims nad 'byung/ /bud med sdug cing rang dbang med/ /rang gi skar ma gnas pa las/ /bsod nams yod na bde legs byed/ /'di skyes skar dgos` gal te rtsa
92a7(mdo 'grel): ni gcig tu steng ma man chad la rtsi song/ /mdza' mo grogs po mdza' mgo dang/ yul dbus yul gzhan/ /dgon gnas ? dgon gnas la sogs khang khyim ni smad 'dir nyin mo'i skar ma gang skyes skar yin pa shes par bya/ /mi shes yul sogs ming skad lta/ de rnams gang dang rtsa 1 bar
92b1(mdo 'grel): bdag gi skar mar song gyur na de rnams bdag dang lhan cig par/ dge ba nyid du shes par bya/ tshig bshad byed dang ? pa re/ bla ma'i gdams pa'i zhal nas zin kyus na med do/ /de la dpon g.yog dge bar dran/ /nor rnyed thams cad mthun par dran/ /myur du thams cad mkhyen par
92b2(mdo 'grel): 'gro/ blo dang ldan pas shes par bya/ /bar ma'i rtsa la song ba na/ /grong dang yul khyim bang bar gsal/ /rtsa gcig pa ni song ba na/ /bdag nyid bde zhing skyid pa yin/ /chung ma khyo dang lhan cig tu/ /rtsa ni gcig la song ba na/ /myur du khyo ni
92b3(mdo 'grel): 'chi bar 'gyur/ /chung ma ring du spang bar bya/ /rang gi rtsal bsod nams snang/ /shis pa'i 'bras bu mdun na sdod/ /de nas gzhan yang bzhin bzang ma/ /gdugs kyi 'khor lo bshad kyis nyon/ /tha skar la sogs nam gru'i mthar//
92b4(mdo 'grel): rtsa bzhi la ni brgyan par bya/ /rtsa rnams legs par gsal ba la/ /rgyu skar rnams ni mnyam par bgod/ /mgo dang nag pa mon grum la/ /gdugs kyi yu bar yongs su grags/ /nyi ma mig dmar sgra gcan dang/ /spon pa mgo dang
92b5(mdo 'grel): lhan cig la/ /gal te phur pa yang dag gnas/ /shar gyi rgyal po srog dang bral/ /brgya lam phur bu med srid na/ /nad kyi sa thebs par 'gyur pa yin/ /de ltar nag par gza' lhag gnas/ /dbus kyi rgyal po sdig can dag`
92b6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin no/ /mon grur zla ba yang dag gnas/ /nub kyi rgyal po sngar bzhin no/ /de nas gzhan yang gsar ba yi/ /shin tu gsang shing bde byed pa/ /seng ge'i gdan du grags pa yi/ /grag gza' bzhi po gang du gnas kyang/
92b7(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /sngar ltar` 'dzan mo grags po thang la khob dang yul dbus yul gzhan dgon gnas 4? dgon gnas la sogs khar khyim ni smad 'di dang ma nyi mo'i skar ma 'di skyes skar yin par shes par bya mi shes yul sogs ming skar lta/ de rnams gang dang gang ? par bdag gi skar ma
93a1(mdo 'grel): song gyur na bsod nams dag dang ldan par gyur /dgu dge ba nyid du shes par bya/ /kyus na med zhal la shes gang gi shes pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /bstan chos mthar thug rtogs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten rnams kyi byed pa
93a2(mdo 'grel): po/ /sems kyi rgyal po 'di shes 'gyur/ /tha skar la sogs dgu rnams dang/ /de bzhin mchu la sogs pa dang/ /snubs la sogs pa'i rgyu skar rnams/ /ngos re dgu dgu bri bar bya/ /de la nor bu nas brtsams
93a3(mdo 'grel): te/ /chos kyi bar du dgu pa bgod/ /yul dang yul du rgyu skar tshogs/ /de dang de yod lha chen ma/ /mon gru de bzhin mgo dang ni/ ? do ? /nag pa rnams ni dbu ma la/ 3 gyis re/ seng ge'i gang na gyi ros rnams su//
93a4(mdo 'grel): lha mo de ltar grags pa yin/ /mon gru byang gi yul du shang men dbyangs sogs` brjod/ /dbus kyi yul du mgo zhes grags/ /lho phyogs 3 pa mi sor par bya ? bum pa zer ? nag pa zhes bya ba/ /'di yod pa la 3 pa`
93a5(mdo 'grel): ni yul der shes mdor` rgyas` par bya/ /nor bu rta dang de bzhin gdugs/ /rnga mo zhes bya lha mchod ma /spen/ seng ge'i gdan la glang po che/ /po ti dang ni de bzhin gser/ chos ni rgyu skar dgu rnams la//
93a6(mdo 'grel): rim pa bzhin du re re bgod/ /gdugs dang seng ge'i gdan dang ni/ /rnga mo dag la rim pa bzhin/ /ji ltar nyi mI rgyu nor lo bdug gnas pa de yi 'bras bu lha dbang ma/ /yul de'i rgyal po lho sngar gyis` mi la` phyogs 'gro/
93a7(mdo 'grel): nor bu la sogs gang la shar/ /dkon par de rnams `nor bu gang la yod pa'i skar ma la sben pa la gnas na/ dkon par the tshom byed do/ /de bzhin du gzhan yang sbyar ro/ /`po gang la ? pa yod pa/ 'gyur te the tshom med/ /seng ge gdan 'chi ?
93b1(mdo 'grel): gyi 'khor lo grags/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /mnga' gzhu'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /rgyal 'pham mtshan nyid nges par ston/ /gzhu dang rgyud la mda' bcas pa'i/ /mda' zhu'i
93b2(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo mnyam par bri/ /nyi mas 'khyud pa'i skar ma nas/ /gsum gsum rim pa bzhin du bri/ /mda' yi ltong dang rked pa dang/ /mde'u rnams la rim pa bzhin/ /gzhu mchog g.yas dang 'chang pa dang/ /g.yon par gsum gsum
93b3(mdo 'grel): rim par bri/ /gzhu rgyud g.yon stong la` dang dbu ma dang/ /mda' gzhu can 'dren` g.yas su gsum gsum rim pa bri/ /nyi ma'i skar` rang gi skyes pa'i skar ma de/ /ji ltar steng dang` gnas pa shes par byed/ /mda' yi ltong la song ba
93b4(mdo 'grel): 'chi/ /rked par nad 'byung rtse mor rgyal/ /gzhu rgyud dbu mas don nyams shing/ /'chad pa song na nor nyams zad/ /gzhu mchog g.yas pas dgra las 'am ming skar` rgyal/ /gzhu rgyud g.yas pas rnyed pa 'byung/ /gzhu mchog g.yon
93b5(mdo 'grel): rang skar` pas rtsod gyur 'chi/ /gzhan las` gzhu rgyud g.yon pas 'chi ba mthong/ /de rnams kun la sdig can gnas/ /mi dge'i 'bras 'byung ri sras mo/ /gal te bsod nams sbyar ba yod/ /shis pa'i 'bras bu nges par mthong
93b6(mdo 'grel): bsod nams sdig can 'dres mar mthong/ /'bras bu 'dres mar mthong ba yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /ral gri'i 'khor lo dge ba can/ /gang gis de las` shes las zlog na` 'dri byed kyi/ /g.yul las rnam
93b7(mdo 'grel): par rgyal bar 'gyur/ /gzhan du gsungs rgyud gzhan du` pa'i 'khor lo gang/ /dge dang mi dge rnam bcad pas/ /bstan chos rgyud kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pas 'dri na/ mtshan nyid la/ /nyung du 'di ni nges par mthong/ /ral gri 'dzin?
94a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i skyes bu la/ /smin drug la sogs rim bzhin bri/ /rtse mor lnga ste kha la gnyis/ /sked par bcu dang yu bar bcu/ /rtse mor sor brgyad gnas pa la/ /rked par de yi nyi 'gyur gnas// //pa dang
94a2(mdo 'grel): nyi mas khyud pa'i skar ma nas bri skyes skar nas rtsi ba dang lugs 2 yod` skyes skar nas rtsams` yu ba dag la ni/ /bye brag yongs su shes par bya/ /kha dang rked par sdig can song/ /rang nyid gnyis 15 dge bar
94a3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba ste/ /ral gri'i rtse mor sdig can gnas/ /bdag nyid nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ /kha dang rked par bsod nams yod/ /dag sdig gi 'bras bu` bdag nyid mi dge byed par dran/ /drag dang zhi ba gnyis ka yod//
94a4(mdo 'grel): dge dang mi dge 'dres mar 'gyur/ /rtse mor zhi drag gnyis yod na/ /de la 'thab rtsod 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de las zlog ma` gal te rtse mor bsod nams snang/ /rgyal dang rnyed dang bde bar 'gyur/ /rked par dge sdig
94a5(mdo 'grel): 'dres mar gnas/ /'khrug pa 'dum par 'gyur pa yin/ /bsod nams sdig can bdag nyid kyis/ /stobs kyi che chung 'bras bu ston/ /de ltar rig pas legs brtags te/ /gzhan la brjod pa'i 'bras bu ston//
94a6(mdo 'grel): de nas bum pa'i 'khor lo mchog /ya tra'i mtshan nyid shes khyin? ? bar bya/ /shar gyi bum pa lug dang ni/ /gong du stan pa'i` seng ge gzhu ni rnam par gnas/ /dri ba po la` rang gi khongs su chud nas/
94a7(mdo 'grel): glang dang bu mo chu srin rnams/ /lho yi ltang mo ? bum par gnas par brjod/ /'khrig pa srang dang bum pa nub/ /lug seng gzhu rnams ces pa dang 'thun` byang du karka sdig pa nya/ /phung po bzhi la bsdus pa yin/ /bum
94b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnam pa rim pa bzhin/ /nyi ma gar yod stong pas te/ /med pa gang ba'i bum par brjod/ /stong par byin na 'chi bar ring/ /gang ba'i sar ni rgyal zhing shis/ /gang ba'i sar ni bsod nams yod/ /de la rang gi skar ma snang//?
94b2(mdo 'grel): shar nas` 'gro nyin nyin skar ? sgyur/ 'og gi chu tshod sros byas la/ 'da' yon tan zla? bas thob pa de /'das khyim bum la gang gi khyim na yod nyi ma yod na stong pa yin zla ba yod na gang ba ste shin tu bzad do/ /bya ba gang byas` thul don 'grub brnyed pa ston/ / bzang
94b3(mdo 'grel): de las bzlog na mi dge nyid/ /bum pa'i 'khor lo rab shes pa/ /gzhan du ma bstan gangs ri'i bdag /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /pad+ma'i 'khor lo dge ba mchog /byes bgrong skyes bu'i 'tsho 'chi dang/ /dge dang
94b4(mdo 'grel): nyi ma sdig can yod pa'i sar skyes skar song na` mi dge shes par 'gyur/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ni/ /byes su 'gro na stag ` 'gro nyin zla skar 60 sgyur 'og gi chu tshod ldan byas la/ mda' yon zlas thob pa'i grangs rnams kyi lugs sogs rim bzhin pa gangs pa bya/ /thob pa
94b5(mdo 'grel): stong par don med cing gang ba'i sar ni shin tu dge` lte bar bcas pa bri bar bya/ /lte bar bzhi ni bris pa ste/ /lhag ma 'dab ma rnams la bgod/ /shar gyi 'dab ma'i phung po la/ /nang du 'jug pa mnyam par bri/ /me mtshams
94b6(mdo 'grel): phyi rol thon pa dang/ /de bzhin lho phyogs nang du 'jug /bden bral 'dab ma phyi rol thon/ skar ma /chu yi 'dab ma nang du 'jug mdor / rgyas` 'gro ba'i ? yang lte 'dab ma 3 dang dbung?/ la 1` de nyin gyi zla skar nas bzung ste phyi ngos nas`
94b7(mdo 'grel): gyi 'dab la 2`/ rlung mtshams phyi rol thon par grags/ /gnod sbyin 'dab ma nang 'jug byed/ /dbang ldan phyi rol mthon pa ste/ /de ltar rim pa ji bzhin bri/ /nyin zhag gi skar ma nas zla skar/ brtsams te/ /'dab ma
95a1(mdo 'grel): rnams la gsum gsum bri/ /shar nas brtsams te bri bar bya/ /dbus su 'jug pa bzhi yang bri/ /nang du 'jug dang phyir 'don dang/ /dge dang mi dge shes par byed/ /skyes bu'i skyes skar pad+ma
95a2(mdo 'grel): la/ /gang na gnas pa ma 'khrul brtag /'di la dge dang mi dge ba'i/ /'bras bu shes par 'gyur ba yin/ /'di la lnga chen lnga dang lnga/ /lhag ma gsum ni yongs su grags/ /skyes skar ming` dang po la ni
95a3(mdo 'grel): ` pad+ma'i 'khor lo 'di bzhan yang nad pa sos ma so? dang btson thon mi thon la sogs pa kun la sbyor` skar ma` brag po lnga tshan snga dang gsum tshan du bcad la/ dang po 4 la yod pa ste 2 pas chas shing 3 pa yis/ ? byed ? pas 4 cha 3 slen lnga ni yul zlob lhag ma 3 mi dge bas na 1 mang bar bya ? lnga tshan ?
95a4(mdo 'grel): bstan par gnas/ /de bzhin chas shing lam zhugs dang/ /lam ni phyed na gnas pa dang/ /de bzhin bzhi char gnas pa dang/ de bzhin yul du phyin pa rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du grags pa rnams/
95a5(mdo 'grel): skyes skar ming skar song na` lnga mchan 2 pa la` nang du 'jug pa'i lo lnga la/ / 2 ba la ? bzhi pa la` bde zing rnyed pa che ba dang/ /lnga tshan lnga pa la bskar ma nye brgyad la lnga tshan 3 du bcad la dang
95a6(mdo 'grel): bo 4 la yang 2 pa chas zhing 3 pa yi lam byed bzhi pas gsum lnga sle ba lha gsum yang/ 'bro nyin nyin du bsgyur 'og gi chu tshod bzhug mnga' sogs thob pa'i drangs rnams kyi lug sogs rim ba sgyur zab pa stong pa shar don med gang ba'i sa dge` nad med rgyal dang grags pa dang/ /kun
95a7(mdo 'grel): tu dge bar bstan pa yin/ ? /phyi rol thon pa lnga po la/ /dbus ma gnas pa nyid dang ni/ /btang snyoms du yang bstan pa yin/ /de ltar shes bya ri sras mo/ /lhag ma gsum ni gnas pa las/ /de'i 'bras bu mi
95b1(mdo 'grel): dge byed/ /dang pos nor ni rnam par nyams/ /gnyis pas nad kyis thebs par 'gyur/ /gsum pa khyim du bslebs nas kyang/ /'chi bar 'gyur ro gang ri'i bdag /pad+ma'i 'khor lo'i stobs bstan pa/ /'di ni rnam par shes bya ste/
95b2(mdo 'grel): nang nas grangs pa'i` lhag ma 3 gyi 'bras bu` tatka la skar ma la gnas pa'i/ /gza' yi dge dang mi dge byed/ /'di ni 'dab ma'i grangs kyis bshad/ /brgyad kyis dge dang mi dge 'byung/ /dang po bstan par gnas
95b3(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ /las kun 'grub par bstan pa yin/ /'gro nyin gyi` bsod nams kyi zhi sdig drag` skar ma` 'jug` 'gro nyin nas rtsis dus skar ma la 'dug pa can yod mi dge` shar gyi 'dab ma'i yi ge
95b4(mdo 'grel): dang po nas rtsams pa'i yi ge bcus thams cad 'bras bu rnams re rer sbyar /pad+ma dang po'i skar ma dang po la skyes skar yang sten par gnas ? des 'dre'o ? ? gnyis pa chas dang nor shor dang/ /rnyed pa 'byung bar bstan pa yin/ /gsum pa lam zhugs nad dang ni//
95b5(mdo 'grel): rnyed pa med par bston pa yin/ /bzhi pa 'chi dang rnyed na 'tshor/ /rnyed pa med par bstan pa yin/ /lnga pa sleb pad ma'i 'dab ma` 'gyur nor med yi/ /skyid par yang ni 'gyur ma yin/ /drug pa phyir la log pa dang/ /lus
95b6(mdo 'grel): kyang skyid par 3 bas` 'gyur pa yin/ /bdun pa sleb 'gyur nor rnyed log /sdug bsngal 'byung bar bstan pa yin/ /brgyad pas myur du sleb pa dang/ /nang 'byung sdug bsngal chen po 'byung/ /de ltar rnyed dang mi rnyed dang/ /bde
95b7(mdo 'grel): sdug 'tsho dang 'chi ba dang/ /rgyal dang rnam lnga pa nor med 'chi yang zer` par rgyal 'gyur pa'i/ /pad+ma'i khor lor 'dis gzhan yang nad pa sos mi sos brtson thon mi thon gzhan re ba yong mi yod spyod/ /'khor lo` bdag gi de bshad yin/ /gling dang 'jug? 
96a1(mdo 'grel): byed bre'i rgyab tu bris la snol la ston` nyi ma zla ba dang/ /bcu bzhi'i rang bzhin mig nyid yin/ /'dod pa nor lha sngon po dang/ /dus zla dang ni 'jig rten dang/ /yul lha 'byor pa bu ga dang/ /ro dang tshes
96a2(mdo 'grel): dang rgya mi tsho dbyangs/ /gur gum g+hi haM sbyar ba las/ /dza ti ba la'i me tog sna ma` snyu gus bris/ /gcig ni bcu drug cha yin te/ /da lta nyid du skye bar 'gyur/ /gnyis sogs cha'i bye brag gis/ /nyin mtshan cha rnams shes
96a3(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /'di ni re ces pa sbyangs g+hi la? dang sbyar la dbyangs re re lus 2 kyi rgyan pa'o yang re mig de lta bu la me tog dngos su bcug la 1 byung 16 cha 'byung na` cha des 'dre'o` `mig bcu drug pa'i/ /'khor lo skye ba'i dus bstan pa'o/ /ji ltar mchog tu
96a4(mdo 'grel): gsang ba yi/ /rdzong gi 'khor lo brtsam par bya/ /'di ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dbyangs 'char ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ /pad+ma'i 'khor lo bstan pa chen po zhes bya ste yi ge zhag mtshan la don` le'u bdun
96a5(mdo 'grel): ba'o// //lha yi lha mchog bcom ldan 'das/ /lha dang lha min phyag byas ba/ /dbang phyug chen po rdzong 'khor lo/ /mchog tu gsang ba bdag la gsol/ /ji ltar bsdus pa'i cho ga
96a6(mdo 'grel): las/ /gza' rnams spyod ba'i rab 'byor pa/ /gangs kyi ri la bzhugs pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom lha ma yin gyi dbang po tri shu la brtsom pa'i rdzong 'khor lo` `ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /
96a7(mdo 'grel): gsang ba las kyang shin tu gsang/ /mchog tu gsang ba lha mo nyon/ /rdzong gi 'khor lo 'di lta bu/ /rang gi sems su la yang mi smra bar` la bzhag par bya/ /tri bu la` rdzong dang grong dang dmag sa dang/ /bstan chos 'di`
96b1(mdo 'grel): ji bzhin yongs su grags/ /gal te pha rol rdzong 'phrog gam/ /bdag nyid srung bar byed kyang rung/ /'khor lo bdag nyid rab tu brtag /rdzong dang dmags shes par bya/ /'di byed mdun du 'ongs pa'i tshe/ /lha yis dbang ldan mtshams su bsdad//
96b2(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar 'khor lo gru bzhi pa ? kyi/ ra ba rim gsum ldan pa bri/ /dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsoms nas ni/ tsakra yang zer` ma nor bar` /smin drug la sogs rim bzhin bri/ /mtshams bzhi nang du 'jug pas ste/ /phyogs bzhi phyi rol
96b3(mdo 'grel): phon par dran/ lho /rdzong gi dkyil du gnas pa ni/ /drag po rnam pa bzhi yin te/ /lag dang me bzhi chu stod dang/ /khrums smad rnams su grags pa yin/ /nang gi ra mdor` rgyas` bar mgo dang spo/ /snubs dang khrums stod mtshams su
96b4(mdo 'grel): bgong/ /nabs so nag pa chu smad dang/ /nam gru skar ma` rnams ni phyogs shar` lho nub` nus` byang shar` su bgod/ /rab bar mar snar ma dang/ /gre dang ?/ dbang` srin` snron dang mon rlung` gre mtshams//
96b5(mdo 'grel): rgyal dang shar` 'bral bu ? don med pa` nub byang` sa ri gro zhun dang/ /tha skar rnams ni phyogs dran/ /rab phyi mar gnas pa ni/ /smin drug skag dang de bzhin mchu/ /sa ga lha mtshams byi zhun dang/ mon gru bra nye brgyad po bgo
96b6(mdo 'grel): shar phyogs la gnas khyim bshad ba/ /nya lug glang rnams de bzhin bgod/ /byang gi phyogs su gnas pa'i khyim/ /'khrig pa karka seng ge dran/ /de bzhin nub phyogs dag tu yang/ /bu mo srang dang sdig par grags/ /gzhu dang
96b7(mdo 'grel): chu srin bum pa rnams/ /lho yi phyogs na rnam par gnas/ /ra ba phyi nang bar ma la/ /ra ba 3 bo la'o` `phyi` ka la a bar` pa ru na` tra zhes/ /rim pa ra ba 3 po` bzhin du bstan pa yin/ gal smin drug gi shul du nyin skar dris la de ? ming skar la rtag go` te ming
97a1(mdo 'grel): gi skar ma ni/ /ka la kho gnas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /a pa la gnas pa stobs chung ste/ /gal te ru tra gnas pa na/ /the tshom med bar rdzong thob 'gyur/ /nang ma bzhi la drag gza' yod/ /
97a2(mdo 'grel): rdzong dang rdzang bdag gi de rang gi skyes skar ma byi'i dmag dpon gtso cha` phyi rol dmag gi don grub 'gyur/ /bar mar drag po'i gza' rnams gnas/ /phan tshun 'khrug 'gyur ring nas thob/ /rdzong gi 'khor lo 'di lta bu/ /lha mo sa steng dag na dkon/ /
97a3(mdo 'grel): drag bo'i gza' rnams phyi na gnas/ /dmag dpung tshogs pa don med 'gyur/ /mtshams la drag gnas 'jug ma dge /phyogs drag phyir thon yun` phyi ma` dge ba yin/ /nang ma bzhi la bsod nams shar/ /
97a4(mdo 'grel): drag po'i gza' rnams phyi rol song/ /'jig rten gsum gyi dmag tshogs te/ /a'e phyi rol` dbang phyug lha yi sna drangs kyang/ oM ma` /rdzong ni thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /oM 'jug gi a'e thor/ slar yang zlog gyur bzhin bzang
97a5(mdo 'grel): ma/ /gang che dbu ma bzhi po la/ /nyi ma rA hu spen pa dang/ /sa yi bu dag song ba dang/ /bsod nams gza' rnams phyi rol song/ /brgya byin dpung dang bcas pa yis/ /bsrungs kyang rdzong ni thub mi 'gyur/ a'i/
97a6(mdo 'grel): bsu ? ba bar snying po` mar dra gza' gnas/ /smra brjod nor stong zer bar bkra shis/ 'gyur/ /bar mar bsod nams gza' rnams sa 'dom na` gnas/ /phyi rol dmag AM gis` dpung 'pham par gsal/ /zhi dbang
97a7(mdo 'grel): na phyi rol ba cung zad rgyal te` drag med par gnas pa las /dmar?/ 'dres ma'i 'bras bu ston par byed/ /drag po'i gza'` phyi dang na nang pas nang ba'i nor chur thob zer` nang du song/ /skar/ 'khrug pa chen po 'byung cung zad bar 'gyur/ /zhi ba
97b1(mdo 'grel): phyi dang nang du song/ /phan tshun 'dum bar yongs su grags/ /rang dang dgra yi rgyu skar la/ /gza' rnams gang gnas lta ba gces/ /zhi drag gdong tshugs nyi ma song/ /khyim bdag rnams la mi dge byed/ /mdung dang mdung chen sbyor ba yi/ /
97b2(mdo 'grel): ka ba'i sbyor ba brtag par bya/ /rdzong gi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang/ /rang dang dgra yi rgyu skar la/ /gza' rnams gang gnas lta ba gces/ /zhi drag gdong tshugs nyi ma song/ /khyim bdag rnams la mi dge byed/ /mdung dang mdung chen sbyor ba yi/ /
97b3(mdo 'grel): ka ba'i sbyor ba brtag bar bya/ /rdzong gi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang/ /rang dang dgra dang po rdzong gi skyes skar ram ming skar ram ming skar/ ` yod ba'i skar ma la ldong tshugs? ram/ sha la ka'i 'khor lo ltar dgos oM rdzong` la gnod pa brnyag /rgyan gyi gong bde` 'khor lo brtag ba dang/ /
97b4(mdo 'grel): dmag logs pa ka ba'i skar ma 4 po la zhi gza' dang/ bsod nams dang/ shal ka'i 'tsho ba'i spyi cim` sha la ka yi gdong tshugs dang/ /brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'khor lo sogs/ /rjes su mthun bar thams cad brtag /biSh+Ta'i 'khor lo brtag bar bya/ /rang gi
97b5(mdo 'grel): khyim dang skyes skar brtag /tatkal dus sbyor brtag par bya/ /dpal ldan rA hu'i 'khor lo mchog /las kun byed pa brtag par bya/ /dgra phyogs mi dge thams cad blang/ /bdag nyid la dge ma lus pa /mgo nas bshad ba` /skyes skar/
97b6(mdo 'grel): dbyangs 'char dang ming skar` rgyud las gang bzang ngan` gsungs pa/ /kun 'brug` mdor na pha rol brlag pa dang/ /bdag nyid ci nas mdor na rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de blun` nas rdzong gi 'khor lo mchog /rim pa sum ldan 'dir brjod bya/ /
97b7(mdo 'grel): 'di 'dra'i 'khor lo sum la yod/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'khor lo mda'/ /smin drug nas ni brtsams nas su/ /shi shul gyis bskyod bar ba gsum la dgod par bya/ /smin dru yang myur 3 sbrang rtsi 'bru` ga rgyal skag mchu dang ni
97b8(mdo 'grel): nu la` rim` sa ri sa ga gzhan la med do// lha mtshams dang/ /g.yas skor` gro zhun bye zhun mon/ dbus su ming bri rab phyi ma'i phyogs su 'bri gzhan gong zhin/ gru dang/ /phyi zur` tha skar bra nye bcu gnyis shar` zur` po//
98a1(mdo 'grel): phyi yi ra ba rnams la yang/ /rim pa bzhin du bgod par bya/ /snar ma nabs so gre dang ni/ /nag pa snrubs dang chu smad dang/ /mon gre dang ni mon gru ste/ /brgyad po bar gyi ra bar bgod/ /mgo dang lag
98a2(mdo 'grel): dang de bzhin sbo/ /me bzhi snubs dang chu stong dang/ /dgod pa'i rim pa yin gnas pa`? khrums stod khrums smad rnam pa brgyad/ /nang gi ra bar bgod par bya/ /rab phyi ma dpung gi srog /nang ma bdag po'i srog gnas bar bgod`
98a3(mdo 'grel): yin te/ /bar mar snyam por bstan pa'o/ /de la rI hu rgyal po ste/ /lhag ma blon por gnas pa las/ /rgyal 'pham mtshan nyid ston bar bya/ /gnas pa` nang gi a'i yig` aM yig` phyogs bzhir rA hu song/ /
98a4(mdo 'grel): rdzong ni blangs pas chog pa yin/ /phyi rol bcu gnyis rA hu song/ /gza' gzhan rnams` bdag po nyams pas don rnams 'grub/ /phal cheg bar gyi ra par rA hu yang` song/ /phyi nang mnyam par grags pa yin/ /sngar
98a5(mdo 'grel): is` bshad thur mar bdun pa yis/ /'khor lo de bzhin shes par bya/ /spen pa dang ni phur pa dag /gang gnas pa d legs par lta/ /ra ba gsum po gang la gnas/ /'khor lo 'di la mi dge yin/ /rdzong dang grong
98a6(mdo 'grel): phyi nang mnyam na` khyer rnams su yang/ she lag /nyi ma yod par mi 'gro gzhan stobs rnams` ste/ /nyi ma phung pa spen pa gsum/ /lhan cig yod pas 'gror mi rung/ /ba'i` rdzong gi 'khor lo cho ga las/ a'i a'i` dang gyi phyogs/
98a7(mdo 'grel): sgra gcan kha mjug legs por brtag /gang na g.yod bar ltas med `dmag 'dren pa lta ci smos/ 'gro bdug gang yang byar mi rung/ smin drug la yod na dbang ldan du mi rung/ des 'dre` rkang pa brgya pa la sogs pa'i/ /sngar bshad cho ga thams cad brtag /rdzong dang
98b1(mdo 'grel): rdzong gi bdag po yi/ /skar ma rA hu yod dam lta/ /gal te de la rA hu song/ /rdzong dang bdag po dag la ngan/ /nang gi phyogs bzhir rA hu song/ /rdzong la mi dge lhas mchod ma/ /ra ba rnams kyi rim pa la/ /ji ltar gnas pa brtag par bya/ /drag ?
98b2(mdo 'grel): rtsal? lta bu la rtsa thog man yod pas de zhi drag nas lta bar bya'o/ bar ma dag la song/ /yun ring lon nas thob par 'gyur/ /sdig can gza' rnams snying por zhugs/ /de tshe zla ba rtag par bya/ /zla ba gnas ba'i phyogs nas rgyug /de tshe de nas gza'`?
98b3(mdo 'grel): rdzong 'joms dran/ /mig dmar rA hu spen pa gsum/ /gcig gnyis snying po'i phyogs bzhir sogs/ /lag la 'di yin skabs yin gong gi` skar ma gang la gnas par bya` nub skar yod na shar nas nub du drang ngo` 'khrugs pa` sam 'tshams nas rgyug`
98b4(mdo 'grel): sogs pa bzhi la song/ /phyogs der zla ba gal te gnas/ /nang ma` gnaS zla ba'i phyogs nas rdzong rlag byed/ /de phyir zla ba gnas pa brtag /snying po'i phyogs bzhir bsod nams yod/ /bzhi 'am gsum 'am gcig gnas
98b5(mdo 'grel): me bzhi kre? khrum smad kyang/ /'khor los sgyur sngar AM gis 3 bo de ba'i rgyal po yang/ /log pa nyid du the zhugs nas` tshom med/ /rdzong dang grong khyer gang yang rung/ /nyi ma mig dmar nang ma spen pa gsum/ /nang gi rgyu skar brgyad
98b6(mdo 'grel): la gnas/ /gcig la rA hu song ba'i tshe/ /phyi rol dmag dpung rgyal ba dang/ /rnam bar rgyal bar 'gyur pa yin/ rdzong mi thob` /smin drug la sogs rgyu skar pa 'dzom na` gsum/ /de bzhin mchu la sogs pa gsum/ /lha mtsheS
98b7(mdo 'grel): la soD sam lta gsum dang ni/ /mon rlung grum la sogs gsum po rnams/ /la rdzong bdag gi skye skar yod na/ nang du 'jug la dge a'i/ ba ste/ /dbang ldan gyi` phyi rol thon ? mi dge a` byed/ /ka ba'i sngar kyi` me yi ge bzhi po yis/ srin po
99a1(mdo 'grel): thog drangs rgyu skar bcu gnyis po/ /lag nas bra nye'i bar du yang/ /phyi rol thon pa dge ba yin/ /ka bar grags po bzhi po ni/ /ku su b+hu tu zhes bya dran/ /smin drug la sogs grwa rnams la/ /rdzong dang bdag?
99a2(mdo 'grel): po'i skar ma song/ /phyi yi dmag la dge ba ste/ /lag la sogs ba'i phyogs bzhi la/ /rdzong dang bdag po'i skad rdzong bdag ` ma ni/ /rdzong bsrungs rnams la dge ba yi/ /na lag pa sangs pa 4 po yin/ nang du 'jug dang ka ba la/ /gal te mig
99a3(mdo 'grel): dmar brtag par gnas/ /de la dmag dpung chas pa na/ /don 'grub rgyal bar ?  skar ma` song na ni` 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar nang du 'jug ba dang/ /ka bar mig lag la sogs` dmar gnas pa 'am//
99a4(mdo 'grel): lug dang sdig pa'i khyim du ni/ /gal te mig phyi rol gyi` dmar legs par gnas/ /drag po gnyis ni 'dzom lug rang sdig khyim du gza' lnga'i mig dmar nud gyi steng na gnas nas gza' rag po dang 'dzom na` nang du 'jug gi yi ge dang` ka ba logs cha po la`
99a5(mdo 'grel): pa rnams/ /grwa yi ra ba rnams la gnas/ /nang du 'jug pa rgyal bar sa dang` ` dang` 'gyur/ /sgrim mi dgos par rdzong thob 'gyur/ /gza' rnams 'khyog po'i 'gros la song/ /de tshe rdzong ni thob pa med/ /
99a6(mdo 'grel): gang tshe phur pa 'khyog por song/ /de tshe phyi'i dmag` i` shar du mi dag byed/ /mig dmar 'khyog po'i 'gros ` dal pa la rkang pa snga ma'i cha la rim las 'khyog po rim min gyi drang po myur ba la rkang pa phyi ma'i gyis 'khyog po rim pas
99a7(mdo 'grel): drang go la gnas/ /bye brag` rdzong ni lho phyogs 'gro 'dug byed kyang ngan` 'gro bar na/ /'gro 'dug gzhan yang` pa lba sangs ni 'khyog po la/ /nub kyi phyogs su 'gro ba ngn/ /gza' lhag 'khyog po'i
99b1(mdo 'grel): 'gros byed pa/ /byang gi phyogs la ngan pa yin/ /gzhan yang nyi ma mig dmar dag /gang gnas phyogs su 'gro mi rung/ /sben pa ga sangs gza' lhag phur/ /mig dmar 'khyog por song ba'i tshe/ /rdzong ni thob par mi 'gyur te/ /
99b2(mdo 'grel): dpung dang bcas pa log par 'gyur/ /mig dmar ni pa lba sangs/ /drag po'i 'gros la 'gro 'dug dge /'khyog po la ni kha smras dang/ /zong mi long sogs mi dge yin/ /chu yi rdzong srub bcu'i 'khor lo bshad` 'khor lo'i
99b3(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid ni/ /yul gyi yi ge tshad mar bzung/ /bum pa brgyad ni mnyam gnas pa/ / ` 'dri tshig thog ma a li'i rangs ni sor ka li'i drangs 'khrug 'gyur /sde tshan rnams 'dom du 'gyur/ ming gi thog ma'i gsal byed kyi sde tshan gyi drangs dang/ bum drang stun bum pa gong gi nang
99b4(mdo 'grel): na 'dug /lte ba 'bras bu ngo shes ba la ? khru dang 'dom rnams nyis 'gyur du skor bzhug chu dang rnyed do/ sde mtshan brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /dang po'i yi ge gcig bzung la/ /de yi grangs kyis shes par 'gyur/ /A li sor du shes bya ste/ /sde tshan ka
99b5(mdo 'grel): li khru zhes dran/ /shar nas grangs ba'i bum ba rnams/ /sde tshan gang chu bkon bar de'i tshad las ? bya dbung` nas 'dom gyi tshad/ /'di ni rdzong dang rdzong bdag la/ /chu yi 'khor lo bshad pa yin/ / `gang byung ba'i thad ka'i nang tshan khrur 'gyur
99b6(mdo 'grel): ji ltar rA hu'i lus rtsa ba'i sgra can` la ni/ /rgyu skar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid bshad/ /nyi zla rnam par gnon pa yi/ /lto phye'i gzugs ni bri bar bya/ /a A i a'i 4 gsal byed du byed na ka zer raM/ 'dri tshig dang po gang yin gyi/ sde tshan gang na 'dug ltas la
99b7(mdo 'grel): ? tshig dang po la tri rings zer ri sde lta bu byung na/ A ni'i dbang du byas bas a'i ti ? ba na gsal byed kyi dbang du bya ba nas/ ka nas drangs ba'i bzhi pa na gsal byed d+ha yod bas khru bcu ba'i dbang du byas/ gnas grangs ba'i bum lnga gnas ta yong bas/ 'dom lnga yod gzhan des dre'o/ /'di byed gsal byed kyi thog ma ka ste la 'byung na ?
100a1(mdo 'grel): gang tshe na 'dom do de 'dre'o// kha nas brtsams nas spyi bor gsum/ /1 bri/ mgrin par bzhi ni bgod par bya/ /rgyab tu gsum ni bri bar bya/ /mjug mar gsum ni tshang bar gi /bri tshin rA hu zhes bya ba/ /rgyu skar rnams
100a2(mdo 'grel): la longs spyod pa/ /'di ni kha 1 bri` skar ma gang la kha yi kha gnam pa lte` de hum 'khyung pa'i skar ma de` legs par brtag par bya/ /yan lag ldan pa'i rA hu ni/ /mkhan nas sbyar la bri 14 nas ? log zer yang/ lto 'phye` sprul gyi byed pa mnyam par bri/ /
100a3(mdo 'grel): lha mo de ltar legs bkod la/ /rA hu'i 'bras bu brtag bar bya/ /dge dang mi dge'i rim pa rnams/ /bshad kyi gang ri'i bdag mo nyon/ /de la rang gi skar ma ni/ /rA hu'i kha la song ba na/ /gnas las nyams shing bud med ni/ /
100a4(mdo 'grel): bcing dang bcom dang phyug rnams zad/ /rA hu mgo la song ba na/ /khyim 'tshig nor nyams 'thab rtsod 'byung/ /lkog mar song na chos skyes skar ming skar/ rnyed cing/ /nor rnyed don 'grub bdag nyid 'gyur/ /gnyen dang lhan cig
100a5(mdo 'grel): 'grogs par byed/ /rA hu'i nod pa log pas` dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyab tu song na 'chi ba dang/ /lhung dang pus mo gnang pa dang/ /gnas nas g.yo lto ba` bar 'gyur ba yin/ /klu gdon 'jigs pa chen po 'byung/ /snying nang 'byung
100a6(mdo 'grel): ba 'jug mas byed/ /zla ba phur bu gza' lhag dang/ /snga ma'i 'gros sam yang na rdzong gi don bsdus gsal lo/ pa sangs snying por chu gnas pa/ /rdzong la dpung gis bskor gyur kyang/ /'jigs zon mi dgos gangs ri'i bdag /nyi ma
100b1(mdo 'grel): mig dmar spen pa dang/ /rA hu snying por chud pa ni/ /dgra yis len par 'gyur ba na/ /rdzong bdag stod par byed dam ci/ /rigs ngan gza' rnams snying por srong/ /phyi rol rnam par rgyal dang grags/ /rigs bzad gza' rnams snying por
100b2(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /rdzong bdag rgyal bar bdag gis dran/ /gal te 'dres mar gnas pa las/ /phan tshun 'khrug par 'dum pa yin/ /rdzong ni 'joms dang bsrung ba las/ /'di yi cho ga bshad pa yin/ /rigs bzang ri zhig` gas ngan yang dag
100b3(mdo 'grel): shes/ /nag bas ga snron dang ni/ /chu stong gro zhun smin zhi drag` drug mgo /tha skar mchu rnams rigs bzang yin/ /bra nye snar ma nabs so skag /sa ri lha mtshams chu smad spo/ /khrums stong nam gru me bzhi rnams/ /rigs ni ngan bar
100b4(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa skar ma'i riD bstan pa ni` yin/ /lag dang snrubs dang mon gre dang/ /byi zhun rnams ni 'dres mar ston/ /rigs skyes rigs min skyes pa las/ /nyi ma zla ba phur bu spen/ /rigs skyes zhes bya skal tshan ma/ /rigs min grags pa slar
100b5(mdo 'grel): yang ston/ /mig dmar pa sangs rA hu dang/ /gza' lhag rnams ni rigs min skyed/ /mdor na rdzong gi bya ba dang/ pha rol 'joms par byed pa gza' dras bo ste zhi ? bye blag tu// te bzang ba yin/ las/ /'di yi cho ga shes bya ste/ /
100b6(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rdong gi 'khor lo mi shes par/ /te ngan pa yin` gzhom 'dod mun pa'i mda' bzhin dran/ /don grub rgyas par bshad pa ni/ /rdzong gi 'khor lo yongs su grags/ /de ltar mchog tu sgrol ba ni//
100b7(mdo 'grel): mdzes ma yid ni gus pas bzung/ /sgyur ba yin zer/ /'di ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dbyangs 'chad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rdzong gi 'khor lo rnam par phye ba ste/ le'u brgyad ba'o// // 
101a1(mdo 'grel): lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni lha yi mchog /zla ba'i dum bus dbu brgyan pa/ /pha rol dgra rnams 'joms pa la/ /shin tu gsang ba'i rgyud chen po/ /rA chu'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /g.yul du rgyal ??
101a2(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /bdag nyid g.yul du chas pa'i che/ /gang gi phyogs su rA hu 'dzeg /rA hu'i spyod yul ji ltar lags/ /dus dang phyogs la ji ltar 'char/ /'dri bar byed pa'i skyes bu la/ /ma lus pa ni bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan
101a3(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ji ltar rA tu 'khor lo yi/ /nges pa'i gdam dag bshad par bya/ /bdag gzhan 'chi ba thams cad ni/ /rgyal po rA hu sa byed par dran/ /rgyu skar rnams kyi ring po nas/ /rA hu mthong bas rgyal bar
101a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /mdun du sdong na nyi zla yang/ /thal ba bzhin du 'joms par byed/ /mthong bas 'chi bar gyur ba'i phyir/ drag po'i gza'i de ming yod ba'i sar 'gro mi nyan` gang dang yang sdoms pa` rA hu rgyab tu bzhag par bya/ /nyi ma mig dmar sgra
101a5(mdo 'grel): gcan dang/ /spen pa g.yul du mdun gnas yang/ /gang gis mgon po zla ba ni/ /mngon sum mthong bar byas la 'gro/ khyim gyi 'khor lo 'gro ba ni/ /dpal ldan rA hu sngar bshad yin/ /gru bzhi dum bur de bzhin du

103a7(mdo 'grel): ba nas rim pa bzhin phri ba dang la ldang ba de yud tsam pa thun phyir ro// byed yan? chang la'o bud nam de la bzlog nas 'char te /chu nas drag po de nas gshin rje des 'brel/ gu gnyis/ /zer yang nyin mtshan ring thung ci rigs su bcod yud tsam rA hu zhes byar brjod/ /drag drag`

105b1(mdo 'grel): du gang gnas pa/ /rdul bran bzhin du thal bar byed/ /mdun du gnas na rnam par nyams/ /rgyab tu gnas la rgyal bar byed/ /ji ltar dkar po'i phyogs la ni/ /bden bral la sogs rgyug bar byed/ /nag phyogs gang gis 'jomS
105b2(mdo 'grel): ba spang/ /rlung la sogs par 'gro bar dran/ /de ltar thun byed rA hu rnams/ /dbyug gu bzhi la brtan kho dng 'grogs pas` shin tu rgyas` 1 nas nya'i bar` sngar bzhin no` /par gnas/ /de ltar 16 na stong gi bar/ thun phyir rA hu ni//
105b3(mdo 'grel): shin tu rtsub bar 'char bsan/ / nus ba che` mtshan nyid legs par shes pa yi/ /nyi mtshan yun snyam ba'i dus su` 'dzem par bya'o rje btsun ma/ zla phyed rA hu'i mtshan nyid ni/ /mdor bsdus ba ni bshad par bya/ /'di ni rnam par
105b4(mdo 'grel): shes pa yis/ /g.yul la sogs pa ci bsams 'grub/ /phyogs su re kha bzhi btsugs pas/ /mnyam par bzhag del` pas grub bzhir dran/ /me nas rlung gi bar du yang/ /dbus nas de kha mnyam par mthong/ /shar
105b5(mdo 'grel): nas de bzhin byang gi phyogs/ /nag po'i phyogs ni yin pa gru bzhi pa bri` 10 nas stong gi bar mang ? lho nub kyi phyogs 'gro 'dug ba'i bya ba las ka byas na` 1 gis ` zur nas zur du` mnyam/ /pa ridzha` lho dang nub kyi phyogs gnyis kyang
105b6(mdo 'grel): zur thig giS 'thang pa'i dkar po'i phyogs su de bzhin 'gyur/ /zla ba nya la me yi phyogs/ /gnam stong la ni rlung mtshams nas/ /dang po'i chos kyis thog drangs nas/ /phyogs la re re` 'char bar 'gyur ba yin/ /byang dang
105b7(mdo 'grel): lho nas 'chang ba'i tshe/ /tshes dgu'i sa nas thog drangs te/ /nyin zhag so so dag la ni/ /rdzogs ba'i bar du 'chad bar 'gyur/ /nub pa'i phyogs bgrod dge pa ste/ /'char phyogs brgyad bdun la` bkrod ba mi dge ? yin?  
106a1(mdo 'grel): dkar po'i brgyad sogs nub phyogs su/ /zla ba nya yi bar du yang/ /dA hu gnas pas shar dang ni/ /byang gi phyogs su mi dge byed/ /nag phyogs gcig nas lha min mthar/ /yang dag gnas pa sngar?
106a2(mdo 'grel): nub nas mgo zung nas tshes 1 nas nya'i bar du lho nub la 'char gsung ` bzhin 'joms/ /shar nub phan tshun 'joms pa dang/ /de bzhin lho byang phan tshes 1 nas` gnam stong ? nub byang mthar?
106a3(mdo 'grel): chun 'joms/ /'di ni rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /g.yul las rnam par rgyal 'gyur rje btsun ma/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /gthu? la du 'jug par byed pa la/ /'di ni rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /
106a4(mdo 'grel): nyi ma rA hu'i 'bras bu mthong/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i rA hu bzhin/ /mig dmar kyes ni rA hu dang/ /spen pa'i rA hu god gi thun phyed kyis rgyas bshad/ zhes bya ba/ /lhan cig lam du 'joms par dran/ /'di dang nyi ma khyim gcig
106a5(mdo 'grel): bzhugs/ /nyi mA rA hur tad kal bdag/ yongs su grags/ /'joms pas mthong ba'i rim pa las/ /stobs kyi rim bshes par bya/ /dbyangs 'char rgyud las gsungs pa yi/ /phan dang gnod pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /rang gi skyes skar ming skad`
106a6(mdo 'grel): gyen dur? kha gsum pa la/ /de bzhin phred la re kha gsuM dang? sa nas bdun pa mthong ba yin te lug gi 'thod pa srang dab 'gre'o/ /bzhi cha phrad 28? pa dang thams cad 'thong sa'i rim pa la kun gyis 'thong ba 7 ba yid` re kha phan tshun snol ba yi/ /rtse mor khyim rnams dgod par bya/ /
106a7(mdo 'grel): shar gyi phyogs kyi mdung rtse la/ /lug dang seng ge gzhu gsum 'byung/ /de bzhin byang gi phyogs su yang/ /nya dang sdig pa karka Ta/ /gshin rje'i phyogs kyi mdung rtse la/ /bu mo glang dang chu srin dgod/ /nang kyi phyogs kyi khal ni
106b1(mdo 'grel): srang dang bum pa 'khrig par grags/ /lug srang de bzhin seng ge bum/ /gzhung dang 'khrig pa zhes bya ba/ /'jom pa phan tshun gang gnas pa/ /sngar bzhin g.yas dang g.yon pa dag /rkang pa rdzogs pas mthong bar gsod/ /ma rdzogs mthong bas
106b2(mdo 'grel): stobs chung 'gyur/ /da ltar mdud rtse gi mthong pa la` pa'i mthong pa la` bcu gnyis so/ /phan tshun rnol le'u gnyis pa'i tad kal dang stun la ra? hu? lo? dad? gnas lta gsung` mthong ba'i` bar shes bar bya/ /4 la mi mthed mdzes ngag la ma rtogs ba` drag gza' yang`
106b3(mdo 'grel): lhan cig gnas dang sngon ma gnas/ /bzhi rnams mi thub dge ba yin/ /da yang lug dang seng ge dang/ /gzhu dang bum pa 'khrig pa dang/ /sdig pa bu mo de bzhin glang/ /nya dang chu srin bdag nyid dge /drag po'i gza' rnams
106b4(mdo 'grel): 'khyog por song/ bzhi la mi mthong? khyim de rol ni mi mthong ba bzhi bzhi yong` / mthong ba che chung gi stobs che chud yod` de la stobs cher 'gyur gang gi 'thod ba 4 bo la dge'o?/ /ba yin/ /gzhan 'dra'o/ /bsod nams gza' gzhan yang` rnams drang bo las/ /stobs ni che bar grags pa yin/ /rnam pa kun du lta ba min/ /g.yul sogs mngon par rdzogs pas 'grub/ /mdor na gza' yi phyogs la ni/ /stobs ni che chung brtag pa yin/ /rA hu stobs chung rang phyoD
106b5(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /lan gcig rgyal yang mthar ni 'pham/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad yin yang zer` par bya/ /rA hu gdong gi rgyu skar mchog/ gang gis rnam par shes pa yi/ /rgyal 'pham bde sdug shes par bya/ /groD kyi stobs chud/ bi
106b6(mdo 'grel): tshin dA hu dang ldan pa'i/ /rgyu skar rnams ni brtag par bya/ /dbyangs 'char rgyud las gsungs pa lta/ /pa'i rtsis ni/ de med rA hu sa gsod par byed/ /dA hu sod ba'i skar ma ni/ /sgra can gyi gdong skar gan? 'dug ltas la` da hu gdong gi skar ma nas`
107a1(mdo 'grel): kha ni nang du bri bar bya/ /mche ba la gnyis sna bug gnyis/ /sna sgo gnyis dang mig la gnyis/ /sna ba g.yon bzhi g.yas pa bzhi/ /dbral bar lnga ste spyi bor gcig /ltos ko la gcig cha phrin ba
107a2(mdo 'grel): bzhi/ /kha ya nang nas brtsams nas ni/ /g.yon skor du ni rim bzhin dgod/ /de la 'bras bu brtag par bya/ /kha yi skar ma la song na/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs lus la 'byung/ /mche ba gnyis kyi skar ma la/ /
107a3(mdo 'grel): nad ni 'byung bar ston pa yin/ /dkar pa'i rim pa` sna bug skar ma gnyis la gnas/ /btson ma 'khrul par` skyes skar dam/ ming skar du 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin/ /sna gong gnyis la gnas pa las/ /mi mthun pa yang
107a4(mdo 'grel): mdza' bar 'gyur/ /mig gnyis dag gi skar ma la/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byung zhes dran/ /sna ba g.yon pa'i skar ma bzhi/ /nor rnams zad par byed pa yin/ /sna ba g.yas ba la gnas bzhi/ /'dod don 'grub par
107a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhes dran/ /dbral ba'i lnga pos dbu thob cing/ /bde zhing skyid par yang dag ston/ /de bzhin spyi bo'i gcig la ni/ /rang 'dod gnas ni thob pa 'gyur/ /ltos ko'i skar ma gcig po yis/ /'bras bu bza' 
107a6(mdo 'grel): btud thob par 'gyur/ /mgrin pa'i skar ma bzhi po la/ /rtsod brdeg la sogs 'byung zhes dran/ /'di ltar rA hu'i? 'khor lo ni/ /rgyas par bshad do lha chen ma/ /lha mo bdag gis yang gsol ba/ /sngar gsungs
107a7(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo'i rim pa la/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge rnams/ /ji ltar 'char tshes la 'chad ba'i skabs su/ ba'i rim pa las/ /ji ltar 'char ba sngar ma 'tshal/ /gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan
107b1(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab byung la sogs lo rnams la/ /bcu gnyis lnga la a sogs 'char/ /de bzhin ba grod ? re re la/ /a sogs lnga ni 'char bar dran/ /tshe yi gnas skabs dag la ni/ /nyi mang a i ?
107b2(mdo 'grel): ces ba ni me yos nas mog bzung nas lo 60? la sdas bgos bas lnga tshan ldang 'gyur la 2 pa a'i 3 pa a'u 4 pa e lnga ba o 'char dus bzang zhing nub dus ngan bar ma rnam ni tang? snyoms so/ zla ba can du lho byang du/ 306? la ro re lo/ /de yi yang zer la lan ` 'di lo? cu la bgos pas lnga po 'di 'char bzla soD des 'dra`? ?
107b3(mdo 'grel): chu u li/ sa /ha ya ra ba la zla ba/ gyis? /mig dmar ka kha ga g+ha nga/ /rA hu ta tha da d+ha na/ /phur bu pa pha ba b+ha ma/ /Ta Tha Da Dha Na spen ba/ /tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya gza' lhag /a e ar o ma ba ke tu/ /yin` sha Sha sa ha ka da kar
107b4(mdo 'grel): bo'o/ /nam mkha' la nor 'jad chung? la rlung nad? me la tshad? nang chu la drang nad sa la soD? gnad 'di rnams la ga dbyangs dang gsal byed la lta'o/ /gza' re la lnga lnga yod pa` rag dang phra ba'i rim pa yis/ gnas skabs la 'char rje btsun ma/ /pa ba sangs yin/ de ltar cho ga ma lus

107b7(mdo 'grel): bu ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das la bdag nyan 'chal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya/ /khyod kyis ji ltar zhus pa bzhin/ /sman pa'i yan lag rgyu skar byis/ /dge dang mi dge'i
108a1(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu dang/ /spen pa rgyu skar spyod pa las/ /sems ni mnyam bar bzhag pa yis/ /rnyed dang mi rnyed shes pa dang/ /de bzhin 'tsho dang 'chi ba ston/ /sa gzhi rab tu yid 'ong la/ /? ?
108a2(mdo 'grel): gzugs ni mnyam bar bri/ /'khyud pa'i skar ma kha la bri/ /lag pa g.yas la bzhi dgod bya/ /rkang pa gnyis la skar ma drug/ /lag pa g.yon gzhi snying nad ? ? gar lnga/ /mig la gnyis te spyi bor gsum/

108a5(mdo 'grel): skyes? skar? ming skang la tsa?` lag pa g.yon bzhis rgyal sa shor/ /nor stor rang gi mja' bo gsod/ /snying gas rgyal bas rnyed pa dang/ /bud med ba la/ 2 gyi thob cing chos rnams sdud/ /mig gnyis skar mas nor? sdud yid//
108a6(mdo 'grel): mi mthun pa yang mja' bor 'gyur/ /mgo bos gnas` bde zhing dgra yang med/ 'khus nas /gsang bas 'jigs pa che gzhan las na po 'byung/ /yul thon 'chir nye'i sdug bsngal 'byung/ /bud smad dgrar 'byung 'thab
108a7(mdo 'grel): rtsod 'byung/ /de lta nyi ma'i bu la ni/ /rgyu skar gnas pa'i 'bras bu yin/ /kha 1 nas bgod pa'i rim pa gsang 2 bar bgrod pa ste/ /gsang ba nas na mgo bor 'gro /spen ba`? de nas mig 2?  na? rnam bar sbyod/ /mig nas snying
108b1(mdo 'grel): ga'i bar du 'gro /snying gnas ni lag pa g.yon/ /de nas 23 rkang pa lag pa g.yas/ /spen pa'i lus la gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar de ltar bkod pa yin/ /de ltar spen pa bshad zin nas/ /grogs mo gzhan gyi yan lag bshad/ /bya khyung?
108b2(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo mngon sum du/ /'bras bu ston no lha chen ma/ /bya khyud gzugs mdzes bris nas kyang/ /rgyu skar rim gyis dgod par par bya/ skor ba yin yang zor/ /nyi mas 'khyud ba'i skar ma de/ /mchu nas ji bzhin bri bar bya/ /brgyad ni rkang par
108b3(mdo 'grel): dgod par bya/ /mig la gnyis ni dgod pa ste/ /spyi bor gsum ni dgod par bya/ /snying ga dag la lnga yin te/ /gshog pa gnyis la brgyad bris la/ /de la phur bu gsung` 'bras bu brtag par bya/ /mchu la sod na lus nang 'byung/ /dad?
108b4(mdo 'grel): par don med mi dge 'byung/ /mig gnyis kyis ni nor rnyed 'gyur/ /spyi pos dgra rnams 'jom par byad/ /snying gas bud med mnyam par sbyor/ /gshog pas 'jigs pa chen po 'byung/ /lha mo skyes skar` 'di 'dra'i 'khor lo yis/ /
108b5(mdo 'grel): don ni nges par brtag par 'gyur/ /ji ltar lha'i gtso mo yis/ /zhus pa bzhin du bdag gis bshad/ /lha mes gsol pa/ biSh+Ti? 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ biSh+Ti rnaM pas ci zhig bya/ /las dang bya ba ji ltar leD/ /dbang phyug gtso bo nyan par 'chal/ /bcom ldan 'das
108b6(mdo 'grel): ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub mi 'grub kyi/ kyis bka' stsal pa/ /khyod kyi ji ltar zhus pa bzhin bshing kya nyon cig rje btsun ma/ /biSh+Ti rnam pa brgyad du 'dod/ /sna tshogs gzugs can stobs po che/ /thams cad bsdus pas brgyad yin te/ /me ru 'bar ba can zhes
108b7(mdo 'grel): bya/ shar/ dbang po'i phyogs su ka 2 ra la/ /mahA g+ho ra dbang ldan byang shar` du/ /dkris pa byang gi phyogs su ste/ mahI 'dzi? ba rlung gi phyog /chu bdag phyogs su ba ta ba/ /ma ha ma ri srin po'i phyogs/ /dus kyi lce ni lho phyogs su/ /biSh+Ti 'di rnams phyogs shas? na` a`
109a1(mdo 'grel): mtshams gnas/ /gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs ba/ /gdon gyi sgrub thabs sna tshogs 'gyur/ /zla bta? nya dang de bzhin gsum/ /bdun dang bcu dang 'byung ba nyin/ /bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu gcig la/ /rim pa
109a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin du 'char bar dran/ /de ltar zla ba nya ba la/ /me nas biSh+Ti 'bar ba can/ /dbang phyug gis kyang me mtshams su/ /de tshe phar do mar do? kha lta rung ma yin/ /de btar gnas pa'i gnas skabs las/ /las dang bya ba'i bye brag kyang/ /mi nas
109a3(mdo 'grel): rlung du 'gro ba dang/ /rdeg rdung med rgyas bshad` par las rnams 14? la zer/ bya/ /ka ra la yi sna tshogs mtshon/ /rings pa'i las dag nub tu dge /ma he lho ras smongs dang sin/ /gnon pa'i las rnams 'grub par bya/ /bkris bas byed ?
109a4(mdo 'grel): dgra dang 'thab pa dang/ /sdud` dgra yul bskrod drag po'i las` pa'i las rnams bya/ /mahe dzi kas dug sbyor dang/ /sna tshogs mthun ni bsgrub par bya/ /ba to b+ha las sngags dang dbang/ /gsod pa'i las sgrub shar du dge/ /dgra chen mo
109a5(mdo 'grel): la 'khrul 'khor dang/ /sgyogs kyi las lhod rnams bsgrub par bya/ /dus kyi lce la gzhan me'i 'tshams su/ sdud bya/ /sems can thams cad bsad pa bsgrub/ /ci la bab kyang bdag gis ni/ /biSh+Ti'i gdod ni spang bar bya/ /da nas biSh+TaMI? ha
109a6(mdo 'grel): mi/ longs spyod bshad/ /biSh+Ta'i nub byang du/ chu tshod sum cu ste/ /biSh+Ti 'i gdod dbang gi las/ la chu tshod lnga/ /bar gyi chal bcu bzhi byang du` ste/ /tha ma la ni brgyad du brjod/ /bye brag tu/ /mjug ma la ni gsum du dran/ /
109a7(mdo 'grel): mtshan 'di dus chu tshod lnga/ mo gdong dge mjug ma ngan/ /ba 3 dam mjug dge gdong sdug nyin mor dran/ /nyin mtshan snyam na 2 ka la 14` bar gyi la nor nyams shing/ /chu dar rgyad la tham la ni srog phrog byed/ /chung 3` bdun chas brkyad lho?
109b1(mdo 'grel): nya dang bcu bzhi la/ /nyin mo'i biSh+Ti zhes bya ba/ /gsum bzhi bcu dang bcu gcig la/ /biSh+Ti mtshan mor shes par bya/ /de ltar cho ga dbang phyug ma/ /biSh+Ti'i 'khor lo yongs su grags/ /g+hu? ji? Da ni dkar phyor la/ dbang ldan/ b+hu ts+tsha da ?
109b2(mdo 'grel): mi`? srin` dbang po` phyogs brjod/ /chu` byang shar rlung` nor bdag` `di rI li la Na shar phyogs d+ha la a thur yod/ me dza la ya ri yod ? snyaM? bar bris nas ni/ ba ri b+ha Da ? bri/ b+ha ja ts+tsha Ni d+hi nyaD b+hu rnams shar phyogs nas rtsal ?
109b3(mdo 'grel): gsal byed tshes su shes par bya/ /de bzhin dbyangs ni thun mtshams nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la/ /de ltar byas na g.yul las rgyal/ /ming gi yi ge dang po ni/ /phyogs dang dus la 'char bar dran/ /dbyangs yig
109b4(mdo 'grel): sde'i mthar ni sde tshan lnga/ /ya ra la wa de bzhin te/ /la dbang che ba ? sha Sha sa ha mthar thug pa/ /'i sde tshan dang po ri? lnga yod ha'i mthar thug pa ni/ phyogs mtshams la brgyad la rim bzhin dgod/ /ming gi yi so so'i ge dbyangs yis? a'i ?
109b5(mdo 'grel): la song/ /dbyangs 4046` 'i sde tshan dang` gcig dang dgu la rang phyogs dge /ka sogs rang gi phyogs la ni/ /gnyis dang bcu la dge bar dran/ /tsa sogs rang gi phyogs la gnas/ ming skar la yin dang po /gsum dang
109b6(mdo 'grel): bcu cig dag la 'jom/ /Ta sde rang gi phyogs gnas pa/ /shar phyags a yo de de ltar nas nub du 'gro ba dag gzhan des 'dre'o/ bzhi dang bcu gnyis ches la 'char/ ming yig / a ka tsa Da ta pa ya shar soD g.yas skor du/ ta sde rang gi phyoD
109b7(mdo 'grel): su yang/ /dag` /lha cub `? lnga dang bcu gsum pa yi tshes/ /rang gi phyogs su ba sde rnams/ /dbang ldan du 'gro ba dag/ tshes ni drug dang bcu bzhi la'o/ /ya ra la wa rang phyogs la/ /bdun dang bco byang nas lhor`
110a1(mdo 'grel): lnga dag sa 'char/ /de ltar shaSha sa ha rnams/ /rang phyogs brgyad dang gnam stong ngo/ /A na sa ha yi mthar thug pa/ /de ltar bdag nyid can du brjod/ /sde tshan brgyad ni rim pa bzhin/ /dang po nas brtsams phyoD?
110a2(mdo 'grel): mchams la` dgod/ /de ltar rang gi dbyangs dang ni/ /gsal byed phyogs mtshams nub byang nas srin por` yang dag rnams/ /dbang por tshes dang yi ge'i bdag /tshangs ma zhes byar yongs su grags/ /de bzhin me ru yi ge ka /go ru` nged`
110a3(mdo 'grel): ches kyi bdag po gzhon nu ma/ /gshin rje'i ming gi yi ge la/ /dbang phyug ma ni 'char bar 'gyur/ /srin por yi ge shar` 1 dang 9/ tshes pa a'i sde chan la` yang/ /khyab 'jug shar lho ka ste' ma ni 'char bar dran/ /
110a4(mdo 'grel): 2 dang 10 'o` de dag la dbang byed ma'i bdag mo ` ? sde ` chu bdag lnga dang tshes 3 dang 11/ bcu gsum la/ /ta sde'i 8 dang 4 dang 12` bdag mo phag mo yin/ /rlung du drug dang bcu bzhi la/ /pa sde'i bdag mor dbang mo 'char/ /bdun
110a5(mdo 'grel): dang nya la rnam thos phur/ /ya tshan dga' ches` byed ma yang 'char/ /dbang ldan brgyad dang gnam stong la/ /sha sde sgeg mo chen mor grags/ /de ltar tshes` phyogs mtshams thams cad du/ /dkar mo tshes tshes`
110a6(mdo 'grel): dngos? su 'ong ba la byung du` ni so so la/ /'i sde` dbang` ming gi yi ge dbang byed 'i dang po la/ 6 tshes` ma/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad 'i bdag ma/ 'char bar grags/ /dbang ldan brgyad dang rnal 'byor ma/ /rang phyogs zhes bas nas` nas song rgyal
110a7(mdo 'grel): ba ste/ /dir 'jug rnams la zhe sdang byed/ /stobs lo ni rang phyogs su` chen nus med mos pa la/ /gang 'tshams phyogs nas de'i thad mi 'char ba'i phyogs su 'gro logs pa la` 'khor lo bden par the tshom med/ de'i thad ka nas` de nas gzhan yang
110b1(mdo 'grel): bshad par bya/ /dus sbyor phyed pa 'khor lo mchog /hor zer` gang gis rnam par shes rtsam gyis/ /las kun the tshom med par 'grub/ /lha yi gtso bo zhag gcig la/ /dus sbyor phyed pa nyi shu bzhi/ /chu srang sum cu chu tshod gnyis/
110b2(mdo 'grel): ` dus sbyor byed pa'i bdag po'i gza''tshal na 1 la lngas bsgyur 'de la re gza' gang yin gnan pa ni nyi ma byung na snan zla ba la 2 snan des 'dre'o/ /de la 7 gyi sgos pa'i lhag ma du byung ba de dus sbyor byed pa'i bdag po'i? gza' yin no lug gi dus 'ang la` de'i tshad gang zhes pa` sbyor phyed par 'gyur/ /
110b3(mdo 'grel): nyin mo chu tshod bcu gnyis kyis/ /bgos `pas thob pa'i chu tshod yin/ /lhag ma drug cus bsgyur thob srang/ /` lug gi khyim lta bur nyin mtshan snyam pas te de ltar 'ong sto gzhan de ltar mi 'ong ste/ nyi ma thung ba'i dus su chu tshod 24 yod 12 kyis bgod
110b4(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo'i chu tshod? du yod pa 12 kyis bgod/ nyin mtshan gzhan ma des 'dre'o/ /de nyin gyi nyin mtshan gyi nyin ma'i chu tshod bgos te/ de lta ba ni 'pho ba gang la gnas pa'i 'das pa'i zhag zangs ji tsh+nyed pa gnas 2 steng mchus sgyur chu srang 25 yis 'og na bsgyur ba zhes ba'i skabs des shes so/
110b5(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo'i de bzhin shes par bya/ /de las dus sbyor byed pa yi/ /longs spyod rtogs par 'gyur ba yi/ /thog mar dang po nas 'pho ba 12 gyi snga dro chu tshod gang 'das de de nyid du song bta bu thur ma'i gra rims shes so/
110b6(mdo 'grel): 'di ni nyin mtshan ring? thung yang nyin mo dang mtshan mo 2 ka la chu tshod 60? 'dug pa la 12 kyis bgos pas de nyid ho ra yin te/ de nyid du song lta ba bur ma'i grib las shes so// ` hor dang po la ldas sgyur 2 pa la 2 ma ldas bsgyur 3 pa la 3 ma ldas sgyur 22 kyi bar du des 'dres ste/ ldas sgyur ba la gang yin pa de la res kyi gza'
110b7(mdo 'grel): ? ba ni zla pa lta bu la 2 gnon no// brtsams te/ /dus der thub shing rtsugs ba'i nyin mtshan gang yin pa'i dus sbyor byad pa sngar 'das pa rnams ldas sgyur/ /tshes de'i res gza' snan pa ni nyi ma byung na 1 zla ba byung na 2 snan 7 gyis bgo? lhag ma` gang 'das ldas bsgyur re gza' bsnan/ /
111a1(mdo 'grel): bdun gyis phye ba'i lhag ma rnams/ /dus sbyor phyed pa'i gza' ru 'gyur/ /dus sbyor phyed pa'i bdag po ni/ /dang po la sogs rim pas mthong/ /rangs nas grangs drug pa la/ /bskor bas?
111a2(mdo 'grel): ces? pa ni res gza' nas du ba dus sbyor byed ba dang bI bdag po yin de nas mgo gzung nas bgrangs pa'i dus gang byung de dus sbyor byed 2 pa'i gza' yin yang de ka nas 'go zung nas tu ba gang byung ba de 3 pa'i gza' yin no/ /de bzhin thams cad la byal/ ` gong gi nyin mo'i gza' rnams 6 la skor ces so/ /nyi ma'i 6 pa nas
111a3(mdo 'grel): pa sangs de ltar yin dpe chung ltar mchan la ldas skor ro// dus sbyor phyed bdag gza'/ /nyi ma pa sangs zla ba spen/ /phur bu mig dmar de bzhin sbyar/ /drug gi grangs la bskor ba yis/ /dus sbyor phyed pa'i bdag po 'gyur/ /
111a4(mdo 'grel): drag po bsod nams rtsig pa can/ /brtan? pa yangs pa yang byed ma/ /'chi ba dge dang dge ba dang/ /sdug 10 pa gtum 11 po smin drug dang 12/ /bdud 13 rtsi dus mtshan 14 drag byed 15 ma/ /bi tra ma dang skrag byed ma/ /g+hu 1 hi da zhes graD
111a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /sgyu ma'i 'od zer 17 chen mo dang/ /srog 20 'phrog mya ngan 'char ba 22 ma/ /da 25 hi ni dang mthun 24 thos ma/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rim pa bzhin/ /dus sbyor phyed pa'i ming du dran/ /drag 1 po dang ni rtsig ba can/ /'chi 2 ba dang ni
111a6(mdo 'grel): dgra 4 dang ni/ /dus 5 mtshan rgyu ba chen mo dang/ /skrag 7 byed ma dang srog 'phrog ma/ /mya 4 ngan 'das dang da hi ni/ /bcu po rtsub par yongs su grags/ /de rnams ho ra'i bdag me'i ming` kun la dge ba yi/ /las byas 'jigs
111a7(mdo 'grel): pa 'byung zhes smra/ /kha ni gyen bltas thur bltas dang/ /phrad la blta ba yod par snang/ /'dod pa nyi ma spyod pa'i rim pa yis/ /18 gyis dus sbyor phyed drag bo` pa shes par byed/ /dus sbyor thub shing gi ltas` phyed pa hor
111b1(mdo 'grel): gcig yin te/ /de ltar byas pa nyi shu bzhi/ /gyen thur phred kyi mtshan nyid kyang/ /nges pa nyen cig ri sras mo/ /nyi ma gang la gnas pa yi/ /snga ma'i phyed la gyen bltas dran/ /nyin ma dang ni lhan gcig pa'i/ /khyim du sbyor phyed pI ?
111b2(mdo 'grel): po 3 mi 'byung ba'i dus su zhes bya ba sngon ma ni gza' rgyu ta gyen ltas` zhag ta la` rgyas bshad` ni phred la bltas ba yin/ /` nyi ma lug lta bu la yod pa'i dus su khyim den chu tshod 6 yod pa'i phyed yan chad la longs spyad na khyim de nyin gyi phyed po 'das pa tshe gyen ltas de nyin phyed la 'ongs ba lhan 1 pa ste 'phred rtas
111b3(mdo 'grel): glang gi dus su longs spyod byed po/ 'thur ltas pa yis/ lug lta bu la nyams chu tshad 1 zos zin na/ yang khyim lug gi longs spyod phyed par bgos pa gong bzhin bya des 'dre/ nyi ma'i phyi nos 'gro ba yi zos zin te?/ thur bltas dus sbyor phyed pa yin/ /gyen thur phreng bltas rim pa las/ /dge
111b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i las ni rung ba yin/ /de rnams spangs ba'i phyed pa las/ /dge ba'i 'bras bu nges par mthong/ /'di ltar las dang bya ba la/ /nyon mongs phyed pa'i dus sbyor ni/ /phred thur ltas pas nyon mongs zhes bya'o/ /bar/ /byed 'gyur lha yi dbang
111b5(mdo 'grel): phyug ma/ /kha ni phreng bltas dus sbyor gyi/ /phyed pas 'khor rnams zad par byed/ /gyen bltas zhes byar grags pa yis/ /dgra yi khyim blang gi` bde kun 'pham par byed/ /kha ni thur bltas dus sbyor gyi/ /phyed pas dgra yis 'pham bar byed
111b6(mdo 'grel): mdor` rgyas bshad` rang gi dus sbyor bdag dgra la dmag grangs pas tshuD la` po yis/ /byed bas mthong na las kun 'grub/ /de lta rang gi` ra dus sbyor phyed pa'ang/ /bshad `rang gis dmag drangs nas dmag mi byed dgra yi bsod gsung` zin dpa' bo'i dbang
