150a5(mdo 'grel): pakUa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang/ gangs ri'i ri logs kyi ngos gnyi ka na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang/ ri ke dang /ri dung na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang/ ri rgyud chang ba na gnas pa dang/ lung pa na gnas pa rnams las
150a6(mdo 'grel): g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar chu smad la sa g.yos na bzo bo rnams la gnod par 'gyur te/ /lcags mgar? dang/ phyA mkhan dang/ tshon mo sten mkhan dang/ shing mkhan rnams dang/ 'breg mkhan dang /phyug po
150a7(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ rkun po rnams dang/ bzo bo rnams dang/ sna tshogs rnams dang/ thos zlos 'don pa'i gcam bu rnams la gnod par 'gyur/ yul gan ra'i mi rnams dang/ yul ke ka ya dang/ yul kha sha ba rnams dang/ gu zan yul dang/
150b1(mdo 'grel): yul ba gur na gnas ba'i drags pa gtum po rnam pa stong snyed dang/ 'bru zha yul la sogS pa dang/ yul sa ga ra de'i skye bo rnams la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar grong zhin la sa g.yos na rgyal bos bkur ba'i mi rnams dang/
150b2(mdo 'grel): bram ze rig byed slob ba'i mi rnams dang/ bstan bcos mkhas ba'i mi rnams dang/ snyan dag shes pa'i mi rnams dang/ yul gan b+ha ra nas yul ko'u shi ba'i bar dang/ yul me dar stag na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang/ sig nis kyi
150b3(mdo 'grel): yul gnyis dang/ yul du sra sa ha dang/ yul du mi la rjed pa'i mi dang/ yul sa ga ka'i mi dang/ yul laM pa ka'i mi dang/ yul na ga ha ra dang/ yul tsa ta bi sha ya dang /yul gi rtsa ka na gnas pa ma rungs pa du ma dang /yul la?
150b4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba'i ri la gnas pa dang/ mdza' i rgyal po chen po rnams dang/ yul ka sat+ta dang/ yul sagto? ra dang/ yul ba ri ra sa ndang/ yul bar+Na pu ri'i grong brdal dang/ klu'i gnas rnams dang/ 'di dag la sa g.yas na gnod par byung bar
150b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar mon gre la sa g.yos na mi phyug po dang/ ra lug dang/ bong bu dang /rnga mo dang/ dre'u dang/ lba dang ri dags kyi rnam grangs tha dad pa dang/ ma he dang/ 'phang dang rtsal che ba dang/ 'dun khang sna tshogs dang/ grong gi tshod
150b6(mdo 'grel): dpon? rnams dang/ yul kha ga dang/ yul swaste man+ta dang/ yul li kha dang/ yul mu na dang/ yul ba twa? ka ra dang/ yul go tha ma'i mi rnams dang /yul bo za dang/ yul si la'i grong khyer bru zha yul dang/ gu zan dang /yul tsit+ta dang/
150b7(mdo 'grel): chad zhim bo sna tshogs dag la dga' ba rnams dang /ri sha sha'i zri logs na gnas pa'i mi sna tshogs la sa g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar mon gru la sa g.yos na si'i 'og tu gnas pa rnams dang/ rgya mtsho'i 'og na gnas pa dang /rgya mtsho'i? 
151a1(mdo 'grel): nang na gnas ba'i sems can rnams dang/ sems can gzhan yang chu la brten pa rnams dang /de bzhin du rta dang/ glang bo che dang/ khyi rnams dang bong bu dang/ rnga mo dang/ bya rnams dang /de bzhin du dmag
151a2(mdo 'grel): mi dpa' bo dam ba dang/ mtshan shak+ti dang /ral gri kyog po dang/ / ral gri thogs pa'i mi rnams dang/ yul pral+la'i mi dang/ yul lho phyogs kyi rgyud kyi reng la brten pa dang/ lho phyogs kyi ri rgyud la drang srong thub pa gnas pa
151a3(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ yul lo gcig ba zhes bya ba'i mi dang/ bud med nu ma ya cig pa rnams dang/ dmag dbon du bskos pa 'di dag la sa g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar khrums stong la sa g.yos na chu dang mes 'tsho ba'i mi
151a4(mdo 'grel): rnams dang /de bzhin du ba lang gsod cing ma he la dga' ba/ nor bu de sogs la tshod ba byed pa dang/ yul so ba ra 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang/ lug gsod cing 'tsho ba'i mi dang /nags kyis 'tsho ba'i rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang
151a5(mdo 'grel): rol mo mkhan dang /mi dam pa dang/ rta rnams dang/ yul ma la la ba dang/ sgo 'byed cing rku ba'i mi ngan pa rnams dang /'di dag la sa g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar khrums smad la sa g.yos na tshong pa dang /chu la brten pa
151a6(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ 'gron lam du zhugs pa rnams dang /tshod pa rgya mtsho la gru bo che 'gro bar chas pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba rnams dang/ rang gi rigs rnams dang /tshang 'tshong gi las byed pa dang/ yul shi bi pa'i mi dang /yul
151a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i yo ta'i mi rnams dang/ rgyal rigs ardzu na ya'i rgyud dang/ yul sin d+hu dang/ yul ha nu Shpa dang/ kha che yul gyi mi dang/ ri khrod zab mo na gnas pa'i mi dang/ rtse gang na gnas pa'i yul dang /yul rnam ba du ma dang/
151b1(mdo 'grel): yul taM? ga la dang/ ba ra nang+ga la'i mi dang/ lha'i bu spang gi gnas me tog sna tshogs bye bas brgyan pa yul ri can brgyad ces bya ba na skye bo du mas gdab /gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ mtshon cha sna tshogs dang ldan par gnas pa la
151b2(mdo 'grel): sa g.yos na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar nam grul sa g.yos na 'thab mo'i g.yul drag shul cher 'byung/ grong phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ grong mi rnams dang/ ri khrod na gnas pa dang /'dun khang rnams dang/
151b3(mdo 'grel): yul de ta ? mi dang/ yul a nu sha dang/ tsa ka dang/ yul dzi ba ra dang/ yul ma tha dang/ yul ka sha dang/ yul baM ga zhes bya ba na dpung gis snyams pa'i nga rgyal mchog dang ldan pa na rlom par gnas pa gar byed cing glu len pa
151b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ smad 'phrod mas 'tsho ba dang/ yul sha na ka dang/ yul a bir ra dang/ yul man+ti dang/ yul tsarma ni ti na gnas ba'i mi dang/ dam gi ma dang/ dmag dpon dang/ yul mi ti li'i grong brngal chen po dang/ yul ni mi'i 'khor/ /
151b5(mdo 'grel): gyi grong brdal gyi mi dang bal yul nas shar phyogs dang/ byang phyogs kyi gzer mtshams kyi yul/ 'di dag la g.yos na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar tha skar la sa g.yos na rta rnams la nang 'byung bar 'gyur/ grong du
151b6(mdo 'grel): mi gsod par 'byung/ mi spun na de gsod pa 'byung/ tha skar gyi ngol rum du bu chags pa la mi dge'o/ /tha skar gyi dus su btsas ba la mi dge ste/ de phan chad lo gsum na mi dge 'byung dam/ de nas lo bcu na 'chi bar 'gyur /yul la
151b7(mdo 'grel): ri dang/ /yul te garta dang/ /yul ? skye bo rnams dang/ yul ardzu na'i mi rnams dang/ yul da rdu dang/ yul d+ha na bya dang/ yul sa ti na'i mi rnams la gnod bar 'gyur/ /rgyu skar bra nye la sa g.yos na rkun po rnams la gnod ba
152a1(mdo 'grel): cher 'gyur/ rgyal po byed pa dang/ mdud pa dang/ sgo lcags 'byed cing rku ba dang/ me long 'tshong ba dang/ dbyig dug spyod zhing sdud ba'i mi dang/ 'khor lo byed pa dang/ bcon srung dang/ gtum bo sdig can
152a2(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ rkum bo rnams dang/ g.yo byed ba rnams dang /mi bsrun ba dang/ phram byed ba dang/ gdol ba dang/ rigs dan la sogs pa'i yul gyi mdza' na gnas ba rnams dang/ rgya yul na rgya rnams dang/ rgya dam ba rnams dang/ yul
152a3(mdo 'grel): dga' ba bzang bo zhes bya ba rnams dang/ yul sya ba na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang/ chu bo chen po si tA zhes bya ba'i 'gram na gnas ba'i skya bo rnams dang/ mchom dros pa yid bzhin byed pa'i 'jig rten rnams la grags bde la/ 'dod chag
152a4(mdo 'grel): dang bral ba rnams dang /rig sngags grub ba dang/ reg 'dzin gyi tshogs rnams dang/ drang srong thub ba rnams kyis kyang bsnyen bar bya zhing 'dzam bu'i skye bo gnas ba dang/ ke la si ti sor? gangs dang/ gangs mangs te nor bu can gyi ri dang/ spos
152a5(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i ri gang ltar go dang/ de bzhin du su ri barsha zhes bya ba/ byang phyogs ngos dang/ gling rnam ba sna tshogs mang po dang/ ri rang dod dag na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang/ 'byung bo dang/ sha za dang /dri za dang/ srin bo'i tshogs mang bo dag dang
152a6(mdo 'grel): grub ba dang /rig 'dzin dang/ klu rnams dang/ de bzhin du sman rnam /stong snyed la gnod ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar sa g.yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun tshad du sal phan ba'i sprin sngo nag 'jam bo mig sa ba'i sman gyi mdog ri chen bo
152a7(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba las/ 'brug sgra zab mor sgrog cing nye bar 'brug sgra drag la/ glog rnam ba sna tshogs 'gyu zhing/ nam mkha' la sngon bo shur shur bo lta bur snang ba'am/ sgra 'byung ba'am/ skar mnga' lta bu med la/ rlung mi drag ba lnga bzhi du /tshub ma lta bu
152b1(mdo 'grel): mi sdug ba ni med / sprin gyi gzugs bkra shis kyi ri mo sna tshogs dang/ dbang po rdo rje lta bur snang ba dang/ nad bar nyi ma la char ba dang/ nyi ma nub nas zla ba 'cha ba'i sprin gyis mchod bar 'char ba dang /nam mkha' la sprin dal snyoms la 'jam
152b2(mdo 'grel): po'i gzugs rgyad ring bor song ba dang/ glog ban? tshun? du 'phro ba'i sprin de lta bu ni dge ba'i mtshan ma yin no/ /sprin 'jam la dal snyoms te/ bar chad med cing sprin gyi gzugs mi sdug ba mi snang ba de lta bur snang na sprin gyi mtshan ma de lta bu
152b3(mdo 'grel): dang ldan ba ni lha'i dbang bo sa g.yos bar bstan ba yin no/ /de ltar gang dang gang dus g.yos ba'i phan gnod kyi 'bras bu'i dmigs ni 'jigs shing dangs ba med ba yid ston la sa bon thams cad thob gyur cig/ las dang gson ma rnams kyang gyis
152b4(mdo 'grel): shig /rnam bar rgyal bar 'gyur ba yang bstan to/ /tshong ba yang ba'i tshe kun tu song yang 'jigs ba med do/ /yang sa g.yos ba'i rjes la zhag bdun sun chad du nam mkha' i sbyin gyis khebs te tha chags su srin ba la ltar dal snyoms bar song la/ nub
152b5(mdo 'grel): phyogs su nam mkha' la chu srin byis ba gsod ba dang/ sbal ba rnams dang/ nya dang/ chu srin 'dra ba'i sprin gyi gzugs snang la nad nub tu nyi ma dang zla ba'i char ba'i tshe sprin gyis bsgro bas ba med ba de ltar snang ba'i mtshan ma ni chu'i dkyil 'khor gyis??
152b6(mdo 'grel): ba zhes bya ste/ de ltar sa g.yos ba'i lan gnod kyi 'bras bu yang drang srod chen bos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du bstan bar bya ste/ thang bu dang/ ri ngos dang/ zhing dang/ mtsho 'bram dang/ de dag tu sa bon thob cig dang/ sa dma' ba dang/ ha cang chu che
152b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i sa dang/ 'dam rdzab can du btab ba ni ma rungs bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul de lta bur sa g.yos ba ni bkra shis te chu'i sa g.yos ba zhes bya'o/ /yang ba g.yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du rlung drag po langs la nad bar dang nub kar nyi ma dang zla ba dman
153a1(mdo 'grel): ser du snang ba de lta bu'i cha tshan ma snang bar mthong na/ de ni rlung gis sa g.yos ba zhes bya ste/ de'i ? gnod kyi 'bras bu bstan ba nyon cig /de'i tshe shes rab can dag gang yang mi 'gro bar ? 'dug la
153a2(mdo 'grel): mtshon cha skyabs ba'i gcan brtsig ba dang/ 'obs rka bgyi pa shig /rgyal po pa rol po dang mchams cig tu 'dug ba dang rtsod bar gyur te/ skye bo 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar sa g.yos pa thams cad ni lhag par mi rnams la gnod ba
153a3(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar bsgrags te/ de lta bu'i rlung gis sa g.yos ba zhes bya'o/ /yang sa g.yos ba'i rjes la zhag da du na tshun chad du de'i skyar mda' shin tu drag po ltung ba dang/ nang nub kyi tsho dmar bor gyur la/ nyi ma dang zla ba la dang dmar bor snad ? tshul
153a4(mdo 'grel): de ltar mthong na de ni ma'i sa g.yos ba zhes bya ste/ khyim rnams srungs kyang /mes 'tshig bar 'gyur/ du ba dang me dang/ mtshon rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ zla ba gur char mi 'bab ste/ zhing tha bar ltas bar 'gyur/ de ltar sa g.yos ba ni ban
153a5(mdo 'grel): cad mi dge ste/ me'i sa g.yos pa zhes bya'o// de ltar snga dros g.yos na rgyal po dang/ dmag gi dbung dang ldan pa/ rta dang glad po che dang/ dmag dbal dang/ blon bor bcas ba la mi dge'o/ /nyi ma gung las g.yas na nad byis 'debs
153a6(mdo 'grel): so phye ma rong las g.yos na ba lang dang/ phyugs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ de bzhin du rje'u rigs rnams lag gnod bar 'gyur/ du ba dang me dang/ mtshon rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ zla ba dgur char mi 'bab se/ zhing tha bar ltas bar 'gyur/ de ltar sa g.yos ba ni ban
153a7(mdo 'grel): cing mi dge ste/ me'i sa g.yos pa zhes bya'o// de ltar snga dros g.yos na rgyal po dang/ dmag gi dbung dang ldan pa/ rta dang glad po che dang/ dmag dbal dang/ blon bor bcas ba la mi dge'o/ /nyi ma gung las g.yos na nad byis 'debs
153a8(mdo 'grel): so phyem? rong las g.yos na ba lang dang/ phyugs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ de bzhin du rje'u rigs rnams la gnod bar 'gyur /da dbang dang nyi ma nub ba dang/ nam gyi gung dus mtshams su sa g.yos na rkun bo dang /gos dmar po gyon?
153a9(mdo 'grel): pa'i mi rnams la mi dga' o/ /mtshan mo srod las g.yos na gnod ba byed ba dang/ mdza' 'khob na gnas ba'i rkun po rnams dang/ ma ning rnams dang/ mtshan 'gyur ba rnams dang/ phyug bo rnams dang/ tshong spogs byed ba'i tshor ba dang
153b1(mdo 'grel): zhing tshang ba la mi dge'o/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo'i nam chung la sa g.yos na gtum po dag shul can dan byed ba rnams la mi dge'o` /zla ba yang gyi de'i nam chung la sa g.yos na chos sbyin byed ba'i yo byad dang/ bram ze mchod sbyin byed ba rnams la gnod bar
153b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /sa g.yos kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi ba'o// //nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'di dang gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan ma bstan ba yul gang du nyi ma shar ba'i tshe/ nyi ma 'dra bar nam mkha' la snad na de'i lho bya dag phyogs kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil
153b3(mdo 'grel): 'khor gyi gzugs rab tu gsal bar yang ma yin/ 'od zer yang mi gsal la/ sprin gyis gnas kun sod na de ni char ba 'bab pa yin te /dbyar gyi tshe ni nyi ma 'dra ba rtag bar yang 'byung ngo/ /dus 'di ma yin ba dus gzhan gyi tshe nyi ma 'dra ba snang
153b4(mdo 'grel): na 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yul gang du nyi ma 'dra ba dkar bo shar na yul dang bram ze rnams la mi rung ngo/ /nyi ma 'dra ba'i kha dog dmar por shar na rgyal rigs rnams dang /mtshon cha thogs bas 'tsho ba la gnod bar shes bar bya'o//
153b5(mdo 'grel): nyi ma 'dra ba kha dog ser bo'am kha dog sngon bor gyur na rje'u rigs rnams dang/ ba lang dang/ phyugs kyi 'tsho ba'i mi rnams la gnod bar shes par bya'o/ /gal te yul gang dang gang du nyi ma 'dra ba kha dog nag bor shar ? dmangs rigs rnam?
153b6(mdo 'grel): la gnod ba dang char ba cher 'gyur ro/ /gal te nyi ma'i g.yas rol tu nyi ma 'dra ba byung na lho phyogs su 'jigs pa cher 'byung/ zhag bdun ? char 'tshor 'bab par bshad do/ /nyi ma'i byang phyogs na nyi ma 'dra ba kha dog dkar bor snang ba byung na de
153b7(mdo 'grel): ni byang phyogs kyi rgyal bo la 'jigs ba cher 'byung/ char mi 'bab/ mu ge 'byung/ phan tshun du 'thob bar 'gyur/ /gal te yul gang du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar bar snang na btsong kye kha dog ltar dmar la/ gal te spen bo zlum bor yang snang na zla
154a1(mdo 'grel): ba ldan rgyal bo 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /da lta bu byung na de'i rjes la ltas ngan drag bo 'byung ste/ rgyal po 'thab cing gsod ba dang/ khrag dang mkhris ba'i nad rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nam nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi
154a2(mdo 'grel): nang na/ me skyes ba'i gzugs 'dra ba gong dang bcas pa gsal bar snang ni zla ba bzhi tshun chad du rgyal bo 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /yul der rgyal po sde dang bcas te ma rungs bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na zhabs ba sngon po dang /ser
154a3(mdo 'grel): po dang dmar po shar ba nam snang ba'i tshe zla ba bzhin mi'i dbang bo ma rungs bar 'gyur/ yul mi nad kyang 'byung ste/ 'jigs ba chen por shes bar bya'o/ /nam nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ral gri gyen du 'greng ba utpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma dang
154a4(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba chang zungs dang bcas ba gsal bar snang ba dang/ gong du zhugs bar snang ba de nyid kyis 'bras bu yang 'dir bstan te/ khyad par du ni mang bo mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na ril ba spyi blugs lta buAm/
154a5(mdo 'grel): reng reng bo'am phub lta bu snang na zla ba gsum tshun chad du bram ze rnams dang/ rgyal po la yang gnod ba 'byung bar ston to/ /de'i tshe lo ma rungs bar 'gyur ba'i char mo che 'bab pa dang/ mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na
154a6(mdo 'grel): gsil yab 'dra ba dang/ yang na sbrul 'dra ba snang na zla ba gsum na yul du 'jigs ba drag po 'byung bar ston/ mi sprul gyis zin pa rnams dang/ sprul gyi dug gis pheg pas ni 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na /gal te
154a7(mdo 'grel): bya rog lta bu snang dam 'on te bya snang ni bram ze rnams dang/ rgyal po la gnod pa zla ba phyed dang gsum na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang nyi ma'i nang na bya rgod kyi gzugs dang/ gcan zan smri? gom ti ka'i gzugs lta bu snang na zla ba phyed dang gnyis
154b1(mdo 'grel): na gnod ba 'byung ngo/ /lba'i gzugs lta bu snang na zla ba cig na gnod ba 'byung ngo/ /lung bong gi gzugs lta bu sna ba na zhag bcu na gnod ba 'byung ngo/ /yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du dbyug ba lta buAm/ gtan ba sbom po lta bu nyi ma'i nang na snang na
154b2(mdo 'grel): rgyal bo phan tshun gcig bas gcig srid che bas snyoms pa dang/ rgya mtsho bzhi la dbang ba'i mi'i dbang bo de lta bu la mi dge ste /'jigs ba mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar ltas ngan gyi 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus nges par bstan ba las dus
154b3(mdo 'grel): der gcod pa ma byung ste mi snang na de ni lo cig na 'bras bu sum 'gyur du skye ste/ gnod pa 'byung ba ston to/ /zla ba dum bur ltags sam/ mdog gyur tam /gso ba dang zla ba'i gzugs chen bor gyur tam /'phro ba dang/ rab tu g.yo ba dang /zla
154b4(mdo 'grel): ba tshes pa'i ? mi gsol ba 'di rnams ltar snang na/ skye bo la 'jigs ba 'byung ba'am skye bo las 'jigs ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ zla ba de la gza' rkyang gis thams cad zin na yang skye bo la 'jigs pa 'byung bar bshad do/ /tshul 'di dang 'dra bar
154b5(mdo 'grel): mdog tu snang ba dang/ zla ba'i mdog mi gsal bar snang na mig nad kyis 'jigs ba 'byung ba dang/ mtshan gyis 'gyed pa dang/ nad kyis 'jigs pa 'byung ba dang/ gzhan yang gnod ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang zla ba'i mdog dar la snum
154b6(mdo 'grel): zhing gsal bar snad na phyogs su bde ba dang tshor che dang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar zla ba 'gro ba dang/ bya ba dang/ gnas dang/ zla ba'i ? dang /mdog gyur pa dang/ tshul dang/ zla ba rgyu ba yang sems can gyi bsod nams ma yin ba byas pa'i 'bras bu ?
155a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ mtshon kar 'gyed pa dang/ 'chi ba dang tshegs 'byung ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar ston to/ /mtshan mo zla ba tshes pa nas gza' rnams kyis zla ba'i steng na phar thal le song na de rnams kyi gnod dbang dmigS
155a2(mdo 'grel): so sor bstan to/ /spyir ni rgyal po dang/ mi dam pa ma rungs par 'gyur/ char pa ha cang che ba dang/ bla ma ma rungs par 'gyur ba dang/ rgyal srid ma rungs par spyir ston to/ /zla ba'i steng na ba lba sangs gyis mnan te song na rgyal po'am
155a3(mdo 'grel): ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba'i thog nas mig dmar dang spen pas non te song na bkres ba'i 'jigs pa dang/ kho na drag shul can du 'byung ba dang/ rab tu 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba la phod mjug ring gis non te song na
155a4(mdo 'grel): mu ge dang mtshon gyis sa gyed par ston to/ /zla ba la gza' lhag gis non te song na lo legs pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar zla ba'i steng na phar gza' rnams kyis non cing phug ste song ba'i 'bras bu de ltar bstan pa yin no/ /gza' rnamS
155a5(mdo 'grel): kyis zla ba phug ste song ba de'i 'bras bu ni zla ba gzas phug pa las zla ba'i gzugs cher skyes la 'ong lhag par che na de ni rgyal ba zhes pa'o/ /gal te pham par gyur na mthu rtsal bri ba na zla ba 'dar cing g.yon pham ba zhes bya'o/ /de la pa
155a6(mdo 'grel): lba sangs kyis phug ste yul many+tsa dang/ yul bany+tsa la dang/ yul ma ga d+ha dang/ yul dam dra dang/ yul ku per dang/ mar gyi yul dang/ yul sar ga dang/ yul kha sha dang/ yul bu lin+dza dang /yul ke ka la dang
155a7(mdo 'grel): kha che yul dang/ par sig gi yul dang/ ri khrod na gnas pa rnams dang/ bud med rgyal po byed pa'i yul dang/ yul u pa tri tra dang/ yul i ga dang/ yul u ru ku ra ni dang/ yul su shi na ra dang/ yul bu ru Sha dang/ ??
155b1(mdo 'grel): ha dang/ bal yul dang/ ba lang rdzi la sogs pa rnams dang/ hyul pra ta na dang/ yul sta la lhan dang/ bcu la gnas pa'i mi rnams dang/ gangs ri'i lho phyogs la gnas pa'i mi rnams la zla ba bdun tshun chad kyis gnyen dang bcas pa rnams
155b2(mdo 'grel): ma rungs bar 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nam zla ba 'od gsal ba la phur bu phog ste song na/ yul bas ta dang/ yul sin d+ha dang/ yul ganda ra dang/ ri khrod na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang/ gang le'i yul dang/ sog le'u yul gyi lung
155b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i ljongs ri khrod pa brgya stong rnyed dang/ kha che yul gyi mi la zla ba bcu tshun chad kyis gnang ba the tshom med par 'gyur ro/ /nam zla ba'i 'od gsal bal phur bu phog na rgyal po yul gzhan du 'gra ba'am rgyal srid bya bar rtsom pa'am /rgyal srid byed bar zhugs
155b4(mdo 'grel): pa lam rungs bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhon pa'i rta rnams zad par 'gyur ro/ /phan tshun du bya zhing gnod pa dang/ dug dang mtshon mang pos rungs par 'gyur/ yul a yo dang/ yul su len dang/ yul ka li ka'i rgyal po rnams dang/ yul bu ri dang/
155b5(mdo 'grel): yul shagti? ti mi ti'i skye bo rnams ma rungs bar 'gyur/ yul dre gar rta dang/ yul ma la ya ba dang/ yul ku ra dang/ yul tat+tsa ra dang/ yul shi ba ya'i mi rnams dang/ dmag dpon rnams dang/ mi'i tshogs rnams dang /dmag
155b6(mdo 'grel): gi cho gas rnams dang` dbung dang ldan pa'i dus dang/ dang tshul la sog spa dang ldan ba'i mi rnams dang /yul lho phyogs na gnas shing brten pa'i mi rnams la zla ba drug gis 'jigs pa 'byung bar ston to/ /nam zla ba gza' spen pas phug
155b7(mdo 'grel): ste song na bram ze gtso bo dang rgyal po gdugs thogs pa 'thab mo'i g.yul du 'jug /'thab par byed/ blon bo dang bcas/ sde'i gtso bo dpon tshan rnams 'thab par 'gyur/ grong brdal dang/ tshong ba lam du zhugs pa dang/ yul a tsu ta'i ci dang 
156a1(mdo 'grel): yul go'u sa'i mi dang/ yul a bi sha ha'i mi dang/ yul ga shud dra'i ma dang/ yul mal ba dang/ yul a bir dang /mya ngan rnams dang/ yul mang pa rnams dang/ ba lang dang/ bong gu? dang /rnga
156a2(mdo 'grel): mo dang/ 'di rnams rgyal mchan du byed pa'i rnams ma rungs pa dang/ yul rus pa can du 'gyur ro/ /yul de rnams kyi mi la zla ba bcu bzhi na sdig pa zhi ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /nam gza' lhag gis zla ba phug na lo leD nad med/ char
156a3(mdo 'grel): pa legs par 'bab skye bo la gnod pa med cing bde ba dang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba la phod mjug rings kyis phug ste song na/ gal te skar thod las dud pa 'thul na mi dpa' bo dang/ mtshon gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang /chom rkun byed ba'i
156a4(mdo 'grel): mi rnams gzhan gyis mthu rtsal dang/ gnod pa dang/ drag shul gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang gal te zla ba re la gza' gzhan gyis 'bugs shing zla ba'i ngos la 'dud cing reg par song na mtshon gyis gnod pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung
156a5(mdo 'grel): ngo/ /gal te zla ba'i nang du gza' rnams song ste nub na rgyal po 'chi ba dang/ lus dang nor yang ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang brtsas pa'i bla skar gyi nang du gza' sbyang ki zhugs pa'am /zla ba la gza' sbyang gi zhugs la skar mda' zla ba la
156a6(mdo 'grel): phog na rgyal po 'chi'o/ /zla ba dang gza' gnyis kyi 'od zer phrad pa dang/ gza' zla ba'i thog na phar non te reg par song na gsar du zhugs pas snga na gnas pa rnams pham par byed pa dang/ rgyal pos skye bo rnams 'joms shing
156a7(mdo 'grel): za bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba me tog pad+ma dang u mu drang 'dra/ tshes grangs bzhin du zla ba skye zhing shas che bar snang na/ dkyil 'khor 'od zer ldan de nyams pa med par 'gro ba yin no/ /de ltar 'od zer bsil ldan mi rnams rgyal bar 'gyur/
156b1(mdo 'grel): zla ba 'char zhing 'gro ba bshad pa'o/ /rgyu skar dang/ rgyu skar gyi khyim gyi nang du gza' mig dmar zhugs pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa/ rgyu skar gyi khyim gang yang rung ba'i nang gza' mig dmar 'od kyi mdog 'jam pa dang ldan zhing chen por gyur te/ zla ba
156b2(mdo 'grel): brgyad dam bdun gyi bar du zhugs shing 'dug pa las 'od kyi kha dog dang/ bong che ba nyams na de ni mi dge ba yin te/ rgya skar gang dang gang gi nang du gza' mig dmar zhugs pa de nyid la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /gza' mig dmar tshul de lta bur
156b3(mdo 'grel): zhugs pa ni skye bo rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /yang gza' mig dmar yon por 'gro zhing 'jug pa dang/ phyir yang 'khor zhing zhugs pa dang/ mig dmar gyi 'od dang/ mdog nyams pa dang/ gza' mig dmar rgyu skar dang nyi zhing 'od
156b4(mdo 'grel): 'dres pa dang/ mig dmar las dud pa 'thul ba dang/ 'bar ba dang/ mig dmar gyi rtse mo las 'od zer dang ldan par gyur ba dang/ phan tshun du 'pho zhang 'gro ba 'am/ lam gcig tu 'dug la 'od dmar po 'am/ /yang na dud pa mi sdug pa cher
156b5(mdo 'grel): 'brul na gnod pa byed 'dod de/ de ni rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na gza' mig dmar 'od dmar pa 'bar na 'byung po thams cad la mi rung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na gza' mi dmar nam mkha' la rgya zhing shar nub ltas mi snang bar 'gron/ ?
156b6(mdo 'grel): rigs bzhi rnams 'jigs par 'gyur/ gang dang gang gi rgyu sgar nang du zhugs su de ltar mi snang na mi de dag la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /nam gza' mig dmar rgyu skar dang skar ma kun gyi nang du 'od kyi mdog bzang bor snang na /mi rigs bzhi thams cad la
156b7(mdo 'grel): phan par 'gyur ro/ /mig dmar gyi mdog dang 'od nyams na dge ste ngan par la'o/ /yang gza' mig dmar yon por 'gro zhing tsha ba zhes bya ba dang/ gdong ? can zhes bya ba dang /sprul zhes bya ba dang/ gdong dmar po zhes bya ba dang/ mig
157a1(mdo 'grel): dmar yon por 'gro ba drag shul can zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin du gtun bu zhes bya ba dang/ mig dmar shar ba rgyu skar bdun gyi nang du zhugs pa dang/ yang na rgyu skar dgu 'am yang na rgyu skar brgyad kyi nang du zhugs pa
157a2(mdo 'grel): las phyir log na de ni yon po chang ba zhes bya'o/ /mig dmar de ltar zhugs pa la/ de'i tshe kha dog gi thad ka 'am/ nags tshal gyi tor to'i thad ka nas/ mig dmar rtag ru rgyal ba bzhin du 'dug la/ nag po reng reng po zhig tu gyur na rigs
157a3(mdo 'grel): nang kyang 'byung/ rab tu dga' ba med par byed/ gang dag me'i las kyis 'tsho zhing gtso bo dang/ sreg par byed pa de dag kyang me shor zhing thor bas skye bzang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar bcu gcig gam yang na rgyu skar bcuAm/ yang ni bcu gnyis kyi
157a4(mdo 'grel): nang du zhugs te 'dug na de ni gza' drag po yon por zhugs pa gdong mchis zhes bya ste/ gza' de ltar zhugs pa ni sbrin du char ba 'bab ste/ char legs par 'bab kyang gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pas phan par mi 'gyur/ mi'i lus kyis g?
157a5(mdo 'grel): gzungs lnga yang nang can du gyur bas de'i phyir na nad mang po 'byung bas mi kun ring cing skam pa dang/ 'jig rten du mi rnams la nad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyu skar bcu gsum mam yang na rgyu skar bcu'i nang du gza' mig dmar zhugs pa
157a6(mdo 'grel): las slar log na de ni yon pa sbrul zhes bya ste/ glang po chen rnams/ sbrul pa cha dang/ sbrul rnams kyis gnod pa byed par 'gyur/ mtshan gyis rmas pa rnams mi 'tsho/ /sman dang 'bras bu rnams dang/ ldum bu rnams legs par smin cing
157a7(mdo 'grel): 'khrung bar 'gyur/ yang char snyoms par 'bab/ sa bon thams cad rab tu 'khrung ngo/ /yang rgyu skar bco lnga'am/ bcu drug gi nang du gza' zhugs na/ gza' drag shul can de gdong dmar po zhes bya ste/ rgyal po phan tshun 'thab cing g.yul
157b1(mdo 'grel): bgye ste/ mtshon gyis rmas bas de'i tshe sha khrag gi 'dam du 'gyur ro/ /yang gza' mig dmar rgyu skar bcu bdun gyi nang du zhugs te/ phyir log na de ni drag shul can dang/ gtum po drag po zhes bya ste/ de'i tshen skye bo mang po rnams snying rje
157b2(mdo 'grel): med/ snying brtse ba med/ bka' khrims dang chos lugs med de/ de'i dus na skye bo rnams gcig la gcig ral gri dang/ mdung bus 'debs shing 'phen par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gza' mig dmar gza' drug tu 'pho zhing 'gro ba tshangs ba
157b3(mdo 'grel): skye dgu'i bdag po ltar rab tu ston/ de lta bu la gza' mig dmar de song ngam/ 'dug gam/ yod dam med dam/ byar yang mi rung ste/ de la nam zla gsum gyi bar du gza' mig dmar rab tu song na de'i tshe skye bo rims nad kyis ma rungs pa
157b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ sa'i bcung zad par 'gyur ro/ /gza' mig dmar bong chun du gyur/ rnam par gzer bar 'gyur/ rnam par gnod par gyur/ dkyil 'khor chung du gyur bas yul phyogs gang na snang ba de'i tshe mig dmar pham pa zhes bya ste/ de ni yul
157b5(mdo 'grel): phyogs su gnod par 'gyur ro/ /gza' mig dmar de ltar gyur na mi'i sa dang/ me la brjed pa'i las byed pa'i mi dang/ yul ma le ba'i mi dang/ yul ku sha'i mi dang/ yul nya sha'i mi dang/ yul bi ti'i mi dang/ yul sa lang ma'i mi

157b7(mdo 'grel): na yul de rnams kyi mi gnod par 'gyur ro/ /gza' mig dmar 'jug pa bstan pa'o/ /Arya sha ru laM ka r+Na'i nang nas gza' skar gyi ltas 'byung ba btus pa/ ltas dang mtshan ma dge bar gyur cig rdzogs so// //

158a2(mdo 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas skabs bzhin shes skyes bu yi/ /dang po'i gnas skabs gsal 'dod na/ /mkha' nyi drug sogs lo yis bsgyur/ /de la mkha' nyis bgos thob lo/ /dag na kun sdoms mkha' nyi grub/ /so so'i lo rnams mkha'

158a4(mdo 'grel): des rgyas shes/ /brgya sogs gsum la'ang drug la sogs/ /gza' dgu so so'i lo yis bsgre/ /mkha' dang nyi mas thob pa lo/ /lhag la nam mkha' me yis bgo/ /thob pa zla ba ltag ma zhag/ de nas so so'i lo rnams kun/ /mkha' dus me yis

160b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang? rgyas ba'i las dang/ bag ma'i las dang/ phyugs kyi 'dul sbyong bya ba dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ nang zang bar byed pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /g.yo ba'i las dag bya'o/ /chu srin gyi dus sbyor la/ zhing las dang/ rten pa bcol ba'i
161a1(mdo 'grel): las dang/ chu'i las dang/ rgyu 'phrul? bya ba dang/ bcings ba bkrol ba dang/ chu brtol bar bya ba dang/ g.yog mo gzhug pa dang/ rkang ba'i las dang /rnga mo'i las dag bya'o/ /bum pa'i dus sbyor shar ba dang/ gru ba'i las thams
161a2(mdo 'grel): cad dang/ chu sbyin pa dang/ brtan pa'i las dang/ sa bon btu ba'i las rnams bya'o/ /nyi ma'i dus sbyor shar ba dang/ rig pa brtsam pa dang/ rgyan 'dogs pa dang/ rgyan 'dogs pa dang/ bzo'las dang/ so nam bya ba dang/ /phyugs kyi las dang/ rgyu 'grul bya ba dang/ bza' 
161a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ bag ma dang/ tshas slob ba la sogs pa mkhas pa'i las bya'o/ /'pho ba yang de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/ /dus sbyor brtan pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rIdza yA nanda dang/ chag lo tsa ba dge slong
161a4(mdo 'grel): chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //dbyangs 'char gyi brgyud pa ni/ rgyal ba shAkya thub ba chen po/ sh+rA ma he shwa ra/ dpal mgrin mgon po/ /dpal tshangs lha mgon po/ /dpal zla ba kun dga' mgon po/ /dpal utpam
161a5(mdo 'grel): mgon po/ /dpal bsang ba'i mtshan can /dpal maN+Dal b+ha dra/ dpal a b+hin gupta ratna/ dpal sha ka b+h+ra dra/ dpal phun sum tshogs 'dzin bzang po/ dpal seng ge go cha/ dpal dz+nyaM ba'i dga' byed/ dpal 'ong byed/ dpal ja ya un ma
161a6(mdo 'grel): lotsa ba pradz+nyar tu/ dpal birya baTTa? b+ho/ dpal dkon mchog mgon po/ /dpal khams ston dga' ba a b+ha Shiny+tsa kau ra sh+ri/ a nanda ratna d+hots+tsha/ des dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje dpal bzang po la rgyud do/ /rgyud 'di sa mo phag gi lo/ /dbyid zla
161a7(mdo 'grel): 'bring bo'i yir nga'i tshes drug la/ bal yul yam bu sa la gong gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ro/ /mang du mi sbel sdig can la sogs pa? min// sems can gcod byed slob dpon gsong la min/ /dang rgyud bzang zhing dam pa'i rigs can la/ /? 'byor me tog
161b1(mdo 'grel): blangs la rgya gsum gdag/ //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nya sha te ga na ma pra ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ shes rab brgya pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig legs
161b2(mdo 'grel): par rtogs pa yis/ /mi rnams shes rab brgya skye ba/ /don gyi bstan bcos lugs ngag ni/ /'byung gnas chen por rab tu bshad/ /mkhas pas don gyi bstan bcos las/ /dngos po gang dag gzigs gyur pa/ /de dag yi ge mang po yis/ /'jigs pa'i ?
161b3(mdo 'grel): du 'dor bsdu bya/ /yi ge nyung la don mang ba/ /gtan tshogs sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /'di ni tshigs su bcad pa brgya/ /shes rab brgyab zhes bya'o/ /mthong dang ma mthong yon tan 'di/ /kun gyi rtsa ba shes rab yin/ /de ltar gnyis ka bsgrub ba'i phyir
161b4(mdo 'grel): shes rab yongs su bzung bar bya/ /chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi/ /'byung gnas chen po rigs pa yin/ /de ltar dang po gus pa yis/ /shes rab yum chen bzung bar bya// shes rab ldan pa cig kyang yang/ /gzhan gyi 'di la gnod mi 'gyur/ /?
161b5(mdo 'grel): thabs ldan pa'i lus chung yang/ /tshan dang ldan pas yod mi brnyas/ /shes rab kyis ni lus bsrungs na ba dgra yi tshegs? kyi ci byar yong/ /lag na gdugs dang chas ba la// char gyi rgyun gyis rdzib med// shes rab rtsal dang bral na ni/ /gzhan gyi ?
161b6(mdo 'grel): byed kho nar zad/ /glang chen ri brtsags lta bu yis/ /lus dang ldan pa snang ba bzhin/ /shes rab mig bya rnams la ni/ /rgung pa rnam par 'jigs 'gyur te/ /lag na mar me thogs pa yi/ /mdun na mun pa med pa bzhin/ /shes rab med pa'i phun
161b7(mdo 'grel): sum tshogs/ /gnam 'bab bzhin du byung ba yang/ /skad cig kho nas de dag med/ /ma rungs pa rnams dra shes pa bzhin/ /legs par brtags te byed pa la/ /ma rungs pa dag mi snang ste/ /'phrang ngo bar tha ba'i lus la ni/ /nad kyi bar chad mi 'byung ngo//
162a1(mdo 'grel): gang la rang don 'phel 'gyur ba'i/ /bshes gnyen yod pa de mkhas pa/ /chu yis gang ba'i mtsho la ni/ /mkha' la rgyab rnams kyang bsten/ /gang zhig gnyen dang 'brel ba yi/ /nor de yang ni ci zhig rang/ /?
162a2(mdo 'grel): gyi mgo la 'dug pa yi/ /nor bu la ni su zhig rog/ rang don bsgrub bar bya ba rnams/ /bag med las kyis bsgrub mi bya/ /sprul so shin tu gdug pa yis/ /don ma bsgrubs par 'phung ba snang/ /rang don bsgrub bar bya ba rnams/ /bag ? tshes
162a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i las kyi bsgrub/ /srin bu pad+ma zin can lus/ /khrag 'thungs bzhin du mi mthong ngo/ /rang gi rting 'dzugs 'dod pa yis/ /gzhan gyi phan la brtson par bya/ /rting 'dzugs sbyor ba ma byas ba'i/ /bsgrub ba po yis tse mi 'grub/ /gzhan gyi phyoD
162a4(mdo 'grel): gzhom 'dod pas kyang/ /bdag nyid? yon tan ldan par bya/ /gzhu ni rgyud dang mi ldan ba'i/ /mnga' lta gang du phyin par 'gyur/ /dbri 'khyud med par smra ba dang/ /ji skad smras bzhin bsgrub pa dang/ /chos bzhi nyams dang sbyar ba yi/ /mi pho rnams ni
162a5(mdo 'grel): bde bar 'tsho/ /ya rabs rnams kyi sbyong ba la/ /skye bo don bas gnod mi 'gyur/ /rin chen sgron ma 'bar ba'i rtse/ /thor 'thung tshogs kyi mi gsod do/ /gya nom skyes bu ji zhig ltar/ /ngan pa'i gnas su phyin 'gyur na/ /dur khrod kyi ni mi bzhin
162a6(mdo 'grel): du/ grogs ngan bsten las 'jigs pa 'byung/ /g.yo can ngag 'jam smra ba la/ /mkhas bas nan tan ma brtags bar/ /yid brtan bya bar rung ma yin/ /rma bya yid 'ong sgra sgrog pa/ /zas su du dga' chen zab bzhin/ /shes rab can gang dgra la
162a7(mdo 'grel): yang/ mdza' ba shes lta bur sgrub byed pa/ /rgya mtsho bzhin du mi 'khrugs te/ /skye bo ngan bas drod mi zin/ /phyi rjes su ni blta ba dang// bag yong khong khro med pa dang/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa'i mi g.yel ba'i/ /mi la dpal mgon nye bar gnas
162b1(mdo 'grel): gang zhig lan la mi re bar/ /sbyin ba gtong la sems spro ba/ /de ni snyan dag mkhas pa bzhin/ /mi g.yul 'di ni grags pas mdzes/ /gang zhig dbang po bran lta bu/ /bka' bzhin rjes su mthun byed ba/ /rgya mtsho che la rin chen bzhin/ /de la 'dod ga? phun
162b2(mdo 'grel): sum tshogs/ /bya ba ma yin mi byed cing/ /bshams pa 'khos la phebs pa dang/ /yul la 'dod pa thag bsrings pa'i/ /skyes bu mkhas pa sus mi bkur/ /mthu rtsal ldan pa'i khengs sems kyis/ /lugs kyi gdams ngag yongs mi spang/ /ru shing
162b3(mdo 'grel): bzang bo'i gzhu mchog kyang/ /rgyud med gzhung bor ci zhig bya/ /g.yon can rnams kyi gron can tshig /mdzangs pas legs par ma brtags na// khong glu'i don rnams ma dpyang ba'i/ /ri dags gzhan gyis brlag par snang/ /mkhas bas rtag tu dgra la?
162b4(mdo 'grel): mnyen nges can du bya dgos te/ /mkhri shing gnyan bos ljon shing la/ /mkhris nas rtsi mor phyin te gnas/ /khong rgyud dog btsam gyis 'dir/ /dgos dgu 'grub bar mi 'gyur bas/ /yid kyis legs par rnam btags te/ /ngag gis bzhams
162b5(mdo 'grel): te smra bya zhing/ /res 'ga' bya la'i sbyong pa sbyang/ /thabs dang ldan pa'i spyod ba la/ /mkhas pa su yang smod mi byed/ /rngon pa bus mo gnyis btsugs te/ /yan lag rnams ni rkum phag tu/ /byas te khong gru? snyan len pas/ /ri dags gsong bar mi
162b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ram// rgyal po'i bzhed? pa mi sbyor bo/ /mkhas pas rtag tu 'bad de spad/ /sa bdag 'khor bcas thag ring zhes/ /khyad du gsang par rung ma yin/ /lugs la mkhas pa'i blon bo yis/ /skye bo ma lus skyod byed ba'i/ /rgyal po gcig pu kho nas kyang/
162b7(mdo 'grel): sa rnams ma lus cham du phebs/ /gang na rgyal po 'bangs rnams kyis/ /legs nyis sems bar byed pa yi// yul der rgyal po yod ces bya/ /de ltar de dag brtson brtag /gang na rgyal po 'das rnams kyis/ legs nyes sems par mi byed pa// ?
163a1(mdo 'grel): de dag gtsug lag la/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bsten mi bya/ /yon tan ldan pa chung yang ni/ /'jig rten ? chen thob par 'gyur/ /zla ba shas tsam lus pa yang/ /drag po yi ni spyi la thogs/ /mkhas pa gang zhig

163a3(mdo 'grel): sar 'phyong ba ci cha yod/ /yon tan ldan yang thams cad du/ /grags chen thob bar 'gyur ma yin/ /zla ba'i 'od zer bsil ba'i rnams/ /pad+ma'i rdzing dang 'phrod me 'gyur/ /mjug tu skyor 'byin byed pa yi/ /snyan tshigs mkhas pa su mi sngags

163a6(mdo 'grel): rgyab kyis phyogs/ /snying la kho nad du dam bzung nas/ /gshes pa'i tshig ni ston byed pa/ /de dag mdzes pa ma yin te/ /srin? bus zos ba'i sdong rul bzhin/ /gang dag tshig tu snyan smra zhing/ /snying la gzhan zhig 'jog byed pa/ /ri dags gzugs 'chang rtag
163a7(mdo 'grel): lta bur/ /de dag gtan gnas ma yin no/ /g.yon tshe grags bdag pa'i rgyu/ /'jig rten pha rol pham gyur pa/ /da gnyis gcig kyang med pa ni/ /'jig rten gnyis ni ci zhig mi/ /gar skyes su ni zad ces te/ /rang ri btson pa dor mi bya/ /'bad pa
163b1(mdo 'grel): med par til dag las/ /til mar thob par 'gyur ma yin/ /kun la mnyes des mi bya ste/ /ha cang des pas gnod par 'gyur/ /chu shing snying po med pa la/ /su zhig bcad bar rtsom mi byed/ /gang zhig gtong phong blo ldan pa/ /tshig bden gtsang la bya
163b2(mdo 'grel): pa bzo// de la rtag tu dpal grogs rnams/ /grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang/ /nags kyi glang chen zhags pa yis/ /bcings nas dbang du byed pa yang/ /thabs mkhas tshul la gnas pa yi/ /yon tan rnams kyi mthu stobs yin/ /rje dpon rang don ?
163b3(mdo 'grel): len pa/ /g.yog 'khor sten par mi byed// sha la rkam ba'i seng ge la// wa skya re tha ga bcad ba bzhin/ /gang zhig legs byas mi tshor ba/ /de la g.yog 'khor brten mi byed/ /tsha rgod can la legs smos kyang/ /la thog phun sum tshigs mi 'gyur

164a1(mdo 'grel): gzu lums can gyi spyod pa rnams/ /dgos pa myur du nyams par 'gyur/ /ha cang log la zhen pa yi/ /bdog pa gzhan gyi nor bu 'gyur/ /sbrang mas 'bad de bsags pa yi/ /sbrang rtsi gzhan dag sprod par ?/ /

165b1(mdo 'grel): lugs legs sbyang na/ /lha yul 'grod pa thag mi ring/ /lha dang mi yi them skas las/ /'dzags nas thar ba'ang lam na 'dug/ don gyi bstan bcos lugs po che/ /don mang phreng ba brgyus pa las/ /gces pa'i snying po mdor bsdus pa/ /shes rab brgya ba 'di yin no/

165b5(mdo 'grel): bu zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi srun skye bo gdul bar bya/ /yon tan can ni bkur bar bya/ /drang bo'i sbyong pas dkor mdzod dgang/ /rang giyul 'khor bskyad bar bya/ /bdag gi gsang dang gzhan gyi gsang/ /rang gi bu gces bzhin
165b6(mdo 'grel): bsrungs na/ /sa rnams la ni snyoms gyur pa'i/ /mi ni gces pas rab gces 'gyur/ /chung ma ngan dang mdza' bo ngan/ /rgyal bo ngan dang nyed du ngan/ /khyim mtshes ngan dang yul ngan rnams/ /thag ring du ni spang bar bya/ /grogs po nor dang che ba spongs/ /chung ma log
165b7(mdo 'grel): g.ye ma dang che spongs/ /bkur dka' gso mi mkhas pa yi/ /de lta bu yi sman pa spongs/ /bye brag phyed ba'i blo ldan yang/ /bya ba gros kyis bsgrub par bya/ /'grub 'gyur kho nar ma zad kyi/ /ma grub na yang mdzes pa yin/ /bstan zhing 'jam la tshig nyung
166a1(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa/ /de la mis ni shin tu bag bya ste/ /nyi ma sprin bu gnang nas khyud pa yi/ 'od zer shin tu tsha bar gyur ba bzhin/ /bstan rnams sdug bsngal myong gyur kyang/ /yid ni gdung bar mi byed de/ zla ba sgra gcan khang
166a2(mdo 'grel): zhugs nas/ /'char bar cig mi byed dam/ kun dga' ra ba'i phred rgyud ltar/ /me tog rgyas pa btu bya yi/ /ji ltar sol ba mkhan bzhin du/ /rtsad nas bcad par mi bya'o/ /gsug dang rgyal po'i bka' drin dang/ /smad 'tshong gla dang legs
166a3(mdo 'grel): brjod dang/ /gru yi gla dang gnas kyis bskal/ /de nyid du ni blang bya ste/ /drug po yun ring thob mi 'gyur/ /rig sngags log par shes pa dug /nad la btang snyoms byas pa dug/ rgan pos gzhon nu bsten bdug/ dbul po nyin par nyal ?
166a4(mdo 'grel): dam pa mang po khas 'tshas mi byed la/ /gal te dka' bas khas ni blangs gyur na/ /rdol ri mo bris pa lta bur ni/ /shi yang gzhan du byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dus su dgra dang 'dum par bya/ /dus su bshes dang 'thab par bya/ /bya dang mi bya'i tshod shes
166a5(mdo 'grel): pas/ mkhas pas dus ni 'da' bar bya/ /kha yi nyes bas 'phung 'gyur te/ /na tsho ri skyegs ti tir/ /mi smra chu skyar mis mi 'dzin/ /thams cad 'grub byed mi smra yin/ chas bzhag bstar bas dgra bo gdul/ /gos dan gyis ni chung ma gdul/ /bsnyung
166a6(mdo 'grel): ba byas pas nad rnams gdul/ /goms pa yis ni ma rig gdul/ /rang gi spyod ba sba bar bya/ /'dam gyi nad du lus bcug pa'i/ /gal te myu gus ma bos na/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba su yis rnyed/ /gal te mngon sum gyur kyang ni/ /mi srid dngos po smra mi
166a7(mdo 'grel): bya/ ri mo la gnas rma bya yis/ /ji ltar nor bu za bar byed/ /gang zhig yid la gnod byed 'dod/ /de la rtag tu slan? tshig brjod/ /rngon ba ri dags gsod mthong tshe/ /yid 'od glu snyan len ba bzhin/ /bsam pa gang dad gang gis ni/ /mi rnams yid
166b1(mdo 'grel): ni yang dag sbyor/ /das na de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no/ /gzhan gyi khur khur 'tsho ba sla/ /nags na shing shun gyon ba sla/ /mi rnams shi bar gyur kyang sla/ /nyin re bzhin du brnyas thabs min/ /ma brnyas mi yi rtsa ba yin/ /brnyas pa'i
166b2(mdo 'grel): nor gyis ci zhig bya/ /nga rgyal dregs pas rab bcom pa'i/ /nor dang sreg gi ci zhig bya/ /bya ba mi lcogs rtsom par byed pa dang/ /tshor dang 'khon zhing stobs ldan dag la rgol/ /bud med la ni yid brtan byed pa ste/ /'chi bdag bzhi po sgo yi drung na sdong//
166b3(mdo 'grel): rgyal po ngan pa yong ma mthong/ /mdza' bo g.yon can yod ma mthong/ /'dod ldan chung ma yod ma mthong/ /skye bo sdig can yod ma mthong/ /gang zhig kun tu bgrod bya yod pa de/ /rang yul chags pas brlag par ci phyir bde/ /skye ba ngan pa bdag gis khron pa ni/
166b4(mdo 'grel): 'di yin zer zhing ba tshwa can chu 'thung/ /skye bo blo dbangs mtho ba la/ /'di na bde skyid gnyis yod de/ /'du 'dzi thams cad spangs pa 'am/ 'byor ba shin du rgya che ba'o/ /dpal ni rgyab kyis phyogs gyur cing/ /rtsol ba don med nyid gyur pa'i/ dam pa dbul por
166b5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa la/ /nags las gzhan du bde ba med/ /dam ba'i 'go? ba gnyis yin te/ /me tog dag gi mgo lcogs bzhin/ /'jig rten kun byis sbyir bkur ba 'am/ /nags nyid du ni da nges par bya/ /dang gis skad cig 'jig pa yi/ /tshe yi snying po 'di yin te//
166b6(mdo 'grel): mdzad dad mkhas dang shed ma bye/ /lhan cig bag yangs gnas pa'o/ /bsags na srog mkhar 'phel 'gyur la/ /sbyad na mig sman zad 'gyur ltar/ /'du las 'god pa chung 'gyur ba/ /de nyid kho na mkhas pa yin/ /grog mkhar dang ni sbrod rtsi dang/ /zla ba
166b7(mdo 'grel): tshes ba yan byed do/ /rgyal po'i nor dang sbrang po'i nor/ /cung zad cung zad bsags pas 'phel /ha cang sred bar mi bya ste/ sred ba cho las nyes pa 'byung/ /ha cang sred pas rmongs byas na/ /ce sbyad gzhu mchog gtsug tor bzhin/ /bya ba'i ngon du rjes su bzang//
167a1(mdo 'grel): byas zin pa la rten mi byed/ /blo ngan zho yi rna ba can/ /bsrung bar bya ba khyod kyis bcom/ /rab tu grags bas 'gro mi bya/ /bdag nyid kyis ni mngon sum bya/ /baM lwa chu ngan lhung ba yis/ /nags tshal stongs
167a2(mdo 'grel): par gyur ltos/ /gnang du 'phog pa'i tshig mi brjod// /shin tu gnod pa'ang rod mi bya/ /skyes bu dang ni mtshon cha yi/ /pha rol dag ni shes par bya/ /dgra po'i bu ni snyan par sman yang/ /mkhas pa yis ni btang snyoms mi bya ste/ /dug lo shin tu
167a3(mdo 'grel): mi bzang yin pas na/ /de nyid du gzhan dag tu gnod pa skyed/ /gang zhig dgra bo dag la yang/ /g.yo med sems kyis phan byed pa/ /de la dgra po thams cad kyang/ /thal mo sbyar ba nyid du byed/ /dgra bo zil gnon 'dod pa yis/ /bdag nyid yon
167a4(mdo 'grel): tan gyis bstod kyi/ /gnod sems ngan bas ci zhig bya/ /das ni bdag gnod dgra la min/ /mi srun skye bo zhi bas min/ /de dang 'tsham pa'i rtsub pas bsten/ /bu ni mi bsgrungs pa dag la/ /phan 'dogs pa yis mi sdigs sam/ /ji srid lam
167a5(mdo 'grel): ni mthong ba dang/ /ji srid rkang pa bstan pa dang/ /ji srid shes rab ma nyams pa/ /de srid rang gi phan bgyis/ /rnam ba kun tu rang phan spyad bya yi/ /'gro mang nang du gnas pas ci zhig bya/ skye bo thams cad yongs su mgu 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i thabs
167a6(mdo 'grel): ni gang yang yod ma yin/ /gzhan las tshol zhing zas zhim 'dod/ /slong mos 'tsho zhing khengs pa che/ /bstan bcos shes med rtsod par 'dod/ /khyod kyi de gsum bzhad gang rgya/ /nags sreg pa yim la ni/ /rlung gis grogs su 'gyur pa yin
167a7(mdo 'grel): de nyid mar mo 'jig byed bas/ /nyam chung ba la bshes yod min/ /gzhan la gnod pa ma byas dang/ /dman la 'dud pa ma byas shing/ /dam ba'i lam ni ma spangs gang/ /nyung ba de ni mang po yin/ /nad kyi 'jigs pa ma byung zhing/ /dam brdag?
167b1(mdo 'grel): dang 'grogs par brtson/ /dman pa'i tshig ni ma smras pa'i/ /nyin gcig lo brgya bas mchog yin/ /dman pas gang tshe nor ni cung zad rnyed/ /'gro ba thams cad brnyas pa'i nga rgyal ldan/ /dam pa nor gyi 'byor pa thob gyur kyang/ /sa lu smin pa lta bur
167b2(mdo 'grel): shin tu 'dud/ /rigs dma' ba yi sems can dag/ nor ram rig pa rnyed gyur na/ /'gro ba kun la rtsa snyam sems/ /pags pa sngon po'i wa bzhin no/ /nor ram rig par ldan gyur na/ /dman pa rnams ni dregs par 'gyur/ /go 'phang gnyis pa de dag
167b3(mdo 'grel): gis/ /mkhas pa shin tu dul bar 'gyur/ /bogs med tshong dang 'kho ldan dag la 'tsho/ /slong zhing 'gyid la nor med 'dod la dga' / /bud med gzhon la tshig rtsub smra ba ste/ /skyes bu leg par spyod pa de lnga'o/ /rma bya so pa'i cha pas gdungs gyur
167b4(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /mkha' dkyeg? char gyi rgyun la ri sla yi/ /rdzing bu rnyog pa can gyi chu ngan la/ /dregs pas bstod pa'i mgrin pa ma btud cig /te ti ra ni zil ba yi/ /thigs pas srog ni 'dzin byed kyang/ /bslangs na gtugs pa'i 'jigs pa yis/ /brgya byin
167b5(mdo 'grel): la gang mi slong ngo/ /de nyid shes na slob dpon ci/ /nang sos sman pag la dgos/ /chu bo brgal nas gru pas ci/ /chags bral byad mas ci zhig bya/ /ngan pa ji srid nyam chung ba/ /de srid par du rang bzhin bzang/ /ston ka yi ni chu bo'i chu/ /skye bo kun
167b6(mdo 'grel): gyis bgrod pa ?/ /gang du byi bas mdzad pa byed/ /byi las mar ni bsrung ba dang/ /khwa yis phyag tshad byed pa yi/ /dngos de la ni smos ci dgos/ /gang na zhal ta byed pa mang/ /thams cad mkhas par nga rgyal che/ /kun kyang gtso bo byed 'dod pa//
167b7(mdo 'grel): de yi chogs rnams 'jig par 'gyur/ /nyin par 'khrig dang nyin nyal dang/ /chang sar zho ni gzhon nu 'thung/ /sha skam bud med rgan nyal te/ /'di drug lus kyi stobs 'grog pa'o/ /gang zhig khro na'ang 'jigs med la/ /dga' na'ang phan 'dogs mi nus
168a1(mdo 'grel): phan tshar gcod bsdu ba med 'gyur ba'i/ /de khros pas ni ci byar yod/ /nang dang phongs dus byung ba dang/ /mu ge'i tshe dang dgras 'jigs dang/ /rgyal po'i sgo dang gshin rje'i gnas/ /de rnams kun gyi gnyen por ?
168a2(mdo 'grel): dgos pa'i don du 'jig rten sgrub/ /dam pa'i don du de dag min/ /be'us 'o ma zad mthong nas/ /ba ni ring du spong ba bzhin/ /sdug pa dang bral rang mis brnyas pa dang/ /bu lon mang zhing ngan pa dag la sten/ /dbul por mthong nas mdza' 
168a3(mdo 'grel): bas spangs pa ste/ /mi ma yin pas lus sreg de lnga'o/ /mi mthun chung du 'phel ba la/ /mi gang zhi bar mi byed pa/ /sprad rtsi thigs pa 'dzags pa dang/ /yul 'khor 'jig par 'gyur ba bzhin/ /gang zhig rig ldan de bzhin bstan
168a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /dam pa phongs kyang yon tan gtong mi byed/ /nyi ma'i rang bzhin tsha bas gdungs kyang ni/ /kha ba grang ba'i rang bzhin gtong mi byed/ /sdig pa zad 'dod bde bar gshegs la dang/ /skal pa zad 'dod skye bo ngan? dang bsten /
168a5(mdo 'grel): rigs rgyud zad 'dod glen zhing lkog pa skye/ /'bru rnams zad 'dod pho ba'i me drong skye/ /'dod pas long bas sdig mi mthong/ /dmus long gis ni gzugs mi mthong/ /dregs pa yis ni skyon mi mthong/ /bdag ltas de nyid mi mthong ngo/ /rgyal
168a6(mdo 'grel): pa yur chu mkhri shing dang/ /bud med dmus long lnga po ni/ /g.yon can blo yis ji ltar khring/ /khring rnams gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur/ /bde pa'i rjes la sdug bsngal te/ /sdug bsngal rjes la bde ba yin/ /mi rnams kyi ni bde sdug dag
168a7(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor bar byed/ /ma mthong ba dag mdun du lhags/ /slar yang mthong ba ru song/ /khyod kyi de ci khyod kyang ci/ /de la mya ngan su zhig byed/ /ji lta ji ltar shing dag ni/ /rgya mtsho che la nyams 'grog /dpa' rlabs kyis ni so sor?
168b1(mdo 'grel): phye/ /de la mya ngan su zhig byed/ /blo gros che ldan khro bas shugs las rgyal/ /skye bo ngan pa khro pas mod la pham/ /pham pas pham par byas pa'i blo ngan dag / blo ldan dag dang lhan cig ci phyir 'dran/ /pha bong 'bad pa chen po yis/ /ri yi rtse
168b2(mdo 'grel): mor 'debs par nus/ /cung zad tsam gyis de skyur ba/ /rang gi skyon yon de dang mtshungs/ /mi gang bya ba ma yin pa'i/ /bya ba la ni sbyor byed pa'i/ /de ni nges par 'phung 'gyur te/ /khye'u 'byin pa'i spre'u bzhin/ /rang gi phyogs ni yongs spangs nas/ /gzhan gyi
168b3(mdo 'grel): phyogs la dga' ba gang/ /de ni nges par brlag 'gyur te/ /rgyal pa rab dmar ji bzhin no/ /mkha' bskar mkhan no dag gis rtsis byas na/ /zla ba dang ni skar ma'i lam rnams shes/ /khyim ni ma dang khyim thab log pa dag /sna tshogs spyod pa de ni mthong ma
168b4(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /rnyog med chu nang zla chos snang gyur ba/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba len par khyod byed gyur/ /dang ba chu dang 'o ma 'byed shes pa'i/ /khyod kyi blo gros di ring gang du song/ /mi gang bya ba chen pa'am/ /cung zad byed par 'dod na yang/ /de ni bsgrims nas rab bya ste/ /seng
168b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i las gcig yin par bshad/ /ji ltar rgyal srid bskyang pa dang/ /sngo ba'i dgra rnams 'dul ba dag /'bangs la ri ba ma 'dzag par/ /zhal zhugs tshe na smyur te mdzod/ /snying du sdug? pa 'am gzhan gang zhes/ /sems yang bdag brtse bar byed/ /
168b6(mdo 'grel): spyod pa rgya chen ldan pa dag /sa yi dkyil 'khor thams cad gnyer/ /rtag tu snyan tshig smra ba yi/ /rgyal pos skyes bu bring par sla/ /phan tshig sman dang 'dra ba de/ /nyan pa bas kyang smra ba dkon?/ /gal te chos don rtogs pa yis/ /zhal tshe lam srang skyon na
168b7(mdo 'grel): ni/ 'gro ba blo ldan gcig gyur kyang/ /de las bdag ni rnam par rgyal/ nar mnyam nus pa mnyam pa dang/ /gnad shes 'bad rtsol che ba yi/ /'khor gyis des par gnod 'gyur gyi/ /gang dgras mi bdud de yis 'phung/ /chu yi nang nas me 'par? na
169a1(mdo 'grel): me de gang gang zhi bar byed/ /skyob pa las ni 'jigs pa byung/ /'jigs pa de las su yis srung/ /ma bskul mi snyan sgra ston la/ /bskul nas snyan pa mi sgrogs ba/ /'jig rten rnga zlum dang 'dra la/ /de ltar bskul zhing ? snyan
169a2(mdo 'grel): sgrogs/ /sa bdag 'dod la chags pas phan dang gnod pa shes mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar rang dgar rang spyod myas pa'i glang chen bzhin du sbyod/ /de 'og 'gyod pas rab gdungs nyam ba'i mya ngan g.yang sar ltung/ /de yis 'khar la nyes ba rgod byed rang gi skyon
169a3(mdo 'grel): mi rig /rtsod dus rgyal po nor tshogs thob pa las/ /srog ni bsrung gi nor ni btang bar bya/ /ji ltar bshan pas lug gi bal bregs nas/ /srog thar byas ba rnyed ba che ba bzhin/ /rtsa 'brang 'gro rtse mo mkha' lding dang/ /yal ga sbre 'dzeg me tog bud bas bskor/
169a4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig gdug ba'i sems can gnas bcas ba/ /tsandan shing de la ni bsnyen du med/ /gang gi thabs kyis pha rol gnon/ /nus bas ma yin thabs kyis de/ /bya rog gis ni gser phreng gis/ /sbrul dag gi bsad par gyur la ltos/ /gang la blo yod
169a5(mdo 'grel): de stobs ldan/ /blo med stobs kyis ci zhig bya/ /ci zhig seng ge stobs dang ldan/ /ri bong gis ni srog dang phral/ /bya ba'i thabs kyis grogs byed na/ /blo ldan dag la dri bar bya/ /phun sum tshogs pa smos ci dgos/ /'phung gyur na yang mdzes pa yin/ /yon
169a6(mdo 'grel): tan tshul spyod rang bzhan gsal ba yis/ skye bo ngan pa bcos su gal rung/ /tsha zhing drong che rtsub bas bsgrubs pa yis/ /bad kan nad bzhin shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /snying la khon du gzung bya yi/ /de la tshig gis ma bskul bar/ /dgra bo'i rkang pa nas bzung
169a7(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /tshig gi mtshon chas bsnun par bya/ /ji srid 'jigs pa ma byung ba/ /de srid 'jigs pa 'jigs par bya/ /'jigs ba mngon du byung ba'i tshe/ /'jigs med lta bur gzhom par bya/ /bden la zhugs par gyur pa la/ /slu byed mkhas pa yin nam ci/ /sba
169b1(mdo 'grel): par brten te nyal ba dang/ /gsod pa de ci dpa' bo 'am/ /gzhon yang rgan pa'i nye bar zhi la dga' / /mkhas par gyur kyang shos pa'i nga rgyal med/ /gzi brjid che yang bzod cing nges pa'i dang/ /je mthor phyin yang nga rgyal dregs pa med/ /rtag tu semS
169b2(mdo 'grel): can phan dga' rnams/ /rin chen sgron ltar mchog yin te/ /snun la bltos par mi byed cing/ /snod dang sdong bu la bltos min/ sman ba zas ni ma zhu dang/ /rgyal po brdzun du smra ba dang/ /rigs ldan sdug pa spyod pa ste/ /'di gsum shin tu mi riD pa'i
169b3(mdo 'grel): mthu che ba dang 'grogs 'gyur na/ /mthom po nyid du su mi 'gyur/ /me tog phreng bar 'brel ba yi/ /skud pa mgo la 'dogs par byed/ /dus la bab par ston pa dang/ /gnas skabs bcas par smra ba dang/ shin tu ngo mtshar gyur la 'god/ /'jig
169b4(mdo 'grel): rten chen po nyid thob 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus rtul phod brtan pa dang/ /stobs dang blo gos pha rol gnon/ /'bad rtsol yon tan drug ldan pa/ /de la lha yang 'jigs ba skye/ /sngon chad dgra po pham par byas pa dag/ mdza' bor 'dod 'ongs pa la yid
169b5(mdo 'grel): mi brtan/ /brag phug 'ug pa'i tshogs kyis gang ba la/ /bya rog gis ni ma btang bsregs la ltos/ /za dang gnyid log 'jigs dang 'khrig pa spyod/ /mi dang phyugs rnams de dag nyams pa yin/ /chos spyod pa yis mi rnams khyad par 'phags
169b6(mdo 'grel): chos mi shes ma phyugs dang cis mi mnyam/ /gang zhig chos la smod pa rnams/ /nyi mar 'gro dang 'od na yang/ /de ni mgar ba'i sbud pa bzhin/ /dbugs 'byin kyang ni gson ma yin/ /sangs rgyas mgon po yongs spangs te/ /lta gzhan la ni
169b7(mdo 'grel): phyag byed pa/ /blo ngan gang gA'i 'gram du ni/ /sgom nas khron pa byed dang mtshungs/ /yul ni shin tu yun ring gnas kyang nges la kho nar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'bral la khyad par ci zhig yod na/ 'gro ba rang nyid spong mi byed/ /dbang med 'bral bas yid la ?
170a1(mdo 'grel): yongs su gdung ba mdza' yas skyed par byed/ /'di dag rang gis spangs na zhi ba'i bde ba mdza' yas 'thob par 'gyur/ /'dod pa yid 'ong yin pa bde/ /'byor ba nyams dga' yin mod kyi/ /'on kyang 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten
170a2(mdo 'grel): 'di/ nad med chang 'thungs khur bar mtshungs/ /'gro ba'i dri ma chags pa 'dra ba med/ /gzhan la gnod pa phrag dog 'dra ba med/ /mdza' bo slongs mo pa 'dra yong min te/ gtod dang mnyam pa'i gnyen bshes gang yang med/ /shes rab dang mnyam
170a3(mdo 'grel): mig med de/ /rmongs pa dang mnyam mun pa med/ /nad dang 'dra ba'i dgra med/ /'chi ba dang mnyam 'jigs pa med/ /de bas shin tu mi zad pa'i/ /'chi ba nges par 'byung 'gyur bas/ /'dod pa rnams la sems zlog la/ /dam pa'i chos la dga' bar
170a4(mdo 'grel): gyis/ grogs po 'dis nor de yod legs bas/ /yid bzhin nor khyod rdor 'gyur nor ma byed/ /sbur long rgyan gyi dam par byed gyur pa/ /de ni 'di 'dra'i nor bu 'jig rten 'phung/ /gang zhig sa stengs 'bru rnams dang/ /gser dang phyugs dang nang
170a5(mdo 'grel): med rnams/ /de dag kun gyis gcig mi doms/ /de ltar shas nas zhi bar gyis/ /'bad pas bsags pa'i nor la ni/ /yang dang yang du nyug par byed/ /bkren pas byi ba ji bzhin du/ /nor rnams sdug bsngal kho nar zad/ /'jig rten 'tsho ba brten
170a6(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ /nor dang longs spyod brtan ma yin/ /bu dang chud ma brtan min gyis/ /chos dang grags ba snyan pa bstan/ /rgyal po nor sogs doms pa med/ /mkhas pa legs bshad kyis mi doms?/ /rgya mtsho chu yis doms ba med/ /'jig rten sdug?
170a7(mdo 'grel): la bltas mi doms/ /me lo shing gis ngom pa med/ /byis pa 'dod pas ngoms pa med/ /tshul khrims drag dang dul ba dang/ /sems ni dul bar gyur pa dang/ /gang zhig drang por zhugs pa dag/ de la gnas na ci zhig dgos/ /chog shes dbang phyug
170b1(mdo 'grel): la gnas na/ /skye bo ngan pa'i sa dang ring/ /longs spyod 'dod pa'i sred bas bcings/ /gom re brnyas pa thob par 'gyur/ /lus zhes bya ba skyon ldan 'di/ /yon tan chen po gcig yin te/ /gnas skyabs gang dang gang phrang ba/ /de dang der ?
170b2(mdo 'grel): rab/ nags kyi glang bo rtsa le za yang stobs dang ldan/ /sbrul ni zas su rlung zar gyur kyang rbeg pa med/ /drang srong rtsa ba 'bras bu tsam gyis dus 'das myeng/ /de bas khrel 'dzem chog shes kho na 'byor ba'i mchog/ tshod ma dag dang rdul med pa'i/ /chu yi dgon
170b3(mdo 'grel): ba gang na yod/ /zla ba thun mong mar me yin/ /'byor ba dag gis ci zhig bye/ /chog shes des ba'i bdag nyid can/ /'cho ba gang na'ang btsal mi bka' / /rtswa dang lo ma chu yi gnas/ /gang na'ang med pa ma yin no/ /nags mchog stag dang glang bo'i
170b4(mdo 'grel): gcos bsten par/ /rtsa yi stan byas shing shun gos su gyon/ /shing gi 'bras bu la sogs zas za ba'i/ /nor med nye du'i chogs ngan gson ba min/ /bzang po 'am ni ngan pa yi/ /sbyor ba gang yang rung ba yis/ /lus ni shin tu bsrung bya mi/ /
170b5(mdo 'grel): nor la chags pas ci zhig bya/ bsod nams chen po'i rin gyis ni/ /khyod kyis lus kyi gru nyos ba/ /ji srid chag par ma gyur par/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol song/ /ji srid sdug pa'i dus kyi zla rgyas pa/ /'chi bdag gza' chen 'di yi 'dri? ma
170b6(mdo 'grel): rnyed pa/ /de srid bag yod par ni gnas byas te/ /rang gi bya ba dag ni bya ba'i rigs/ /gang che 'du shes bral zhing mig mig yo/ /skyegs bu rgyun 'byung dbugs mthar thug pas slebs/ /mun par g.yangs cher khrid ltar gyur na/ /de tshe bu dang chung ma
170b7(mdo 'grel): gnyon cir 'ong/ /snying rjes gdungs pa'i yid dang dbang mo dul zhing sems ni cho ga shes dag la dga' ba dang/ /chags bral mngon dga' i sems dang shing drung dag na lhung ba'i 'bras bus bza' ba'i bya ba byed/ /lus rig shing shun gyon zhing rgyal
171a1(mdo 'grel): ba rgyal ba zhes ni snyan ba lta bur sgra sgrogs la/ /bar NA ser gshin rje'i dbang gyur bcom pa'i lus tshig 'di ni nam zhig spong bar 'gyur/ /bstan bcos 'dzin pas thar pa min lus mi dub? pas /
171a2(mdo 'grel): kyang ma yin te/ shes rab kyis ni sems btul na/ /thar ba the nye 'di na yod/ /nyes pa'i skyon ni reg par gyis/ /mgo bo bregs pas ci zhig bya/ /gang zhig yid kyi gos med na/ /ras kyi chos gos cil phan/ /sems can rnams
171a3(mdo 'grel): la gang gi sems/ /snying rjes brlan par gyur pa dag/ thar dang ye shes de yin gyi/ /thal ba ral pa chos gos min/ /gang zhig lang tsho la zhi ba/ /de ni zhi bar bdag gis shes/ /khams rnams yongs su zad pa na/ /ci yi phyir na zhi mi
171a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /mdza' bshes nye du dur khrod du/ /du ba 'thul nas ldog par byed/ /gang zhig rang dang lhan cig 'grogs/ /las te nges na dge ba spyad/ /gang zhig rab tu nyon mongs dang/ /chos dang 'gal bar byed pa dang/ /dgra la 'dud pa'i nor
171a5(mdo 'grel): rnams ni/ /gang gis nor du rung ma yin/ /dam pa legs spyod la sred shin tu bsdams gyur te/ /kun tuAng skye bos smod 'jigs rtag tu sdug bsngal gnas/ /gang zhig 'dzem med log spyod dag gi rtso stsol ba/ /rigs dang mi rigs
171a6(mdo 'grel): dpyod med tha mal skye bo skyid/ /rigs dang mi rigs dpyod pa'i blo med cing/ /thos dang sdom pha mang po rnam spangs nas/ /lto ba 'gengs ba tsam zhig 'ba' zhig 'dod/ /skyes bu phyug dang phyugs la khyad ci yod/ /mthong ngang ma mthong yon tan gyi//
171a7(mdo 'grel): 'byung gnas chen po rig pa yin/ /des na de dag don gnyer bas/ /shes rab yongs su gzung khar bya/ /brgya yi nang nas dpa' 'o skya/ /stong gi nang nas mkhas pa 'byung/ /brgya stong las ni mdzangs ba ste/ /stong pa skye 'am mi skye'ang srid/ /mkhas
171b1(mdo 'grel): pas rig pa rnam kun tu/ /na tshod yol yang bslab par bya/ /gal te 'dir 'bras mi ster yang/ /skye ba gzhan du rnyed pa sla/ /skra dkar gnyar ma lhags dus suAng/ /thos pa bsog par bya ba ste/ /gang du thos mang 'gro 'gyur ba/ /der ni phung po 'gro mi 'gyur//
171b2(mdo 'grel): rgyal po dang ni yon tan ldan/ /de gnyis 'dra ba ma yin te/ /rgyal po rang gi yul na bkur/ /yon tan ldan pa kun tu bkur/ /yon tan ldan pa skyon yod kyang/ /yon tan dga' rnams skye mi byed/ /zla brnyog pa yod gyur kyang/ /brtan rnams dga' bas
171b3(mdo 'grel): lta bar byed/ /yon tan dang 'dra lus kyi rgyan gzhan med/ /sems las dang 'dra lus kyi sdug? bsngal med/ /bzod pa dang 'dra lus kyi srungs ma med/ /gtong ba dang mnyam gnyen ni gang na'ang med/ /dam pa ring na gnas gyur kyang/ /yon tan pho
171b4(mdo 'grel): nya nyid byed de/ /ki ta ka yi dri bsnams nas/ /bud ba rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur/ /yon tan dag la 'bang bya yi/ /'gyid tshul dgos pa ci zhig yod/ /ba ni 'o ma med pa la/ /dril bu btags kyang nyo mi 'gyur/ /dus ni yun thung rig pa'i rnam ba mang/ /tshe
171b5(mdo 'grel): yi? tshad kyang ji tsam mi shes pas/ /ngang pa chu la 'o ma len ba bzhin/ /gang zhig gces pa de ni bsten par bya/ /skar ma chen po mang du shar gyur cing/ /sa yi rgyan gyur zla ba shar na yang/ /gang du nyi ma nub na mtshan mor 'gyur/ /nyi ma ma gtogs
171b6(mdo 'grel): shar nub ming mi 'dogs/ /gang zhig shar bar gyur na ni/ /mun pa med cing gzi can byed/ /nyi ma shar ba mchog yin gyi/ /gzhan rnams shar bas ci zhig bya/ /skyes bus bya pa gang yin gcig/ byas mthar phyin pas// /sems can las ?
171b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur nya mang po cil dgos/ /zla ba rgyas pas steng gsal ba bzhin/ /skar ma mang po'i tshogs kyis nus ma yin/ /yon tan skyed pa rang khar las/ /rdzas ni bsod nams khar las pas/ /skyes bu la ni ci phyir smre/ /yon tan 'bang pas bsgrub bya yin//
172a1(mdo 'grel): 'bad ba'ang bdag nyid la gnas na/ /gzhan dag yon tan ldan zhes te/ /de ltar gson pa su yis bzod/ /bstan bcos don ni shes pa'i mi/ /'di na zha bo rnams la'ang mang/ /ra gri'i rtse mo rmon po yis/ /? las
172a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal byed de rnyed dga' / /phyug po kla klo rnams la'ang yod/ /dpa' bo dud 'gro rnams la'ang mang/ /sna tshoD don gyi gtam smra ba'i/ dam ba dag ni kun tu dkon/ /ri bor kun la tsan dan med/ /glang po kun la mu tig med/ /yang dag don gyi gtam smra ba'i/ /mkhas pa'ang kun na yod ma
172a3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /yon tan shes la de nyid yon tan 'gyur/ /yon tan med la de nyid skyon du 'gyur/ /chu bo'i chu ni shin tu skyon med pa'ang/ /rgya mtshor phyin na btung du mi rung 'gyur/ /yon tan ldan pa yon tan la dga' yi/ /yon tan mang pa yon
172a4(mdo 'grel): tan gyis mi mgu/ /bung ba nags nas pad+mar 'ong 'gyur gyi/ /sbal pa lhan cig gnas kyang de lta min/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi grags pa ni/ /mkhas pa nyid kyi nang du 'phel/ /rin chen shes la rin chen dang/ /g.yul do dag tu dpa' o bzhin
172a5(mdo 'grel): dad pa khra yi tshogs nang mdzes ma yin/ /cang shes bong bu'i tshogs nang mjes ma yin/ /seng ge wa yi tshogs nang mdzes ma yin/ /mkhas pa blun po'i tshogs nang mdzes ma yin/ /gang zhig chen pos sbyi bos bkur/ /de nyid dman bas
172a6(mdo 'grel): rtsa mnyam sems/ /mkhas pas phyag bas mchod rten ni/ /khwa dag stan du byed pa yin/ /bdag la grags med yong gyur kyang/ /gzhan la nyung zad yod pa yi/ /yon tan de la dam pa dga' / /spyod pa 'di ni do mtshar che/ /thams cad
172a7(mdo 'grel): mkhyen ba'i yon tan ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis mkhyen/ /sa gzhi yi ni lci ba'i chad/ /mdza' yas nyid kyis shes pa yin/ /gzhan gyis gzhan dag bsgrags na ni/ /med pa'ang yon tan can du 'gyur/ /yon tan rang nyid
172b1(mdo 'grel): sgrogs pa ni/ /pa rgya byin yin yang mi btsun 'gyur/ /gang du yon tan ldan mi mchod/ /mkhas pa de ru ci phyir 'gro/ /gos med gcer bu'i grong khyer du/ /khrus mkhan gyis ni ci zhig bya/ /kye ma 'jig rten glen pa 'di/ /rang rgyud grub pa yod min te
172b2(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyis byas pa'i rjes 'brang bas/ /zangs ma'i snod ni stor nas med/ /gzhad gad mkhan dang mkhas pa gnyis/ /blun la bzhad dag byed pa mchog/ bzhad gang mkhan gyis nor rnyed kyis/ /mkhas la nor med stong par 'gro/ /sna tshogs 'on? lan
172b3(mdo 'grel): gtam rgyur kyis/ /mkhas pa dus ni 'da' bar byed/ /dbul bo chos kyi phong gyur bas/ /gnyid log na yang 'thob par byed/ gang zhig mang po tshogs par gyur pa las/ skye bo dam pa'i yon tan sten mi byed /de ni rang gi ma yi sdug bsngal gyis/ /bskyed
172b4(mdo 'grel): de skyes par gyur kyang ci zhig phan/ /mkhas pa'i tshul ni rig pa yin/ /khu byug tshul ni sgra snyan yin/ /dka' thub tshul ni bzod pa yin/ /bud med tshul ni nyon mongs yin/ /skar rtsis de bzhin grub mdza' dang/ /mkha' lding sngags dang sngags smra ba/ /don?
172b5(mdo 'grel): gyi de nyid gzung bya mi/ /sgra la dbyad par mi bya'o/ /glegs bam la bzhag rig pa dang/ gzhan las tshol ba'i nor dag ni/ /dgos pa'i dus la bab pa na/ /de ni nor min rig pa min/ /bzo slob ba yi yon tan kun/ /yon tan 'tsho ba'i rgyu ci mi yan/ /'khor
172b6(mdo 'grel): ba gcong pa'i blo gros gang/ /ci yi phyir na de ma yin/ /mi ni su la'ang ma brtags par/ /gdams ngag sbyin par mi bya ste/ /sbre'u tsam gyi gnas bcas kyang/ /gnas med par ni byas la ltos/ /kha cig smra ba lhur len te/ kha cig mi smra don yang sgrub/ /
172b7(mdo 'grel): 'dam bu me tog 'bras bu med/ /star ka 'bras bu me tog ldan/ /ka ta ka yi 'bras bu ni/ /chu rnams dang bar byed med kyi/ /de yi ming tsam smras pa yis/ /chu rdul dang bar mi byed do/ /gzhung lugs dag la byang byas kyang/ /nyams su len par mi byed na?/ /
173a1(mdo 'grel): lag na sgron ma yod kyang ni/ /long bas lam ni mthong mi 'gyur/ /zla ba yar ngo mar ngo ltar/ /dam pa dam min bstan pa las/ /yon tan chung duAng rgyas gyur zhing/ /rgya chen po yang 'grib par 'gyur/ /
173a2(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa dgra bor gyur pa'ang bla'i/ /mi mkhas pa dang mdza' ba min// rkun pos bram ze bsrungs pa dang/ /spre'us rgyal pa'i mig bcar bzhin/ /mkhas pa dang ni dul ba dang/ /chog shes bden par smra ba dang/ /'chi ba na yang 'dug bla yi/ /skye ba
173a3(mdo 'grel): ngan dang rgyal srid min/ /sbrul gdug skye bo ngan pa dug/ sbrul bas lhag par skye ngan drug /sbrul gdug sman dang sngags kyis thub/ /skye ngan gdug pa gang gis zhi/ /skye bo ngan pa yon tan rgya yis phan btags te/ /dga' bar gyur kyang de ni tshig rtsub smra
173a4(mdo 'grel): bar byed/ /gang zhig rig ldan de bzhin brtan pa dang/ /bsdags 'os phongs kyang yon tan gtong mi byed/ /rang bzhin ngan pa'i mi dag dang/ /srang gi mtshan nyid dag dang mtshungs/ /cung zad tsam gyis mtho 'gyur zhing/ /cung zad tsam gyis dma'
173a5(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /tsan dan gla rtsig phur gyis byugs kyang/ /sgog skya'i rang bzhin dri nga mi 'dor ltar/ /rigs pa'i gzhung lugs mang po rab bslabs kyang/ /rang bzhin ngan pa'i mtshan nyid 'dor mi srid/ /dam pa'i bu la gdong na pad+ma med/ /smad
173a6(mdo 'grel): 'tshong bu la glad nas rwa ma skyes/ /ji lta ji ltar log par byed gyur pa/ /de lta de ltar nal bu'i mtshan nyid yin/ /kha nas smras pa'i tshig gzhan la/ /yid la sems pa'i bsam pa gzhan/ /kye ma yon po'i blo gros can/ /'di yi rang bzhin su yis
173a7(mdo 'grel): sprul/ /'bad pas skyon ni len par byed/ /yon tan rtag tu spong bar byed/ /skyon len yon tan spong ba yi/ /skye bo ngan pa chu tshags 'dra/ /skye bo ngan pas sun phyung na/ /dam pa la yang yid mi rton/ /byis pa 'o mas kha tshig na/ /zho la'ang phu? yis 'debs shing
173b1(mdo 'grel): 'thung/ /mtshan mo mtsho nang skar ma'i gzugs brnyan snang ba la/ /ngang pa pad+ma'i rtsa bar 'khrul pas sun phyung ba/ /nyin mo pad rtsa mngon sum mthong yang za mi byed/ /brdzun smras sun phyung bden pa la yang dogs pa skye/ /bud med zas ni nyis 'gyur te/ /de yi
173b2(mdo 'grel): g.yo sgyu bzhi 'gyur ro/ /ngo che dag ni drug 'gyur ro/ /'dod chags brgyad 'gyur zhes brjod do/ /sbyin pas ma yin rim gros min/ /mchod pas ma yin bsnyen bkur min/ /bstan pas ma yin brtson pas min/ /kun tu mi bzang bud med yin/ /mkha' lding dbang
173b3(mdo 'grel): pos khyer ba'i tshe/ /pad dkar klu yis smras pa ni/ /gsang tshig bud med la smras pa/ /de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur/ /don dang chos ni rnam par nyams byed cing/ /mtho ris dag dang thar pa'i gegs byed la/ /gnod pa kun gyi rtsa ba nyid gyur pas/ /de bas
173b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi bud med rtag tu spang/ /gang gis tshigs bcad gcig tsam zhig/ bla mas slob ma la byin na/ /gang zhing btang nas shog btang 'gyur/ /rdzas de sa stengs yod ma yin/ /'du 'dzi kun tu spang bar gyis/ /gal te de spong ma nus na/ /dam pa
173b5(mdo 'grel): dag dang 'dre bar gyis/ /de nyid de yi sman yin no/ /'dod pa kun tu spang bar gyis/ /gal te spong bar ma nus na/ /thar pa dag la 'dod par gyis/ /de nyid de yi sman yin no/ /phan med gnyen yang gzhan yin te/ /pha rol yin yang gang phan gnyen/ /lhan
173b6(mdo 'grel): cig 'byung ba'i lus sogs nang/ /phan byed dgon pa'i sman bzhin no/ /'bad pa yis ni bzung ba yis/ /bum pa yi ni chu phyed bzhin/ /sbyi be la ni bkur byas na/ /skye bo dan pa khro bar byed/ /gang zhig yid dang rjes mthun pa/ /ring na gnas kyang nye ba yin no/ /gang zhig
173b7(mdo 'grel): yid la brtan mi gnas/ /drung na gnas kyang ring ba yin/ /dam pa min dang lhan cig gnas gyur kyang/ /chu dang padmo bzhin du 'dres mi 'gyur/ /dam pa thag ring dag tu gnas gyur kyang/ /zla ba ku mu da ltar dga' bar byed/ /gal te rtag tu mdza' 'dod na//
174a1(mdo 'grel): gsum po 'di dag mi bya ste/ /rgyan po 'gyed dang nor 'brel dang/ /lkog tu chung ma dang smra ba'o/ /ji ltar rwa las 'o ma 'byung/ /'dam bu me tog sbrang rtsi 'jag/ gal te bud med bden gyur na/ /skam sa las kyang pad+ma skye//
174a2(mdo 'grel): bsod nams yengs su dman pa'i mis/ /longs spyod thob kyang sbyod mi shes/ /gangs chen mtshol khyi bzhin du/ /skom na'ang lce yis lhag par byed/ /'jig rten 'di na las byed pa/ /gla med lam rgyags khyer mi btub/ /slong ba dman pa mi mngon par/
174a3(mdo 'grel): phyi ma'i dus na brgya 'gyur khye/ /rang nor spangs nas 'gro 'gyur bas/ /skyes bu sbyin pa gtong bar byed/ /shi na'ang nor ni mi 'dor bas/ /sbyin byed ser sna can 'drar shes/ /byin na dbul gyur dogs pa yis/ /bkren pa sbyin pa gtong mi byed//
174a4(mdo 'grel): nges par 'jigs pa de nyid kyis/ /mkhas pas nor ni gtong bar byed/ /zas las zan gyi phyed tsam yang/ /slong ba rnams la cis mi ster/ /'dod dang rjes mthun 'byor pa yang// /gang gi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /las kyis 'byor pa med kyang gdung
174a5(mdo 'grel): pa mi bskyed kyi/ /'on kyang ci 'byor pa las sbyin pa btang bya ste/ /lo ma me tog 'bras bu chu dang sman rnams ni/ /thams cad mdza' yang bsngo ba'i stobs kyis mdza' yang 'gyur/ /sbyin dang spyod pas stong pa yi/ /nor des nor bdag yin na go/ nor de
174a6(mdo 'grel): nyid kyis bdag kyang ni/ /nor gyi bdag po cis ma yin/ /yab cig 'di ni las kyis/ /'di nas pha rol 'bras bu'i sa/ /'dir ni gang zhig byas gyur pa/ /de nyid gzhan du nges par spyod/ /gzhan 'byor rigs dang gzugs dang nad med nyid/ /mthong
174a7(mdo 'grel): nas 'dir ni ci phyir gdung bar byed/ /gal te 'di kun khyod 'dod bsed nams kyi/ /sa bon las ni 'bras 'byung mgos sam/ /'byor pa yod kyang gtong med na/ /nye bar 'tsho bas ci byar yod/ /kimpa ka yi 'bras bu ni/ /chags kyang ltogs la ? byar yod
174b1(mdo 'grel): gang zhig gzhan la gnod pa med par sbyin gtong ba/ /'di yi longs spyod sna tshogs chu yis ma 'khyer zhing/ /me yis mi tshugs rkun po rnams kyis 'phrog mi nus/ /de yi 'byor pa nam yang rab nyams mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig dmyal ba'i nang la ni/ /gso
174b2(mdo 'grel): ba dag ni mi byed pa/ /sman med gnas su song nas ni/ /nang dang bcas pas ci byar yod/ /mi srun skye bo'i sa khung las byung ba'i/ /tshig gi sbrul gyis skye bo dam pa zin/ /dug de zhi bar byed pa'i gnyen por yang/ /shes rab bzod pa'i sman ngag btung bar bya
174b3(mdo 'grel): ji srid 'tsho bar gsod kyang ni/ /dgra bo zad par mi 'gyur gyi/ /rang gi khre ba nyid bsad na/ /de ni dgro ba nyid gsod yin/ /mthu chen bcos su mi rung la/ /brdod? pa byar yang ci zhig yod// /dul bzhi ba'i spyod pa la/ /bzod pa byar yang ci zhig dgos//
174b4(mdo 'grel): gnod byed yin pas khro zhe na/ /chos don 'dod dang thar pa dag/ mngon sum du ni 'jig byed pa'i/ /khro la khyod ni cis mi khro/ /gzhan gyi 'byor pa dam pa mthong nas ni/ /gang zhig sems 'khrug pa ni skye 'gyur bas/ /don de cung zad rnyed par mi 'gyur gyi
174b5(mdo 'grel): 'gro de rang gi bsod nams 'joms par byed/ /thams cad chos ni mnyan par bya/ /thos nas rab tu bzung bya ste/ /gang zhig bdag nyid mi 'dod pa/ /de dag gzhan la mi bya'o/ /'jig rten pha rol 'gro ba dag/ shes pa 'am smra la su mi mkhas/ /de ni nyams
174b6(mdo 'grel): su len pa na/ /drang srong rnams kyang mkhas pa yin/ /'byor pa g.yo zhing lang tsho yun gyis 'jigs/ /srog ni gshin rje'i so gtsigs gnas dang mtshungs/ /'on kyang 'jig rten pha rol sgrub la lhod/ /kye ma mi yi spyod pa ngo mtshar che/ /blo gros bzang
174b7(mdo 'grel): yang le lo yis/ /skya ba mthon por mi 'gyur te/ /lag rtsis sa la 'dri ba yi/ /pho long gshar ba dag dang mtshungs/ /gal te 'gro ba 'di kun gyis/ /'chi bdag sbyi bor gnas mthong na/ /zas kyang i gar mi 'ong na/ /bya ba gzhan lta smos ci dgos//
175a1(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas zin tam ma zin ces/ /chi bdag sdong par mi 'gyur bas/ /seng ge bya ba di ring bya/ /phyi de'i bya bas dro bya/ /ji srid nad med lo tog skyes gyur pa/ /nad kyi ser ba chen pos ma brlag cing/ /ji srid
175a2(mdo 'grel): blo ni bya ba'i rjes 'dug pa/ /'di ni dam chos mnyan pa'i dus yin no/ /bong bu phyugs la me tog phreng ba ci/ /dud 'gro phag la kha zas zhim po ci/ /long la snang dang 'on pa dag la glu/ /glen pa rnams la chos kyis ci zhig bya/ /ji srid 'dod chen ma
175a3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /de srid yon tan che nyid yin/ /'dod chen nyid la zhugs gyur na/ /yon tan btsun par gal 'gyur/ /ji srid dus la'ang mi slong ba/ /de srid dka' thub gzi brjid can/ /dpa' zhing shes ldan rigs mtho dag/ skyes bu zhes kyang de
175a4(mdo 'grel): srid brjod/ /dang pa'i rtsom pa gang yin pa/ /'di ltar ngo mtshar che ba yin/ /zo chun bzo sbyar gyur pa ni/ /bud med kyi yang dbang du 'gyur/ /drang srong bu ni myur du shi yang rung/ /rgyal po'i bu ni yun ring gson yang rung/ /rngon pa'i bu ni shi 'am gson
175a5(mdo 'grel): mi rung/ /dam pa'i bu ni shi 'am gson yang rung/ /de nas 'byung ba la gnas pa'i/ /mi i blo ni 'phel bya'i phyir/ /gang gis bstan bcos shes gyur pa'i/ /legs par bshad pa bshad par bya/ /legs par bshad pa'i rang bzhin tshig/ gang
175a6(mdo 'grel): yang rung ba bsag par bya/ /tshig gi gnas skabs mchog sbyin la/ /nor ni ci zhig ster bar byed/ /rig pa bslabs dang dpa' bo dang/ /gang yang gzugs bzad ldan bud med/ /gang dang gang du 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de dang der ni dpal chen thob/ /rig par
175a7(mdo 'grel): ldan dang rgyal po ni/ /gang duAng mnyam pa ma yin te/ /rgyal po rang gi yul na bkur/ /rigs ldan kun tu bkur bar 'gyur/ /gzugs dang lang tshe phun tshogs shing/ /rigs mtho rnams las skyes gyur kyang/ /rgya skyegs shing gi me tog ltar/ /rigs
175b1(mdo 'grel): dang bral na mdzes ma yin/ /lus can rig dang bral gyur pa/ /rigs ldan yin yang ci zhig dgos/ /'jig rten du ni rig pas mchod/ /rig pa med pas brlag par byed/ /bde ba 'dod na rig pa 'dor/ /rig pa 'dod na bde ba dor/ /bde ldan rig pag pha?
175b2(mdo 'grel): 'grub/ /rig ba don gnyen ga la bde/ /rig dang mdza' bshes med gyur pa'i/ /mi ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /rig dang mdza' bshes ldan gyur pa'i/ /mis ni rtag tu dga' ba 'thob/ /rig dang ldan la gzhan yul gang/ /snyan par snral pha ro
175b3(mdo 'grel): su?/ /gnas dang ldan pa khur lci gang/ /brtson dang ldan la thag ring ci/ /rtsol ba yi ni grogs yod la/ /ri rgyal rtse mo'ang mtho ba min/ /sa yi 'og kyang dma' ba min/ /rgya mtshos mchod pa'ang pha rol min/ /rigs pa glegs bam la bslabs kyi/ /ba
175b4(mdo 'grel): ma'i thad nas ma bslabs pa/ /'khyon ma'i bud med sbrum ma bzhin/ /tshogs pa'i nang du mi mdzes so/ /bla ma gang zhig yi ge gcig/ ster ba la ni brnyas byed pa/ /khyi yi skye gnas brgyar brgyud nas/ /rigs ngan du yang skye bar 'gyur/ /gang zhag
175b5(mdo 'grel): la ni yi ge gcig/ bla mas slob ma la byin na/ /gang zhig btang nas shog gtong pa'i/ /nor ni sa steng yod ma yin/ /skyed par byed dang legs slob dang/ /gang zhig reg pa ster ba dang/ /zas ster pa dang mi 'jigs sbyin/ /lnga po 'di dag pa ru bshad ?
175b6(mdo 'grel): rgyal po blon po chung ma dang/ /de bzhin mdza' po'i chung ma dang/ /sbun zla'i chu da ma ma nyid de/ /lnga po 'di dag ma ru bshad/ /blun po rnams la gdams pa ni/ /'khrug par 'gyur gyi zhi mi 'gyur/ /sprul la 'o ma blud pa ni/ /dug 'phel 'gyur ba kho nar
175b7(mdo 'grel): brad/ mngon sum pa mi rkang gnyis phyug/ /blun po yongs su spang bar bya/ /ma mthong cher ma ji lta bar/ /tshig gi zug rngus gnod par byed/ /blun pos blun po mthong gyur na/ /tsan dan pas kyang bsil bar byed/ /gal te mkhas pa mthong gyur na/ /phag? ?
176a1(mdo 'grel): pa ni lta bur sems/ /skye bo ngan la phan pa ngag /byas kyang ga la'ang bas mi gzo/ /dam pa cung zad bkur na yang/ /ji srid 'tsho bar rang dbang 'gyur/ /blun po chu yi ri mo ltar/ /gang zhig byas pa de myur? 'jig /
176a2(mdo 'grel): dam pa rngo yi ri mo ltar/ /shin tu chung duAng brtan par gnas/ /skye bo ngan pa snyan smra yang/ /'di la yid brtan rung ma yin/ /rma bya sgra snyan sgrog na yang/ /zas su dug chen za ba yin/ /e ma skye bo phan pa dang/ /bad kan dag gi rang bzhin mtshungs/ /
176a3(mdo 'grel): 'jam bo yis ni 'khrug 'gyur la/ /rtsub po yis ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /skye bo ngan dang gser dang rnga/ /mi bslun rta dang bud med gos/ brdungs na dul pa nyid 'gyur gyi/ /de dag legs byas snod ma yin/ /skye bo ngan dang lhan cig tu/ /dgrar gyur mdza' 
176a4(mdo 'grel): ba'ang mdzes ma yin/ /khyi ne rtse bar byed pa 'am/ /bldag pa'ang mdzes par 'gyur ma yin/ /sprul pas kyang ni mi bsrun gdug /sbrul gdug sman dang sngags kyis zhi/ /mi srun cis kyang zhi mi byed/ /mi srun pa yi nyes pa ni/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rjes
176a5(mdo 'grel): 'dug la/ /gang zhig mi srun dang 'dres de/ /mi srun las kyang mi bsrun 'gyur/ /pha yi spyod pa ma mthong yang/ /bu ni rjes su 'jug byed de/ /ke ta ka yi shing las ni/ /skyu ru ra 'bras 'byung mi 'gyur/ /pha dang ma dang de bzhin sbun/ /chung ma rjes mthun
176a6(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa rnams/ /de yis sdig pa byas pa gang/ /de ni mi des byas dang mtshungs/ /sa 'di rgya mtsho chen po dang/ /ri bor bcas pa khur min gyi/ /gang zhig byas ba mi gzo ba/ /de ni shin tu khur lci yin/ /tshul khrims ldan dang lhan cig gnas
176a7(mdo 'grel): 'byung bo kun la phan par dga' / /gshin rje 'jig byed gang yin pa/ /de ni mkhas pas rab tu bsngags/ /mkhas pa dang ni dul ba dang/ /cho ga shes bden sma? lhan cig tu/ /btson rar gnas na'ang gnas bla yi/ /me srun nang gi rgyal srid min/
176b1(mdo 'grel): dam pa dag dang lhan cig 'dris/ /mkhas dang lhan cig smra ba dang/ /bskam med lhan cig mdza' ba nyid/ /byed pa skyo bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shin tu yun ring dus su yang/ /gang gis 'jig rten 'di dang ni/ gzhan du sdug bsngal mi mthong pa'i/ /blo ni
176b2(mdo 'grel): chos mthun nyid du bya/ /sems ni dga' bar byed na yang/ /rnam smin gnod byed ce ru rung/ /gang gis khams ni 'khrug byed ba'i/ /kha zas zhim po'ang ci ru rung/ /gnod kyang phan par 'gyur ba ni/ /mkhas pas sman bzhin btung bya ste/ /'di yi
176b3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu rjes thob ba/ /mtshungs pa med pa nyid du 'gyur/ /don 'di rig dang ldan pa yi/ /rgyal pos bsdu ba byas na ni/ /thog? ma dbus dang tha ma ru/ /de ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho 'jig ba'i dus su ni/ /gzhung las brgal bar 'gyur zhes grags//
176b4(mdo 'grel): dam pa'am mi ma'ang gzhung lugs las/ /nam yang 'da' bar mi byed do/ /lugs kyi bstan bcos shes rab sdong bu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa las le'u gnyis pa logs shig tu bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //
176b5(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bya na pu dza na tu b+ha? d+hu? po shA nA ma /bod skad du/ lugs kyi bstan chos skye po gso ba'i thigs pa zhes bya ba /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal gyi 'byung gnas 'jam dpal
176b6(mdo 'grel): kun gyis dpal/ /mdza' dag byams pas khyab par 'jam pa'i dang/ 'jam dang dpal gyi grags pas thugs rje'i mgon/ /'jam dpal kun gyi mgon la phyag 'tshal te/ /blo dman skye bo mun nag lta bu la/ /snyan dag sgron ma lta bu gsal bya'i phyir/ /bdag?
176b7(mdo 'grel): lta dman la snyan sngags sgron med kyang/ /blun po gso phyir chu thigs tsam zhig brjod/ /gzhan gyi skyon rnams brjod mi bya/ /gzhan gyi skyon rnams ci brjod ba/ /de bzhin du dag la'ang yod pa ste/ /dper na wa dang bud med bzhin/ /bdag nyid la ni bstod ?
177a1(mdo 'grel): bya/ /bdag nyid la ni gang pa? stod ba/ /da ni blo chung? ? /dper na ka lan+ta ka 'dra/ /grogs ngan bsten par mi bya ste/ /grogs po dan pa su sten pa/ /na gu ta na bsten
177a2(mdo 'grel): ba yis/ /shig rnams 'phung bar gyur la ltos/ /ngan pa rnams la gros mi gdab/ /ngan pa rnams la gros btab na/ /legs bar smas kyang nyes par 'gro/ /spre'us? ka lan ka yi/ /tshang bshag pa mi tshul la ltos/ /spyod pa rnams la ?
177a3(mdo 'grel): yod bya/ /bag med rgyun du spang bar bya/ /glang chen myos pa lta bu ni/ /nam yang bya ba ma yin no/ /tshig rnams brjod 'dod rtag tu ni/ /ji ltar brtags shing de ltar smras/ /gang zhig ma brtags par smras pa/ dper na smyon pa'i bstan bcos
177a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /dgos pa med ba'i tshe ga rtsub ni/ /nam yang brjod par mi bya ste/ /bdag mi phan par gzhan gnod pa/ /dper na ne tso'i rdzun tshig bzhin/ /rdzun gyi tshig rnams brjod mi bya/ /brdzun gyi tshig rnams brjod byas na/ /myur bar gzhan gyis
177a5(mdo 'grel): shes 'gyur te/ /dper na byi la'i rdzun tshig bzhin/ /tshul 'chos sbyong pa bya ba min/ /tshul 'chos spyong ba gang byed pa/ /de yis btsun par mi 'gyur te/ bram ze na a rgyal mo bzhin/ /mdza' shes ngan pa'i tshig mi snyan/ /mdza' shes nyan
177a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshig nyan pa/ /'dod don med de bslus par 'gyur/ /dper na rus sbal spre'u bzhen/ /g.yo can dag 'jam tshig mi nyan/ /de yi tshig rnams nyan byed pa/ /dper na dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ /spyad kyi la sogs bslus la bltos/ /gnod
