177a7(mdo 'grel): sems can gyi tshig mi mnyan/ /de yi tshig rnams nyan byed na/ /bdag la phan pa me 'byung ste/ /wa? ni sreg pas phung ba bzhin/ /sdig pa'i grogs po yid mthun bzhin/ /dga' ba sna tshogs tshig brjod kyang/ /sdig ngan de ni bdud yin te/ /dper na gling?
177b1(mdo 'grel): gi srin po bzhin/ /phyug po kla klo la yang yod/ /dpa' bo dud 'gro la yang yod/ /don dang mthun pa'i gtam smra ba/ /'jig rten 'di na shin tu dkon/ /de phyir yon tan dag la ni/ /srog dang sdos te 'bad par bya/ /gang zhig yon tan mi slob pa/ /yin glan po phyug
177b2(mdo 'grel): lta bu/ yon tan med pa'i kha nyid ni/ /sa yi bu ga ngag dang mtshungs/ /yon tan rab kyis brgyan pa yi/ /kha ni pad+ma yid 'ong ldan/ /gzhon pa'i dus su rig pa bslab/ /zho 'dod ba ni rgun nas gsos/ /drod gsher ldan dus sa bon gdab/ /'di gsum
177b3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu smin pa'i rgyu/ /yon tan ngag la 'bang bya yi/ /'gying tshul dgos pa ci zhig yod/ /'o ma med par gyur pa'i ba/ /dril bu btags kyang nyor mi 'dod/ /bdag la phun sum tshogs yod kyang/ /gzhan la brnyas par mi bya ste/ zhun mar lta bu'i sems
177b4(mdo 'grel): kyis su/ /yon tan mdza' dag khong du sba/ /shes rab ldan pa lus chung yang/ /dar thabs gzhan gyis brnyas mi bya/ /dper na blo gsang? ri bong gis/ /seng ge srog dang phral ba bzhin/ /kun la mthon dman med pa yi/ /nyi ma lta bu'i phan byas na/ /kun gyis
177b5(mdo 'grel): lan rnams ljon 'gyur te/ /byi bas glang chen bslangs pa bzhin/ /sems can kun la phan sems bskyed/ /ras 'ga' rtsa bzhin zhum par bya/ /res 'ga' rtsa bzhin zhum par bya/ /res 'ga' gangs ri lta bur bgyis/ /res 'ga' dmag la bab pa bzhin
177b6(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyis yul na gnas ba dang/ /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /ji lta bur ni brnyas gyur kyang/ /kha rog 'dug bas bde ba 'thob/ /skye bo ngan pa yun ring bsten byas shing/ /bza' btung zhim po mang pos phan btags kyang/ /phan med grogs po spong
177b7(mdo 'grel): gyur te/ /dper na khron par ltung ba'i mi bzhin no/ /mi gang blo ni g.yo zhing 'gyur byung ba/ /de yi mdza' ? bshes brtag par mi 'gyur te/ /rab tu nyon mongs mi de ci 'dra na/ /shing shun tshos kyis ras dkar btsos pa bzhin/ /gal te blo ldan mkhas pas dgro ?
178a1(mdo 'grel): bo dag /rab tu mi dga' bar ni byed 'dod na/ /tshig rtsub mi smra rab tu ngag 'jam gyis/ /des ni de la gnod pa chen por 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab gling la sogs/ /'jig rten pa rnams bdag gi khur min gyi/ /'jig
178a2(mdo 'grel): rten byas pa mi bzo gang yin pa/ /de ni bdag gi khur chen dag tu 'byung/ /mi gang sems ni mi rgod cing/ /byas pa bzo dang byas pa tshor/ /byas pa chud bo zan mi byed pa/ /de dag mkhas pas rab tu bsngags/ /chos bad byams pa bde ba ste/ /'jug ngoD?
178a3(mdo 'grel): bde ba'i chu klung bzhin/ /grogs la 'khu ba med pa dang/ /nga snyems nga rgyal zad pa bde/ /khengs dang zol byed nga rgyal che/ /sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa dang/ /stobs ldan rnams la rgol byed pa/ /de dag yid ni bde mi 'gyur/ /de phyir khengs
178a4(mdo 'grel): par mi bya ste/ /khro brnam par spang bar bya/ /khengs dang khro ba 'ong 'gyur na/ /de dag rnams kyi grags pa 'jig /gang zhig rgan dang byis pa nad pa dang/ /nyam chung thabs dor de bzhin dman pa dang/ /rgyal bos spangs dang skyabs med pa dag la
178a5(mdo 'grel): snying rje med pa de dag mir mi rung/ /rang gi yul 'khor gnas dpags te/ /gzhan gyi ljongs su phyin pa na/ /tshig ngan so sor zlos ba la/ /bzod pa chen po bskyed bar bya/ /dka' thub tshul ni bzod pa yin/ /gtso bo'i tshul ni dka' spyod yin/ /
178a6(mdo 'grel): shar ba'i tshul ni dka' bzlog yin/ /bud med tshul ni dka' thub yin/ /de ltar ma yin rang bzhin ngan pa'i mi/ /byams la lan med gzhan gyis phan byas brjed/ /sdad bas gnod pa ji snyed byas gyur kyang/ /sdang thabs byas pa de yang chu bzhin thung
178a7(mdo 'grel): tshe dang longs spyod gnyen bshes kun ngar skon/ /de dag rgud pa shin tu rnyed par sla/ /de phyir sems can dams par gyur pa'i tshe/ /khwa bzhin mu cor mi smra kha rog 'dug /gal te nor med bdag gi phyogs nyung la/ /mdza' bshes stobs kyi
178b1(mdo 'grel): phyogs kyang chung gyur zhing/ /dgra bo'i phyogs kyi stobs tshul lan pa'i tshe/ /tshig ngan mi smra kha rog 'dug par bya/ /ya rabs tshul med khengs pas nga rgyal shin tu che/ /g.yo sgyu dang med kha bzhin shin tu mu cor smra?/ /gzu lums phrag dog skams rang
178b2(mdo 'grel): khrims med ngo tsha bral/ /mi de bur gyur kyang ni gzhan bzhin shin tu spang bar bya/ /de lta bu yi dman zhing dan pa de/ /mthon po'i sar mi drang zhing der mi bzhag /sa der bzhag kyang dregs dang khengs mi thub/ /dper na bags pa sngon po'i wa dang 'dra//
178b3(mdo 'grel): skye bo rmongs pa 'ga' zhig ni/ /log pa'i chos la rab zhen pa/ /'dod pa'i don nges bslus 'byur te/ /rus sbal so yis bya bslus bzhin/ /rab tu mi bzo'i skye bo rnams/ /sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyu dag la/ /dang blangs don du gnyer byed pa/ /gcan zan
178b4(mdo 'grel): gal sbor byed pa bzhin/ /dregs ba'i longs ba 'ga' zhig ni/ /rang gi skyon rnams ma bsam par/ /yon tan phra mos rab mgul/ /khron ba'i? sbal pa ji bzhin no/ /rmongs pa'i log pa 'ga' zhig ni/ /chos kyi de nyid ma rtogs par/ log pa'i chos kyis
178b5(mdo 'grel): rab mgu ba/ /blun po nor bu len pa bzhin/ /shin tu blun pa la la dag /'chi ba'i rnam pa rab brjed nas/ /bya ba mang po rtsom byed de/ /bdud kyis bslus par rig par bya/ /'gro ba bzang po bzang mo la/ /gang zhig rab tu chags byed pa/ /srog chags
178b6(mdo 'grel): me la mchong ba bzhin/ /'dod pas 'phung bar 'gyur ba ba yin/ /rta dang ma he glang po sogs/ /'ga' zhig de la chags byed pa/ /'dod pa can gyi skyes bu yis/ /rmi lam nor rnyed bslus pa bzhin/ /sdig pa'i las la rab dga' zhing/ /dgel dran par mi
178b7(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /'jig rten dag la rab tu chags/ /dug dang 'dra ba'i skyes bu des/ /'dir yang sdug bsngal chen po can/ /phyi ma ma nar med rab tu 'jigs/ /bar dor srid pa'i las rnams dran/ /gsal ba'i ma long rab 'jigs pas/ /las kyi dge sdig rnam
179a1(mdo 'grel): par bye/ /rang dbang gnas su gnas dbang med/ /mi 'dod pa ru rnam par khrid/ /las kyi rgyu 'bras mi bslu ba/ /kho mo mthong ba'i rnam pa 'am/ /gzhan yang rab tu grangs mang ltos/ /de phyir dam pa'i skyes rnams kyis
179a2(mdo 'grel): rgyun tu 'chi ba dran par bya/ /rang gis ci byas las rnams bgrang/ /yud tsam pa yi tshe 'di la/ /thang cig 'dug pa'i blo can de/ /de ni shin tu 'khrul pa de/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i rdzu 'phrul bzhin/ /de phyir rtag pa'i sems mi bskyed/ /ngan song/
179a3(mdo 'grel): gsum po dran par bya/ /srog gcod la sogs lus kyi ni/ /nyes pa rnam par bsdam par bya/ /rdzun sogs ngag gi nyes pa spang/ /de bzhin yid kyi nyes pa spang/ /ma lus rab tu bsdam par bya/ /de ni skyes bu dam ba'i tshul/ /rab tu tsha zhing
179a4(mdo 'grel): drang ba yin/ /dmyal ba nyi ma cig bzhin dran/ /bkres skom dag gis ring pa yi/ /yi dags rnams kyang dran par bya/ /rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal rab mang ba'i/ /byol song lta zhing dran par bya/ /de rgyu rnam spang bde rgyu spyad/ /thob dga' 'dzam
179a5(mdo 'grel): gling mi yi lus/ /de thob dus su ngan song rgyu/ /rab tu bsgrims te bcad par bya/ /'dir bdag mi yi lus thob nas/ /phyi nas smon lam 'dabs byed pa/ /de ni blun po le lo can/ /ngan song gnas su rab 'gyod de/ /gro bzhin skyes gyi brdo 'jog gi/
179a6(mdo 'grel): yi dags mthong ba ji bzhin no/ /'di yi tshe ni ma nges pas/ /de ring sang dam zla ba 'am/ /le lo'i rnam pas 'chi 'gyur te/ /de phyir dge la brtson par bya/ /ngam pa'i chos la rab 'jug na/ /rigs ngan gshan mo lta bu dang/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
179a7(mdo 'grel): po yang/ /bran mo btsun mor thub pas gsungs/ /dam pa'i chos la mi mjug cing/ /'jig rten khrel ltas mi srung ga/ shin tu smad cing bshung 'gyur te/ /b+hi ra li pa'i dka' thub bzhin/ /ri brag mdom gang sogs yod zabs/ /de ?
179b1(mdo 'grel): rab tu srung byed na/ /shin tu gting med gyur pa yi/ /g.yang sar lhung ba cis mi rung/ /yungs 'bru tsam gyis rma khung yang/ /shin tu bsgrims te 'chos byed na/ /'tsho med tshal bar 'gas pa yi/ /rma de ci phyir 'chos mi byed/ /nyin par dga' zung
179b2(mdo 'grel): tsam du yang/ /zas skom gyis dbul mi bzod na/ /bar gyi skal pa la sogs su/ /zas gos mi myong ci phyir bzod/ /rang lus dag la tsher ma yi/ /rtse mo'ang bzod par mi 'gyur na/ /gzhan gyi lus la mtshon dag gis/ /srog dang 'brel pa ci
179b3(mdo 'grel): phyir bzod/ /rma 'bu dug dre'u shing srin dang/ /sa bon myu gu sdong skyes dang/ /de bzhin ngan pa'i mi rnams ni/ /rang rten kho na 'phung ba sgrub/ /phyi ma shes ma 'dzangs ma'i tshul/ /nyon mongs dgra thul dpa' bo'i tshul/ /chags pa med pa chos byed tshul
179b4(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa'i tshul ni rtogs pa yin/ /rtogs pa'i tshul ni byed pa yin/ /skye bo med pa sbyin pa'i tshul/ /tshul khrims tshul ni ma dpyas pa/ /bzod pa'i tshul ni chos nyid shes/ /brtson 'grus tshul ni 'chi ba dran/ /bsam gtan tshul ni g.yengs med
179b5(mdo 'grel): yin/ /rnam par 'byang shes shes rab yin/ /sangs rgyas 'dod pa dad pa'i chul/ /rtog pa chung ba rnal 'byor tshul/ /zang zing gnyen bral sgom mkhan tshul/ /phan sems che ba sgrin pa'i tshul/ /drang po'i tshul ni mi bslu ba/ /bag yod nyam nga
179b6(mdo 'grel): med pa ni/ /de ni rgyal po'i tshul du bshad/ /de yi tshul dang mi ldan pa/ /dman zhing smad pa'i tshul byed pa/ /las kyi rgyu 'bras mi bslu'i tshul/ /'og gi tshul ni 'di bzhin no/ /yon tan ldan la ser snas bcings/ /bslangs na khro ba dang bcas pa/ /sdug
179b7(mdo 'grel): bsngal chen pos non gyur te/ /shu ma ri yi mi sdug bzhin/ /mnyam sogs dag la phrag mi dog /'dir yang sdug bsngal che 'gyur la/ /phyi mar rnam smin che 'gyur te/ /dper na gzhon nu dang 'dra/ /dregs med shin tu dul bar bya/ /kun la gsong ?
180a1(mdo 'grel): smra bor bya/ /khro med nga rgyal spang bar bya/ /kun la 'dzum zhing drang por smras don med cal col smra mi bya/ /'du ba mang po'i sar mi 'gro/ /chang sogs myos pa btung mi bya/ /ci 'dod sbyin la yangs par bya/ /bshas med mi la byamS
180a2(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /dge ba'i chos la brtson par bya/ /khrims sogs blangs la bsrung bar bya/ /de ltar byas na mang po'o mi/ /drang gis bde ba 'thob par byed/ /da lta shin tu ngan pa'i mis/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa nub du nye/ /de ni man bsngags dan spyod dang/ /log par
180a3(mdo 'grel): lta ba mang ba yi/ /rmongs pa dag gis bcom ldan gyis/ /bstan pa'i ljon shing bcang kyis med/ /da ni snying rje med pa yi/ /chos lugs bar shing rang bzo byed/ /brkam chags pha rol ma mthong bas/ /bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan brnyal gyis med//
180a4(mdo 'grel): da ni gdul ka ngo tsha med/ /sdig la dga' zhing tshul 'chos byed/ /sdig can rnams kyis thub pa yi/ /bstan pa'i za ma pha? bcag gis med/ /da ni mgo bregs nyams mi len/ /sbyed 'chal smad pa lus la 'chos/ /ngan g.yo can gyis thub ba yi//
180a5(mdo 'grel): bstan pa'i tshong 'dus bcom gyis med/ /da ni khro dang nga rgyal dang/ /rgyags chos byed cing rnyed la zhen/ /sdig pa sna tshogs byed pa'i mis/ /chos kyi grub po bcag gis med/ /da ni thub ba'i bstan pa yang/ /cung zad tsam zhig lus bar zad/ /thub pa'i bstan
180a6(mdo 'grel): pa gang chen mtsho/ /ring por mi thogs skam par 'gyur/ /seng ge'i sgra yi bstan pa ni/ /dus kyi 'khor los rab bcom nas/ /myur ba nyid du 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang dag 'di 'dra'i dus bab tshe/ /bde 'dod rnams kyis phan pa'i don/ /da ni legs par brtag pa'i
180a7(mdo 'grel): rigs/ /dus kyi 'khor lo ngan byed pa/ /ma rabs shes rab 'chal pa dang/ /tshul can dag dang bsten mi shes/ /nyes pa bsten cing tshul khrims spangs/ /dben pas 'jigs shing 'du 'dzi 'dod/ /mi mkhas bslab nyes slob dpon nor/ /gdug rtsub nga rgyal
180b1(mdo 'grel): brnyas pa che/ /ngan pa'i mi la yid rton pas/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa ma rungs byas/ /zhi zhing bde ba'i dus ni zad/ /gdug rtsub mi zad dus ni byung/ /shes rab can gyis mi rnams dang/ /dpang gyur skye bo rnams ni zad/ /de lta bu yi dus rnams byung ba'i tshe?//
180b2(mdo 'grel): rang gi yul 'khor gnas spangs te/ /gzhan gyi ljongs su phyin pa ni/ /de yang nags 'dabs dben pa ru/ /smra ba skyungs te gnas par bya/ /dkar bo'i chos rnams yid la mi 'jog skye bo rnams yin/ /mi chos phul du byung ba yid la 'dzog pa de nyid ni/ /cung zad
180b3(mdo 'grel): dge bar 'gyur snyam nas ni bris pa yin/ /dge bas blun bo ma lus grol zhing bstan chos yul du gnas par shog /lugs kyi bstan chos kyi snyan dngagS skye bo gso ba'i thigs pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs
180b4(mdo 'grel): so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shi lenda bo d+hi dang/ lots+tsha ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya ko Sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
180b5(mdo 'grel): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rnam pa thams cad du/ /yon tan kun ldan skyon spangs shing/ sa gang skyor ba gang lags pa'i/ /de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan skyon dag gle bur mnyam /'di nyid 'jig rten goms pa ste/ ngang gis bya rgod dur khrod dang/ dang
180b6(mdo 'grel): ba mtshor 'bab ji bzhin no/ /'gro ba mi bsrun du kun tu/ /skye bo'i yon tan 'tshub par byed/ /rigs bzang po yi rin chen dag/ kur byin nga yis sba bar byed/ /sems can skyon dang 'dres na yang/ /yon tan ldan pas yon tan blang/ /chu las 'o ma 'byed pa lang//
180b7(mdo 'grel): dang pa las gzhan su yis shes/ /mi srun 'gro la 'tshe ba yang/ /skyes mchog phan 'dogs ngoms pa med/ /mun bas sa stengs snang ba med/ /nyi mas rtag tu gsal bar byed/ /mi srun gzhan la gdam la sogs/ /'phen mkhas de ni rigs ma yin/ /'di ltar dug
181a1(mdo 'grel): ni gnod nus kyi/ der ni phan bar byed mi nus/ /skye bo dam par ba bsgrims te/ /gzhan gyi skyon sbed dmangs rigs mtshungs/ /'on kyang 'di gnyis khyad yod de/ /skyes mchog sbed skye dmangs rigs smra/ /g.yo spyod
181a2(mdo 'grel): skye bos rab gtses na/ /lhag par nges ba dran par 'gyur/ /'jig rten nyi mas rab gdungs na/ /lhag par zla ba mngon par 'dod/ /ngan pa pha rol 'byed brtson ltar/ /skye ba dam pa sdums de bzhin/ /khab kyis rims kyis phug pa yi/ /bu gu skud pas dgod
181a3(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /pha rol brtses mthong ngan pa dag /dga' bar 'gyur gyi bstod rim min/ /lcags las byas ba'i mtshon cha dag /phal cher g.yul ngor dpa' ba bzhin/ /skye bo ngan pas smad pa shes/ /skye bo dam pas legs bsngags shes/ /rgun gyi dus ni skyems
181a4(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /spyid nyid nags chal kha yang 'bu/ /gnod dang lhag par gdug pa yang/ /'tshe khengs rtsub pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /dus na bdag nyid chen po bas/ /spyi rtol can ngag phal cher bkur/ /dam pa sdig pa chung yang spong/ /ngan pa rnams ni che yang min/ /mig
181a5(mdo 'grel): ni rdul la 'jom par byed/ /lag pa mig rtsar reg par byed/ /dmangs rigs mgo 'phang bstod grags dang/ /gzhung ngan phan btags mi sems te/ /gyen du mi gtsang rdzas gtor na/ /thog mar rang gi mgo la 'bab/ /ris shing 'os par 'gro ba las//
181a6(mdo 'grel): dpyad zad dpyad pa 'byung 'gyur gyi/ /thang bskyed bzang po ma yin te/ /mi bsrun pa yi dgra sen bzhin/ /mchog las mchog dag bskyed pa dang/ /ngan las ngan skye de rigs te/ /phug las brten nas mun pa dang/ /thang la zla zer 'bab par byed/ /ngan pa ji ltar
181a7(mdo 'grel): 'phang mthos kyang/ /rigs ldan rgud pas zil gyis gnon/ /rigs ldan nor bu nyams bdun du/ /bcos pa'i nor bu gzi mi phyin/ /yon tan ldan pa'i grags pa dag /phyogs bcur grags pa dgra yis 'tshug /g.ya' dang ldan pa'i me long ni/ /gzugs
181b1(mdo 'grel): brnyan 'byung bar dgra bo med/ /nyi ma rgya mtshor nub pa dang/ /zla ba bri yang gzhan mi 'gyur/ /yon tan ldan pa rgud gyur kyang/ /nam yang che ba nyid mi nyams/ /tshe dang lang tsho ngag dang ni/ /me lce rtse dang chu rgyun mi/ /'das pa'i phyir na phyir zlog med/ /mi srung go
181b2(mdo 'grel): 'phang de bzhin no/ /mi rigs zhes pa'i mi bsrun dag /rigs pa'i gzhi la ga nas pa med/ /rus ba'i rol za bas kyang/ /tsandan sdong po spong bar byed/ /ngan g.yo can bstod rang bzhin gyis/ /lhan cig skyes pa 'dor mi srid/ /zla ba tshes pa nges par ni/ /dbang
181b3(mdo 'grel): phyug chen po'? spyi la thogs/ /pal pa dag ni rlung bzhin du/ /gzhan gyi dri yi rjes su 'byung/ /skyes bu dam ba nyi zer bzhin/ /skyon gyis rtag tu gos ba med/ /khrims ldan gzhan la gnad song pa/ /rnam shes spangs kyang dga' bar byed/ /rgyu dang bral ba
181b4(mdo 'grel): dbang po'i gzhu/ /sa dang nam mkha' i rgyan du 'gyur/ /mi bsrun gang zhig che bdag pa/ /rigs ldan des gang rgyud pa gang/ /'byor ba mi 'dra byed pa 'di/ /rang bzhin blun pos cis mi gdung/ /bdag nyid chen pos dmangs rigs kyang/ /yongs bzung shin
181b5(mdo 'grel): tu bskyed kyang 'byung/ /bzo bo ngag gis shel sbam yang/ /tshon gyis bsgyur na nor bur snang/ /kha cig smra ba lhur len te/ /kha cig mi smra don yang grub/ /'dam bu'i me tog 'bras bu med/ /star ga'i 'bras bu me tog med/ /yon tan drang bas mi chog ste
181b6(mdo 'grel): skye bo bya sgyu skyon min no/ /mda' dring ba yis gsod par byed/ /phub ni 'khyogs te lus kyang bsrung/ /shin tu gtum yang drang po bdam/ /ngan g.yo phub me rtsas g.yog min/ /sos ka sprin med nyi ma bas/ /sprin mes mi gsal shin tu bsreg /dpal mgon
181b7(mdo 'grel): na ni blun po? yang/ /shes nyen gsal ba'i spyod pa 'byung/ /lang tsho rgyags pa'i spyod pa yang/ /'jo ba sgeg pa ston par byed/ /zhi ba yi ni lus can la/ /'jigs pa mi 'byung nges med de/ /mar me'i rtse mo dkar po las/ /dud pa nag po 'byung ba bzhin/ /'jigS
182a1(mdo 'grel): byed chen po zhi ba'i gzugs/ /zhi ba'i ched du cis mi 'byung/ /yon tan chu yis mi mdza' ba'i/ /'bar ba'i skyon 'jil skyon bus min/ /snang ba kho nas mun pa ni/ /blun po don grub gang yin la/ /de yi bya rog ta lar mtshungs
182a2(mdo 'grel): srun bus shing dag mtshungs pa'i rjes/ /stes dbang yi ger 'byung ba bzhin/ /skye bo yon tan ldan pa la/ /mkho ba'i sgo nas phal cher nyams/ /ne tso tshig gsal smra mkhas pa/ /gzeb kyi spyil bus bsrungs par snang/ /gdul bar sla ba'i dgra dag kyang/
182a3(mdo 'grel): sems can che brten gdul bar dka' / /chu thigs mtsho nang bzhag pa dag /nyi mas skams par mi nus so/ /bdag nyid brtsam pa mthar phyin pa 'am/ /yang na ma brtsam rtsom mi byed/ /gang du thogs babs gnod pa med/ /yang na thog babs mi byed do//
182a4(mdo 'grel): rtogs par sla ba'ang blun pos ni/ /yon tan skyon yang 'byed mi nus/ /skye bo mig ni long ba la/ /snang ba dang ni mun par mtshungs/ /'gro ba snod la bstod smad de/ /rtag tu ro gcig 'bab pa'i char/ /sbrul khar bab na dug tu 'gyur/ /nya phyis steng bab mu tig
182a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /blun po phal cher thub gsod byed/ /mkhas pa de lta ma yin no/ /chu nang zas kyi gzugs brnyan ni/ /byis pa las gzhan su zhig 'dzin/ /cung zad mi mthun byas pa'i rgyus/ /yang ba'i sems can lhag par khro/ /rlung gis bdas pa'i rdul phran yang
182a6(mdo 'grel): shin tu thag ring 'thul bar byed/ /yon tan can la mi bsrun dag /thibs non brnyas thabs byed par 'gyur/ /rtsa shing chu yi steng na 'phyo/ /rin po che dag ma yin no/ /blo dang ldan pas gdung ba las/ /bslang bar nus kyi phal pas min/ /shar bla yi dbugs
182a7(mdo 'grel): brdubs bas/ /khron pa'i chu ni 'thung bar byed/ /yun ring 'dris pa'i yon tan la/ /sems can dag ni skyo ba bskyed/ /shin tu skom pas chu 'thung na/ /de nyid yongs su spong bar byed/ /thabs dang bral bar byed pa na/ /dam pas kyang ni don mi 'grub/ /gzhu ni log
182b1(mdo 'grel): par 'gengs pa'i mis/ /mda' drang 'phen la phog mi 'gyur/ /mi dag go 'phang mchog rnyed na/ /phal cher de la rmongs par 'gyur/ /ri rtse mtho la 'dug pas kyang/ /gshong yang thang dang 'dra bar mthong/ /kha cig yon tan mes 'khor na/ /dam pa 'khor ba spong mi
182b2(mdo 'grel): byed/ lhan cig skye zhing 'grib pa bzhin/ /bdag nyid chen po rgud dus su/ /lhag par mthu gsal tha mar min/ /a ka ru ni mes bsregs na/ /dri zhim tha ma de lta min/ /ji ltar zla ba nya ba la/ /ra ri mngon gyis tshes la min/ /mthu yis 'phongs pa'i phal pa
182b3(mdo 'grel): dag/ gzhan la rgol cing 'gro ba'i tshe/ /rang gcod mi nus brdar rdos kyang/ /sta re rnon po 'dar bar byed/ /skye bo bcam bu pha rol gyi/ /thag ring skyon lta rang gi min/ /mig gis rang gi skyon mi mthong/ /zla ba'i ra ri rtog par byed/ /skye ba med cing rin che dang/ /sel byed
182b4(mdo 'grel): bstan la dpye rga dang/ /nor bu 'bar 'dra'i bum pa dag /'phran tshegs tsam gyis 'gyur ba med/ /gnyugs thung rang bzhin yang ba dang/ /mgu dka' khrel med khong rtsub pa'i/ /ngan pas mdza' bshes yid gcod de/ /mkha' la me ni rlung gis sbyor/ /phan byed sa
182b5(mdo 'grel): bon dam pa'i sar/ /btab 'khrud mi srun tsha sgo min/ /til mar thigs pa chung ngus ni/ /chu la snyoms kyi bye mas min/ /blo ldan dgra'o nyid 'joms shing/ /mi mkhas pa ni yan lag nyid la'o/ /seng ge 'khros na mi gsod kyi/ /mi 'khros nas ni rdo la brdeg /'byor pa
182b6(mdo 'grel): 'phren tshags gang dag gis/ /sems yang bdag drod mi thub/ /brgyas sprang bu 'dzin nus kyi/ /ma ta ka'i glang pos min/ /mang pos reg par mi bzod pa'i/ /gzer ldan bkra shis za ba'i yang/ /skyon gyi rdul cig bskyed pas na/ /yon tan brgya ldan 'tshub par byed//
182b7(mdo 'grel): dad pa mtsho la tshul 'chos pas/ /glags rnyed gzhan la 'tshe bar byed/ /ba yis mkha' la rgya btsugs nas/ /sbrang bu bzung zhing gsod par byed/ /yul gyi dug gis drangs pa'i yid/ /rang bzhin dan pa cis mi byed/ /sha rul dri ma zhim pa dag /khyi ltogs rnamS
183a1(mdo 'grel): kyis cis mi len/ /skye bo dam pa g.yo med la/ /ngan pas lhag par 'tshe bar byed/ /pad+mas gnod pa ma byas par/ /ba mos rtag tu skems par byed/ /mi bsrun pa dag mi bsrun bas/ /'dul 'gyur skye bo dam pas
183a2(mdo 'grel): min/ a ri te yi shing bston no/ /ngan g.yo can dag drang por ni/ /yon tan ldan pa'i che ba 'gog /bud med kyi ni bu brgyas la'ang/ /dga' ba dang por de la 'byung/ /blun po lhag bar srid mthos kyang/ /blo ldan lhag pas zil gyis gnon/ /mkha' la
183a3(mdo 'grel): char pa 'bab pa yis/ /rdul phran ldang bzhi par byed/ /blo ldan rtag tu nyam thag kyang/ /brnyas thabs bsres pa'i 'byor mi len/ /skad snyan khu byugs steng gi /skom yang mtsho ru 'thung mi byed/ /bdag nyid chen po dar ba dang/ /rgung pa na yang semS
183a4(mdo 'grel): snyoms 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba dang/ /nub pa na yang 'gyur ba med/ /nyin re 'bri ba'i sdug bsngal yang/ /zla de lta bus bzod par nus/ /nyi ma lta pu'i btsan po yang/ /nub 'dod bre bar spro ba med/ /rang nyid nyam thag ma byung par
183a5(mdo 'grel): de sred mi dag grogs byed do/ /klang par gnam lcags pa ba pa na/ /su zhig 7? ni bskyab bar nus/ /yon tan ldan pa yon tan mi byed pa/ /mi byed phal pas khyad ci yod/ /nyi ma mun sel mi byed na/ /de ni mun dang khyad par med/ /'ga' zhig 'ga' 
183a6(mdo 'grel): bsdoms mthu yod kyang/ /gcig bus kun thub yod ma yin/ /rdo rjes pha bod 'digs? byed kyang/ /de nyid ra rus gcod par byed/ /'dab shog rdzogs bya 'chi 'dod pa/ /'bad rtsol gyis 'phang thag ring 'phur/ /'phangs pa'i shugs zad ma da'? dag kyang
183a7(mdo 'grel): rang nyid ltung bar byed ba bzhin/ /longs spyod bdog kyang 'jungs pa dag /rang gi las kyis spyod dbang? med/ /dgun gyi 'bras bu smin pa'i tshe/ /kha la chu nad 'od zhes grags/ /shes rab ldan bas rdzas bzang po/ /mthong na mod la bye brag?  phyed/ /lag
183b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshod la rab go mas pas/ /srang tshad rnams ni shes par byed/ /sdig pas sngags pa'i rang bzhin las/ /dka' bas yid ni dga' 'gyur te/ /dang gis dri ma can gyi gos/ /rab tu 'bad pas dkar bor 'gyur/ /g.yo can gus pa ston pa ni/ /dgos pa'i
183b2(mdo 'grel): ched yin gus bas min/ /smad 'tshong skyes pa dga' byed pa/ /'drid ba'i ched? yin dga' bas min/ /sbu dang myu gu sgong skyes me/ /dug dre'u shing srin rma 'bu dang/ /rang bzhin khrel med mi dag ni/ /rang rten ma phung mi gtong do/ /yon tan ldan la phyug po
183b3(mdo 'grel): dkon/ /phyug po phal cher yon tan med/ /me tog rna rgyan rab mdzes kyang/ /li shi'i me tog dri rab zhim/ /rang bzhin mi brtan lhag par g.yo/ /gzung dka' bcos dka' skyon ldan pa'i/ /rung chu lta bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /ma bsdams dam pa gad la
183b4(mdo 'grel): 'grub/ /mthon dregs par mi bya ste/ /rgud na'ang yid chad mi bya'o/ /nyi mas mun ba gsal mod kyi/ /nyi ma shar ba nub par 'gyur/ /ku la'i ri brtan rab che yang/ /mi gzhol skyen gyis spangs nas na/ /chu rnams rgya mtshor 'bab pa yang/ /bdag nyid
183b5(mdo 'grel): rin gyis gzhol ba ltos/ /cho rigs yon tan ldan na yang/ /rang bzhin mi bsrun bshes mi bya/ /me mched gyur na ma la ya'i/ /tsan dan gyis kyang bsreg par byed/ /dmangs rigs gzeng mthos thog mar ni/ /rje dbon khyad du gsod bar byed//
183b6(mdo 'grel): sa rdul gyen du 'thor ba yang/ /'thor byed nyid la thog mar 'bab/ /gang gis blun po nyam thag pas/ /bgrod dka' shes rab ldan bas brgal/ /lcags gong chu nang byid bdag /de nyid snod byas steng na 'phyo/ /phung grol rang nyams 'jungs nor dang/ dman
183b7(mdo 'grel): pa gson bor gyur pa dang/ /bya rog yun ring 'tsho ba dag /gnod par 'gyur gyi phan pa mde/ /dam pa snying brtse'i gzi ldan pa/ /'gro ba kun la mnyen par byed/ /'jig rten phar phyin nyi ma'i zer/ /mthong ba'i gnas nas sa la 'bab/ /smad rigs phal cher dman
184a1(mdo 'grel): rnams la/ /rngan chan byed kyis mi mchog min/ /til mar chu nang khyab byed la/ /mar sar bcug na 'khyag par byed/ /skye bo dam par 'khros kyang/ /thabs kyis gnyen gyur dmu rgod min/ /chab roms sra
184a2(mdo 'grel): yang bzhu ba yi/ /thabs yod rtsa 'jams ma yin no/ /dmangs rigs dag ni phan byed na'ang/ /ya rabs la gnod khros ci smos/ /gshin rje 'dzum na'ang 'chi 'gyur na/ /rab tu khros ni smos ci dgos/ /dam pa yon tan sten
184a3(mdo 'grel): byed de/ /skye bo ngan pa skyon nyid sten/ /nor bu rin chen rang bzhin lci/ /ka shi'i shing pal rang bzhin yang/ /'gro ba shin tu grangs med kyang/ /sems can yon tan ldan pa dkon/ /yul ljongs dpag tu med mod kyi/ /rin po che
184a4(mdo 'grel): dag 'byung ba dkon/ /rgyu spun mang po bsdoms pa bzhin/ /skye bo ngan sdongs gzhig bar dka' / /bye'u dus cig 'phur ba yis/ /nyi ma'i 'od ni khebs bar byed/ /dman las yon tan ldan pa 'byung/ /dam pa las kyang ngan pa
184a5(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /'dam gyi nang nas pad+ma 'byung/ /pad+ma las kyang srin pu 'byung/ /rgyal po mi bsrun gces byed las/ /yon tan ldan ba'i go 'phang min/ /khang pa sprul gdug can dag tu/ /sgron ma legs par gsal mi 'gyur//
184a6(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid chen po nyams pa la// chen po min bas mi bkur ro/ /zla ba'i shas tsam lus ba yang/ /drag po nyid kyis spyi la bkur/ /gnod pa byed la phan 'dogs dang/ /dbon byed dang che nyam thag brtan/ /phongs kyang
184a7(mdo 'grel): sbyin gtong sems yod pa/ /bdag nyid chen po che ba'i bdag /ya rabs dag gi dang can tshig /tsang shu'i khu bas za 'jil bzhin/ /dan g.yo tshig snyan rgya shug gi /'bras bu mngar yang 'bru par byed/ /phan btags drin bskrang? mi? byed dang
184b1(mdo 'grel): dman la dang chi ma bslangs ster/ /bye ba 'dum byed yon tan can/ /brgya yi nang na 'ga' 'gar shes/ /gang zhig chad pas gcod nus shing/ /de nyid phan par byed kyang nus/ /nyi mas skems byed char nyid kyang/ /'bebs par byed kyi zla bas min/ /don nyid
184b2(mdo 'grel): mi mthong byis pas min/ /mkhas pa des kyang ci zhig bya/ /long ba gnyis te dmus long dang/ /rig pa med pa'i long ba'o/ /bstan bcos brtson byas phan med na/ /don med brtson pa byas shes bya/ /sbyor ba med par nang zhi na/ /bcud kyis len sogs
184b3(mdo 'grel): don med do/ /smra ba dma' zhing bag 'khums min/ /btsan tshig ma yin ran na mdzes/ /ran par 'jal ba'i srad mnga' ni/ /mtho ba ma yin dma' ba' ang min/ /rang bzhin mi bsrun phal cher ni/ /ma bsdigs phan pa mi byed de/ /smad 'tshod ma yi rdo gang
184b4(mdo 'grel): yis/ mya ngan 'tshang bsnun me tog ltar/ /ngan pa las kyang legs pa gang/ /mthong na de ni de las blang/ /yon tan ldan pa'i rin chen yang/ /ngan la nam yang 'byung ba med/ /'jig rten rjes su 'gro 'dod pas/ /'tsho chos thams cad shes par bya//
184b5(mdo 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig dag /mi shes gnad rnams shes pa med/ /'gro ba'i nang na 'di gnyis bde/ /'di gnyis rag las med pa ste/ /'dod pa thams cad spangs pa ste/ /'dod dgu phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /che bdag bskal bsgrubs spyod pa med/ /ngan pas thang cig chud
184b6(mdo 'grel): gson byed/ /chu yin rim bsgrubs lo tog kyang/ skad cig gis ni mes sreg byed/ /skye bo blun khrod g.yon can gyi/ /go 'phang mchog thob che bdag min/ /rab rab stug bor skar ma ltar/ /nyi ma nam yang gsal mi 'gyur/ /rang bzhin rnam dag bsod
184b7(mdo 'grel): nams ldan/ /btsun mo'i 'khor na'ang sems zhi yi/ /dgon pa zhi ba'i nags dag gi /stag dag zhi ba ma yin no/ /mi bsrun 'dris byas 'phung 'gyur zhes/ /mi dag zer ba de re bden/ /sngal?
185a1(mdo 'grel): la bdug dang ni rtse ba'i mi/ /bde legs zhig tu ga la 'gyur/ /rang bzhin shin tu ma dag pa'i/ /skye bo ngan pa'i sdom pa yang/ /rngon pa ngur smrig gos bgos pas/ /ri dags 'dris nas gsod pa bzhin/ /blo ldan kun tu thog ? ni
185a2(mdo 'grel): 'dul ba'i ched du sbrungs bskyed de/ /gser ni sbyang ba ma byas par/ /las su rung par mi 'gyur ro/ /slong la byin pas phyug po ni/ /chos dang grags 'byung slong ba min/ /de bzhin phyug la bkur sti 'byung/ /slong la min pas slong ba kun/ /ngan g.yo chog snyan smra ba dag
185a3(mdo 'grel): spyod ba spu gri bzhin du byed/ /log 'gro la sogs bya ba gzhan/ /sgra snyan rma bya'ang bya ba gzhan/ /blon po blo ldan gsal ba yis/ /bla 'og gi ni don mi nyams/ /mig ldan lam du zhugs pa ni/ /goms pa chud zos mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug yon tan ma dad gang/ /blun nam
185a4(mdo 'grel): 'ong te brnyas las 'gyur/ /mu tig mi shes long ba yis /gces par ma rtsis ci zhig 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i byin dang blon po'i mthus/ /thabs kyis 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ /chad par dam pos bsdams pa'i mthus/ /ral gris gzas pa chad par 'gyur/ /gzhung lugs rnamS
185a5(mdo 'grel): la byang byas kyang/ /nyams su len par mi byed na/ /lag pa na ni sgron yod kyang/ /long bas lam ni mi mthong bzhin/ /kun la phyogs su ma lhung zhing/ /lhag par byams sdang mi bya'o/ /ro gcig zas kyis spyod pa ni/ /nad mi 'gyur zhes smra ba yin/ /kun tu dbus na gnas pa ni/ /mkhas pa
185a6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/ /nyi ma 'char tshe che ba ste/ /nam mkha' i dkyil phyin ran par 'gyur/ /bud med che bdag nyid kyang spang/ /rgyal po'i 'byor pa smad 'chod bzhin/ /khor yug gnas pa'i sa nyid kyang/ /gdengs can cha shas g.yo bar byed/ /de ltar 'byor pa 'gas
185a7(mdo 'grel): rnyed ltar/ /mkhas pa'i yon tan mkhas pas shes/ /grong na skyon can lam log spyod/ /rtsa bzhin du ni rab tu mang/ /legs pa ma mthong bdag nyid che'i/ /yon tan yod kyang yid mi ches/ /rgya mtsho'i chu ni rgya che zhes/ /khron pa'i rus sbal sus yid ches/ /sgrub pa sna tshogs sgo nas
185b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /la la ngan dgos che bdag min/ /mkhar ba las ni byas pa yi/ /me long sten gyi gser gyi min/ /dam pa gzhan gyis phye na yang/ /rang gi yon tan gyis 'dum byed/ /mi bsrun lcags byong 'dra ba ni/ /'byed par nus kyi 'dum mi nus/ /bdag nyid ngan pa'i ma rig pa/ /?
185b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i lam la'ang rmongs pa skye/ /sgron mas phyung pa'i snang ba la/ /mkha' la rgyu ba log par rgyu/ /ji ltar nongs skyon med pa'i tshig /drag po'i skyon gyis 'gyur ba ltar/ /gnod byed de lta ma yin te/ /sreg pa'i gned gyur chu skyar min/ /bdag nyid chen po 'byor pa gang/ /da las rim gyis
185b3(mdo 'grel): rgud pa 'byung/ /nyi mas yun rings bskyangs nas ni/ /dus kyi tha mar 'gro bsreg byed/ /'byor pa rang bzhin mi brtan pa'ang/ /sems can che la brtan par 'gyur/ /dngul chus byer ba sbyor ba yis/ /phan tshun 'byed bsdus cis mi nus/ /ngan g.yo'i 'jam tshig rnon po yis/ /ji ltar
185b4(mdo 'grel): snying la gdung byed pa/ /de ltar ral gri rnan po dang/ /rlung chu de bzhin mes mi byed/ /nyams par gyur na sems can dag /spyod pa log par byed par 'gyur/ /rmi lam na ni 'od med pa'i/ /nyi ma mthong na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gzhan la gnod pas yid gdung ltar/ /rang la gnod pas
185b5(mdo 'grel): de lta min/ /rang la gnod na mi g.yo ba'i/ /sa ni gzhan la gnod pas g.yo/ /mkhas pas 'di ni gnyen sdug ce'am/ /dbang phyug shes rab bag mi dbab/ /rlung gis me yang spor mod kyis/ /sgron ma 'bar ba 'ang gsod par byed/ /gtum po 'dis ni phan btags zhe 'am/
185b6(mdo 'grel): ? zhes su yi rong mi blta/ /me ched gyur na sbyin sreg mkhan/ /yo byad bcas ta 'tshig par 'gyur/ /srog la bab kyang blo ldan nyid/ /ngang? gtsang yon tan 'dor mi byed/ /dung ni me yis sregs na yang/ /rang bzhin dkar ba mi 'dor ro/ /khrel med bya ba bya ba min/ /
185b7(mdo 'grel): spyod pas nam yang chog pa med/ /mya ngam? lam du zhugs pa dag /chu gtsang mi gtsang su zhig rtogs/ /rang gis rab bsgrims bya ba las/ /de las lhag par la bzlar med/ /bde bar shing rtser 'dzegs pas kyang/ /de las rtsa la na ltung bar 'gyur/ /phal cher 'gro
186a1(mdo 'grel): mang pha rol las/ /skyon byung smra rigs rang las min/ /bud shing dang ni me gnyis la/ /brten nas mes ni bsreg par 'gyur/ /thos pa mang bas nga rgyal dang/ /phyug khengs gzugs mdzes
186a2(mdo 'grel): rgyags pa dang/ /rgya mcha? la ni bul teg chu/ /gshin rje'i rtsed me phyin ci log /bkren pa 'di bas bdag 'byor pas/ /bdag la mi phod de mi bsam/ /mi g.yo rin chen rtse mo yang/ /cig rde rdzas mi 'bigs sam/ /ner gyis bdag po
186a3(mdo 'grel): bsrung mkhas kyang/ /nang byed shin tu bsrung bar dka' / /nya dag rgya mtsho'i chu 'thung yang/ /'thung ngo bar ni mngon pa med/ /sbyin bas phyug po nyid rnyed nas/ /phongs la sbyin par mi phyed pa'i/ /khrel med gang yin de la ni/ /khros pas
186a4(mdo 'grel): lhag par phyis mi ster/ /ji srid dam pa mi brtson pa/ /de srid nyes pa stabs ldan 'gyur/ /brtson pas nyon mongs sngar ma la/ /blo ldan skrag par mi bya ste/ /nyon mongs bag chags dri ma ni/ /shes rab mes bsregs ting
186a5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin chus/ /rdo thal rdo bsregs chus gtor na/ /dum bu brgyar 'gyes bzhin du bya/ /bdag nyid chen pos bsten pa'i lam/ /gzhan dag goms par byed pa yis/ /ci nas 'di la dga' lta'i phyir/ /'di ni
186a6(mdo 'grel): bsgoms pas smras pa yin/ /de ltar 'gro ba nyes pa sna tshogs mas/ /dge legs sa bon myu gu bskyed bsregs pas/ /ji srid srid gsum za phod 'chi bdag ni/ /gnam lcags 'bab la grags pa'i tshogs bskyed
186a7(mdo 'grel): shog /tshigs su bcad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba/ /slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //za hor gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na shAM ti dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha? ba
186b1(mdo 'grel): dpal gyi lhun po'i sdes bsgyur ci zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sha ta gA thA/ bod skad du tshigs su bcad pa brgya pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig pa gzhon nu'i
186b2(mdo 'grel): dus na slobs/ /ba ni dgun gyi dus su gsos/ /zhing ni ser dang ldan la rmos/ /'di gsum 'bras bu smin pa'i rgyu/ /mkhas pas rig pa rnam kun tu/ /lang mtsho yol yang bslab bya ste/ /gal te 'dir 'bras ma smin yang/ /skye ba gzhan du
186b3(mdo 'grel): rnyed par sla/ /yon tan dag la 'bang bya yi/ /'gying tshul bstan pas ci zhig bya/ /'o ma med pa'i ba dag ni/ /dril bu brtags kyang nyor mi 'gyur/ /yon tan ldan pa yon tan la dga' zhing/ /yon tan med
186b4(mdo 'grel): pa yon tan la mi dga' / /nags kyi bung ba mtsho yis pad+mar dga' / /sbal ba lhan cig gnas kyang de lta min/ /yon tan ldan la phyug po kon/ /phyug po la yang yon tan dkon/ /yul ljongs dpag
186b5(mdo 'grel): tu med mod kyi/ /rin po che dag skye ba dkon/ /'gro ba dpag tu med mod kyi/ /ba ma rnyed pa shin tu dkon/ /dam pa ring na gnas gyur kyang/ /pho nya yon tan nyid byed de/ /ke ta ka yi dri yis
186b6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /bung ba rang bzhin phor ba bzhin/ /krgyal po yon tan ldan pa gnyis/ /mnyam zhing 'gran pa ma yin ta/ /rgyal po rang gi yul na 'khur/ /yon tan ldan pa kun tu 'khur/ /dus kyi yun thung rig pa'i rnam pa mang/ /gang zhig ces pa de ni bsten par gyis/ yul ni shin tu
186b7(mdo 'grel): dus ring gnas kyang nges pa kho nar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'bral la khyad par ci zhig yod na 'gro bar rang nyid spong mi byed/ /dbang med 'bral las yid la yongs su gdung ba mdza' yas skyed par byed/ /'di dag rang gis spangs na zhi ba'i bde ba mdza' yas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dam pa min
187a1(mdo 'grel): dang lhan cig gnas gyur kyang/ /chu dang pad+ma bzhin du ma dres mi 'gyur/ /dam pa thag ring dag na gnas gyur kyang/ /zla ba ku mu da ltar dga' bar byed/ /'du 'dzi kun tu spang bar bya/ /dam pa dag dang 'grogs par brtsom /rang
187a2(mdo 'grel): kyi 'jigs pa med pa ni/ /nyin gcig lo brgya bas kyang mchog 'dod pa kun tu spang bar bya/ /gal te de spong ma nus na/ /thar pa dag la 'dod par gyis/ /de nyid de yi sman yin no/ /skar ma chen po mang du shar gyur cing/ /sa yi rgyan gyur zla ba shar na yang//
187a3(mdo 'grel): gang tshe nyi ma nub na mchan mor gyur/ /nyi ma ma gtogs shar nub phyogs mi phyed/ /gang zhig shar nub gyur na yang/ /nyi ma med na gzi can med/ /nyi ma shar ba mchog yin gyi/ /gzhan dag shar ba ci zhig dgos/ /me tog gi ni mgo lcogs bzhin/ /dam pa'i
187a4(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba gnyis yin te/ /'jig rten kun gyi spyi bkur 'am/ /nags nyid du ni dnges par bya/ /mi bsrun skye bo'i khung nas byung ba yi/ /tshigs ngan sbrul gyis skye bo dam ba zin/ /sbrul de zhi bar byed pa'i gnyen por yang/ /shes rab bzod pa'i sman dag
187a5(mdo 'grel): bsten par bya/ /brtan rnams sdug bsngal myong gyur kyang/ /yid ni zhum par mi byed de/ /zla ba sgra gcan khar zhugs kyang/ /'char bar ci ga mi byed dam/ /sems can rnams la gang gi sems/ /snying rjes brlan par gyur pa dang/ /thar dang ye shes
187a6(mdo 'grel): de yin gyi/ /ral pa thal ba chos gos min/ /nags bsreg pa yi me la ni/ /rlung langs grogs su 'gyur ba yin/ /de nyid med par gsod byed pa'i/ /nyams chung ba las shes yod min/ /gzhan gyis gzhan du bsgrags na ni/ /med pa'ang yon tan can du
187a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rang nyid yon tan smra byed na/ /brgya byin yin yang brtson mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig rig ldan khengs pa dang/ /nor yod ser sna ldan pa dag/ de ni lha yis smod 'dor ste/ /chu las me ni byung dang mtshungs/ /gang zhig yid dang rjes mthun pa/ /ring na gnas kyang nye ba
187b1(mdo 'grel): yin/ /gang zhig yid dang mi mthun pa/ /gam na gnas kying ring ba yin/ /gzhan gyi 'byor ba dam pa mthong nas ni/ /gang zhig sems 'khrug pa ni skye 'gyur ba/ /don de cung zad rnyed mi 'gyur gyi/ /'gro des rang gi bsod nams 'joms par byed/ /chags pa dang 'dra'i
187b2(mdo 'grel): dri ma 'gro na med/ /phrag dog dang 'dra'i gnod pa gzhan yod min/ /slong ba dang 'dra'i mdza' bo yod min te/ /gtong ba dang mnyam gnyen ni 'gro na med/ /bkres pa dang 'dra'i lus kyi zug gzar med/ /sems las dang mchungs lus kyi skem byed med/ /yon
187b3(mdo 'grel): tan lta bu'i rgyan ni yod min la/ /bzod pa dang mnyam lus gyi go cha med/ /skye bo ser sna can la nor yod ci zhig bya/ /g.yo sgyu phrag dog can gyi shes kyis ci zhig bya/ /pha rol gnon byed yon tan mar ldan ci zhig bya/ /phongs dus rgyab tu phyogs pa'i mdza' 
187b4(mdo 'grel): bos ci zhig bya/ /rnam pa kun tu rang phan spyang bya yi/ /'khor mang nang du smas pas ci zhig bya/ /skye bo thams cad yongs su mgu 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i thabs ni gang na'ang yod ma yin/ /gnas skabs dang ni mthun par bya/ /bden dang brdzun dang byams ldang dag /
187b5(mdo 'grel): bdag gzhan nus dang sbyar nas spyod/ /gang yin de shes mdzangs pa yin/ /ji srid 'tsho bar bsod kyang ni/ /dgra bo zad bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /rang gi khro bo nyid bsad na/ /des ni dgra rnams kun bsad yin/ /mi sun skye bo gdul bar bya/ /yon tan can ni kun tu bkur/ /drang
187b6(mdo 'grel): po'i spyod pas dkor mdzod dgang/ /rang gi yul 'khor bskyang bar bya/ /ji srid las ni mthong ba dang/ /ji srid rkang pa brtan pa dang/ /ji srid shes rab mnyams pa/ /de srid rang gi phan pa gyis/ /rgyal po byi bo byed pa dang/ /da yi blun po mi mkhas pas/ /nor
187b7(mdo 'grel): bsags ba lta gal te/ /'bad pa chen pos srog bsrungs shig /gang na zhal te byed pa mang/ /kun kyang mkhas par nga rgyal che/ /thams cad gtso po byed 'dod pa/ /de yi tshogs ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang na byis pas mdzod pa byed/ /byi las ?
188a1(mdo 'grel): ni brlungs? ba dang/ /bya rog phyag tshang byed pa yi/ /de yi dngos de smos ci dgos/ /kun dga' ra ba'i phreng brgyad bzhin/ /me tog rgyas pa batA? bya yi/ /ji ltar sol ba mkhan bzhin du/ /rtsa nas bcad par mi bya'o/ /grog ma bar sa dang sbrangS
188a2(mdo 'grel): rtsi dang/ bla ba tshes pa yang gyi to/ /rgyal po'i nor dang sprang po'i nor/ /cung zad cung zad bsags pas 'phel/ /ti ti ra ni zil pa yi/ /thigs pa tsam gyis srog 'dzin byed/ /bslangs pas thob par mi 'gyur na/ /brgya byin la yang mi bslang ngo/ /rma bya so ba'i?
188a3(mdo 'grel): tshangs gdungs kyang ni/ /mkha' dkyil char gyi rgyun lar sla yi/ /rdzing bu rnyog ma can gyi chu dman? la/ /dregs pas bstong pa'i mgrin pa ma 'dud cig /stobs ldan seng ge ri dags sha za phrag 'thung yang/ /lo gcig khyud kor la ni 'khrig pa
188a4(mdo 'grel): lan gcig spyod/ /bong bu rdul tsam za ba'ang 'dod pa rtag tu spyod/ /de gnyis gang gi rgyus bskyed khyod kyi nga la smos/ /nags kyi glang bo rtswa lo za yang stobs dang ldan/ /sbrul ni zas su rlung zar gyur kyang rbeg pa med/ /drang srong rtsa ba 'bras bu tsam gyis dus
188a5(mdo 'grel): 'da' byed/ /de bas khrel 'dzem chog shes kho na 'byor ba'i mchog /gang zhig yi gi mchog gis brgyan pa'i kha ni gang yin pa// /de ni yid 'ong pad+ma rab gsang rgyas pa lta bur mdzes/ /yi ge med par gyur pa'i kha ni gang yin pa/ /de ni kham ni
188a6(mdo 'grel): sa yi bu ga dag dang mtshungs/ /bong bu phyugs la nor bu mu tig ci/ /dud 'gro phag la kha? zlas zhim po ci/ /long la snang ngang 'on pa dag la slu/ /glen pa dgal chos kyis ci zhig bya/ /ka tan+ta shes sgra mkhan dang/ /gces sgrub shes pa'i
188a7(mdo 'grel): sman pa dang/ /dbyug pa thogs pa'i ral ka ba/ /de gsum 'jig rten bzhad gad sa'o/ /bdag la byin zer dman pa'i tshig /mi sbyin zer ba dman bas dman/ /'di khyer zer ba mchog gi tshig /mi 'khyer ba zer de bas mchog /gnod spangs phan pa
188b1(mdo 'grel): bsten pa yi/ /sbyor gang yang rung ba yis/ /lus ni shin tu bsrungs bya yis/ /nor la sred pas ci zhig bya/ /'byor pa yod kyang gtor med na/ /nye bar 'tsho bas ci zhig bya/ /ki shu ka yi 'bras bu ni/ /chags kyang ? bas ci byar yod/ /'dod pas gdungs la khrel
188b2(mdo 'grel): med ngo tsha med/ /bkres pas gdungs na stobs med mdangs kyang med/ /nad kyis gdungs na gnyid med bde pa med/ /lam gyis dub na 'jigs dang brtson pa med/ /grogs po nor la brkam pa spang/ /? ma log g.yem che ba spang/ /rgyal
188b3(mdo 'grel): po chos ni na spyod pa spang/ /blun po rab gsum dbyen smra spang/ /yul ngan 'tsho ba nganpa spang/ /shes gnyen ngan pa spang bar bya/ /ba khur dka' gso spyad mi shes pa/ /de lta bu yi sman pa spang/ /phan dang mi phan dpyod pa'i blo med cing/ /thos
188b4(mdo 'grel): dang bsam dang bsgom pa rnam spangs te/ /lto ba 'gongs ba tsam zhig gtsor 'dzin pa/ /skyes bu de blo phyugs dang khyad ci yod/ /chu yis bum pa phyed bkang ba/ /rab tu 'bad pas bzung byas te/ /spyi bor bdag gis khur ba bzhin/ /skye bo ngan pa bkur
188b5(mdo 'grel): na khro/ /rang bzhin ngan pa'i mi rnams dang/ /srang gi mtshan nyid shin tu mtshungs/ /cung zad tsam gyis mtho 'gyur la/ /cung zad tsam gyis dma' bar 'gyur/ /tsan dan gla rtsi ga bur gyis byugs kyang/ /sgog skya'i dri ni
188b6(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin mi 'dor ltar/ /legs pa'i gzhung lugs bzang por rab bslabs kyang/ /rang bzhin ngan pa'i mtshan nyid 'dor mi srid/ /ji ltar rig pas brgyan gyur kyang/ /skye bo ngan pa yongs su spang/ /sbrul gdugs nor bus brgyan gyur
188b7(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /ci ste 'jigs pa mi bskyed dam/ /ngan pa ji ltar nyam chung ba/ /de srid bar du rang bzhin bzang/ /ston ka yi ni chu bo dag /skyes bu kun gyis brgal bar sla/ /yon tan tshul spyod rang bzhin gsal ba yis/ /skye bo ngan pa bcos su ga la rung/ /
189a1(mdo 'grel): tsha zhi 'drod che rtsub pas bsgrubs pa yi/ /bad kan nad bzhin rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /mi bsrun skye po mgus bran/ /ma rdul rta dang chung ma ngan/ /brdungs na gnyen par 'gyur ba ste/ /'di dag legs bya'i snod ma yin//
189a2(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho char bab don med do/ /'grangs la zan byin don mod do/ /phyug la nor byin don mod/ /dman la legs byas don med do/ /dam pa'i bu yi gdong la pad+ma yod/ /smad 'tshong bu yi slad nas dug lo skyes/ /ji lta ji ltar log par spyod par byed/
189a3(mdo 'grel): de lta da ltar go 'phang 'da' bar 'gyur/ /sprin gyi grib ma skye bo ngan dang mdza' / /rje bo ngan dang bdag po dman la brten/ /zil pa'i chu dang rtsa las 'bar ba'i me/ /drug po 'di dag chu yi chu bur mtshungs/ /sha skam dang ni bud med rgan/ /chang gsar
189a4(mdo 'grel): zhen tshigs ma thag /nyin phyed gnyid dang nam phyed zas/ /'di drug 'phral du srog 'phrog pa'o/ /mar sar 'bras chan 'o mar bcas/ /sha gsar bud med gzhon nu dang/ /shing gi grib ma chu dron khrus/ /'di drug 'phral du stobs skyed do//
189a5(mdo 'grel): sdug pa dang bral rang mis brnyas pa dang/ /bu lon mang zhing ngan pa dag la brten/ /dbul por gyur nas mdze 'os ring du spangs/ /'di lnga me med par ni bsreg pa'o/ /bogs med tshong dang stobs ldan dag la tshe/ /slong zhing 'gying la nor med 'dod la dga' //
189a6(mdo 'grel): na chud sdug la tshig rtsub smra byed pa/ /'di lnga log par spyod pa'i skyes bu'o/ /gang zhig chos ni sbyin byed dang/ /mi 'jigs sbyin dang kha zas sbyin/ /lus skyed pa dang gdams ngag sbyin/ /'di lnga phan 'dogs byed pa'o/ /rab tu byung nas slar log dang/ /bud med
189a7(mdo 'grel): khyo gsum mthong ba dang/ /tsa sbyad snyi las shor ba ste/ /'di gsum g.yon can shes par bya/ /sman dang kha zas ma zhu dang/ /rgyal po brdzun du smra ba dang/ /rigs ldan sdig pa spyod pa ste/ /'di gsum shin tu mi rigs pa'o/ /gzhan las chol zhing zas zhim
189b1(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /slang mos 'tsho zhing khengs pa che/ /bstan bcos mi shes brtson par 'dod/ /'di gsum 'jig rten gzhad gad rgyu/ /rgyal po smra ba lan cig pa dang/ /bu mo gtong ba lan gcig dang/ /'phags pa mthong ba lan cig ste/ /'di gsum 'jig rten lan reg/
189b2(mdo 'grel): dka' thub lus ni cho ba dang/ /mdzes ma gcig pur nyal ba dang/ /dpa' bo rma mtshan med pa ste/ /'di gsum yid mi ches pa'i rgyu/ /rgyal po byi g.yem byed pa dang/ /bram ze gzhan la 'tsho ba dang/ /dge spyod rtsod 'jo byed pa ste/ /'di gsum 'jig rten smad pa'i gnas /
189b3(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa nga rgyal med pa dang/ /dpa' bo nye bar zhi ba dang/ /phyug po gtong ba'i sgo phye ba/ /'di gsum 'jig rten bstod pa'i gnas/ /brtse ldan phan 'dogs ngoms pa med/ /gdug can 'tshe bas ngoms pa med/ /byis pa 'dod pas mi ngoms te/ /'di gsum 'jing
189b4(mdo 'grel): rten ngoms med pa'o/ /nor phyir yid ni gdungs pa dang/ /khyim na chung ma log par spyod/ /bslus dang brnyas ba byas pa rnams/ /blo dang ldan pas smra mi bya/ /mkha' la skar mkhan dag gis rtsis byas na/ /zla ba dang ni skar ma'i lam rnams shes/ /khyim na chung
189b5(mdo 'grel): ma log g.yem byed pa dang/ /sna tshogs ngan spyod de ni mthong ma gyur/ /de nyid shes na slob dpon ci/ /nang dang bral la sman pas ci/ /chu bo brgal la gru bas ci/ /chags bral mdzes mas ci zhag bya/ /lha dang bram ze dam ba dag /bden ba yis ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa
189b6(mdo 'grel): tshig zab smra bas dga' / /phal pa zas dang skom gyis dga' / /ri bo kun na rin chen med/ /nags tshal kun na tsan dan med/ /nya rnams kun la mu tig med/ /dam pa kun la yod ma yin/ /dang pa chu skyar tshogs na mdzes ma yin/ /cang shes bong bu'i tshogs
189b7(mdo 'grel): na ma ngos ma yin/ /seng ge wa yi tshogs na mdzes ma yin/ /mkhas pa blun po'i chogs na mdzes ma yin/ /khu byug tshul ni sgra snyan yin/ /mkhas pa'i tshul ni rig pa yin/ /bud mong tshul ni khrel yod yin/ /dka' thub tshul ni bzod pa yin/ /mthu
190a1(mdo 'grel): chen bcos su mi rung la/ /bzod pa byar yang ci zhig yod/ /zhi ba dul bar spyod pa la/ /bzod pa bya ba ci zhig dgos/ /phan med gnyen ni gzhan yin te/ /pha rol yin yang gang phan gnyen/ /lhan cig
190a2(mdo 'grel): skyes pa'i nang soD dang/ /gangs can ri bo'i sman bzhin no/ /mthu che ba dang 'grogs gyur na/ mthon po nyid du su mi 'gyur/ /me tog phreng dang 'brel pa yis/ /srang bu mgo la 'ching bar byed/ /drang zhing bden par smra ba la/ /slu byed mkhas pa yin nam ci/ /phang? bar
190a3(mdo 'grel): brten te nyal pa'i mi/ /gsod pa de ci dpa' bo 'am/ /gzhon nu'i dus na pha ma'i dbang gyur zhing/ /lang tshe'i dus na bud med dbang gyur te/ /rgan po'i dus na bu yi dbang gyur bas/ /blun po nam yang rang dbang yod me yin/ /ji srid 'dod chen ma gyur ba/ /de srid yon
190a4(mdo 'grel): tan de nyid yin/ /'dod chen 'di la zhugs gyur na/ /yon tan btsun par ga la 'gyur/ /skye bo phal cher rang gi ni/ /tshad mas gzhan dag 'jal bar byed/ drang srong gis ni yi dags mthong/ /'di ni dka' thub ba zhes zer/ /skye bo ngan pas sun phyung na/ /dam
190a5(mdo 'grel): ba la yang yid mi ches/ /phyis pa 'o mas kha chi ge na/ /zho la phu yis 'debs shing 'thung/ /zo chun bzor ni sbyar gyur na/ /bud med kyi yang dbang du 'gyur/ /dang bo rtsom ba gang yin ba/ de ni de mtshar che ba yin/ /gang zhig chen po'i sbyir bkur ga/ /de
190a6(mdo 'grel): nyid dman bas tswa snyam sems/ /mkhas pas phyag byas mchod rten ni/ /khwa yis stan du byed pa yin/ /ke ta ka yi 'bras bu ni/ /chu rnams dang bar byed mod kyi/ /de yi ming cam brjod ba yis/ /chu rdul dang bar mi phyed do/ dam pa dang por khas 'chi mi byed
190a7(mdo 'grel): la/ /gal te dka' bas khas ni blangs gyur na/ /rdo la ri mo bris pa ji lta bar/ /khas blangs de ni nges par sgrub par byed/ /dman pas gang tshe nor ni cung zad rnyed/ /'gro ba gzhan la brnyas pa'i nga rgyal ldan/ /dam pa nor gyi 'byor pa thob gyur kyang/ /sA lu smin pa
190b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du shin tu dud/ /shes rab dang 'dra'i mig med de/ /rmongs pa dang mnyam mun pa med/ /nad dang 'dra pa'i dgra med de/ 'chi bdag dang mnyam 'jigs pa med/ /de bas shin tu mi bzang pa'i/ /'chi ba nges par 'byung 'gyur gyis/ /'dod pa rnams las sems bzlog la/ /dam pa'i
190b2(mdo 'grel): chos la dga' bar gyis/ /yon tan ldan la rig pa yon tan 'gyur/ /yon tan med la de nyid skyon du 'gyur/ /chu bo'i chu ni shin tu dri med pa'ang/ /rgya mtshor byin na btung du mi rung 'gyur/ bye brag phyed pa'i blo ldan yang/ /bya ba gos
190b3(mdo 'grel): gyis bsrub bar bya/ /de la nyes dmigs mi 'byung ste/ /byung na'ang de yis slar spong byed/ brtan zhing 'jam la tshig nyung gang yin pa/ /de la mi yis shin tu byag bya ste/ /nyi ma sprin stug nang nas byung ba yi/ /'od zer shin tu tsha bar 'gyur ba bzhin//
190b4(mdo 'grel): na tshod gzhon yang nye bar zhi la dga' / /mkhas par gyur kyang shes pa'i nga rgyal med/ /gzi brjid che yang bzod cing des pa yis/ /dgra las rgyal byed de ni rnyed par dka' / /phyug po kla klo rnaMs la'ang yod/ /dbar bo dud 'gro rnaMs la'ang yod/ /sna tshoD ngan ldan gtams smra ba'i/ /dam
190b5(mdo 'grel): ba dag ni shin tu dkon/ /'byor pa g.yo zhing lang 'tsho myur du 'jig /srog ni gshin rje'i so yi bar na gnas/ /'dir bde don gnyor pha rol yal bar 'dor/ /de ni g.yang sa'i mthar gnas phor ba bzhin/ /gang zhig nyon mongs nad bcas pa/ /do sman dam chos
190b6(mdo 'grel): mi bsten par/ /yul la bag kyang spyod pa ni/ /srid pa'i lam las 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gal te 'gro ba 'di dag gis/ /'chi bdag spyi bor gnas mthong na/ /zas kyang yid du mi 'ong na/ /bya ba gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /bya ba zin nam ma zin zhes/ /'chi bdag skyod par
190b7(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur bas/ /sang gi bya ba de ring ste/ /phyi dro'i bya ba snga gro'o/ /'jig rtan 'tsho ba brtan ma yin/ /nor ngang lang 'tsho brtan ma yin no/ /bu dang chung ma brtan min te/ /chos dang bden dang phan pa brtan/ rgyan po yun ring gson na rung/ /dang gpo sa myur du shing yang rung/ 
191a1(mdo 'grel): rdon? pa shi ? gson mi rung/ /dam ba shi'am gson bar rung/ tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang/ /bod
191a2(mdo 'grel): kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ b+hi ma la pra shod tra ra ratna ma ma le nA ma
191a3(mdo 'grel): bod skad du/ dri ma med pa'i 'bris lan rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri med dris lan rin chen phreng ba 'di/ /bdag gis mgul na nges bar gnas 'gyur na/ /mdzod? dang ma mthong bsgrub
191a4(mdo 'grel): pa la mkhas pas/ /nges par rgyan du gyur ba cis ma yin/ /bcom ldan blang bya gang zhe na/ /bla ma'i don ldan tshig rnams so/ /spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/ bya ba ma yin thams cad do/ /bla mar gyur pa gang zhe na/ /de nyid ji bzhin rtogs pa dang
191a5(mdo 'grel): rtag tu sems can thams cad la/ /phan bar mngon par brtson pa'o/ /mkhas pas rig bya gang zhe na/ 'khor ba'i rgyu ni nges bcad pa'o/ /thar ba'i sa bon zhing mchog gang/ /yang dag ye shes brtson byas pa'o/ /shin tu mthun pa gang zhes?
191a6(mdo 'grel): chos kyi spyod pa skyon pa'o?/ /'di na gtsang ba gang zhe na/ /gang gis yid ni yongs dag pa'o/ /mkhas par gyur pa gang zhe na/ /bye brag ji bzhin phyed pa'o/ /gdug pa'i dug ni gang zhe na/ /bla ma brnyas byed gang yin pa'o/ /'khor pa
191a7(mdo 'grel): na ni snying po gang/ /yang dag don la rnam dpyod nyid/ /mi yi de nyid thob ba gang/ /bdag gzhan phan par brtson pa'o/ /ra ro lta bu'i rmongs pa gang/ /phyin ci log la chags pa'o/ /mi bsrun dgra 'dra gang zhe na/ /mi bzang pa yi yul
191b1(mdo 'grel): rnams so/ /'khor ba'i 'khri shing gang zhe na/ /log par srod pa dam pa'o/ /dgra bor gyur pa gang zhe na/ /yang dag don la brtson med pa'o/ /'di na 'jigs pa gang zhe na/ /srog mthar gyur pa'i 'chi ba'o/ /long ba las kyang long ba gang/ /

191b3(mdo 'grel): lci ba'i rtsa ba gang/ /gang 'di blun par gyur pa'o/ /tshang tshing mi zad gang zhe na/ /bud med rnams kyi dbyod pa'o/ /shin tu bsgrim pa gang zhe na/ /gang gis nges gral ma gyur pa'o/ /'di na dbul po gang zhe na/ /gang zhig chog shes med pa nyid/ /shin tu yang
191b4(mdo 'grel): pa gang zhe na/ /gzhan bltos slong mo pa rnams so/ /don yod 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ /kha na ma tho med pa'o/ /skyes bu glen pa gang zhe na/ /mkhas bya'i yul la mi slob pa'o/ /gnyid kyis ma log gang zhe na/ /ma rmongs don gyi bye brag shes/ /gnyid kyis log?
191b5(mdo 'grel): pa gang zhe na/ /skyes bu shin tu rmongs pa'o/ /pad+ma'i 'dab chags chu thigs ltar/ /mi brtan myur 'jag? gang zhe na/ /skyes bu rnams kyi lang tsho dang/ /nor dang de bzhin tshe nyid do/ /zla zer lta bu'i yid 'ong gang/ /skye bo dam pa phan 'dogs ba'o//

191b7(mdo 'grel): nang? lkug pa gang zhe na/ /gang zhig snyan smra mi shes pa'o/ /skyes bu'i 'ching ba gang zhe na/ /glen zhing gti mus can nyid do/ /rin chen gyur pa gang zhe na/ /gang zhig du su byin pa'o/ /mi yi zug dur gyur pa gang/ dben par bya min byas pa'o/ /gang la 'bar bya
192a1(mdo 'grel): gang zhe na/ /rig pa legs par slob pa dang/ /sman chen tshul bzhin bsten pa dang/ /sbyin pa kun tu gtong pa'o/ /bltos med bya ba gang zhe na/ /'gro ba ma bsrun 'dul min dang/ /chags gyur gzhan gyi bud med dang/ /'brel med

196a1(mdo 'grel): gang zhig snyas gyur pa/ /de ni sa bdag ma yin ste/ /g.yog 'khor rnams kyang rten mi 'gyur/ /skam chags las ni rang gzhan la/ /rgud pa ring na gnas ma yin/ /mchil pa'i sha la chags pa yi/ /
196a2(mdo 'grel): nya rnams dang yang mtshungs par snang/ /kun gyis thams cad mi shes ste/ /thams cad shes pa gang na med/ /gnas cig la ni mthar thug par/ /shes pa'i skyes bu gang na'ang dkon/ /'jig rten na ni kun rig yod min zhing/ /shin tu blun
196a3(mdo 'grel): pa'ang yod min ste/ /shes pas mchog dang par ma tha mar rung/ /gang gis shes de mkhas pa yin/ /tsan ka rgyal po'i lugs kyi bstan bcos las/ /le'u gsum pa'o// //sa bdag nyid
196a4(mdo 'grel): dang bran g.yog gi /bya ba kho na bshad par bya/ /rgyal po kun la mkhas pa yis/ /bran g.yog legs par rtag par bya/ /bden dang chos la gzhol pa yis/ /rtag tu yul 'khor bskyang bya zhing/ /gzhan gyi dpung ni gnod ba dang/ /rtag
196a5(mdo 'grel): tu chos kyis skyang bya/ /kun dga' ra pa'i phreng rgyud ltar/ /me tog me tog tsam batu yi/ /sol ba mkhan ni ci bzhin du/ /rtsa nas gdon par mi bya'o/ /'o ma bzhos nas 'thung bzhin la/ /ba ni gsad par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin rgyal po'i yul 'khor ni//
196a6(mdo 'grel): 'du shes nas nas longs spyod bya/ /ba'i brla ni? chag gyur na/ /bzho bas 'o ma thob mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin yul 'khor tshul min pas/ /gnod pa byas na 'phel mi 'gyur/ /yul 'khor sbrang rtsi ltar bshad kyi/ /sbrang bu bsad par mi bya'o/ /be'u las
196a7(mdo 'grel): bdag po'i pa bzho ltar/ /rgyal bos sa ni de ltar bskyang/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sa ni rjes su bskyang bya ste/ /sa rnams legs par bskyangs nas ni/ /tshe dang grags pa snyan gsum 'phel/ /brtan rnams 'pho ba thob 'gyur yang/ /rnam par nyams par
196b1(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur ro/ /zla ba sgra gcan khar chud kyang/ /slar yang 'char bar mi byed dam/ /glu mkhan gar mkhan ri mo mkhan/ /rol mo mkhan dang rtsis mkhan dang/ /don gyi bstan bcos 'phong slob dpon/ /sa yi bdag pos 'bad de bsrung/ /bran g.yog la ni
196b2(mdo 'grel): rgyu med par/ /gang zhig khro par byed pa dag /de ni sbrul nag mche ba zug /mos pa'i dug gis zin pa yin/ /rgyal pos 'gyur zhing g.yon can la/ /g.yon po nyid du kun tu spyod/ /sdug la mdza' dang g.yo la g.yo'i/ /drang po rnams la khong drang nyid//
196b3(mdo 'grel): mi rtan pa la brtan pa dang/ /log par sma la de bzhin no/ /gtsang sbra spyod dang de bzhin du/ /g.yog 'khor tshogs ni sbyin pas sdu/ /g.yog 'khor nor gyis dregs pa dang/ /gang zhig rgyal po la sdo dang/ /g.yul du 'jug par 'gyur ba ni/ /dgra'i zil gyis
196b4(mdo 'grel): gnon par 'gyur/ /sa bdag rtag tu rgyu med par/ /khro gnyer dag ni mi bya zhing/ /bran g.yog nor med bar ma yin/ /rgyal pos chos ni bsrung bar bya/ /log par smra la de bzhin no/ /sa bdag gis ni rtsed mo dang/ /bde la chags pa ring du spang/ /khyim gnas bzhin dgra
196b5(mdo 'grel): bo la/ /bde bas rab tu gdul bar bya/ /brtson dang rtul phod brtan pa dang/ /blo dang nus pa pha rol gnon/ /yon tan drug po gang la yod/ /de la lha yang dogs pa skye/ /gang gis rgyal srid 'dod pa yis/ /bsgrubs kyang thob par ma gyur na/ /don bsod nams rgyu yin gyi//
196b6(mdo 'grel): skyes bu brtson pas nyes ma yin/ /tsan ka rgyal po'i lugs kyi bstan bcos las/ le'u bzhi pa'o// //g.yog 'khor gang gi yon tan ni/ /gang zhig yongs brtags bshad par bya/ /mdzangs shing bya ba kun la mkhas/ /grub mdza' bstan bcos
196b7(mdo 'grel): las rab bya/ /rtag tu rgyal po'i bya ba bsgrub/ /'di ni blon po yin par bshad/ /rig byed rig byed yan lag bshad/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg byed la brtson/ /rtag tu shis pa brjod la brtson/ /'di ni rgyal po'i mdun na'i don/ /tshe yi rig byed la legs slangs/ /thams cad
197a1(mdo 'grel): shes shing lta na sdug /dang tshul bzang la bya ba mkhas/ /'di ni sman pa yin par bshad/ /blo ldan smra? mkhas shes rab che/ /bden par smra zhing dbang po dul/ /bstan bcos thams cad legs mthong 'di/ /'di
197a2(mdo 'grel): ni yi ge pa zhes bya/ /rigs dang dang tshul yon tan ldan/ /bden dang chos la mchog tu gzhol/ /gzugs byad shin tu bzang ba yi/ /rgyal po'i spyan ni yin par bshad/ /rang lugs ma 'tshol rgyal la brtan/ /rin chen thams ni yongs
197a3(mdo 'grel): rtogs shes/ /rma ma bab cing rtsol ba can/ /dmag spyan yin par shes par bya/ /brda' la legs par byang 'gyur zhing/ /stobs ldan mthong na sdug pa dang/ /bag yod nor ni che ba dag /sgo dpon chen por de bshad do/ /blo ldan shes rab che
197a4(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /gzhan gyi bsam pa rtog mkhas shing/ /stan la ji bzhin lan 'debs shing/ /'di ni pho nyar shes par bya/ /g.yos kyi bstan bcos kun la mkhas/ /dge zhing snyan smra dbang po zhi/ /gtsang sbra che zhing yid brtan rung/ /de ni phyag
197a5(mdo 'grel): tshad yin par bshad/ /zhar ba zha bo ma ning dang/ /rgur po rgan po dbang po bsdams/ /'di dag btsun mo'i bsrung mar ni/ /rgyal pos nye bar sbyar bar bya/ /bran g.yog mchog dang tha ma dang/ /bar ma mang por shes byas nas/ /de rnams
197a6(mdo 'grel): las don gsum po la/ /ci riD bar ni sbyar bar bya/ /smra mkhas khengs dang le lo can/ /gdugs dang g.yon can phongs chos ldan/ /chog mi shes dang rme sha za/ /bran g.yog rgyal pos spang bar bya/ /bdag po la 'khu spang bya zhing//
197a7(mdo 'grel): shin tu mi bsrun dkren pa'ang spang/ /bkren pas bye brag mi shes pas/ /de bkrin 'di gnod byed pa yin/ /mi bsrun rkam chags phongs chos can/ /mu cor smra dad gus pa med/ /zhe 'gras pa dang sdig las can/ /rgyal pos yongs su spang

198b2(mdo 'grel): rtse ba'i rtsang sbra dang/ /chu yi gtsang sbra lnga ba yin/ /bkur bas mgu bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /mnyas pas 'khrug par mi byed la/ /khro med skyes bu zhes bshad de/ /'di ni dam ba'i mtshan nyid yin/ /skyes bu dbul po rnams kyi tshig/ mkhas shing snyan par gyur
198b3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /dus su smra zhing phan smras kyang/ /su yang nyan par mi byed do/ /sngags dang stobs dang brtson ba dang/ /shes dang skyes bu'i rtsol bas kyang/ /rdos gang snyed par ma gyur pa'i/ /de la su zhig gdung bar byed/ /bde 'am yang na sdug bsngal dag/ thob par
198b4(mdo 'grel): bya ba ma thob cing/ /bgrod par bya ba ma bsgrod ba/ /brnyed par bya ba ma rnyed las/ /don gcig 'grub par 'gyur na ni/ /de las gdung sbyar ci zhig yod/ /gang du 'chi bdag yod der 'chi/ /gang la dpal gnas der phun tshegs/ /rang gi las kyis khrid nas
198b5(mdo 'grel): ni/ /de dang der ni bdag nyid 'gro/ dge dang mi dge'i las rnams ni/ /sngon chad byas pa gang yin pa/ /sngon tshe'i ji ltar spyad pa bzhin/ /byed pa po yi rjes su 'brang/ /skye bo ngan pa gzhan gyi skyon/ /yungs 'bru tsam la rtag byed kyi/ /rang skyon bi wa tsam yang ni
198b6(mdo 'grel): yod du zin kyang mi mthong ngo/ /gzhan dbang thams cad sdug bsngal ste/ /rang dbang thams cad bde ba yin/ /bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis tshang ga/ mdor na 'di dag yin zhes bya/ /bde ba'i rjes la sdug bsngal zhing/ /sdug bsngal rjes la bde ba ste/ /mi rnams kyi
198b7(mdo 'grel): ni bde sdug dag /'khor lo bzhin du yongs su 'khor/ /gang zhig song ba de 'das zin/ /gang zhig ma 'ongs te thag ring/ /gang zhig ltung bar mi 'gyur bar/ /da ltar byung bas gnas par gyis/ /tsa na ka rgyal po'i lugs kyi bstan bcos las le'u drug pa'o/ /
199a1(mdo 'grel): 'ga' yang su yi mdza' bo min/ /su yang gang gi dgra bo min/ /mdza' bo dang ni dgra bo dag/ rang gi nus pa nyid las byung/ /mya ngan dgra skyed 'jigs las skyob/ /yid chos gnas gyur snying du sdug /mdza' bo zhes bya'i yi ge
199a2(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ /rang gi rin chen 'di sbrul 'gyur/ /gal te rtag tu mdza' 'dod na/ /pho nya nor gyi kha spogs dang/ /yid ches chung ma la blta ba/ /nyes pa sum po spang bar bya/ /rlung shugs mi bzad ldad pa dang/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i rba brlabs dang/ /'byung ba dgag
199a3(mdo 'grel): par nus srid kyi/ /rjes chags sems ni de lta min/ /me dang chu dang bud med dang/ /blon po sbrul dang rgyal po drug/ 'phral du srog 'phrog byed yin bas/ /rtag tu bag dang bcas pas bsten/ /gzhan gyis rang skyon mi mthong bas/ /gzhan gyi

199a5(mdo 'grel): lkog pas chos/ /gzhan la gnod pa sbyor bas dang/ /rtsub pas bud med bde rig pa/ /gang zhig 'dod mkhas pa min/ /gang zhig rgan po gros mi nyan/ /bstan bcos shes pa'i skye bo med/ /ma rtags par ni spyod gyur pa/ /de yi bya ba med la 'jig /
199a6(mdo 'grel): bsgrod dka' bar ni gnas gyur kyang/ /mi yis gsang thub rang dbang 'gyur/ /phye bar gyur pas 'khrugs pa ni/ /g.yul gyi bu bzhin mya ngan skyed/ /dka' thub lus ni 'jam pa dang/ /dpa' bo rma ni med pa dang/ /bud med dam pa 'char 'thung dang/ /
199a7(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i chos me dang mi ches/ /mdza' bo med la yid mi brtan/ /mdza' bo la yang yid mi brtan/ /gal te mdza' o khros gyur na/ /gsang tshig thams cad smra bar byed/ /byed pa po la ma bltos par/ /bya ba ci yang ma grub pas/ /bya ba kun la 'jug
199b1(mdo 'grel): na yang/ /blo ni brtan pa nyid du bya/ /lhon sha dbul po'i dug yin ste/ /rgan po'i dug ni gzhon nu ma/ /blo ngan gyi ni rig pa drug /ma zhu zas za dug yin no/ /rnyog ma mi bde glu la dga' / /dmangs rigs stan mtho la dga' dang/ /dbul po gtong ba la dka' 
199b2(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /rgan po gzhon nu la dgar 'gyur/ /chu mang 'thungs shing stan srab dang/ /lus zungs zad dang shugs bkab dang/ /nyin bar gnyid log mtshan gnyid med/ /drug po 'di rnams nad rkyen byed/ /sha skam dang ni bud med rgan/ /chang gsar zhon?
199b3(mdo 'grel): chags ma thag /nad par 'khrig spyod nyin gnyid log/ drug po 'phral du srog 'phrog yin/ /chang rnying sha dang mar rnying dang/ /bud med gzhon dang 'o ma 'thung/ /chu tshan dang ni shing grib dang /'phral du srog na ster byed yin/ /khrus byas 'o mchu spyod sha/

202b1(mdo 'grel): yi ge gcig tsam zhig/ bla mas slob ma la slabs pa/ /gang byin bu lon med gyur pa'i/ /rdzas de sa steng yod ma yin/ /bla ma gang ni yi ge gcig /ster la phyag ni ma byas pa/ /khyi yi skye gnas brgya thob? nas/ /rigs ngan du ni skye bar 'gyur?//
202b2(mdo 'grel): rigs pa glegs bam la gnas shing/ /bla ma'i thad nas ma slabs na/ /'phyon ma'i bud med sbrum ma bzhin/ /tshogs pa'i nang na mdzes ma yin/ /bram ze'i bla ma med yin la/ /rigs kyi bla ma bram ze yin/ /chud ma'i bla ma khyen thab? gcig /
202b3(mdo 'grel): kun gyi bla ma'i glo bur lhags/ /mdza' o la la phreng ba 'dra/ /mdza' bo la la shing bal 'dra/ /mdza' bo la la lhun po 'dra/ /mdza' bo la las gzhi 'dra/ /mdza' bo phred ba 'dra spang zhing/ /shing bal 'dra ba'i mdza' po dang/ /lhun po 'dra ba'i
