202b5(mdo 'grel): byas/ /bu raM shing mngar nim ba kha bdag /'di dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis grub/ /gang na skye ba klang la mos ltar dregs/ /gang na rta dang bong bu khyad par med/ /gang na 'ching bu ma rgang dbyer med pa/ /de ru yon tan can gnas ci ru rung/ /yul gang na
202b6(mdo 'grel): ni yongs rtogs mkhas med pa/ /rgya mtsho las byung nor bu der mi brin/ /nor bu chu shel rin thad tshe ba la/ /ba lang rdzi ni phul gsum sbyin zhes zer/ /khwa yi tshogs nang dang bar mdzes ma yin/ /wa'i tshogs nang seng ge mdzes ma yin/ /bong
202b7(mdo 'grel): bu'i khyu na rta mchog mdzes ma yin/ /skyes bu blun nad mkhas pa mdzes ma yin/ /yon tan shes na yon tan yon tan gyur/ /yon tan med na de nyid skyon du 'gyur/ /chu bo'i chu ni shin tu zhim pa dag/ rgya mtshor phyin na btung du mi rung 'gyur// //
203a1(mdo 'grel): yon tan 'bad pas 'grub ba yin/ /'bad pa bdag nyid la gnas pas/ /gzhan dag yon tan ldan ces zhes/ /yon tan kun tu rnam mchod kyi/ /pha mes rigs ni don med yin/ /khyab 'jug la ni skye bo rnams/ /phyag 'tshal
203a2(mdo 'grel): nor lha la ma yin/ /chos kyi rtse mo rgyal po ste/ /chos rtsa dge sbyong bram ze? yin/ /rtsa ba las ni 'bras bu skye/ /de bas rtsa ba gnod mi bya/ /chos kyi 'bras bu rgyal po yin/ /me tog las ni 'bras bu skye/ /de phyir me tog la mi rtsa/ /rgyal po shing de
203a3(mdo 'grel): dge sbyong rtsa ba yin/ /blon po yal ga grong ma 'dab ma yin/ /rtsa ba bsrungs na shing de mnyams pas/ /de phyir dge sbyong bram ze lags par bsrungs/ /thams cad gzhan la rag lus gyur kyang? ni/ /mi yi dbang pos dge sbyong bram ze bsrung//
203a4(mdo 'grel): chos dang nor dang grags dang snyan ba yang/ /dge sbyong bram ze legs par skyangs las thog/ /rgyal po tsan ka yi blo ma/ /bstan bcos thams cad legs brtags nas/ /longs sbyod lha yis bstan pa dang/ /khyad par shes pa nyid du 'gyur/ /blo ldan
203a5(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa'i thar ba'i phyir/ /gang gis bstan bcos 'di bslabs shing/ /bslab pa 'di la gnas 'gyur na/ /dpal dang bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /de la thag yis mi tshugs shing/ /nad kyis 'jigs pa yod ma yin/ /nad par dad ni dgongs ka'i
203a6(mdo 'grel): tshe/ rgyal bos 'di na bzlas par bya/ /des ni rgyal srid yul 'khor yang/ /rtag tu 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur/ /dpal ldan ba la ta ka'i bus/ /lugs kyi bstan bcos las btus pa/ /thos ba'i nor med sa stengs na/ /long pa yin snyam bsams te
203a7(mdo 'grel): byas/ /tsa na ka rgyal bo'i lugs kyi bstan bcos las/ /le'u brgyad pa'o// //tsa na ka rgyal po'i lugs kyi bstan bcos rdzogs// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra ba ka sri mi tra dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha
203b1(mdo 'grel): ? ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //lugs kyi bstan bcos bzhugs// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ nI tI shA shta/ bod skad du/ lugs kyi bstan bcos/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don gyi
203b2(mdo 'grel): bstan bcos bye brag las/ /bstan bcos dag la phan pa dang/ /mi rnams blo ni bskyed pa'i phyir/ /ma su rak+Shas bsdus te bshad/ /'jig rten legs bskyed shes pa bsgrag phyir/ /shes pa bslab phyir yang dag don bsgrub phyir/ /blo bskyed phyir ni tshig
203b3(mdo 'grel): bshad tshul 'di brjod/ /dngos po kun la mkhas shing goms par bya/ /chos spyad gzhan gyi mngon sum bsrung bar bya/ /khro ba spang zhing mkhas pa bsten par bya/ /bden par smra zhing smra nyams brjod mi bya/ /bram ze bkur zhing ba lang brnyas mi bya/ /rgyal pos
203b4(mdo 'grel): 'jigs shing spyod pa spa bar bya/ /dgra bo shes bya mi rnams brnyas mi bya/ /drags pa spang zhing smad dngos bsten mi bya/ /phan pa'i zas bsten grogs po brnyas mi bya/ /me la mi bgom g.yul la blta mi bya/ /snyan dags mnyan zhing srog chags
203b5(mdo 'grel): gnod mi bya/ /bya min mi bya khron pa dgom mi bya/ /rig pa blang zhing sprul la rtse mi bya/ /ci nus sbyin zhing dman la bslang mi bya/ /bdag la mi bstong gzhan la smad mi bya/ /de nyid shes bya mtshan mo rgyu mi bya/ /zhags pa dang bral glang gla rjes mi 'gro/ lham
203b6(mdo 'grel): med mi 'gro grogs med lam mi 'gro/ smyo byed? blo ngan ring du spang bar bya/ /chung ma ma rungs spang zhing yid 'ong bsten/ /ma 'dris pa dang nam yang mthun mi 'jug/ /rgyal po'i bran mo 'dod spang man ngag mnyan/ /gang dang lhan cig zhe 'dras yong mi bya
203b7(mdo 'grel): be'u gzhon pa drus ring du spang bar bya/ /bud med rnams la nam yang yid mi brtan/ /chu bo brgal dka' rgya cher 'jug mi bya/ /chang 'thung ra ro shing mthor mjog? mi bya/ /don rnams bsgrub cing chos dang nor mi spang/ /gang du bsrung ba med pa'i
204a1(mdo 'grel): yul? de spang/ /kun gyi gsang tshig nam yang mi smra ste/ /kha rjer mi bsdud skyes bus rtsol ba 'bad/ /gsong bor smra zhing 'brel min tshig mi smra/ /glo bur lhags mdun dus su legs 'ongs brjod/ /mi
204a2(mdo 'grel): dang lha dang bram ze rnams la mchod/ /bsod nams yul ni rtag tu bsten par bya/ /rtag tu khrus dang gos dkar gos la gus/ /ha cang bud med chags men zhu nas bza' / /shes ldan gang zhig de ltar byed pa ni/ /'tsho ba nad med tshe ring
204a3(mdo 'grel): shes bar bya/ /ma su rak+Shas byas pa'i lugs kyi bstan bcos las le'u dang po'o// //bdag gi gsang dang gzhan gyi gsang/ /bu bzhin gces bzhin bsrung bya ste/ /sa bzhin kun la snyoms par bya/ /mi rnams dga' 
204a4(mdo 'grel): bas rab tu dga' / /gnad kyi tshig rnams mi brjod cing/ /gnang du 'phog 'gyur mi bsgrag ste/ /gzhan gyi gnad rnams smra ba ni/ /skyes bus mtshon cha bzhin shes bya/ /snying la tsham tshom med byas nas/ /bu ram chu bzhin kha nas brjod
204a5(mdo 'grel): zhe 'gras yid ches byas nas ni/ /de nas dag gam mtshon gyis gzhom/ /dgra rnams snyan par brjod kyang ni/ /blo ldan btang slobs mi bya'o/ /de nyid mthar ni gnod byed de/ /ji ltar dug snod mi bzad bzhin/ /rang stobs chu bo mi brtan te/ /chu bo'i
204a6(mdo 'grel): rgyu khyon yongs brtags nas/ /de bzhin dus su brgal byas te/ /rang gi don rnams rjes su bsam/ /ji srid 'jigs pa ma byung bar/ /de srid par du 'jigs par bya/ /'jigs pa mngon sum byung na ni/ /'jigs pa btang ste brdeg par bya//
204a7(mdo 'grel): don ni chu skyar bzhin du bsams/ /pha rol gnod pa seng ge bzhin/ /byi la'i dri tshor byi ba ltar/ /shes don bzhin du btul bar bya/ /seng ge cig dang chu skyar bzhi/ /bya gag gi ni bslab pa bzhi/ /bya rog lnga dang khyi yi drug /bud?
204b1(mdo 'grel): bu'i bslab pa gsum rnams so/ /bya ba mang nyung gang yang rung/ /skyes bu gang zhig byed 'dod pa/ /rtog med bya ba kun brtsams te/ /seng ge'i cig ces grags pa yin no/ /dbang po rnams? ni rab bsdams shing/ /yul dang dus la ci rigs par/ /bya? ba
204b2(mdo 'grel): rnams na rtig dpyang de/ /skyes bu mdzangs pa chu skyar bzhin/ /tho rangs ldang dang 'thab pa dang/ /gnyen la kha zas snyoms par 'gyed/ /mo la rab gnon nye bar spyod/ /khyim bya'i bslab ma bzhi yin no/ /mi mngon 'khrig dang rdam pa dang/ /dus su
204b3(mdo 'grel): gnas ni 'cha' ba dang/ /bag yod pa dang yid mi ches/ /'di ni bya rog bslab pa lnga/ /mang du za dang cung zad chog /legs par gnyid log myur bar sad/ /dpa' la snying nye brtan pa ste/ /khyi'i spyod pa drug yin no/ /khal gyis bkal na 'degs
204b4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /grang dang tsha bas mi bskyod dang/ /rtag tu chog ni shes pa ste/ /bong bu'i spyod pa gsum yin no/ /de ltar nyi shur shes bya ste/ /skyes bu gang zhig spyod 'gyur ba/ /'di ni dgra las rgyal 'gyur te/ /dgra rnams kun gyis mi thub
204b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /le'u gnyis pa'o// //ji srid dus la ma bab par/ /dgra ni phrag gong bkur bya ste/ /de bzhin dus su phyin gyur na/ /rngo la rdzam bsnun bzhin gzhom/ /dman bzhin snying rje'i skad 'don kyang/ /dgra ni btang
204b6(mdo 'grel): bar mi bya'o/ /de la snying rje mi bya zhing/ /sngon chad gnod pa byed pa gzhom/ /bu lon me yi lhag ma dang/ /de bzhin dgra yi lhag ma ni/ /yang dang yang du 'phel 'gyur bas/ /de bas lhag ma bzhag mi bya/ /byams la lan du phan bya ste
204b7(mdo 'grel): 'tshe bar byed pa slar yang gtse/ /de la nges par mi blta zhing/ /ma rungs byed la ma rungs spyad/ /'phongs pa'i don du nor rnams bsrungs/ /nor bas chung ma bsrung bar bya/ /nor dang chung ma gnyis pas kyang/ /thams cad don du bdag bsrung//
205a1(mdo 'grel): lkog na bya ba nyams byed cing/ /mngon sum snyan par smra byed ba/ /de 'dra'i grogs po spang bya ste/ /bum pa'i 'o ma dug bzhin no/ /brkam chags sbyin pa mi ster dang/ /khengs pa thal mo mi sbyor dang/ /de 'dra'i glen?
205a2(mdo 'grel): pa rjes mthun par/ /ji ltar de ltar shes pa mkhas/ /dgra la thal sbyar yid ches dang/ /spyi bos btung de gus bya zhing/ /gdung 'gyur mchi ma 'dzag sogs bya/ /'byor pa 'dod pas de ltar bya// dgra bo stobs ldan rjes mthun byes?
205a3(mdo 'grel): stobs chung dgra la klog bya ste/ /mthu stobs mnyam pa'i dgra la ni/ /mthun min gdul min bya ba'o/ /gang gis gdung 'gyur de mi bya/ /gang gis zhum 'gyur de mi spyad/ /mthar mi phyi ni pa'i las mi brtsam/ /mgo ltung mi
205a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur gdag mi bya/ /pha rol ma brgal de mi brtsam/ /gang du dgra gnas der 'dug min/ /shing rtsa ma phyung phyung ba min/ /gnyis su ma gyur bcad pa min/ /rgan po med pa'i 'tshogs pa min/ /chos mi ston dag rgan ba min
205a5(mdo 'grel): gang la bden med chos kyang med/ /tshig don 'brel med don ma yin/ /tsher ma gting du zug pa dang/ /chos la nyams pa nyid dang ni/ /dgra dang sha 'khon zhugs pa ni/ /rtsad nas phyung na bde ba yin/ /gtan du drang po mi bya ste//
205a6(mdo 'grel): nags su song la yongs ltos dang/ /der ni shing drang gcod 'gyur te/ /yon po'i shing ni gnas pa ltos/ /gang dang gang la ci bsam pa/ /de dang de la phan bsams te/ /rjes su 'jug pa'i mkhas pa ni/ /myur du bdag gi dbang
205a7(mdo 'grel): du 'gyur/ /'di ltar bsang bya gang yin pa/ /mi brjod mtshor bsad bya ste/ /ri dags rgyal po rab 'khrugs pas/ /lus bskums nas ni gsod byed bzhin/ /snying la khon du dam bzung nas/ /gzhan la mi ston spyad par bya/ /blo
205b1(mdo 'grel): ldan bzod pa ldan byas nas// gzhan gyi skyon ni yod mi bgrang/ /dper na khu byug grog ma dang/ /dngul rdo lta bu'i mdog ldan ba'i/ /lag 'gro'i rkang mthil gang yin te/ /dus ma yin par nyams kyang no/ /gang zhig blo gros la
205b2(mdo 'grel): bsten te/ /gdengs ka go 'phangs mi smad cing/ /de ni dug nyams mi 'gyur ltar/ /skyes bus nyams kyang go 'phang mtho/ /ji srid dgra bo pha rol la/ /'dis ni pus btsugs gdung bya ste/ /skye bo dam pa rnam la ni/ /bsnyen bkur
205b3(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs spyod pa dang/ /rngon pa'i spyod lam 'jam bu yis/ /ri dags drung du bsnyen nas ni/ /dug bsgos mnga' yis bsnun bzhin bya/ /le'u gsum pa'o// //bdag don 'bad pas bya ba ste/ /gzhan don de bzhin
205b4(mdo 'grel): bsam mi bya/ /bdag gzhan don rnams spangs pa ni/ /mdzangs pa thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi don la mi brtul te/ /rang gi las la brtson par bya/ /mig sman spyad na brang snang bzhin/ /grog ma yid ni bsags pa ltar/ /de
205b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin du ni mkhas pa yis/ /bsags pa nyung du spyad par bya/ /ma rmongs thams cad rmongs bya zhing/ /rmongs rnams rtag tu mgo skor bya/ /yid mi che la yid ches bya/ /bdag nyid sba zhing rjes su bsam/ /nyi ma don med mi bya ste/
205b6(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa kha don las rnams spyar/ /ji ltar srin gyi kha chu yis/ /grog ma bslus pa bzhin du bya/ /dam pa'i skye bo dga' bar bya/ /mi bsrun skye bo bsten mi bya/ /skye bo ma rungs yid mi brtan/ /skye bo dgra la dpa' ba brtan/ /bla ma'i skye bo
205b7(mdo 'grel): bzod par bya/ /smad 'tshong ma la brid par bya/ /gang gis de dag ma lus pang?/ /thams cad yongs su shes gyur pa/ /'jig rten 'jig rten shes pa yin/ /gang dang gang la don ldan pa'i/ /skyes bu las la chags gyur pa/ /bshang?
206a1(mdo 'grel): dang gang la dga' ba'i tshig/ de dang de yi yon tan brjod/ /yid mi ches la yid mi brtan/ /yid ches lhag bar yid brtan min/ /yid ches pa las 'jigs pa 'byung/ /rtsa ba las kyang gcod par byed/ /
206a2(mdo 'grel): 'byung po kun la yid mi brtan/ /kun la yid ches bya ba'ang min/ /rang gi rang bzhin sba bya zhing/ /gzhan gyis rang bzhin shes par gyis/ /gzhan gyi bud med dug yin te/ /de bzhin chung ma gzhan 'gro dang/ /gnyis po
206a3(mdo 'grel): de la yid? rton pa'i/ /mi rnams 'chi sgor brten pa yin/ /bud med rgyal po sbrul rnams dang/ /kha ton dag dang dgra rnams dang/ /tshe dang longs spyod dag la ni/ /shes ldan rnams kyis yid brten min/ /rig pa 'dod pas mkhas
206a4(mdo 'grel): bsten bya/ /shes par gyur na gzhan ston byed/ /de bas las rnams thams cad dang/ /lus ba med par bslab par bya/ /sdig pa can la yid mi brtan/ /blo ldan bdag ces zer yang min/ /gang phyir de las yid ches min/ /de yi
206a5(mdo 'grel): 'tsho ba nyams par 'gyur/ /gshin rje'i gshed ma 'chi ba dang/ /sa 'og rgya mtsho'i gling rnams dang/ /sbu gri'i so dug sbrul rnams ni/ /mi ste phyogs gcig bud med yin/ /dgra yi phyogs byed spang par bya/ /bdag la
206a6(mdo 'grel): dga' ba yongs su bsdu/ /kun la blo ni yod pa ste/ /yun ring blo ni dga' ba yin/ /mig 'byed mig btsums tsam yang rung/ /dgra la mngon sum bya ba min/ /dmod ba byas na 'on pa bzhin/ /dus bab ral gris bcad bzhin
206a7(mdo 'grel): bya/ /gang du chu yod dang pa gnas/ /chu skams mtshon skams par 'gyur/ /chu yis gang na slar gnas bzhin/ /dang pa lta bu'i grogs mi bsten/ /rgyal po smad 'tshong mdang ni/ /de bzhin nye du sman pa dang/ /g.yog 'khor
206b1(mdo 'grel): rnams la rtag tu yang/ /ha cang gdung bar mi bya'o/ /gang gis rgyu las mya ngan dang/ /dngos dang sdug bsngal nyid dang ni/ /lus kyi gnod bskyed rtsa ba ste/ /gcig gam cung zad tsam yang rung/ /mkhas pas spangs zhing dor bar bya/ /gser ni rnam bzhiS
206b2(mdo 'grel): brtag ba ste// brdar bcad bsreg dang brdungs pas so/ /de bzhin rnam bzhis skyes bu brtag/ thos dang tshul khrims rigs snying brtse/ /thams cad shes shing rig par bya/ /kun la dogs bya dus shes kyis/ /'jig rten sems ni bsrung bya
206b3(mdo 'grel): ste/ /tshig rnams kun gyis yid ches bya/ /bdag gis gsang tshig gzhan mi bsnyad/ /le'u bzhi pa'o// //blon po'i blo ni phun sum tshogs/ /bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med cing/ /bang mdzod stobs dang ldan pa ni/ /ma bsang
206b4(mdo 'grel): de yi phyir bsad 'gyur/ /yid ches skyes bu 'chi 'gyur te/ /smig ma'i 'bras bu byung ba bzhin/ /yid ches zhags pas gsing 'gyur te/ /nags na gnas pa'i ri dags bzhin/ /mig rtsa dmar zhing tshig 'jam smra/ /dga' bas sems can
206b5(mdo 'grel): kun dang mthun/ /don rnams kun la gya gyu smra/ /gzhan tshig gam? la 'jig rten smod/ /de ni g.yon can sbyod lam ste// /de snying nyes pa chen po yis/ /sdig pa nyi tshe tshogs ba sogs nas/ /grong gi tshogs ni bzlog byas nas/ /grong khyer 'khrug
206b6(mdo 'grel): byed g.yon can 'di/ /'byung khungs skye bo ngan pa'i gter/ /de ni 'jig rten spyi dgra yin/ /ma rungs skye bo kha snyan cing/ /tsan dan lta bu bsal ba'i dag/ snying ni ma rung bdag nyid dang/ /sogs le bas kyang khyad par 'phags/ /ma rungs bdag
206b7(mdo 'grel): nyid tshig 'jam zhing/ /skyon dang rjes mthun snyan smra ste/ /mi mngon khon bzung byams med la/ /yid brten byed dang gshin rje gshed/ /thag rings mthong na mgo smod cing/ /shin tu dman pa'i tshig brjod la/ /skad gsang chung ba smra ba ni/ /
207a1(mdo 'grel): g.yon can rnams kyi mtshan nyid yin/ /gang gis sngon chad gnod byas dang/ /da lta gang gis gnod byed pa/ /de la yid ches mi rigs te/ /khung na gnas pa'i lag 'gro bzhin/ /'bab chu sder mo can rnams dang ? can lag
207a2(mdo 'grel): na mtshon thogs dang/ /rgyal bo'i pho brang bud med la/ /yid brtan bgrod par mi bya'o/ /me chu bud med glen ma dang/ /sprul dang rgyal rigs dag la ni/ /rtag tu 'bang bas sten byed ba/ /'phral du srog 'phrog de drug yin/ /nor rnams mang po ster byed pa'i
207a3(mdo 'grel): dgra la gang zhig bsten pa dang/ /chung ma khyo la ma chags gnyis/ /de yi 'tsho ba bar du gcod/ /sngan chad dgrar gyur bshes byed cing/ khon pa'i gzhi med 'khrug byed pa/ /grogs po'i 'dod pa bzlog byed pa/ /de 'dra'i grogs po ring du spang/ /dgra
207a4(mdo 'grel): dang bshes gnyen g.yog 'khor dang/ /bar gnas rgan po nyams chung rnams/ /rmongs pas bye brag mi shes pas/ /de ni skyes bu tha shes yin/ /rkun ma'i chad pa bsrad ba dang/ /grogs 'khu nyung du brjod par bya/ /chung ma 'khub pa la sten dbye//
207a5(mdo 'grel): bram ze nyes med spyan mi drang/ /bdag gis mngon sum ma gyur bar/ /gzhan gyi nyes pa smra byed pa/ /gang gis dmyal bar ltung ba'i rgyu/ /las de brtsams par mi bya'o/ /bdag nyid bdag gi gnyen yin zhing/ /bdag nyid bdag gi dgra yang yin/ /mtho
207a6(mdo 'grel): ris dmyal ba de bzhin du/ /thams cad bdag gi dbang du gnas/ /le'u lnga pa'o// //blon pos legs par mnyam bzhag ste/ /spyod pa gzhan la smra mi byed/ /nyi ma bzhin du don rnams la/ /gzi brjed kyis ni gdung bar byed//
207a7(mdo 'grel): mi bsrun lhan cig spyod pa dag/ dang po dga' zhing mnyen pa dang/ /bar du rtsod pas dga' med de/ /tha mar sha? 'khon zhugs pa yin/ /bdag nyid cha dang mtshungs pa yin/ /dang po chung du bshes byed cing/ /bar du de bas lhag par 'gyur/ /thams
207b1(mdo 'grel): rab tu dga' bar mdzad/ /dam pa'i bshes ni 'bab chu 'dra/ /dang po nyung zhing bar du che/ /rim gyis rim gyis rgya cher 'phel/ /'gro ba'i phyir mi ldog tu med /dud 'gro dri yis mthong bar byed/ /rig byed kyis ni bram ze mthong/ /sman gyi rigs bas sman pa mthong//
207b2(mdo 'grel): rgyal bo nyan rnams mthong bar byed/ /mi yis dgra ni gzhom 'dod pas/ /rtag tu snyan smra ngan bas bsam/ /klu yis brid pa'i ri dags bzhin/ /sems 'khrul gyur na bsad par bya/ /gang la nor yod gnyen bshes dang/ /gang la nor yang nye du ste/ /gang la
207b3(mdo 'grel): nor yod 'jig rten mi/ /gang la nor yod de mdzangs yin/ /nor med gyur na gnyen bshes dang/ /bu dang chung ma nye du dang/ /skye bo sdug ba rnams kyis spong/ /nor ldan gyur na phyir yang gnyen/ /nor ni 'jig rten mi yi gnyen/ /go 'phang mchog thob gyur
207b4(mdo 'grel): na ni/ /bshes gnyen grogs po la sogs pa'i/ /sngon ma mthong ba rnams kyang bdud/ /nor bzang go 'phang nyams dus na/ /rang mi rnams kyang dgrar 'gyur ro/ /gsang dang khong ni grims pa dang/ /brnag pa mthar phyin byed nus dang/ /dgra la 'jigs pa
207b5(mdo 'grel): spyod pa ni/ /dgra bo 'jigs 'gyur the tshom med/ /dgra yi phyogs la mkhas pa yis/ /dang por rtsa ba bcad par bya/ /de nas rang gi phyogs bcas pas/ /sngon chad gnod pa byed pa bsang/ /lan cig 'jigs 'gyur bshes gnyen gang/ /slar ni 'dus
207b6(mdo 'grel): bar 'dod gyur pa/ /de ni 'chi ba nyer len te/ /dre'u mo yin ni mngal bzhin no/ /dgra dang lan cig 'dum byed cing/ /yid brtan bde bar gnyid log pa/ /de ni shing rtser gnyid log pa'i/ /lhung nas sad pa ji bzhin no/ /gal te bu 'am spun zla 'am/ /smag gi gnyen mtshams groD bshes rnamS
207b7(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i bar du gcod byed na/ /bsang bya 'di la the tshom med/ /gnyen pas mi gnyen 'jig pa ste/ /'jam pos rtsub pa 'jig par byed/ /gnyen pas mi 'dul cung zad med/ /da bas gnyen pa shin tu no/ nor nyams nus pa nyamS ba dang/ /gnang la mkhas shing brtson 'grus che/ /rgyal srid?
208a1(mdo 'grel): phyed ni 'phrog pa'i mi/ /gal te ma bsad nges gsod 'gyur/ /zab mo'i blo ldan dang 'jam zhing/ /dman par smra la dbang po thul/ /bden par smra zhing gzhan dbang can/ /shis pa'i tshig ldan de nyid rig/ de nyid g.yog 'khor bzang po yin/
208a2(mdo 'grel): shin tu chog shes le lo med/ /legs par gnyid log rab tu sang/ /bde dang sdug bsngal grogs byed ba'i/ /g.yog 'khor 'jig rten rab tu dkon/ /g.yo can dag la g.yo ston cing/ /drang la drang ba'i spyod pa ston/ /dga' la dga' ba'i nyid dang ni//
208a3(mdo 'grel): mi dga' ba la mi dga' ston/ /dngos po gang la gang dga' ba'i/ /skyes pa bud med ston byed pa'o/ /dam pa rnams kyi 'jug sgo ni/ /nam du yang ni mi 'dor ro/ /skye bo ngan dang 'grogs na ni/ /skye po dam pa'ang nyams byed de/ /chu dang 'dam bu 'dres na ni/ /dang
208a4(mdo 'grel): ba'ang dri ma can du 'gyur/ /kha la sprang rtsis bsgos bzhin dang/ /khong na rnyog pa'i bdag nyid de/ /nang na rag na phyir rdul dang/ /kha yi nang gi rdo phye bzhin/ /tshig 'jam brtse med shes rab ldan/ /mi mngon shin tu mi zad pa/ /bu ram dug 'dres lta bu yi
208a5(mdo 'grel): de 'dra'i skyes bu bsten mi bya/ /shin tu ma rungs skye bo la/ /rjes su mthun pas zhi bya zhing/ /sngar ba'i dag gis bsgos byas te/ /mkhris pa'i nang byung ji bzhin no/ /n+ya gro d+ha zhes bya ba yi/ /shing gi rgyal por grags pa yod/ /de yi byu gu bu rnamS
208a6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /rtsa ba zugs nas gting gnas te bcig? la cig ni 'brel byas nas/ /de nas shing de 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin bu dang tsha'o dang/ /blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pa yis/ /rgyal po'i gnas nas skyed byed de/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi myu gu bzhin/ /
208a7(mdo 'grel): le'u ste drug pa'o// //sa bdag gi ni g.yog 'khor gyi/ /mtshan nyid bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /rgyal po ji ltar bshes gnyen ldan/ /g.yog 'khor de ltar brtag par bya/ /ji ltar dbang po la sogs pa'i/ /me ni lha rnams kun
208b1(mdo 'grel): gyi kha/ /de bzhin rgyal po'i blon po yang/ /yul 'khor rgyu dang mi rgyu'i kha/ /brtan zhing zab mo'i blo ldan dang/ /mdangs ldan chos dang bstan chos rig/ dul zhing bden par smra ba dang/ /rgyal po'i 'khor la phan par sems/ /rigs btsun rgyud ni mnyan pa dang/ /bla ma la
208b2(mdo 'grel): ni gus nyan dang/ /skye dgu'i rjes brtser ldan pa yi/ /brgyud byung de ni rgyal sras yin/ /rgyal po snying brtse phan sems ldan/ /bla ma'i skyon ni spang ba dang/ /g.yul 'jug slar yang mi ldog cing/ /bde dang sdug bsngal mnyam par sems/ /rigs dang tshul khrimS
208b3(mdo 'grel): phun sum tshogs/ /chos lugs 'chad pa mkhas pa ste/ /de bzhin 'dun dang dad pa dang/ /grims pa rgyal por rab grags so/ /tshig gsal blo ni phun sum tshogs/ /lugs kyi bstan bcos dag la mkhas/ /dag 'jam spyod par byed pa ste/ /rgyal po'i
208b4(mdo 'grel): blon po de 'dras bya/ /yid gzhungs tshig gsal shes rab ldan/ /gzhan sems nye bar mtshon nus dang/ /brtan zhing ji skad bsgo bzhin smra/ /rgyal po'i pho nya de 'dras bya/ /rig byed yan lag de nyid shes/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg mchod sbyin brtson//
208b5(mdo 'grel): rtag tu shing bar brjod byed pa/ /shes rab ldan de mdun na 'don/ /sgra rig rtsis kyang shes pa ste/ /yi ge byang zhing lag pa myur/ /yid gzhungs tshig ni gsal ba dang/ /grags dang sbyin ldan yi ge ba/ /yi ge byang zhing sgrol mkhas/ /sgra yi mtshan nyid
208b6(mdo 'grel): rtog byed/ /dri za bzhin du dbyangs mkhas te/ /de 'dra'i klog mkhan bsgo bar bya/ /brtan zhing dbang po rjes su 'os/ /shes rab che zhing legs nyes rtogs/ /gtsang zhing rgyal po'i sku byed sten/ /de 'dra'i chad pa gcod mkhan yin/ /tshe yi rig byed goms
208b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /chos rig yid 'ong snyan smra zhing/ /cho ga dang tshul phun sum tshogs/ /thang la 'bar zhing gso mkhas shing/ /nad kyi mtshan nyid kun la mkhas/ /rgyal pos de 'dra'i sman pa bsten/ /gzhan gyi spyod lam zur gyis shes/ /stobs ldan
209a1(mdo 'grel): snyan pa smra ba dang/ /gzhan gyi bsam pa rtag tu shes/ /rgod dpon de 'dra bsgo bar bya/ /mtshon la goms shing nus dang ldan/ /gzhon pa dag la byang zhing mkhas/ /dpa' zhing brtan pa phun sum tshogs/ /de bsrangs ? dpon
209a2(mdo 'grel): yin par shes/ /pha mes rgyud 'byung grims shing bshor/ /bstan bcos rigs cing zhim par 'tsheng/ /gtsang sbra che zhing snying nye ba'i/ /de lta bu yi phyag tshang bya/ /shas cher dpyad med phun sum tshogs/ /bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med
209a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rigs ni chen por skyes gyur pa/ /de ni nang blon shes par bya/ /de 'dra'i bsrung mkhan bstan par bya/ /brtan zhing rgyal ba thob pa dang/ /gdugs dkar ba dan dkar ba ste/ /g.yul las rtag tu rgyal ba ste/ /rgyal po'i zhes sa rab tu
209a4(mdo 'grel): grags/ /ji ltar khyi zhig bkres nyen te/ /rus pa skam po khang brdzangs nas/ /khrag byung sdug bsngal bde snyam pa/ /de bzhin 'dod rmongs rnams kyis ni/ /bud med rnams la bder snyam sems/ /le'u bdun ba'o/ //ma su rak+Shas
209a5(mdo 'grel): byas pa lugs kyi bstan bcos rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tsarya d+harma sh+ri badzrA dang/ lo tsa' ba dge slong shAkya blo gros la sogs pas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/
209a6(mdo 'grel): sa mu tri kaM pa ri k+Sha ta na lak+Sha Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ mi'i mtshan nyid rtag pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/ /dang por lha la phyag 'tshal nas/ /skal
209a7(mdo 'grel): bzang skyes pa bud med kyi/ /mtshan nyid rab tu bshad par bya/ /sngon du tshe na yongs su brtag/ phyi nas mtshan nyid la sogs rnams/ /tshe thung ba yi mi rnams la/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni ci zhig bya/ /bud med rnams kyi g.yon gyi tsha/ /
209b1(mdo 'grel): skyes pa de bzhin g.yas su ste/ /rgya mtsho'i tshig ni ji bzhin du/ /de rnams mtshan nyid nges par brtag/ gnas lnga ring zhing bzhi ni thung/ /lnga ni phra zhing drug ni mtho/ /bdun ni dmar zhing gsum ni zab/ /gsum ni yangs pa rab tu bsngags/ /
209b2(mdo 'grel): lag pa mig dang brang dang ni/ /de bzhin pus mo sna de bzhin/ /yan lag 'di rnams ring ba ni/ /lnga po ring bar bsngags pa ste/ /mgrin pa rkang pa rgyab dang ni/ /rje dar rnams ni thung ba bsngags/ /gang gi bzhi po thung ba rnams/ /rtag tu mchod pa thob
209b3(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /sor mo phra zhing tshigs pa dang/ /so dang skra dang sen mo pags/ /gang gi lnga po phra ba nyid/ /de ni mtshan nyid mchog yin no/ /mtshan 'og rtsibs logs brang dang ni/ /sna dang dpung pa dpral ba rnams/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i bdag nyid kyis
209b4(mdo 'grel): drug pa mthon dge bar bshad/ /lag pa rkang pa'i mthil dmar zhing/ /mig gi mdza' dang sen mo dang/ /rkan dang lce dang mchu rnams te/ /bdun po rnams ni dmar ba bsngags/ /dbyangs dang sems dang lte ba ste/ /gsum po rnams ni grab pa bsngagS
209b5(mdo 'grel): bring dang mgo bo dpral ba ste/ /gsum po rnams ni yangs pa bsngags/ /lus kyi nang nas bzhin nam ni/ /yang na thams cad yang dag brjod/ /de yang mchog tu sna dang ni/ /de bzhin mchog tu so dang ni/ /kha dog rnams ni mchog tu
209b6(mdo 'grel): snum/ /dbyangs ni mchog tu snyam pa dang/ /dbyangs la mchog tu bden pa dang/ /kun nas bden pas rab tu gnas/ /mig dmar bud med spong mi byed/ /gser mdog dmar skya nor med min/ /lag ring rnams ni dbang phyug ste/ /yan
209b7(mdo 'grel): lag mdzes bsngags bde bar 'grub/ /dbang po chung na nor ldan zhing/ /bu bral che bas nor rnams dman/ /sgro ba'i mtshams dma' bu nor bral/ /gzhan nam yon pos bu ldan dbul/ /mgo bo che zhing rtsa phra dang/ /rtsub dang rtsa ni mtho ba dang ?
210a1(mdo 'grel): sbom dang mdung bar gang gyur dbul/ /mnyen pas rtag tu phod pa dang/ /rab tu dga' ba ster bar 'gyur/ /rtags ni gyod pos yul gzhan 'khyam/ /chen po yis ni dbul pa dang/ /dma' mos bud med nges par rgyal/ /sgro ba mnyam
210a2(mdo 'grel): zhing mdzes par mtho/ /phan pa dang ni tshe dang ldan/ /grang yangs 'bru dang nor rnams spyod/ /dbu yangs mi bdag mchod dang ldan/ /sked yangs bu ni mang du spyod/ /rkang pa yangs pa nor ldan 'gyur/ /mig snum pa ni skal ba bzang/ /so snum
210a3(mdo 'grel): ba ni zas dang ldan/ /bags pa snum pa bde bar 'gyur/ /rkang ba snum pa bzhon par ldan/ /las med lag pa sra/ /rkang pa dag ni 'jam la mnyen/ /gang gi lag pa rkang par ldan/ /de ni rgyal por nges par bstan/ /gang la nya yi dbyibs yod na
210a4(mdo 'grel): brgya yi bdag por shes par bya/ /chu srin gyis ni stong du ste/ /dung gis bye bar shes bar bya/ /pad+ma yis ni bye ba stong/ /mthe'u chung gi phyogs rnams nas/ /ming med la ni ri mo 'gro/ rtags 'di yis ni sum cu'i lor/ /'tsho ba nyid du shes par bya/
210a5(mdo 'grel): mthe'u chung gi phyogs rnams nas/ /gung mo la ni ri mo 'gro/ /'di yi rtags kyis drug cu'i lor/ /'tsho ba nyid du shes par bya/ /mnyam pa'i phyir na brgyad cur 'tsho/ /mi mnyam de bzhin bdun cur 'tsho/ /tshogs pas dman pa'i skyes bu rnams/
210a6(mdo 'grel): lo ni drug cur 'tsho par 'gyur/ /mtheb chen gyi ni tshigs gyi dbus/ /gang la nas yod rnam par dge/ rnyed pa zas su longs spyod cing/ /mi de bde ba'i longs spyod can/ /ri mo mang ba longs spyod can/ /nyung ba yi ni nor dman no/ /dbang po yis
210a7(mdo 'grel): ni bde ba 'thob/ /nag po yis ni 'chol bar byed/ /slo ma'i dbyibs ltar rnam par rtsub/ /sen mo kya bo yon po dang/ /rtse mo la ni ri mo dang/ /shin tu dkar bar gyur pa dang/ /rkang pa'i sor mo sbrod pa ni/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu sted?/ /gang gi
210b1(mdo 'grel): rkang ba tsha ba dang/ /dur mig lta bur gyur pa ni/ /rigs ni rnam par 'chad ba ste/ /tshangs 'joms gzhan gyi las byed pa/ /sa steng dbang med mnar bar byed/ /rdul mi 'byung zhing mthil ni mnyen/ /pad+ma'i lte ba lta bu ste/ /sor mo 'byar zhing mdzes pa dang
210b2(mdo 'grel): sen mo zangs mdog ring ba mdzes/ /gro zhing rtsa ni mi mngon dang/ /long bu dag ni mi mngon zhing/ /rkang pa rus sbal ltar mtho na/ /mi rnams kyi ni dbang phyug go/ shin tu blo ldan grags dang ldan/ /de bzhin du ni rnam par gnon/ /bde dang shin tu snum pa'i
210b3(mdo 'grel): mag/ de rnams tshe ni thung bar bshad/ /gos ngan so yi dri mi sel/ /mang du za zhing tshig rtsub smra/ /nyi ma nub shar nyal ba rnams/ /gal te mkho ba'i lag ldan yang/ /dpal ni rnam par spong par 'gyur/ /mgo po la ni me tog bcas/ /rkang pa la ni legs par
210b4(mdo 'grel): mchod/ /yan lag mchog ldan bsten pa dang/ /kha zas nyung du sprod pa dang/ /gos med nyal bar mi byed cing/ /dus tshigs 'khrig pa mi bsten na/ /dpal ni rab tu nyams gyur kyang/ /slar yang rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// /mi sbyin gyis gsungs pa'i rgya mtsho
210b5(mdo 'grel): las skyes pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //mi sbyin gyi ni tshig ji bzhin/ /bud med mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od mtshungs pa'i/ /bu mo zla ba gang ba'i gdong/ /mig yangs mchu ni dmar pa yi/ /bu mo de
210b6(mdo 'grel): ni rnyed na bde/ /utpal sngon po'i 'dab ltar sngo/ /ri dags mig can glang ltar dkar/ /nor bu rin chen mdza' dag dang/ /gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan gyur ma/ /de bzhin gang zhig mig gnag ma'i/ /bu mo dgar mo shin tu mdzes/ /mig yangs mchu ni
210b7(mdo 'grel): dmar ba yin/ /bu mo de ni rnyed na bde/ /gang zhig 'gro ba tsam gyis ni/ /sa gzhi g.yo ba ltar byed 'gro/ ji ltar mi sbyin tshig las ni/ /de yis zhe 'dres byed par gsungs/ /gang gi sor mo mi sdug cing/ /rkang pa'i mthil ni nyag por 'gyur/ /de yang
211a1(mdo 'grel): zhe 'dras byed par ni/ /ji ltar me sbyin gyis ni gsungs/ /gang zhig rkang pa'i mtheb chung dag/ sa gzhi la ni ma reg na/ /bdag po brgya yang myur 'joms zhing/ /de srid de ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gang gi skra yi tshogs pa rnams/ /
211a2(mdo 'grel): rtag tu langs par gyur pa ni/ /rgyal rigs nyid du skyes gyur kyang/ /de ni bran mo nyid du 'gyur/ /rma bya 'khor lo pad+ma dang/ /bum pa gang dang rta babs ldan/ /da ni bran mo'i rigs skyes kyang/ /rgyal po yi ni btsun mor 'gyur/ /gang gi lag mthil
211a3(mdo 'grel): ri mo la/ /so dang rta babs ri mo gsal/ /bran mo'i rigs su skyes gyur kyang/ /de ni rgyal po'i btsun mor 'gyur/ /rnam par brtson pa'i dang tshul can/ /bla ni rku ba la dga' zhing/ /bzhin gyi rigs dang ldan gyur ma/ /sdig pa ltar byed las
211a4(mdo 'grel): mang cing/ /bzhin gyi khyim la nyes bsten na/ /gal te bu dang bcas gyur kyang/ /mi yis de 'dra'i bud med spang/ /mig kyang khron pa'i 'grams pa dang/ /pha rol skyes bu rnams la dga' / /byin pa sbom zhing skra ni 'phyar/ /mchu 'phyang rtsibS
211a5(mdo 'grel): ni ring ba dang/ /so ni sprang po kha dog sngo/ /rkan dang mchu dang lce dang ni/ /yan lag skams shing kha skams shing/ /nu ma zung dag mi mnyam zhing/ /sna dang pus mo ring ba rnams/ /bu bral tshul nyams bud med de/ /bu mo de ni nor rnamS
211a6(mdo 'grel): spong/ /brla rgyas 'gram pa rgyas pa dang/ /so ni dkar zhing mnyam pa dang/ /pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra sbyan yangs ma/ /bilba'i mchu dang sna mtho dang/ /gom pa glang po ltar 'gro dang/ /g.yas su bskor zhing bzlog pa dang// /
211a7(mdo 'grel): lus ni snum zhing kha dog mdzes/ /gsang gnas mnyen zhing mthug pa dang/ /dbyangs snyan skra ni mdzes pa rnams/ /de ni bdag po'i zhing du 'gyur/ /skal bzang bu bcas bud med do/ /rdul chung spu ni nyung ba dang/ /gnyid dang
211b1(mdo 'grel): zas ni chung ba dang/ /mig dang lus la sbu med na/ /bud med rnams kyi mtshan nyid mchog/ gnyis po'i mtshan nyid yang dag pa/ /gzhon nu ma dang skyes bu dang/ /dge ba dang ni mi dge ba'i las/ /de bzhin du ni byed par 'gyur/ /zhes pa ni bud med
211b2(mdo 'grel): kyi mtshan nyid de/ /mi sbyin gyis gsungs pa las mi'i mtshan nyid brtag pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //sde snod 'dzin pa chen po/ b+ho Ta paN+Di ta chen po'i gsung giS bskul nas/ paN+Di ta d+harmA d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ /bod kyi
211b3(mdo 'grel): lots+tsha ba spangs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis/ dpal sa spyi'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phang pa'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sa mu dra b+ha dz+nya na pa na/ bod skad du/ rgya mtshos bstan
211b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i mtshan/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang pa'i gong gi sor mo'i mtshan rnams ni/ /skyid dang sdug pa thams cad shes par byang/ /mthe bong che na sdug bsngal 'thob par byed/ /chung zhing skam pa yul rnams bskor
211b5(mdo 'grel): zhing sdug /leb mor skabs pa'i skye bo mi bzang ste/ /mtheb mdzub par du kha 'dra skams pa ni/ /nyon mongs chen po skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mthe bong gyen du mtho la legs par snyoms/ /snum zhing mnyam par skyes pa bde ba'i mtshan
211b6(mdo 'grel): sor mo zlum po sen mo zangs kyi mdog/ shin tu dmar ba khrag gi mdog can ni/ /rgyal por 'gyur ba'i mthe bong mtshan ma yin/ /rkang pa'i mdzub mo sbom zhing ring ba ni/ /bud med longs spyod kyi ni rnyed pa thob/ /thob pa'i bud med
211b7(mdo 'grel): myur du 'chi bar byang/ /yang na bu skyes myur du 'chi ba yin/ /mdzub mo chung na kun dang 'khon par byed/ /gung mo mtho na don rnams nyams par 'gyur/ /chung na sdug bsngal bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /srin lag ring na rig ba 'dzin
212a1(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /thung na chung ma 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mthe chung ring na don rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /chung na pha rol nor rnams 'phrog par byed/ /mdzub mo mthe chung shin tu sbom pa ni/ /e ma 'chi bar 'gyur bar rgya
212a2(mdo 'grel): mtshos bshad/ /gung mo snyoms shing zlum la legs pa ni/ /bu skyes chung du'i lo la 'chi bar byed/ /sor mo mi snyoms sbom phrar gnas pa ni/ /'bangs po 'am 'bangs kyi las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /'bangs mo min yang gzhan
212a3(mdo 'grel): gyi las rnams byed/ /sor mo 'phyog cing gug pa gang gis dang/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig spyod par byed/ /sor mo snyoms pa gcig tu skyes pa 'dra/ /snum zhing zlum pa byin tu phra ba ni/ /rgyal po'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i
212a4(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma yin/ /sen mo dkar mos dang bcas pa ni/ /skyes pa sdug bsngal bzhin du gnas par bshad/ /sen mo gas pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod med/ /sen mo 'khyog pa chag pa sbom pa las/ /rtag tu slong mo byed ba'i
212a5(mdo 'grel): dbul por bshad/ /ba bla lta bur san mo sar ba yis/ /bram ze gsod dam bkur 'os gsong bar bshad/ /sen mo dmar ba rgyal por 'gyur ba ste/ /des ni gnyen spong byas ba mi gzo'o/ /rang gi rigs rnams smod
212a6(mdo 'grel): par byed pa yin/ /sen ma dung mdog mchog gi rgyal por 'gyur/ /zangs kyi mdog can rgyal po'i sen mo ste/ /pad+ma'i mdog can sen mo'ang de bzhin no/ /sen mo khrag mdog mchog ni dbang phyug ste/ /snum pa legs
212a7(mdo 'grel): pa zangs mdog rgyal por 'gyur/ /mthe bong nas bzung mthil gyi sha rgyud ni/ /snyoms shing mdog bzang ring pa bde bar 'tsho/ /thung du mdog ngan mtho dman ldan pa yis/ /bsam ngan kun la gnod cing bde ba med/ /rkang pa
212b1(mdo 'grel): phag gi lta bu yod pa las/ /rtag tu gzhan gyis 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mnyam zhing snyoms pa bde ba thob par byed/ bol tshigs ma he lta bu 'am phag lta bu/ /pol? tshigs rdo rje lta bu rtag tu sdug/ bol tshigs rta yi 'dra bas dbang
212b2(mdo 'grel): phyug 'thob/ /byin pa ri dags lta bu rgyal por 'gyur/ /ce spyang lta bu'i byin pas sdug bsngal 'thob/ /byin pa sbom po mchog gi dbang phyug go/ byin pa sbom po ring ba gang gis dang/ /rtag tu 'gro ba 'ba' zhig thob par byed/ /byin ba
212b3(mdo 'grel): phag ba lta bur longs spyod med/ /byin pa pho rog lta bur sdug bsngal 'thob/ /byin pa dom mam spre'u lta bu 'ching/ /seng ge stag gi byin ba 'dra ba las/ /pha rol grags shing nor rnams mang po ldan/ /ba spu re re skyes pa rgyal por
212b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /gcig gnyis skyes pa nor gyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /gsum bzhi yan chad gang de rnyed pa med/ /mtshan bzhi pa'o// //dang pa ni tso'i gdangs can rgyal por 'gyur/ /de gnyis 'gros kyi 'gro ba mchod par 'gyur//
212b5(mdo 'grel): khyu mchog seng ge glang chen gdangs dang 'gros/ /longs spyod mang bo'i bdag po byed par 'dod/ /sna tshogs bya dang dud 'gro'i gdangs dang 'gros/ /de dang de yi longs spyod 'thob par bshad/ /chu nang sems can bzhin du dbugs 'khyim
212b6(mdo 'grel): ba/ /gnas ba'i mi yis 'jigs dang sdug bsngal 'thob/ /khyi dang phag dang ma he bong bu yi/ /'gros can de 'dras sdug cing don mi 'thob/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa'i mtshan lnga pa'o// //brla phra'i skyes pa de ni bu dang bral//
212b7(mdo 'grel): bla bug mdzes la sbom sa lo rgya mtsho/ /nan ltar sbom na sdug bsngal mang po 'thob/ /sha rgyas snyoms pa mi yi dbang phyug yin/ /sbom pa ring bas gzhan gyis 'ching ba 'thob/ /srab mo phub dang 'dra bas sdug bsngal 'dzin //
213a1(mdo 'grel): sha skam brla ni srab cing rgyu 'grul byed/ /sbom phra med par mdzes shing snyoms pa ni/ /yon tan mang po 'dzin par byed pa yin/ /brla sgang leb pa bud med rnyed pa 'thob/ /brla stong phra la brla smad sbom pa ni/ /rtag tu rgyu
213a2(mdo 'grel): 'grul 'ba' zhig byed par 'gyur/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa las mtshan drug pa'o// //sor mo'i ri mo g.yas su 'khyil ba ni/ /bu 'thob g.yon du 'khyil bas bu mo 'byung/ /ser mo mi snyoms sbom phra rtsa dang bcas/ /
213a3(mdo 'grel): de 'dra gang la yod pa sdug bsngal 'thob/ /snyoms pa ring po rtsa med sha dang bcas/ /gang la yod pa de ni bde bar 'tsho/ /rkang ba 'phongs tshos mnyam par 'dug pa la/ /rtags kyis sa la reg pas sdug bsngal 'thob/ /dbang pos tshig
213a4(mdo 'grel): la slebs pas dbang phyug 'thog/ seng ge stag gi dbang po lta bu la/ /longs spyod mang po'i bdag po byed par 'gyur/ /rta yi dbang po lta buAng de bzhin no/ /dbang po'i nang du pad+ma'i ri mo 'dra/ /gang la yod pa de ni rgyal por 'gyur
213a5(mdo 'grel): gser dngul mu tig rngo yi snying ? dang/ /dam ba snum pa nor bu rin chen 'dra/ /gang la yod pa de ni rgyal bo'i mtshan/ /ljang dang sngo nag rdul dang bcas pa dang/ /ri mo sngo skya gas dang kang kong can/ /gang la yod pa sdug bsngal
213a6(mdo 'grel): mang po 'thob/ /ba bla'i ri mo lta bu rgyal por 'gyur/ /mdog ngan rdul dang bcas pa'i ri mo can/ /de 'dra gang la yod pa rnyed pa med/ /yang na de 'dra'i mtshan ma ma ning 'gyur/ /mchog tu 'dod pa chen bu mo skye/ /u tapal sngon
213a7(mdo 'grel): po par rgyas 'dra la snyoms/ /bzang bo'i mtshan ma yin par rgya mtshos bshad/ /dri chu ring por 'gron bde bar 'tsho/ /dri chu gnyis gsum bzhi lnga ngan bar bshad/ /nan ltar mang por 'phro ba bzang por bshad/ /dri chu sgra dang bcaS
213b1(mdo 'grel): pa bde bar 'tsho/ /dri chu sgra dang bral ba sdug par 'gyur/ /'bab tshe g.yas su 'khor ba bzang por bshad/ /phyi nas de ni bu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /g.yon du 'khor na bu mo bzang mo skye/ /ral gri sngon po lta bur sdug cing gson/ /skye
213b2(mdo 'grel): bar skye ba kun tu sdug bsngal 'thob/ /rtags la reg na shing ltar gyong ba yis/ /rang gi rigs rnams rlag par byed pa yin/ /snyoms la zlum zhing 'jam pa khu ba 'dzin/ /gang la de 'brir rtags can bde bar 'tsho/ /sor gsum
213b3(mdo 'grel): sor lnga ldan pa'i dbang po ni/ /gang la yod pas yi bdag por bshad/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa las mtshan bdun pa'o// //lte ba yangs la zab pa nang du zlum/ /de 'dra gang la yod pa bde bar 'tsho/ /nang du zlum po med pa
213b4(mdo 'grel): sdug cing gson/ /tshang ra sha dang bcas pa bde bar 'tsho/ /sha skams sngo dang bcas pa sdug bsngal 'dzin/ /sha skams ting song rkub tsos sbu dang bral/ /rtag tu de la sdug bsngal mang du 'byung/ /stag dang seng ge lta bu'i 'phongs rtsos
213b5(mdo 'grel): can/ /rtag tu bde chen bdag po byed par bshad/ /dom dang spre'u lta bu bde ba med/ /sha skams khyi yi lta buAng de bzhin no/ /gsus pa ri dags lta bu bde ba'i mtshan/ /gsus ba rma bya lta buAng de bzhin no/ /stag dang seng ge lta bu rgyal
213b6(mdo 'grel): por 'gyur/ /gsus pa chung pa mi yi bdag por 'gyur/ /gsus pa shin tu che ba 'ang bde ba'i mtshan/ /gsus pa b+ha g+ha lta bu mi yi bdag/ de ni sa yi bdag po byed par bshad/ /lte ba zab ba zlum ba skyes bu'i mchog/ zlum ba phyir ru
213b7(mdo 'grel): 'thon na ngan gar bshad/ /lte ba g.yas su 'khyil bas don rnams 'grub/ /g.yon du 'khyil bas don rnams stong bar bshad/ /sbu gnyis snyoms shin zab pa bde ba'i mtshan/ /sbu gnyis mi mngon gsum pa snyoms pa las// //
214a1(mdo 'grel): bud med longs spyod thob pa bde ba'i mtshan/ /spu gnyis ri bong lta buAng skyes pa'i mtshan/ /gsus pa nas 'dra rtsa yis gang ba las/ /mtshan ngan sdug bsngal mang po 'thob par byed/ /gsus pa zla gam sbrul 'dra drong
214a2(mdo 'grel): po che/ /sbrul dang nya 'dra rang gi dka' thub nyams/ /khyi dang ce sbyad lta bu ltogs shing skom/ /tshe ring lo brgya 'tsho yang sdug cing gson/ /rgya mtshos bshad ba las/ mtshan brgyad pa'o// //nu ma mtho ba snum zhing snyoms pa
214a3(mdo 'grel): las/ /bde zhing bzang po'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa yin/ /brang zhing snyoms pa zab pa bde bar 'tsho/ /tshe ring lo brgya 'tsho zhing longs spyod 'phel/ /sha rgyas zhing che zlum pa rgyal por 'gyur/ /gdong ba sha med mid? sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /dbang
214a4(mdo 'grel): phyug rtag dang seng ge 'dra bas 'thob/ /sde yi bdag dang dpon po 'thob par 'gyur/ /seng ge'i rgyab can bdud rtsi kun gyis mchod/ /rta yi rgyab can skyid sdug 'dres mar spyod/ /shin tu rgyab gzhung ring ba gnyen dang bcas/ /rtag tu bde bar skyong
214a5(mdo 'grel): zhing rang don med/ /rgya mtshos bshad pa las mtshan dgu pa'o// //snying gar spu dang bcas pa bde bar 'tsho/ /sbu dang bral ba'ang bde bar 'tsho bar byed/ /spu snyoms cung zad skyes pa mkhas par 'gyur/ /sbu gcig skyes
214a6(mdo 'grel): ba phyug por 'gyur bar bshad/ /gnyis dang gsum du skyes pa ngan par bshad/ /ser skya sngo nag sprin gyi mdog can dang/ /ldong ros zla ba'i kha dog pad+ma dang/ /'dra ba de yang rgyal po'i mtshan du 'dod/ /ser skya nyi ma 'char
214a7(mdo 'grel): ka'i kha dog can/ /sa skyong rgyal po byed par 'gyur pa yin/ /rgya mtshos bshad pa las/ mtshan bcu pa'o// //glang chen lta bur lus po byin du rgyas/ /bde bar gson pa bzang po'i mtshan dum can/ /thad kar langs
214b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i lag pas bus mor sleb/ /yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa'i lag pa yin/ /shin tu lag pa chung ba 'bangs por 'gyur/ /lag pa ring po g.yon du 'khyil ba yin/ /thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rgyas pa de/ /pha rol grags pa'i rgyal po thob
214b2(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /lag pa'i rim g.yon du 'khyil ba ni/ /rtag tu skyes pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba yin/ /lag pa snyoms la mthug pa sor mo ring/ /dmar po zlum pa sha dang bcas pa ni/ /'jam pa nang du chu blugs 'dzin par byed/ /de 'dra gang la
214b3(mdo 'grel): yod ba rgyal por 'gyur/ /lag pa sha med rdul dang rtsa yis gang/ /ser skya sen mo ser ba sdug bsngal 'dzin/ /mdzub mo'i dkyil na gyen du langs pa yi/ /ri mo gang la yod pa bu gsum 'byung/ /gang du srang gir mi yod gyur pa//
214b4(mdo 'grel): lag pa'i rting par nya 'am rngam 'dra/ /gang la yod bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu 'thob/ /de ni dbu ma bdag po byed par bshad/ /mtheb chung srin lag rtsa ba'i tshigs gsum gyis/ /'og ma'i dkyil du ri mo snyoms pa gsum/ /nan ltar 'dod pa yod na
214b5(mdo 'grel): lo brgya 'tsho/ /lag pa bur chang mdog can lta bu ni/ /gser dang nor mang bdag po byang ba yin/ /gzhan yang rig ba mang po 'dzin par byed/ /lag pa'i dkyil lam yang na gnas gzhan du/ /hoM gzar lta bu gang la yod pa ni/ /kun gyis
214b6(mdo 'grel): bkur ram mchod sbyin bdag por bshad/ /lag pa'i ri mo mang po yod gyur na/ /bram zer gyur na rig byed bzhi pa mkhas/ /dbyug pa gdugs dang chu bum lta bu ni/ /ri mo gang la yod pa bram ze yi/ /de yi rkang pa rgyal po'i mgo bos
214b7(mdo 'grel): 'dud/ /rdo rje rtse gsum shag ti 'dra ba dang/ /dgra sta'i ri mo ral gri dang 'dra ba'i/ /gzugs rnams yod pa de ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /dung dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan lcags kyu dang/ /gang la yod pa mi yi dbang por 'gyur/ /ri mo
215a1(mdo 'grel): dong snyoms snum ba 'khor lo 'dra/ /gang la yod pa de ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /ri mo chad ba rdul can nyung du gson/ /ri mo ring dang shing sdong lta bu dang/ /sor mo ring shing zlum la snyoms pa ni/ /dud 'gro mang po'i bdag
215a2(mdo 'grel): po byed par 'gyur/ /ri mo gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'khor lo ltar/ /gang la yod pas rgyal po thob par nges/ /'gro 'am 'dug kyang nges par bde bar gson/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa las mtshan bcu gcig pa'o// //lag pa
215a3(mdo 'grel): mtho la zlum zhing sha dang bcas/ /de ni sde chen bdag po byed par bshad/ /mgrin pa ring ba rnga mo lta bu ni/ /pha rol nong la rlom sems byed par bshad/ /mgrin pa snum pa ki ra lta bu dang/ /glang chen lta bu yod na rgyal por 'gyur/ /bza' 
215a4(mdo 'grel): btung longs spyod mang bo thob par byed/ /gdong pa zlum po chos dang tshul khrims ldan/ /gdong pa sha dang bral ba nya skyog can/ /pha rol don rnams mang po smra bar byed/ /mang por smra ba de ni rkun mar 'gyur/ /don rnams rdzogs par
215a5(mdo 'grel): smra ba rgyal por 'gyur/ /ra dang spre'u'i skad dang gdong pa can/ /pha rol grags pa nor rnams mang por ldan/ /'gram mgo pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu ni/ /sde yi 'dren pa longs spyod mang por ldan/ /ya mchu dmar zhing srab pa mi yi bdag/
215a6(mdo 'grel): ya mchu 'thug par gyur na rmongs par 'gyur/ /nan ltar skams na sdug bsngal mang po 'byung/ /bim ba'i mchu can bza' btung mang por bshad/ /so rnams ku mu da ltar dkar ba ni/ /mchog tu bzang pa mi yi rgyal por 'gyur
215a7(mdo 'grel): glang chen bong bu'i so can snum pa rnams/ /bde bar 'tsho ba bzang po'i mtshan ma yin/ /dom dang spre'u'i so 'dra ltogs par gnas/ /rdob lta bur rdol can 'khyog pa ni/ /sdug bsngal 'thob pa'i so yi mtshan mar bshad/ /g.yas
215b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i so gnyis sbom ba dpon por bshad/ /stobs dang longs spyod mang po ldan pa yin/ /g.yon pa'i so gnyis sbom na pha ma 'chi/ /so bzhi 'khyog pa sdug cing pha ma 'chi/ /dkar po dra ba legs pas yi bdag? ring zhing rno ba mkhas
215b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i mtshan ma yin/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis so can rgyal por bshad/ /sum cu rtsa gcig so can longs spyod 'thob/ /sum cu yod pa bde bar 'tsho ba'i mtshan/ /sum cu so dgu'i so can sdug cing gson/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'ang bde bar 'tsho
215b3(mdo 'grel): des ni las la longs spyod mang po snying/ /ya so ma so mnyam pa nor gyi bdag/ dmar rmug lce can sdug pa byed pa yin/ /ma thug pa rdul can sdug bsngal mang po 'thob/ /dkar po'i lce can spyad pa gtsang ba yin/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu ring ba
215b4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /shin tu srab pa ma yin 'thug pa min/ /rgyal por 'gyur ba'i lce yi mtshan ma yin/ /snum zhing dmar ba rig pa 'dzin par byed/ /dmar mug rkan can rigs rnams nyams par byed/ /nor med sdug bsngal mang po 'thob par
215b5(mdo 'grel): byed/ /ser nag rkan can gang yang bzang po min/ /seng ge glang chen lta bu mi yi bdag/ dang po 'brug gi gdangs can nor dang ldan/ /glang dam bong bu'i skad can sdug bsngal che/ /rta dang bong bu bya rog sgra can sdug/ tshig gtam zer
215b6(mdo 'grel): ba sdig can yin par bshad/ /nyung du smra zhing bden pa rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa las mtshan bcu gnyis pa'o// //glang chen rta yi sna can rno ba ni/ /'jig rten 'dren ba byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /ne tso'i
215b7(mdo 'grel): mchu can de yang de bzhin no/ /shin tu sna gong mtho ba longs spyod can/ /sna chu sa chos dang tshul khrims rtsa ba bskrun/ /sna gong 'khyog pa sdug pa byed pa can/ /sna rtse sbom pa 'thug pa'ang sdug pa byed/ /sna rtse sbom la sna gong lab pa ni
216a1(mdo 'grel): de'ang sdug bsngal mang po 'dzin par byed/ /rgya mtshos bstan ba las mtshan bcu gsum pa'o// //me tog dmar po lta bu'i mig can ni/ /longs spyod bdag po sde yi 'dzin pa byed/ /gru gsum mig can 'jigs
216a2(mdo 'grel): pa ldum pa dang/ /byi la dang pa'i mig 'dra dpon por 'gyur/ /khrag ltar dmar ba nad dang bcas shing sdug /mchog tu mig 'bor che ba 'ang sdug par bshad/ /ma he lug dang ra'i 'dra 'khrug pa re ma/ /g.yo ba'i mig can kun tu blta ba ni/ /pha
216a3(mdo 'grel): rol bud med la ni bsam pa can/ /mig gnyis nad du song ba mang por gson/ /zlum po'i mig can nyung du gson par bshad/ /ri dags rma bya ce spyang ba glang dang/ /glang chen lta bus longs spyod thob par byed/ /mchog 'chung ba skam po yo
216a4(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ /chu yis gang ba zag pa mchi ma can/ /nor med sdug bsngal can gyi mig tu bshad/ /rgyal mo shin tu gnag pa bde bar 'tsho/ /rgyal mo dkar bas 'ching ba thob par byed/ /rgyal mo dmar bas nor gyi bdag po byed/ /mig rka
216a5(mdo 'grel): logs pas dbang phyug thob par byed/ /mig rtsa dmar ba longs spyod thob par byed/ /dmar dang dkar po'i ri mo dod pa las/ /de ni mkhas shing blo gros bzang po can/ /mig nas mchim 'dzag pa 'khon zhing sdug /'gro tshe lam la lta ba
216a6(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa'i mtshan/ /kun tu lta ba ba glang lta bu dang/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa las mtshan bcu bzhi pa'o// //pad+ma'i skra can dmar ba legs pa dang/ /me ltar 'od zer 'bar ba gdangs dang bcas/ /de 'dra'i gdangs can
216a7(mdo 'grel): 'khor los sgyur bar bshad/ /gser gyi gdangs can dbang phyug thob par byed/ /phug ron a ka ro dang khyu byug gdangs/ /dbang phyug longs spyod mang po thob par byed/ /byi la 'ug pa'i mdangs can dpal 'thob cing/ /nyi ma
216b1(mdo 'grel): glog gi gzugs can rgyal por bshad/ /ka la bing ka ser skya'i mig can ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /rin chen mu tig mig can mkhas par 'gyur/ /mig gnyis 'byed 'dzum mang ba nyung du gson/ /'byed 'dzum
216b2(mdo 'grel): chung ba ring du gson par byed/ /bstung nas 'byed 'dzum mang ba nad mang zhing/ /lan gnyis 'dzum pa g.yog tu 'gyur ba yin/ /gsum du 'dzum pa bde bar 'tsho bar byed/ /lan bzhi 'dzum pa ltogs par gnas pa gnyid/ /de ni tshe thung
216b3(mdo 'grel): sdug cing gson par bshad/ /dpral ba skams pa rdul dang bcas ba sdug /gnyer ma lnga pa lo brgya 'tsho bar bshad/ gnyer ma bzhi pa dgu bcu gson par bshad/ /gnyer ma gnyis pa drug cu gson par bshad/ /gnyer ma med pa'i
216b4(mdo 'grel): mi rnams tshe thung zhing/ /gnyer ma thung du gcig pa nad dang bcas/ /gnyer ma nyi shu rtsa lnga yod pa las/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal mang po spyod par 'gyur/ dpral bar rtse gsum tho bas dbang phyug 'thob/ /gnyen bdun mang po'i 'khor
216b5(mdo 'grel): dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /me tog pad+ma lta bI dpral ba can/ /chos dang tshul khrims 'dzin par byed pa yin/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'khor lo zla ba dang/ /'dra ba yod pas yi bdag por bshad/ /gyen duri mo gcig pa 'khor gyi bdag /

216b7(mdo 'grel): rdog por thon nas rno ba la/ /ltogs shing rtag tu nor med dbul por 'gyur/ /mgo bo glang chen lta bur rgyal po 'dra ba'i/ /dbang phyug du ma'i bdag po byad par 'gyur/ /mgo bo grum pa lta bu skye ba dang/ /rdul dang skra
217a1(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'ang de bzhin no/ /rdul can chen po 'thug po skyes pa sdug/ srab 'thub snyoms por skyes pa bde bar 'tsho/ /rtsa ba legs par snyoms shing ring thung med/ /de 'dra'i mi yis dbang phyug thob par byed/
217a2(mdo 'grel): rgya mtshos bstan pa las mtshan bco lnga ba'o// //skyes pa'i mtshan bstan pa rdzogs so// //bud med mtshan rnams bshad kyis nyan par gyis/ /pad+ma lta bur dmar la snum pa dang/ /rkang pa chung ba'i bud med
217a3(mdo 'grel): bde ba 'thob/ /'khor lo pad+ma rgyal ba mtshan gdugs 'dra ba'i/ /ri mo yong ba de yan btsun mor 'gyur/ /rkang pa'i sor mo'i 'og tu gyen dur la/ /ri mo yod na dpon po'i chung mar 'gyur/ /rkang pa srab mo tshen mo g.yog mor
217a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rkang ba bskams pa ltogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /'gro na bya bran lta buAng de bzhin no/ /de la rang gi rigs dang tshul khrims med/ /mtheb chung sa la mi reg khyo po 'chi/ /srin lags la mi reg 'khon par 'gyur//
217a5(mdo 'grel): de'ang khyo bo 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gung mos la reg par mi byed pa/ /skyes pa lta bu'i spyod pa byed par 'gyur/ /mdzub mo zlum pas la mi reg pa/ /khyo bo spangs shing skyes pa gzhan yang spyod/ /sor mo so sor gyes ba rdul
217a6(mdo 'grel): dang bcas/ /de ni gzhan gyi g.yog mo byed par 'gyur/ /sor mo sbom pa bde ba med par byed/ /sor mo skams pa rtsa dang bcas ba dang/ /sdug bsngal 'dzin bar 'gyur ba'i bud med yin/ /ring ba snyoms la gtsang ba ring
217a7(mdo 'grel): pa bde/ /sor mo mnyam pa bar med sha dang bcas/ /rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ba'i bud med yin/ /rang gi khyo pos chog par 'dzin par byed/ /sor mo mtho la zlum pa pad+ma'i mdangs/ /de la bu dang nor rnams rgyas par 'gyur/
217b1(mdo 'grel): sor mo chung ba sa la reg par byed/ /skam pa rdul dang bcas pa'i bud med de/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig spyong par byed/ /mthe ba chan gas ba san ma ngan ba can/ /de yi spun zla nyams par 'gyur ba yin/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa
217b2(mdo 'grel): las bud med kyi mtshan gsum pa'o// //rkang pa'i mthil gyi sha rgyud mdzes shing skong/ /de ni smad tshong byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /shin tu sbom na sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig thob/ /sa la reg cing snyoms pa bde bar 'tsho//
217b3(mdo 'grel): bol tshigs ma he lta bu'i chang bar 'gyur/ /bol tshigs snyoms pa'i bud med bde bar 'tsho/ /brla yi sha rgyas snyoms shing snum pa dang/ /rtsa med spu dang bral ba'i bud med ni/ /'gro dang 'dug pa kun tu bde bar 'tsho/ /brla la gyen du ri mo
217b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis yod na/ /smad 'tshong byed de tshul khrims gnyis pa yin/ /ri mo chung na khyo bo 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gyen du ri mo gcig pa bde bar 'tsho/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa las mtshan bzhi pa'o// //brla mgo ri mo 'phreng la yod pa na//
217b5(mdo 'grel): phyi rol skyes pa gzhan rnams tshol bar byed/ /brla stong shin tu sha rgyas bde ba'i mtshan/ /nang nas phyi rol shin tu gnag pa'i spu/ /nyung du snyoms par skyas pa'i bud med ni/ /mi yi bdag po'i btsun mo byed pa yin/ /mtshan ma rus
217b6(mdo 'grel): sbal rgyang can snum? zhing rgyas/ /ba spud lta bu'i spu dang bcas pa ni/ /nor dang don 'dod bu dang ldan zhing bde/ /des ni khyo la bsnyen bkur legs par byed/ /sha skams chan po rtsa yis gang ba ni/ /ltogs shing sdug bsngal mang po skye
217b7(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /g.yas kyi sha rgyas bu dang ldan pa yin/ /g.yon pa mtho na bu mo skye ba yin/ /dmar ser spu can ltogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /spu nang skyes pa bde bar 'tsho bar byed/ /ba spu lta bu mang po rgyas ba'i spu/ /gnag pa ma
218a1(mdo 'grel): yin nyung ba ma yin pas/ shin tu bde ba mang bas gang bar 'gyur/ /shin tu dkyil 'khor gang ba tha ma la/ /snyoms shing mdzas par skyes pa'i spu dang ldan/ /rus sbal rgyab bam glang chen spyi bo ltar/ /'gram gyi sha rgyas khyo dang bcas pa 'ang?
218a2(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma skong pa skams pa ngan pa'i mtshan/ /gang la yod pa ltogs dang sdug bsngal 'byung/ /'gro tshe mtshad ra 'gul zhing phyi nas rnyog /tshul khrims gnyis ma byed pa'i rigs su 'gyur/ /mi 'gyur brtan pa bde ba thob par
218a3(mdo 'grel): byed/ /mtshang ra sbom pa gru bzhi tshang ba ni/ /ba spu cung zad yod pa bde bar byed/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa las bud med kyi mtshan lnga pa'o// //lte ba zab ba skyes pas 'phongs pa med/ /pad+ma ge sar lta bu'i lte ba can//
218a4(mdo 'grel): bde bar 'tsho zhing bzang po'i mtshan du bshad/ /lte ba mtho ba rgyas pa rdul dang spu/ /med pa sdug bsngal mang po 'dzin par byed/ /sha skams ring po rdul dang spu yis gang/ /legs pa med bas gang zhig 'jigs pa skye/ /glang chen 'gros
218a5(mdo 'grel): dang ba glang dad pa dang/ /rma bya ne tso'i 'gros can bzang po'i mtshan/ /'gro zhing smra ba ci spyang skang can ni/ /bde spong sdug bsngal mang po 'dzin par byed/ /rkub tshos rtsa yis gang dang 'dung pa can/ /bud med khyo dang bral bar gnas pa yin/ /tshul
218a6(mdo 'grel): khrims gnyis pa de ni smad 'tshor 'gyur/ /gsum pa chung na bud med smad 'tshong 'gyur/ /gsum pa rtsa yis gang ba sha dang bral/ /rtag tu ltogs shing nor med sdug ba yin/ /gsus pa gtsang zhing snum pa legs pa bde/ /nu ma
218a7(mdo 'grel): g.yas pa rgyas pa bu dang bcas/ /g.yon pa mtho na bu mo 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nu ma 'khyog cing yo ba bu dang bral/ /nu ma skams dang rtsa ba yo ba la/ /rtse mo skams pa sdug pa'i mtshan ma ste/ /de yi khyo 'chi bu dang bral ba yin/ /nu ma rgyas
218b1(mdo 'grel): pa sha yis gang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas shing mdangs dang ldan/ /de la bu dang nor dang bu mo 'byung/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa las bud med kyi mtshan drug pa'o// //rked pa rgur ba gzhu 'dra g.og mor 'gyur/ /rked pa gyod pa khyo bo
218b2(mdo 'grel): 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sha skams rtsa yis gang ba sdug par 'gyur/ /rked pa spu can shu ba 'dra bas gang/ /de la sdug bsngal chen po thob par 'gyur/ /bya brang byung ba sdug ba'i mtshan ma yin/ /brang zheng snyoms pa spu yis gang ba dang/ /sha yis
218b3(mdo 'grel): rgyas ba khyo bo bzang po ?/ /brang zhed srab pa khyo bo 'chi bar bshad/ /skams ba'i brang yang snga ma de bzhin no/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa las bud med kyi mtshan bdun pa'o/ //lag pa spu med chu 'dzin zangs kyi mdog /snum pa bde zhing sha rgyas
218b4(mdo 'grel): nor mang ldan/ /sen mo gas pa ser gas gdab dang/ /shin tu srab pa spu yis gang ba dang/ /rdul can rtsa dang bcas pa ngan pa yin/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin du snyoms shing dag /gshibs nas slang na bar du mthong ba med/ /de 'dra'i bud med bde bar 'gyur
218b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i mtshan/ /lte ba'i dkyil du gos kyis g.yog shing gnas/ /nor bu dang ni ldan par 'gyur ba yin/ /lag pa srab mo rna ba chen mo can/ /tshe thung myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /'dzub mo che'am rna ba chen mo ni/ /de ni srin mo bdag bo za bar byed//
218b6(mdo 'grel): lag pa'i ri mo rgyang nas gsal por mthong/ /snum la mtho ba de 'dra bde bar 'tsho/ /lag pa chung la snum pa de 'dra ni/ /bde zhing gson par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yin/ /lag ba 'thug pa ri mo rdul dang bcas/ /dmar zhing snum pa ring ba mchog tu
218b7(mdo 'grel): bzang/ /de 'dra'i lag pa gang la yod gyur pa/ /rigs ngan yin yang rgyal po'i btsun mor 'gyur/ /shams gang ba'i bkra shis mtshan ma can/ /dpon po'i chung ma nor gyi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /spu med dkar por gnas pa 'am zangs kyi mdog /
219a1(mdo 'grel): snum pa de yang bde bar 'tsho ba yin/ /sen mo gas pa rdul can bugs gang/ /sbu dang bcas pa de ni sdug par bshad/ /lag pa bkra shis rtags can snum pa ni/ /bu dang nor rnams thob bar byed pa yin/ /lag pa dmar po
219a2(mdo 'grel): snum la gtsang ba ni/ /lag pa de 'dra rgyal po'i btsun mor 'gyur/ /me tog gdugs dang bum pa bkra shis mtshan/ /snga ma ral gri yod pas don rnams 'grub/ /gtsang zhing pad+ma 'am rgyal mtshan yod gyur na/ /da la skyes pa rgyal po 'dra bar 'gyu?
219a3(mdo 'grel): rgya mtshos bstan pa las bud med kyi mtshan brgyad pa'o// //lag ba chung ba nyon mongS skye bar 'gyur/ /nan ltar che ba bdag po 'chi bar 'gyur/ lag ba spu yis gang ba yang de bzhin no/ /ri mo snyoms pa bde ba thob bar byed/ /ril bor rgyas pa bang?  ba'i mtshan ma yin//
219a4(mdo 'grel): mchog tu mgrin pa sbom pa de yang de bzhin no/ /gang zhig mdun du rgur ba sdug ba yin/ /g.yon na sha mtshan nag po yod pa na/ /de yi khyo po 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /sha mtshan dkar po gtsang ba yod pa ni/ /dbon po'i chung ma byed par 'gyur
219a5(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /mgrin pa sha skams rtsa yis gdab ni/ /sdug bsngal mang po skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mchu la ser ka mang po shu ba can/ /mchog tu 'thug pa smad 'tshong byed par 'gyur/ /skams pa'i mchu can khyo bo 'chi bar gyur/ /rtsa ba'i
219a6(mdo 'grel): mdza' can snum pa snyoms pa ni/ /spu dang bral ba dmar ba nor dang bu/ /rgyas shing rtag tu bde ba thob par byed/ /mchu spro sgra? thad kar gyen du ri mo can/ /shin tu bang zhing skyid pa'i mtshan ma yin/ /nag po'i mchu can kun dang 'khon par byed/ /skas
219a7(mdo 'grel): pa rdul can 'thug pa sdug pa'i mtshan/ /snyoms la dkar po snum pa bde bar byed/ /ma so 'khyog pa a ma 'chi bar byed/ /ya so lo byag pa bu rnams 'chi bar byed/ /brdzun can smad 'tshong byed ba'i rigs su 'gyur/ /so la reg na ldag pa
219b1(mdo 'grel): ltogs par 'gyur/ /bcu drug lon nas skyes pa mang po 'chol/ lce mdog dmar ba nor dang ldan pa yin/ /srab 'thug snyoms pa'i lce can de bzhin no/ /mchog tu srab cing dkar ba nad dang bcas/ /shin tu 'thug pa'i lce can de bzhin no/ /de ni
219b2(mdo 'grel): kun dang 'khon par byed ba yin/ /ring bar sleb cing dmar ba snum pa ni/ /de yis bde ba chen po 'thob pa yin/ /rkan gyi kha dog dkar ba ldogs pa yin/ /rdul can rkan ni chos la ston par 'gyur/ /ser ba mchog tu sdug bsngal chen po 'a thob/ /pad+ma'i
219b3(mdo 'grel): mdangs can bde ba 'thob cing mchong/ /chu bya'i skad can dad? pa khu byug gi /gdengs can rgyal po'i btsun mo byed par 'gyur/ /'gram mgo snum zhing sha rgyas bde ma'i mtshan/ /skams pa rdul can shu ba mang ba dang/ /gtsang zhing gang pa
219b4(mdo 'grel): de la sdug bsngal mang/ /de la bud med par ni rgya mtshos bshad/ /sno gong ring ba kho bar 'gyur ba yin/ /nan ltar chud na g.yog tu 'khol bar 'gyur/ /sna gong srab pa khyo po 'chi bar 'gyur/ /ring pos du dang tshul khrims gnyis pa yin/ /che chung snyomS
219b5(mdo 'grel): pa spu med bde ba che/ /sna gong mtho ba bde pa chen por bshad/ /rgya mtshos bstan pa las bud med kyi mtshan dgu pa'o// //dmar ba'i mig la rtsa dang ldan pa ni/ /bu dang bde ba mang po 'thob par byed/ /g.yon pa mtho ba chen por bshad/ /g.yaS
219b6(mdo 'grel): pa mthon bud med don dang bral/ /sbrul dang byi la'i mig can dge ba med/ /dmar ser mig can gyos pa 'am bu dang ni/ /pha la sogs pa rnams dang sbyor bar byed/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin du snyoms shing sdug /snum pa ring zhod zhib pa'i mdangs
219b7(mdo 'grel): can ni/ /rma bya ngang pa ri dags lta bu yang/ /bud med mchog tu gyur pa'i mtshan ma yin/ /mig gi rdzi ma mang bas snum zhing gtsang/ /nor can nor gyi bdag mo byed cing 'chi/ /smin ma mthing gnag ring zhing snyoms la gcang/ /rna ba chen mo
220a1(mdo 'grel): sha can zhum zhing gtsang/ /skra med chung ma min 'dir bde ba'i mtshan/ /de 'dra gang la yod pa bde ba'i mtshan/ /dpral ba'i ri mo gsum pa rtsa dang spu/ /snyoms pa drud ba tshe ring ba de ba'i mdzod/ /che chung snyoms pa ring thung mad pa ni?//
220a2(mdo 'grel): ri mo legs par mtho ba rgyal po dang/ /lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba rgya mtshos bshad/ /bud med phag gi skra ltar sbom zhing ring/ /ngas ni khyo bo za bar 'gyur ba yin/ /bud med phag gi gzugs ltar sbom zhing ring/ /ser skya'i sgra can khyo
220a3(mdo 'grel): dang 'khon par byed/ /rdul can skra mdog srab pa sdug bsngal 'thob/ /ring thung lag ba'i tshang can snum pa yin/ /rma bya'i gdangs can rgyal bos sbyong bar 'gyur/ /rgya mchos bstan pa las/ bud med kyi mtshan bcu ba'o/ /rdzogs so// //
220a4(mdo 'grel): yul dpus 'gyur tshal gyi o tan+t+ra spu ri'i tsug lag khang gi phyi rol/ /tshad tra pur gyi grong khyer gyi/ /paN+Di ta pra ba ka ra dang/ bod yul gyi lo tsa ba/ dge slong uryan pas/ dpal bde chen gling/ ri'o sbud trar sgyur ba legs so//
220a5(mdo 'grel): gang la gnyer ma lnga yod cing/ /de yi sna rgyud mtho ba dang/ /dpral ba'i mdza' gnyis rgyas shing mtho/ /lus bo shin tu sbom la snyoms/ /mgo bo zlum zhing rab tu rgyas/ /smar srab cing snyoms pa dang/ /na chung lta bur num rgyas/ /
220a6(mdo 'grel): dkar dang so ni dam zhing snyoms/ /mig gi dbang po rgyas la gsal/ rna ba mdangs sdug chung zhing snyoms/ /phrag gong rab tu rgyas pa dang/ /rkang pa'i sor mo bcu gnyis pa/ /sha rgyas skrag bzang bol gong mgo/ /gang gi mchan/ bung spu med
220a7(mdo 'grel): pa/ /lag pa chung zhing sha rgyas ba/ /de rnams mtshan ldan lha yi rigs/ /skom gdungs che zhing chung du za/ /sha yi zas la rnam par rtsi/ /nad med de yi lus la ni/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i lo lon tshe/ /chu'i gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yul
220b1(mdo 'grel): rnams bskor zhing rnam phar 'khyam/ /kun tu bde skyid ldan par byed/ /brdzun tshig spangs shing thams cad ster/ /'dod pa chung zhing mi rku ba/ /don rnams smas ba bzhin du bsgrub/ /gang zhig mi yi rigs gyur ga /gdong ring gyen du gnyer ma can/
220b2(mdo 'grel): smar nyung zhing rna shal ring/ /gsus ba lag pas rnam par 'grul/ /'bru tshugs su ni rnam par blta/ /lus po rdzud cing skem pa dang/ kha spu mang zhing ring ba dang/ /de yi mig ni gting du song/ /sna ni cung zad leb pa dang/ /lus bongs ring zhing
220b3(mdo 'grel): brnab sems che/ /mang du za zhing rku la 'khon/ /'dod pa che la gcig tu sdong/ /chos min spyod cing thob tshad za/ /sems ngan de ni mi yi ra gas/ /rkang ba ring zhing gdong pa bskam/ /rkang lag sar kha mang ba dang/ /gnag cing ba spu med pa dang
220b4(mdo 'grel): zas ngan za zhing bzang po 'dor/ /mtshan ngan de ni nyi ma 'dod/ /lag ba'i nor rnams nyams par byed/ /de rnams mtshan can yi dags mi/ 'gro zh+ng 'gro zhing sdod pa dang/ /'gro zhing phyogs rnams kun tu blta/ rkang sha med rtsa yis gang/ /sma
220b5(mdo 'grel): ra che 'am yang na med/ /de rnams mchan can dung 'gro'i rigs/ /de rnams rnam par bshang bya ga /gang gi dpral ba'i skra mtshams la/ /thig le 'am ri mo sngo can chags/ /blo las ldan zhing sdug bsdul 'thog /sna yi g.yas g.yon
220b6(mdo 'grel): mkhur ba la/ /sha mtshan nag po chags gyur na/ /zla drug lon nas nad kyis 'debs/ /mig la nag po chags pa na/ /nor yod zas kyis 'phongs par 'gyur/ /gdong pa gtsang zhing mdangs bzang na/ /nad mang gtsang zhing bde bar 'tsho/ mkhur
220b7(mdo 'grel): ba g.yas sam g.yon pa la/ /mdzad pa chung ngu chags pa na/ /longs spyod ldan zhing rnyed pa 'thob/ /sna 'debs nad la rme ba chags/ /gang zhig sum cu lon pa'i tshe/ /gser dang rta yi rnyed pa ni/ /rgyal po las ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /mi 
221a1(mdo 'grel): spyad 'di rdo rje gdan du/ uryan bas bsgyur ba'o// /rgya gar skad du/ kA ka dza ri ti/ bod skad du/ /bya rog gi skad brtag par bya ba 'di lta ste/ /bram ze dang/ /rgyal rigs dang/ /rje rigs
221a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ dmangs rigs zhes so/ /de la zho la rtsi ba bram ze'o/ /mig dmar ba rgyal rigs so/ /gshog ba sprug pa rje rigs so/ /nya'i gzugs lta bu rmangs rigs so/ /mi gtsang ba za ba dang/ /sha 'dod ba yang de bzhin no/ /'di dag
221a3(mdo 'grel): gi skad kyi rnam 'gyur ni/ /khyim bdag gis cig car bden par 'gyur ba ni brjod par bya ste/ /thun dang po shar du bya rog skad sgrogs na sems can gyi 'dod pa 'grub bar 'gyur ro/ /me ru bya rog sgrogs na dgra 'ong bar 'gyur ro
221a4(mdo 'grel): lho ru bya rog skad sgrogs na grogs po 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bden bral du bya rog skad sgogs na ma bsams pa'i red pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /nub du bya rog skad sgrogs na rlung chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi phyogs su bya rog skad sgrogs na

221a6(mdo 'grel): lo rdzogs so// thun gnyis pa la shar du bya rog skad sgrogs na rang gi nye ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /lto ru bya rog skad sgrogs na me tog dang gol thob par 'gyur ro/ /bden bral du bya rog skad sgrogs na rgyud pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /nub du skad sbroD
221a7(mdo 'grel): na thag rings su 'go bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi mtshams su skad sgrogs na rgyal po gzhan du 'gyur ba'i rtags/ /byang du sgang sgrogs na 'phrin las legs par thos par 'gyur ro/ /dbang ldan no du sbad sgregs? na 'khrug pa 'ong bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i gan
221b1(mdo 'grel): su skad sgrogs na 'dod pa'i 'jug pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /thun gnyis ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs so// //thun gsum pa la shar du bya rog skad sgrogs na nor rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /me ru bya rog skad sgrogs na 'thab mo 'ong bar 'byu ro/ /lte ru skad sgrogs na rlung po 'ong bar
221b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /bden bral du skad sgrogs na dgra 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /nub du skad sgrogs na bud med 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung phyogs su skad sgrogs na nye ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang phyogs su skad sgrogs na grogs po bzang po 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang ldan du skad sgrogs
221b3(mdo 'grel): na mas 'chig bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i gnas su skad sgrags na rgyal pos thugs la brtags pa'i rnyed pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /thun gsum pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs so// //thun bzhi ba la shar du bya rog skad sgrogs na 'jigs ba che ba'i rtags so//
221b4(mdo 'grel): me ru skad sgrogs na rnyed ba che ba'i rtags so/ /lho ru skad sgrogs na 'gron po 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdan bral du skrang sgrogs na zhag bdun du rlung po 'gyung bar 'gyur ro//nub du skad sgrogs na rlung po'i tshar 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ rlung gi mtshams su skad sgrogs na
221b5(mdo 'grel): nor gtor ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /byang du bya rog skad sgrogs na rgyal po 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang ldan du skad sgrags na go la rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /cha ngas pa'i gnas su bya rog skang sgrogs na ltogs pa'i rtags so/ /thun phyed dang bzhi'i 'khor lo rdzogs so// //
221b6(mdo 'grel): nyi ma nub pa'i tshe shar du bya rog skad sgrogs na lam du dgra 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /me ru sgra sgrogs na gter 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /lha ru sgra sgrogs na nad kyis bchi bar 'gyur ro/ /srin po'i mtshams su sgra sgrogs na sems kyi 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nub du bya rog
221b7(mdo 'grel): skad sgregs na nye ba/ 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi mtshams su skad sgrogs na nor rnyed pa'i rtags so/ /byang du skad sgrogs na rgyal po la bkur sti 'ong par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i gnas su skad sgrogs na bsam pa'i rnyed pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /thun bzhi ba'i
222a1(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo rdzogs so// //'di lta bu'i bya rog gi skad kyi rnam 'gyur rdzogs so// //da ni 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste/ /'gro ba'i dus su bya rog gi skad kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste/ /rags dang chu'i 'gram
222a2(mdo 'grel): dag la/ /shing gcig la ni da bzhin du/ /grog stong dang ni lam bzhi la/ /g.yas su bya rog sgra sgrogs na/ /'gro ba 'di ni legs par shes/ /lam la rab tu 'gro ba'i tsha/ /rgyab tu bya rog sgra sgrogs na/ /dngos grub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ /lam du
222a3(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba'i tshe gshog pa sprug cing skad 'don na/ /bar chad chen po 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /lam du zhugs pa'i tshe skra mchus gzings shing sgra sgrogs na de'i tshe 'chi ba'i rtags so/ /lam du zhugs pa'i tshe mi gtsang ba za zhing sgra sgrogs na
222a4(mdo 'grel): bza' dang skom 'ong ba'i rtags so/ /lam du zhugs pa'i tshe tsher ma la gnas shing sgra sgrogs na dgra'i 'jigs par shes par bya'o/ /lam du zhugs pa'i tshe 'o ma can gyi shing la gnas shing sga sgrogs na/ /de'i tshe 'o thug
222a5(mdo 'grel): gi bza' ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /shing skam po la gnas shing sgra sgrogs na de'i tshe bza' ba dang skom med pa'i rtags so/ /phro brang la gnas nas gang gi tshe skad sgrogs na de'i tshe sdod sa bzang po rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gdan la gnas nas sgra sgregS
222a6(mdo 'grel): na dgra 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /sgo lta zhing sgra sgrog na mtshams kyi 'jigs par shes par bya'o/ /mchus gos gzings shing bya rog skad sgrogs na gos rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /lam la zhugs ba'i tshe thod pa la gnas shing sgra
222a7(mdo 'grel): sgogs na 'chi ba'i rtags so/ /skud pa dmar po bzung nas khyim gyi thog du gnas naS sgra sgrogs na khyim 'tshig par 'gyur ro/ /snga dra'o dus su bya rog mang po 'tshogs na rlung po che bar 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /lam la zhugs pa'i
222b1(mdo 'grel): tshe shing mchus bzung nas sgra sgrogs na rnyed pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /lam la zhugs pa'i tshe nyi ma shar dus su bya rog sgra sgrogs na nor rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /lam du zhugs pa'i tshe sgra sgrogs na 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta
222b2(mdo 'grel): bu'i lam gyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so// //gnas ba'i bya rog gi tshang gi mtshan nyid ni/ /shing gi shar gyi phyogs kyi yal ga la tshang byed par gyur na/ de'i tshe lo bzang ba dang char 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /lho phyogS
222b3(mdo 'grel): kyi yal ga la tshang byed par gyur na de'i tshe 'bru ngan par 'gyur ro/ /shing gi dbus kyi yal ga la tshang byed na de'i tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'og tu tshang 'cha' na pha rol gyi dmag las 'jigs par 'gyur
222b4(mdo 'grel): ro?/ /rtsig pa 'am sa 'am chu la tshang byed na rgyal po 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/ ka ka zhes bya rog skad sgrogs na nor rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /da da zhes bya rog skad sgrogs na sdug bsngal 'byung

222b6(mdo 'grel): mthong na bya rog la gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /sbal ba'i sha? bya rog dga' bar byed pas/ des gtor ma phul na bar chad med par 'gyur ro/ /oM mi ri mi ri badzra tu da Da ga liM grih+na gi slahA/ /
222b7(mdo 'grel): 'di lta bu'i bya rog gi spyod pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po dA na shi las/ yul dbus kyi yar klungs thad po che'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// //pri ri bratshtsi/ /
223a1(mdo 'grel): byu tpat+tis mAti Sh+Thati maM gal/ na ma b+haga wa te shAkya mun ye tathA ga tA yA rha te samyaksaM bud+d+hA ya bud+d+hA?(mdo 'grel): b+ha ga bAn tathA ga ta(mdo 'grel): arhan samyaksaM bu d+d+ha(mdo 'grel): bidyA tsa ra Na
223a2(mdo 'grel): bye brag tu rtogS par byed pa bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang sku dang che ba nyid kyi rnam gangs kyi ming la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzoD pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan ba
223a3(mdo 'grel): sampan+tasu ga ta(mdo 'grel): loka bita a nu t+tar pu ru Sha damya sA rathA(mdo 'grel): shAstA? dzin loka dz+nye Sh+Tha(mdo 'grel): sarba dz+nya tA yi de bA ti de ba(mdo 'grel): maha rShi d+harmma swA mI riSha b+ha:

255b4(mdo 'grel): dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dbang rtog pa dang bcas spyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa mad pa dbyed
255b5(mdo 'grel): e ko ti b+hA bA da'i ta rkam bi tsA raM sa mA d+hi dzo? pri ti su khaM dwi tAM yand+hya? na mU pa saM pa dya bi har ti/ su pri to bi rA gA du pek+Sha ko bi tar ti smri ti ssaM pra dza na su kha tsa kA yen pra ti
255b6(mdo 'grel): pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis brdzogs par byas te gnas so/ de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyi gangs

257b1(mdo 'grel): ma ma ni si kA rA da nan+ta mA kA sha mityA ka shA nan+tyA ya tan mu pa saM pa dye bi ha ra tya yany+tsa tu rtho bi mo k+Sha(mdo 'grel): sa sarba sha A kA shA nan+tyA ya ta naM sa ma ti kra myA nan+tyAn+ta bi dz+nyA nA mi ti dz+nyA nA nan+tya marta? na sa mu pa saM pa dya
257b2(mdo 'grel): kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mdza' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched rdzogs bar byas te gnas pa da ni rnaM par thar pa bzhi pa'o de rnam pa thaMs cad du nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnaM par shes ba mdza' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mdza' yaS skye mched

258a1(mdo 'grel): zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad kyi ming la/ /ad+hya t+marU paM saM dz+nyI ba hind+hA rU pA Ni baSh+yan+ti pa ri t+tA ni su par+N+NA rbar+N+NA ni tA ni kha lu rU pA tA b+hi b+hu? yadzA nAn+tya b+hi b+hu ya pa sh+yan+tya pa saM dz+nyA tsa b+ha ba tI daM twitri? yas?
258a2(mdo 'grel): nad gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzuD chu bdu kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste de lta bu 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i
258a3(mdo 'grel): ma b+hi b+hU? ya ta naM/ ad+d+hyA? t+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyA ba hird+ha rU pA Ni pa sh+yan+ti ma hAbb+hU tA ni su bar+N+Na du rbar+N+NA ni tA ni kha lu rU pA NA b+hi b+hU ya dzA nA n+tya b+hi b+hU ya pa sh+ya n+tya paM saM dz+nyI tsi b+ha ba tI daM dwi tI ya mab+hi b+hwA ya ta naM/
258a4(mdo 'grel): skye mched dang po'o// nad gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen por gyur pa kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste de lta bur 'du shes par gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o//
258a5(mdo 'grel): ad+hyA t+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyA ba hijha? rU pA Ni pa sh+yan+ti nI lA ni nI la bar+N+NA ni nI la ni da rsha nA ni nI la nirb+hA sani tadyathA u mada Shu phu ShpaM sampan+na bA rA Na se yaM ba straM nI la bar+N+Na nI la ni darsha na nI la nirb+hA saM me pA d+hyA t+ma rU bA
258a6(mdo 'grel): nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la blta ste dper na zar ma'i me tog gi yul bA NI?  sa'i ras phun sum tshogs pa kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba de bzhin du nad gzugs med
258b1(mdo 'grel): saM dz+nyI ba hird+hA rU pA Ni pa sh+yan+ti nI lA ni nI la baN+Na ni nI la ni darshanA ni nirb+hA sA nI daM tri tI ya ma b+hi b+hwa ya ta nam/ a b+hya t+ma sa rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hird+ha rU pA Ni pa sh+yan+ti pI tA ni pI ta bar+N+Na ni pI ta ni darsha nA ni pI ta nirb+hA sA ni
258b2(mdo 'grel): bar 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zi li gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po la 'bur ston pa 'ong ser po 'byung ba rnams po lnga ste
258b3(mdo 'grel): ta dya thA kar+N+Ni kA ra pu ShpaM sampan+na bA bA rA NA se yaM ba straM pI taM bar+N+Na pi ta ni darsha naM pI ta ni rb+hA sa me bA d+hyAt+ma marU pa saMdz+nyI ba hird+hA rU pA Ni pa sh+yan+ti pI tA ni pI ta baN+NA ni pI ta ni darshanA ni pI tanarb+hA sA na i daM tsa turtha ma b+hi b+hA ya
258b4(mdo 'grel): dper na dong ka'i me tog gam yul bA ra Na sa'o? ras phun sum tshogs pa ser po kha dog ser po lta bur ston pa 'od ser po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od zer po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched

258b6(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa'o/ nad gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'dod mar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na bandu dzI ba ka'i me tog gam yul bA ra Na si nyi ras phun sum tshogs pa dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar por 'byung ba de bzhin du ?

259a5(mdo 'grel): rU pA Ni pa sh+yan+ta badA tA n+ya ba dA ta bar+N+NA mya ba dA ta ni darsha nA ni a ba dA tA ni rb+hA sA n+ye daM Sha Shtha ma b+hi b+hA ya ta naM/ sa sarba sho ru ba saM dz+nyA nA sa ma ti kra mA tpra tig+ha saM dz+nyA nA ma staM ga nA nA twa saM dz+nyA nA ma ma na si kA rA dan nA mA

259b3(mdo 'grel): tI da maSh+Ta ma ma b+hi b+hwa ya ta naM/ /zad par gyi skye mched bcu'i ming la/ /nI la krit+sna ya ta naM/ pI ta kri t+sA ya ta naM/ lo hi ta kri t+snA ya ta naM/ a badA ta krit+snA ya ta naM/ bri thi bI kra t+snA ya ta naM/ a pra krit+snA ya ta naM/

259b5(mdo 'grel): te dza kri t+sna ya ta naM/ pA yu kri t+snA ya ta naM/ A kA sha kri t+snA ya ta naM/ bidz+nyA na krit+snA ya ta naM/ pri thi bI krit+snA mi tye kes dza na te i tyU rd+ha mad+ha sti ryam dwa ya ma pra mA NaM/ a pa te dzo bA yu nAM la lapI ta lo hi tA

260a1(mdo 'grel): ba dA ta krit+snA mi tye ke saM dza na te i tyU rd+ha mad+ha stiryam dwa ya mapra mA NAM/ /rnam yang thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ming/ /shU n+ya tA/ a ni mi t+taM/ a pra Ni hi taM/ /rton pa bzhi'i ming la// artha pra ?
260a2(mdo 'grel): ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o zhes steng dang 'og dang thad kar gnyis su med cing tshad med par 'du shes su byed stong pa nyid mtshan ma med pa smon pa med pa
260a3(mdo 'grel): sar Ne na b+ha bi ta byaM/ na byany+dza sha pra ti sa ra Ne na/ d+harma pra ti sar Ne na b+ha bi ta byaM pung+ga las ra Ne na/ dz+nyAn pra ti sara Ne na b+ha bi byaM/ na bidz+nyA na pra ti sara Ne na/ nItArtha swu traM pra tisa raN na b+ha ba ti byan+na ni yArtha sU pra tis ra Ne na/

260b2(mdo 'grel): chos yang dag par len pa bzhi da ltar byung ba la bde la phyi ma la rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba da ltar byung ba la sdug bsngal phyi ma la rnam par smin pa bde ba da ltar byung ba la yang bde la phyi ma la rnam par smin pa bde ba
260b3(mdo 'grel): pratyu tpan+na du(mdo 'grel): kha mA ya tyAM du(mdo 'grel): kha bi pa kaM /nor bdun gyi ming la/ /sh+rad+d+hA d+hA naM/ shI lad+ha naM/ h+rI d+ha naM/ a pa tra bya d+ha naM/ sh+ru tad+ha naM/ tyA gad+ha naM/ pradz+nyA d+ha naM/ /blana med pa drug gi ming la/ da rshanA nut+ta ryaM/
260b4(mdo 'grel): de ltar byung pa la'ang sdug bsngal la phyi ma la rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba dad pa'i nor tshul khrims kyi nor ngo tsha shes pa'i nor khrel yod pa'i nor thos pa'i nor gtong ba'i nor shes rab kyi nor mthong ba bla na med pa/
260b5(mdo 'grel): sh+ra ba Na nu t+taryaM/ lA b+hA nut+ta ryaM/ shak+ShA nut+ta ryaM pa ri tsaryA nut+ta ryaM/ a nu smri tya nut+ta ryaM/ /byin gyis brlabs pa bzhi'i ming la/ /sa tyA d+hiSh+ThA? naM/ tyA gA d+hiSh+Tha naM/ u ba sha mad+hiSh+Tha naM/ pradz+nyA d+hiSh+ThA naM /
260b6(mdo 'grel): thos pa bla na med pa rnyed pa bla na med pa slob pa bla na med pa rim? gro bya ba bla na med pa rjes su dran pa bla na med pa /bden pa'i byin gyis brlab pa gtong ba'i byin gyis brlab pa nye bar zhi ba byin gyis brlab pa shes rab kyi byin gyis brlabs// 
261a1(mdo 'grel): mchog tu dga' ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos dgu'i ming la/ /na ba bra mo dya bU? rbaka d+harmmA/ bra mu da ti sya prI ti dzA ya te/ prI ta ma nas(mdo 'grel): kA ya(mdo 'grel): pra sra bd+ha te/ pra srabb+ha kA ya(mdo 'grel): su kha bed ya ti/
